name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml
description: Forming an invisible bandage on sore skin, La Roche-Posay's insulating Cicaplast Gel B5 brings instant relief to compromised and damaged skin. This is one treatment to keep stocked on your shelfie at all times. Your new personal at-home healer can be used by every member of the family to treat damaged skin and even when recovering from laser treatments and cosmetic peels. Working to stimulate new cell production is a complex of copper, manganese and zinc that are perfectly partnered with hyaluronic acid, drawing in all the water your skin is craving. Wondering what brings that instant relief? Panthenol is your hero ingredient at play here at 5% to immediately soothe sore skin. Using this just twice a day is enough to speed up healing times and improve your skin barrier health. It might sound too good to be true but this clinically tested treatment has the dermatologist seal of approval!
how_to_use: Apply twice a day to cleansed and dry skin. Do not apply directly on wounded skin. Avoid the eye contour area.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Polybutene, Sodium Citrate, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Zinc Gluconate, Madecassoside, Dimethiconol, Manganese Gluconate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Copper Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Tocopherol.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Matte Beauty Blush Wand (Various Shades)
description: Brighten, blur and blush with Charlotte Tilbury's Pillow Talk Matte Beauty Blush Wands, featuring long-lasting pigments and an easy to blend formula, there's a shade for every look and occasion. Add a pop of flawless colour to your cheeks with the latest icon to arrive from Charlotte Tilbury's flawless ranks. Elevate your look with a spectrum of digitally-developed shades that have been endlessly tested on and off screen to ensure they hit the beauty mark. Each shade harnesses the light-reflective power of Lumi-Blur technology that reveals a soft-focus finish and a flawless pop of colour. Choose from three flattering shades: the pretty in pink 'Pillow Talk Pink Pop', the nudey-peach of 'Pillow Talk Peach Pop' and 'Pillow Talk Dream Pop's' cherry-pink hue.
how_to_use: DIAL UP THE DOTS - using the easy-to-use cushion applicator apply 1 dot for day, 2 for date and 3 for disco, onto the apples of your cheeks! BLEND - using the Hollywood Complexion Brush, blend after each application up along the cheekbones towards the temples for a lift effect - avoiding the eye area!
ingredient: Pillow Talk Pink Pop:Isododecane, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Mica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, 1,2-hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410)]. Pillow Talk Peach Pop:Isododecane, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Mica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, 1,2-hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985)]. Pillow Talk Dream Pop:Isododecane, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Mica, Dicalcium Phosphate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, 1,2-hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985)].

name: Laura Mercier Real Flawless Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)
description: Dress your skin in a filter-like fluid with the Real Flawless Foundation. Weightless, waterproof and long-wearing, this medium-coverage foundation beautifully blurs the lines between skin care and make up. Controlling shine with Laura Mercier's Auto Balancing Technology, bamboo silk powders blur the appearance of skin, while a lipid matrix manages moisture levels and reigns in the shine, bringing to the fore a natural finish. For coverage that doesn't cake, the Perfecting Color Technology uses high resolution pigments to enliven skin with the just the smallest pump of pigment; and sweetening the skin care deal is an antioxidant-rich infusion of camelia seed, vitamin E and cacao extract to protect skin from environmental damage and blue light. Available in 30 shades in a range of undertones, you've just found your newest complexion companion.
how_to_use: Apply to clean skin with Laura's Real Flawless Foundation Brush. Begin with one pump, as minimal product is needed to achieve your desired coverage. For best results, apply over your preferred Laura Mercier Pure Canvas Primer.
ingredient: Isododecane, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Hydrogenated Didecene, Silica, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Dicalcium Phosphate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Cellulose, Lauryl Pca, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Aqua/Water/Eau, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylene Glycol. May Contain/Peut Contenir/(+/-): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).

name: Westman Atelier Eye Pods
description: A luminous eyeshadow trio in two iterations for day and for night, Westman Ateliers Eye Pods are brimming with super-soft pigment that seamlessly blends for a smooth, hazy finish. Formulated with only the finest ingredients, each velvety cream-powder hybrid applies like a dream for phenomenal payoff thats easily layered to dial up the drama and switch up the finish from subtle to show-stopping. Formulated with silky emollients, derived from coconut oil and fatty acids in lieu of silicones for luxurious slip and blendability, the naturally-derived pigments are bound together by a unique oil-gel suspension system that delivers a luminous finish. With featherweight rice and plant extracts to guarantee velvety smooth application, the magnetic pods snap together to make them immensely portable. Made without silicones, parabens, PEGS, phthalates, talc or synthetic fragrance, choose from Les Jours (Neiges, Chocolat and Tabac) or Les Nuits (Noir, Champagne and Vin Rouge).
how_to_use: Gucci created each Eye Pod palette with one classic core shade thats a seamless base or smudgy liner; one accent shade for an amplified pop of colour, and one highlight shade to brighten lids and tear ducts. This clean eye shadow formula has a healthy luminosity to the finish thats super wearable. Sheer it out for a glass translucent effect or go full on with a warm bronze or deep burgundy lid. "I love the idea of a perfectly edited palette that clicks together and apart: Throw one in your bag and take it with you, or layer all three shades for more intensity."

name: benefit Fluff Up Brow Wax 6ml
description: Leaning into the trend of fluffed-up, bushy brows, the new Fluff Up Brow Wax gives you the ultimate control over your brow shape. Available in a full size and mini for all your needs (and bags), this humidity-proof wax is about to revolutionise your brow game. Boasting a completely translucent hue and carefully structured brush, this flexible brow-texturising wax gives you a crunch-free hold that you can reshape time and time again. With a setting power of 12 hours, this brow-loving wax will see you through the working day, without budging in the face of sweat, humidity and water. Lightweight, buildable, this is the key to the perfectly undone look.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage: Brush wax through brows using upward strokes to fluff up and texturize. To pump up the fluff, gently comb brow hair against direction of natural growth. Then, brush brows into desired shape. Pro-Tips: Layer Fluff Up Brow Wax over Benefit Cosmetics’ Precisely, My Brow Pencil (sold separately) for a fuller, richer, precisely defined look. When to set versus when to fluff: If you want brows that are fluffy and look texturized with a flexible, reworkable hold, Fluff Up Brow Wax is your go-to solution! It easily shapes, feathers, tames, and sets brows with the perfect amount of playtime. If you want brows that are structured and perfectly placed with a lasting hold, Benefit Cosmetics’ 24-HR Brow Setter (sold separately) is the ideal option—it sculpts, shapes, controls, and sets brows in place all day.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Synthetic Candelilla Wax, Steareth-21, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cellulose, Silica, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax), Agrania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Arginine, Tocopherol, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Dimethicone.

name: Laura Mercier High Vibe Lip Colour Lipstick 10g (Various Shades)
description: Coating your pout with long-wearing pigment, the High Vibe Lip Colour delivers a generous dose of high-resolution vibrancy and mirror-like shine. With everything from pinch-me pinks to go-to nudes, choose from 16 enlivening shades to transform your look with effortless application. Gliding with ease thanks to nourishing guava oil, this ultra-comfortable formula is jusssst what your beauty bag has been waiting for!
how_to_use: Press bullet to lips and apply, using even pressure, following the natural shape of the lips. Technique: The 'Smooth and Blend': For a light coverage application, dot on lips, then smooth and blend to spread colour evenly. The 'Swipe and Press': For a medium coverage application, apply on lower lip and press lips together to blend. The 'Line and Apply': For a high coverage, more defined lip look, line lips with a complementary shade of Longwear Lip Liner before or after High Vibe application.
ingredient: Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Mica, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Silica, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Psidium Guajava Fruit Extract, Ethyl Vanillin, Flavor (Aroma), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Disteardimonium Hectorite. May Contain/Peut Contenir/(+/-):Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake(Ci 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985).

name: NARS Soft Matte Complete Foundation 45ml (Various Shades)
description: A brand that needs no introduction, NARS is a definitive cult classic and renowned trailblazer remaining at the forefront of the beauty world that has quickly earned a permanent place in the hearts (and make up bags!) of all who try it. From the revolutionary Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation to the iconic Sheer Glow Foundation and the latest dew-enhancing formula - the Light Reflecting Foundation - NARS are world-renowned for their complexion essentials. Here to satisfy and mattify the complexions of those averse to a dewy finish, the Soft Matte Foundation harnesses superior oil-absorbing powders and a ‘Hydramatte Balancing Complex’ to reveal a smooth, shine-free and perfectly balanced appearance. Gone are the days of the dreaded ‘flat matte’ finish, this breakthrough formula has a hot new take on matte… resistant to oxidation, completely transfer and shine-proof and even protects against pollution and blue light. Natural, matte, full coverage is coming your way…
how_to_use: PAT. PRESS. BLEND. Dispense a small amount on to the back of your hand. One drop delivers full coverage with fingertip application. PAT product with fingertips Start at the centre of the face and gently PRESS the foundation on skin Use a stippling motion to BLEND outward. Work in small sections, focusing on one area at a time.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Glycerin, Lauryl Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Bis-Butyldimethicone Polyglyceryl-3, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Plankton Extract, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Polysilicone-2, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Barium Sulfate, Tocopherol, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Alumina, Glucose, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Sodium Succinate, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)

name: RevitaLash Lash and Brow Masque 5ml
description: Fluttering into your lash and brow care routine (don’t have one? This is your sign to rectify that, quick smart!), the Lash & Brow Masque is the ultra-reparative treatment that promises to strengthen and condition often-fragile lash and brow hairs for a fuller, healthier look. Designed to fight the compromising effects of over-styling, daily make up use or damage caused by professional lash or brow services, a cocktail of powerhouse ingredients offer a burst or nourishment for hairs. Think: Revitalash’s ‘Tri-Flora Complex’ — a trio of ginseng, gleditsia and white nettle — which fortifies hair to bring back natural vitality and elasticity (meaning less breakage over time); biotin, which improves your body’s keratin levels (that’s the all-important protein found in your hair); and vitamin E, which strengthens, nourishes and infuses hair with shine.
how_to_use: Twice a week, swipe the applicator evenly over clean, dry lashes and brows until fully coated.Leave on for at least 15 minutes, or until product dries. Apply warm water on lashes and brows, continuing to soak until product begins to loosen or release from the hair. Use comb side of the applicator to remove the masque gently from the lashes and brows. Repeat until product is fully removed. To clean the comb, use antibacterial soap and warm water. Let dry naturally. Do not sanitise with alcohol or any other chemical steriliser.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera Wax, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Behenyl Behenate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Stearic Acid, Polysorbate 80, Aminomethyl Propanol, Dimethicone, Isostearyl Alcohol, Mica, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Silica, Trehalose, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Phenoxyethanol Sodium Acrylates Crosspolymer-2, Hydrated Silica, Biotin, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tetrasodium Edta, Disodium Edta Hydroxyacetophenone, Gleditsia Triacanthos Seed Extract, Lamium Album Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Tocopherol, CI 77891, CI 77007.

name: IT Cosmetics CC+ and Nude Glow Lightweight Foundation and Glow Serum with SPF40 32ml (Various Shades)
description: Colour correction, skin care and natural-looking coverage in one skin-loving formula, that’s what you get with IT Cosmetics’ latest revolutionary creation. The first CC cream to be formulated with 90% (yes, you read that right… 90%) skin care ingredients, this lightweight, fluid tint is a sure-fire way to achieve the laid-back no-make up make up look. Amalgamating your medium-coverage foundation, brightening serum and SPF into one trailblazing formula, the CC+ Nude Glow Lightweight Foundation + Glow Serum with SPF 40 is your new complexion essential, trust us on this one. Held within this skin-perfecting formula you’ll find humectant hero hyaluronic acid, skin-loving niacinamide and green tea extract, all working to grant a radiant complexion. Thanks to a buildable, medium coverage you can customise your base day in and day out while visibly improving everything from texture to tone. Fall in love with your skin again, and again, and again…
how_to_use: Apply 1-2 pumps to clean skin, as the last step of your AM skincare routine. Use your Heavenly Luxe™ Complexion Perfection Brush #7 makeup brush to effortlessly buff and blend foundation onto your face, neck and décolleté. Apply more product as needed to build your desired level of coverage.
ingredient: Active Ingredients: Homosalate 8.3% Octisalate 4.5% Octocrylene 5.6% Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Caprylyl Methicone, Dimethicone, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Niacinamide, Propanediol, Dimethicone/Peg-10/15 Crosspolymer, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Fragrance, Chlorphenesin, Caprylyl Glycol, Snail Secretion Filtrate, Silica Silylate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Limonene, Simethicone, Maltodextrin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Adenosine, Ethyl Hexanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citral, Linalool, Sodium Citrate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain Iron Oxides, Titanium Dioxide.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Charlotte's Jewel Lips
description: The jewel in the beauty queens crown, Charlottes Jewel Lips are more than just your average glosses. Supercharged with hero ingredients, you can expect hydrated, plumped lips with a mirror-like finish that lasts for up to seven hours. Infused with decadent diamond powder, Charlottes Jewel Lips give dazzlingly high levels of shine, creating a reflective appearance that cleverly conceals fine lines. Non-sticky, smooth and comforting, the formula allows for a drag-free application of sheer, glossy colour, while jewel-toned pearls offer a three-dimensional glow. Cue fuller and wider-looking lips, thanks to the supercharged hyaluronic acid and vitamin E hard-working ingredients that leave lips hydrated, supple and nourished. With five shades to choose from including the iconic 'Pillow Talk' (a pretty pink with gold sparkle) and 'Walk of No Shame' (a delicious ruby red with warm copper shimmer) youll find yourself reaching for these whenever your lips are in need of a serious treat.
how_to_use: Glide over the lips for hydrating shine with a veil of three-dimensional diamond sparkle.

name: Laura Mercier Translucent Loose Setting Powder 29g (Various Shades)
description: A definitive cult classic, this fan favourite setting powder feels sublimely soft setting make up without adding weight or texture. Applying to skin in a silky smooth fashion, this invisible setting powder casts a flawless, skin-perfecting veil over the complexion while avoiding creasing or caking. Simply swirl your brush in the powder and sweep across the T-zone or under eyes and watch this miracle worker blur pores, mattify and control oils, as well as brighten and lift your look. Boasting a 16-hour, soft matte finish, the no-flashback formula doesn't show up in photos (!) allowing you to confidently grab that Insta selfie completely shine free. The intelligent formula won't clog pores and comes in three versatile shades that cover a range of skin tones from fair to medium (with olive and golden undertones included) to deep. It's no surprise that this hard-working skin-perfecter is the recipient of numerous awards were obsessed!
how_to_use: Sprinkle a little powder into the top of the powder lid, then dip a brush or sponge into the powder and apply to the desired areas to set, bake or brighten the skin. Always apply after creamy formulas and not before.
ingredient: Talc, Magnesium Myristate, Nylon-12, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, EthylhexylPalmitate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Methylparaben, Lauroyl Lysine, Propylparaben, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Butylparaben, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopherol, Methicone. May contain: Ultramarines (Cl 77007), Iron Oxides (Cl 77491, Cl 77492, Cl 77499).

name: NARS Cosmetics Radiant Creamy Concealer (Various Shades)
description: Ask any beauty buff to name their favourite concealers and, chances are, the NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer will top the list. Coveted by anyone whos heard of it (from professional make up artists and beauty editors to make up junkies everywhere) for its luxurious texture and luminous finish, this dreamy concealer evens skin out with lightweight, medium-to-high buildable coverage. Leaving cakey, crease-prone formulas behind, this one is enriched with hydrating, multi-action skin care benefits and light-diffusing technology, creating a softer, smoother complexion while instantly obscuring imperfections and diminishing fine lines and signs of fatigue. Whether youre camouflaging dark circles, battling blemishes, hiding stubborn spots or simply evening out your skin tone, this long-wearing, crease-proof formula is the perfect option and it comes in 30 versatile shades (were hardly surprised that its the number one-selling concealer in the U.S.).
how_to_use: Use Radiant Creamy Concealer to blur any imperfections foundation won't cover and apply a few dots under eyes, blending with your finger.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Glycerin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Bis-Butyldimethicone Polyglyceryl-3, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Isostearic Acid, Polysilicone-2, Aluminum Hydroxide, Maltodextrin, Trisodium Edta, Lecithin, Silica, Tin Oxide, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Magnolia Officinalis (Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract), Tocopherol, Vitis Vinifera [Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract]. +/- May Contain: Mica, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake)]. Ingredients may vary between shades. Please refer to product packaging for a full list of ingredients.

name: Pat McGrath Labs Skin Fetish: Sublime Perfection Foundation 35ml (Various Shades)
description: When you combine over 25 years of historic make up artistry with the chance to create a second-skin foundation forallcomplexions, you're bound to end up with something iconic. The result? The Skin Fetish: Sublime Perfection Foundation. It's time to meet your perfect match... The second step in the Skin Fetish: Sublime Perfection System, this divine oil-free foundation takes the texture of a serum and unites it with a buildable, medium, soft-focus coverage and a weightless finish. Boasting 36 (!) universal shades, with five shade levels you can find your couture foundation with ease. More thanjusta foundation, you'll find a unique 'Vita-Serum Complex' within this illuminating formulation to care for your skin and help your natural radiance shine through. Mimicking your skin's natural structure for enhanced 12-hour wear and seamless blendability is a 'Biocompatible Powder Technology' to leave you with a finish so flawless, you'll think you're dreaming. As you build up this serum-soft foundation (which self-sets by the way) to reach your desired custom level of coverage you'll reveal a skin-like finish that's ready to walk the catwalk.
how_to_use: Sheer Perfection Pump a few drops onto the back of your hand and dot onto the cheeks, chin, forehead and nose with your fingertips. Blend from the centre of your face and move outwards, patting and pressing for a filtered, blurred effect. Pat additional product into areas where more coverage is desired. Sublime Perfection Pump a few drops onto the back of your hand and dot onto the cheeks, chin, forehead and nose with your fingertips or the Skin Fetish: Sublime Perfection Foundation Brush. Use the brush to seamlessly diffuse Foundation, working in sweeping motions as you blend outwards. Apply product in thin layers and buff to gradually build, blur and create radiant medium coverage. For more concentrated coverage, to conceal blemishes or brighten the under-eye, follow with Skin Fetish: Sublime Perfection Concealer.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isododecane, Alcohol, Glycerin, Phenyl Trimethicone, Ipdi/Di-C12-13 Alkyl Tartrate/Bis-Hydroxyethoxypropyl Dimethicone Copolymer, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Sodium Chloride, Aluminum Hydroxide, Benzimidazole Diamond Amidoethyl Urea Carbamoyl Propyl Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Di-C12-13 Alkyl Tartrate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hexyl Laurate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Rubus Idaeus Leaf Cell Culture, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate. May Contain / Peut Contenir / +/- : Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492, Ci 77491, Ci 77499)

name: VIEVE Modern Radiance Concealer 13ml (Various Shades)
description: What says 'perfection' other than the Modern Radiance Concealer? Available in 20 versatile shades that'll banish the dark circles, hyperpigmentation and imperfections, this hydrating liquid formula is here to brighten up your day with its magical doe-foot wand. Fused with hyaluronic acid, a unique 'Skin Thirst Relief Complex' and 'Phytoradiance Complex' this skin-loving concealer corrects and perfects your base like any multi-tasking marvel would. Complimenting your skin tone with flattering shades from light to deep, create eye-brightening illumination and cheek-chiselling depth to reveal a beautiful skin-like finish.
how_to_use: Apply using the doe foot where needed and blend out with VIEVE 119 Conceal & Prime Brush or fingers for a flawless looking finish. Customise your coverage by applying concealer and building as desired. JAMIE'S TOP TIP: Combine Modern Radiance Concealer with Skin Nova for customised tinted moisturiser, giving a luminous, lit-from-within light coverage finish.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Didecene, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Glycerin, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sorbitan Sesquistearate, Phenoxyethanol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Pentylene Glycol, Evodia Rutaecarpa Fruit Extract, Citric Acid, Fructose, Sodium Hydroxide, Urea, Allantoin, Maltose, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Lactate, Sodium Pca, Trehalose, Glucose, Sodium Hyaluronate, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)].

name: Huda Beauty Lovefest Obsessions Eyeshadow Palette
description: We’re feeling all kinds of groovy and ready to throw it back to the era of disco with the LOVEFEST Obsessions palette. It’s time to bedazzle your lids with an array of bio glitter sparkles, duo chrome shadows and bold mattes that will take you from dawn to dusk and desk to dancefloor in a hop, skip and a brush… Get ready to party like it’s 1969… Huda Beauty’s latest groovy collection boasts a new Obsessions palette that will have you releasing your inner Twiggy. Whether you’re after super wearable nudes, browns and terracottas, or shimmer-soaked metallics, this collection of 9 warm hues are here to help you create limitless eye looks. Effortlessly buildable with minimal fallout, this disco-inspired palette is ready and waiting to up your eye game with new textures from a dual-toned metallic marble to super creamy, semi-sheer crushed flake metallics. We’ve got disco fever…
how_to_use: Build your base with matte shadows. Pick up the metallic shades using a dense flat brush for a softer finish. For a fuller coverage foil effect, use your fingers or sponge applicator.

name: PATRICK TA Major Dimension II Rose Eyeshadow Palette
description: Would a rose with any other shimmer still dazzle as bright? Introducing a royal mix of rose-toned shades and shadows, Patrick Ta's Major Dimensions Rose Eyeshadow Palette is the key to ultra-romantic make up masterpieces. With luminous cream, iridescent metallic, glistening pearl and velvet matte pans to accentuate your eyes, this palette holds a gorgeous mix of warm, cool and neutral tones so you can create an array of looks — no matter if you're dialing up the drama with a smoky cut crease or playing it natural with a wash of rosy pigment. To begin your masterpiece, layer one of the three cream bases over your lids to create a rich canvas for the shadows that follow.
how_to_use: Using a brush, apply eyeshadows and blend as desired. Each shade can be worn alone or layered together for optimal depth and dimension.

name: IT Cosmetics Your Skin But Better CC+ Cream with SPF50 32ml (Various Shades)
description: Get ready to meet your complexions new best friend: IT Cosmetics Your Skin But Better CC+ Cream with SPF 50+. A make up phenomenon with hosts of devoted fans, this CC Cream (which stands for complexion correcting, not Cult Cult though it could do) provides a full coverage, sun damage-deflecting, brightening and hydrating finish. Available in 14 versatile shades and giving a subtly radiant result, this formula helps to conceal dark spots and minimise the appearance of pores. The formulas brimming with skin-nourishing ingredients too theres hydrating hyaluronic acid, strengthening soy extract, firming collagen and hydrolysed silk, along with grapefruit, orange, bergamot and lemon oils to infuse skin with refreshing vitamins. As well as this, theres the addition of SPF50+ broad-spectrum mineral sunscreens, which protect from harmful UVA and UVB rays.
how_to_use: Start your foundation routine by preparing and moisturising you skin with {Confidence in a Cream}. Then apply the CC Cream with a brush, starting from the centre of the face and blending outwards in a circular motion. Set the CC Cream with the {Bye Bye Pores Pressed Powder} or {Bye Bye Pores Finish Airbrush Powder}. Finish with a touch of blusher, bronzer, and highlighter from {Your Most Beautiful You} face palette.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Glycerin, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Hexyl Laurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Tocopherol, Silica, Panthenol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tin Oxide, Hydrated Silica, Methicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/-: Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides, Mica, Ci 77007/Ultramarines, Ci 15985/Yellow 6 Lake, Ci 42090/Blue 1 Lake, Ci 45410/Red 28 Lake, Ci 15850/Red 7]. D247442/1

name: Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Foundation
description: Charlotte Tilbury has continued to wow us over the years with her exceptional range of cult-beloved formulas and this Airbrush Flawless Foundation is certainly no exception! A long-wearing, full coverage yet weightless formula, it blends onto skin effortlessly to grant a smooth, natural matte, soft focus finish that is both transfer-resistant and sweat-proof. Going above and beyond, Charlotte Tilbury has spiked this complexion hero with a hefty supply of skin-loving ingredients to hydrate, protect against harmful pollutants, grant a fresh cooling effect and even reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Then theres the incredible shade range to rave about, with 44 shades that have been crafted to match both undertones and overtones. Available in cool, neutral and warm undertones in fair, medium, tan and deep overtones finding the perfect shade for you couldnt be easier!
how_to_use: Apply using a brush (we recommend Charlotte Tilbury's Hollywood Complexion Brush, or a stippled foundation brush) or with fingers for an airbrushed, flawless base.

name: Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray 118ml
description: Want a product that works just as hard (if not harder!) than you do? Look no further... Urban Decay's fan-favourite All Nighter Setting Spray has serious staying power – keeping your make up in place until you decide otherwise. The UK's #1 premium make up setting spray*, this mist-with-a-difference ensures that your look appears freshly applied until bedtime. Suitable for all skin types and formulated without oil, parabens, this PETA Certified, cruelty-free game-changing mist also features advanced Temperature Control Technology, which actually lowers the temperature of your make up to keep foundation, eyeshadow, blush and concealer in place, even when the weather (or the dancefloor) has designs on beauty sabotage... There's no nightclub too sweaty or island too hot for this featherlight – but heavy duty – formula. *According to the NPD Group. Value and Unit product sales of Total Prestige All Other Face segment, January to December 2019.
how_to_use: After applying make up, shake All Nighter Setting Spray bottle well, hold 8"-10" away, and mist face two-four times in an 'X' and a 'T' formation. Want extra intense shadow colour, less fallout and even longer wear? Wet your brush with the make up fixing spray before you apply. Warning: keep out of eyes. Close eyes before misting.
ingredient: Aqua / Water, Alcohol Denat., PVP, Dimethicone PEG-7 Phosphate, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Cocamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Glycereth-5 Lactate, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenylpropanol, Parfum / Fragrance, Propanediol, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Poloxamer 407, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Maltodextrin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Citronellol, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, BHT.

name: Huda Beauty Empowered Eyeshadow Palette 16.8g
description: Grab your beauty by the horns with the eye-conic Empowered Eyeshadow Palette and adorn your lids with daily doses of glamour. Stealing the show with 18 seamless shadows that are both intensely pigmented and perfectly blendable, take your look from here to here with a variety of textures and shades. Discover the starry-eyed world of rich metallics, wet-look shimmers, creamy gel-liner hybrids, enchanting golds and more! Taking your fluffy brush or even just your fingertips, prepare to unlock endless looks that’ll have you feeling as confident as ever…
how_to_use: Build your base with matte shadows. Pick up the metallic shades using a dense flat brush for a softer finish. For a fuller coverage foil effect, use your fingers or sponge applicator. For a soft pearlescent glow, apply the gloss hybrid shadow ‘Manifest It’ to bare lids, using your finger, or a flat brush. Finish your look and define your lash line using the hybrid gel liner shadows – ‘Purpose’ or ‘Worthy’ - as eyeliners.

name: Huda Beauty Easy Bake Loose Powder
description: Not content with keeping our lips, lashes, lids and cheeks looking flawless, Huda Beauty has unveiled the secret to perfectly baked make up looks: Easy Bake Loose Powder. Supremely smooth, silky and ultra-finely milled, this sublime powder blends seamlessly into skin leaving a soft, velvety matte finish with a hint of sheen thats a million miles from cakey, drying powders. Blessed with a beautiful, petal-esque perfume, its perfect for baking, setting make up in place all day long, blurring the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and controlling shine throughout the day all without creating a white cast or causing flashback in photographs. Paraben-free, non-comedogenic and enriched with protective vitamin E, the easy-to-use loose powder leaves a beautiful airbrushed finish, subtly colour correcting and highlighting and leaving a translucent veil of colour on your skin so you can bake without the cake! To suit your skin tone, there are eight sweet treat-inspired shades to choose from, including Cupcake, Banana Bread, Cinnamon Bun and Coffee Cake, alongside neutral 'Sugar Cookie' so grab your brush or blender and get ready to bake! *A bit baffled by baking? Hudas ingenious Insta Glossary describes it as applying a thick coat of translucent powder over your foundation in areas you want to look the brightest (often underneath eyes, along your jawline and down the centre of your nose) letting it sit for 3-5 minutes then dusting it off with a clean, fluffy brush.
how_to_use: Prep your skin with a moisturizer or primer. Apply concealer under the eye.Flip the jar upside down and tap the base twice to release powder: Apply a generous layer of powder under the eye, T-zone, laugh lines, outer corners of the mouth, and chin. Let powder bake for 3 to 5 minutes. Gently dust away excess powder. Other suggestions for use: - Apply a light amount of powder all over your face to remove shine and set any liquid formulas applied. - Use throughout the day to touch up, and control shine without the cake. Shade Descriptions: Sugar Cookie - Suitable for all fair to tan skin tones. Neutral undertones. Ultra-brightening. Cupcake - Suitable for fair to light skin tones. Pink undertones brighten and disguise under-eye darkness. Pound Cake - Suitable for fair, light, medium and tan skin tones. Golden undertones brighten and disguise under-eye darkness. Banana Bread - Suitable for light, medium and tan skin tones. Golden undertones brighten and disguise under-eye darkness. Blondie - Suitable for light, medium and tan skin tones. Golden undertones brighten, while pink undertones disguise under-eye darkness. Kunafa - Suitable for deep tan and rich skin tones. Golden undertones brighten and disguise under-eye darkness. Cinnamon Bun - Suitable for rich skin tones. Golden undertones brighten and disguise under-eye darkness. Coffee Cake - Suitable for rich skin tones. Golden and red undertones brighten and disguise under-eye darkness.
ingredient: Talc, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Dimethicone, Nylon-12, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene, Glycol, Oryza Sativa Starch / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Phenyl Trimethicone, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Parfum / Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Benzyl Salicylate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Benzoate, Ci 77492 / Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Ci 77491 / Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Ci 77007 / Ultramarines (Ci 77007)

name: SUQQU Signature Color Eyes 6.2g (Various Shades)
description: A palette of soft, tonal shadows to subtly amplify eyes, SUQQU’s Signature Colour Eyes quads come in an array of seductively sumptuous colourways from soft taupes to warm rosy tones to compliment the turn of the new season. Adorning your lids with gold-soaked radiance and layer-worthy shimmer, prepare to be the eye-con in every room. Bestowing a featherlight veil of smooth colour and lustre, the buildable shades can be easily layered for tailored intensity from pared-back to totally breath-taking. There’s no risk of creasing or caking and thanks to the clever clear pearls, every shade will diffuse with a semi-sheer finish that’s beautifully even and great for creating an endless array of arresting effects. With soft matte and pearlescent textures, the only downside is deciding which one you need first…
how_to_use: Apply with fingers or brushes - layering to increase the intensity.
ingredient: Mica, Talc, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Petrolatum, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Silica, Isotridecyl Isononanoate, Alumina, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Zinc Myristate, Tin Oxide, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Aluminum Hydroxide, Sodium Lauroyl Aspartate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Zinc Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, BHT, Ascorbyl Dipalmitate, May Contain(+/-) : CI 15850, CI 73360, CI 77007, CI 77120, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499, CI 77510, CI 77891.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Bronzer
description: Boasting the same soft-focus effect as her iconic, bestselling finishing powder, this all-new Airbrush Bronzer comes in four sunkissed shades to define and enliven your cheekbones. Going above and beyond your average bronzer we expect nothing less from this beauty trailblazer this powder is infused with hyaluronic acid and fine-as-air pigments to blur the look of pores and cast a silken, sun-soaked veil over your skin. This buttery bronzer diffuses effortlessly for a natural-looking matte finish that can be built from a wash of warm colour to contour-sharpening definition. Available in four hues, pick between Fair, Medium, Tan and Deep.
how_to_use: Apply to your face and body where the sun naturally tans cheekbones, jawline, top of shoulders, collarbone and the centre of your arms and legs. Buff onto the skin and blend with {The Air-Brush} retractable Kabuki-style bronzer brush for a sun-kissed, natural-looking finish.

name: benefit 24-Hour Brow Setter Clear Brow Gel
description: Benefit’s 24-HR Brow Setter is the ultimate way to regain control of unruly lashes and ensure that they don’t pull a disappearing act. Providing up to 24 hours of impressively strong, yet surprisingly flexible (and flake-free!) hold, this invisible-finish brow gel can be worn alone or used to set other brow products in place. The custom-moulded, dual-sided wand coats hairs from root to tip – use the longer bristles to coat lashes evenly and the short-bristled side to sculpt and shape hairs into place. Quick-drying yet super long-lasting, just a few sweeps and you’re ready to hit the town (or the office) for hours of arch perfection.
how_to_use: To evenly coat brow hairs from root-to-tip, apply using the side of the wand with long bristles. Use the side with short bristles to sculpt and shape hairs into place. Wear alone or to set other brow products. You’re ready, you’re set…hit the town with 24 hours of arch perfection.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Alcohol, Acrylates Copolymer, Amp-Acrylates Copolymer, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Panthenol, Butylene Glycol, Gossypium Herbaceum (Cotton) Extract. N° 10113/A

name: PATRICK TA Major Skin Crème Foundation and Finishing Powder Duo 21g (Various Shades)
description: Major skin goals require major formulas to get you where you need to go. Thankfully, Patrick Ta and the Major Skin Crème & Powder Foundation Duo (which pairs perfectly with the Major Skin Dual-Ended Complexion Brush FYI) have everything you need to achieve flawless coverage and a skin-like finish in one golden compact. Bringing you buildable, breathable coverage and a light-as-air powder in one seamless compact is (of course) Patrick Ta. The velvet-textured cream foundation blends with ease to blur imperfections and impart a naturally luminous finish. Pair this with the airy translucent powder to set, soften and diffuse your complexion and minimise the appearance of pores. A more flawless complexion we have never had the pleasure of attaining… until now, of course! With 24 major shades to choose from, this is sure to be a mainstay in every make up bag from now on.
how_to_use: Apply cream foundation to moisturized skin, building to desired coverage. Apply translucent setting powder to oil-prone areas, concentrating on the t·zone. For best results. apply using the Patrick Ta Major Skin Dual-Ended Complexion Brush.
ingredient: Crème:Phenyl Trimethicone, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Divinyldimethicone/Dimethicone/Phenylsilsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Polyethylene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Bis-Stearyl Dimethicone, Isononyl Isononanoate, Butyl Acrylate/Hydroxypropyl Dimethicone Acrylate Copolymer, Nylon-12, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isopropyl Myristate, Lecithin, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Polyricinoleate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isostearic Acid. MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR (+/-) : CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491/CI 77492/CI 77499 (Iron Oxides). Powder: Talc, Silica, Mica, Lauroyl Lysine, Zinc Stearate, Nylon-12, Kaolin, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Dimethicone, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Polysilicone-11, Isononyl Isononanoate, Magnesium Myristate, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Water, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Hexylene Glycol, Laureth-12, Triethoxycaprylylsilane. MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR (+/-) : CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491/CI77492/CI 77499 (Iron Oxides).

name: Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Brightening Flawless Finish (Various Shades)
description: Taking your base to the next, illuminating level, the Airbrush Brightening Flawless Finish - Refillable is the ultimate multi-tasking powder that’s here to not only minimise shine but also blur and lift your face. Beautifully ethereal in more ways than we can count, this magical formula delivers flashback-free radiance that’ll instantly elevate your look. Fused with skin-smoothing collagen amino acids, hydrating hyaluronic acid and of course, the number one brightening agent that is golden vitamin C, nourishing powder reveals the most luminously lifted complexion that’s rid of dark circles, unwanted texture and imperfections. Available in two shades and donned with the iconic monogram of the Greek goddess of victory, unlock the dreamiest filter-free flawless that you so rightly deserve. What’s more — the unique ‘Light Bounce Technology’ and ‘Brightening Complex’ supports your base routine with skin-plumping perfection that’ll keep you set for up to 16 hours! Ready, set, glow…
how_to_use: Glide Airbrush Brightening Flawless Finish powder onto the skin using your desired brush brush. Focus on areas with any darkness, such as under the eyes and along smile lines – don’t forget your cheekbones, forehead, nose and jawline.
ingredient: Talc, Mica, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Silica, Dimethicone, Nylon-12, Lauroyl Lysine, Zinc Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Aqua/Water/Eau, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Dimethiconol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Collagen Amino Acids, Sorbitol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Propanediol, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Strobile, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbic Acid, Colloidal Gold, Glutathione, Tin Oxide, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)].

name: Pat McGrath Labs Skin Fetish: Sublime Perfection Blurring Under Eye Powder 4g (Various Shades)
description: Made with a barely-there weightlessness that you'd appreciate with a show-stopping powder, Pat McGrath's Sublime Perfection Blurring Under Eye Powder delivers the ultimate finishing touch to seal your look together in one fell sweep. Ideal for brightening, blurring and smoothing over your skin, this delicate formula glides across your face with an instantly lifted, soft-focus effect. Created with a smoothing mica fusion that's designed to retouch your imperfections in seconds whilst imparting a sheer veil of pore-perfecting coverage, discover a selection of sought-after shades expertly designed to balance and match your tone and texture with a photo-ready result!
how_to_use: Using a powder brush or sponge, apply around the nose, t-zone and any other oily areas that need to be mattified, brightened or blurred.
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Potassium Sorbate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Water / Aqua / Eau, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499).

name: Charlotte Tilbury Beauty Light Wand
description: Get a sculpted glow worthy of the bright lights of Tinseltown with Charlotte Tilburys Hollywood Beauty Light Wand. Like real-life airbrushing (without any of the press scandals!) this dreamy highlighter flatters all skin tones and is brimming with treated pearls to give a luminous, soft-focus finish. Free from giveaway glitter or sparkle, this believable radiance potion is perfectly applied using the soft cushion applicator pad, which delivers and blends product evenly. For a flawless finish, apply the highlighter on the high points of your cheeks, down the centre of your nose, in the corners of your eyes and along your browbone, then buff in with fingers or a brush Charlotte Tilburys double-ended {Hollywood Complexion Brush} comes highly recommended!
how_to_use: To use, apply the highlighter wand on your cheekbones, down the centre of your nose, in the inner corners of your eyes and browbone, then buff in using fingers or a brush.

name: Pat McGrath Labs LUST: Gloss 4.5ml (Various Shades)
description: Ever had love at first gloss? Well, with the LUST: Gloss, there's a first time for everything… Offering a lustrous shine that's second to none, this sheer-to-saturated selection of glosses glides across your lips with truly unbeatable payoff. Utterly lightweight yet emollient, this runway-worthy lip glaze blends long and short polymers together to promote a sublimely seductive sheen while its balm-like texture delivers high-performing colour that's hard to resist. What's more — this pout-perfecting luxuriant is further enhanced with softening vitamin E which makes this beauty staple suitable to be worn alone or over your go-to lipstick for an extra dose of drama. Decadent, dreamy and daring glosses await you…
how_to_use: Prep: Smooth lips with an exfoliant. Dab on a touch of Lip Fetish Sheer Colour Balm to soften and fill in texture. Wear Alone: Swipe the LUST: Gloss™ applicator across the top and bottom lips. Repeat if desired. To shape and define, apply PermaGel Ultra Lip Pencil in a coordinating or complementary shade, following your pout's natural contours or drawing just outside the lip line for added volume. Apply as a Topper: After applying your base lip colour, top with a layer of LUST: Gloss™, concentrating on the centre of your pout. You can also create different looks by filling in the lip with PermaGel Ultra Lip Pencil, blending with a lip brush and finishing with LUST: Gloss™.
ingredient: Aphrodisiac / Blood 2 / Bronze Temptation / Divine Rose / Flesh 4 / Flesh Fantasy: Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isostearyl Isostearate, Synthetic Wax, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Methyl Styrene/Indene Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Dicalcium Phosphate, Ethyl Vanillin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Propylene Carbonate, Tin Oxide. name: BYREDO Liquid Lipstick (Various Shades)
description: Create an impact with the new Liquid Lipstick Vinyl from the indulgent realms of BYREDO’s creations. Worn alone or layered, these high-shine glosses are sure to make an impact. A mirror-like shine and comfortable wear await you (and your lips) with the latest addictive formula from this opulent range. Enter into a world of endless lip look possibilities with this carefully curated collection of cool, neutral and warm undertones, all bar the mysterious allure of Fantôme that is. Utterly unique in this sophisticated selection, its total transparency makes for the perfect eye sheen, impactful top coat or worn-alone clear gloss. For those who crave colour, you can flood your lips with the intense pinky brown of Molasses, the soft rosewood tones of Flushed or maybe Thar Desert’s warm nude hue. If that wasn’t enough to tempt you, then the non-sticky, long-wear and long-lasting comfort should certainly tick all your boxes…
how_to_use: Apply directly to lips from the lightly flocked wand.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Take It All Off (Various Sizes)
description: Introducing the latest in the goddess-worthy skin care line - the Take It All Off cleanser gently and effortlessly removes all traces of make up ahead of your nightly cleanse in mere moments. Making light work out of your first cleanse in your nightly ritual, the Take It All Off cleanser shifts all traces of stubborn make up while keeping your skin hydrated. Soothing eyebright and chamomile extracts comfort and care for sensitive skin and condition your lashes and lips. Gone are the days of sore, red eyes after a cleansing battle with a particularly long-wearing waterproof mascara - this bi-phase formula unites oil and water in a 'shake' to bring you unparalleled cleansing against long-wear lip and eye products.
how_to_use: Apply Take It All Off to a cotton pad then gently smooth it over anywhere you want to remove make up.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Isohexadecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Maltodextrin, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Gluconate, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide, Citric Acid, Euphrasia Officinalis Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide.

name: VIEVE Eye Wand
description: Expertly packaged and engineered to stay creamy and pigmented, the Eye Wands are like eyeshadow sticks, but better. With a one-swipe, multitasking formula that primes and colours, the Eye Wands can be used all over the lid, in the lash line, or in the waterline with its malleable, glide-on formula that gives plenty of play time before drying to an impeccably matte finish. Whether used alone or alongside traditional eyeshadows and whether by a pro or by a novice these sticks stay put for hours. In true VIEVE style, there are eight essential nude shades to choose from (Vanilla, Sand, Camel, Hazelnut, Mahogony and Raven, and introducing the latest java-toned hues, Coffee and Espresso), so you're bound to find something that speaks to you. Inspired by Korean Beauty the wands are even manufactured in Korea with good-to-skin ingredients that'll actually benefit your delicate eye area.
how_to_use: Tap on with fingers or use a brush to build, blend and contour.
ingredient: Coffee: Cyclopentasiloxane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyethylene, Octyldodecanol, Ozokerite, Synthetic Beeswax, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Silica, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci77492, Ci 77499)].

name: Charlotte Tilbury Beautiful Skin Sun-Kissed Glow Bronzer 21g (Various Shades)
description: Achieve instantly sun-kissed skin without spending time in the sun with the new glow-giving cream bronzer fresh from the make up icon that is Charlotte Tilbury. With four beautiful sun-drenched shades to give you that ‘just back from the beach colour’, you can bask in the most mesmerising glow of your life. More than just make up, this creamy bronzer uses a film-forming resin to create a ‘magic’ shield that seals in the skin care benefits and instantly boosts the appearance of your complexion for a humidity-resistant glow. Add in finely milled pearls for a healthy, illuminated bronze glow and silky polymers that ensure completely flawless coverage for the face and body… get ready to bronze to your heart's content. It’s time to infuse summer into your skin all year-round with Charlotte Tilbury’s beautifully hydrating glow-giving bronzer.
how_to_use: Lightly buff onto skin and blend with the Beautiful Skin Bronzing Brush for an all-over sun-kissed glow.
ingredient: Dimethicone, Triethylhexanoin, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Ceresin, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Dimethicone/Polyglycerin-3 Crosspolymer, Silica, Mica, 7-Dehydrocholesterol, C14-18 Triglycerides, Sodium Hyaluronate, Triolein, Glyceryl Dioleate, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Tocopherol, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)].

name: Saie Airset Radiant Loose Setting Powder 4g (Various Shades)
description: Available in three shades ('Translucent', 'Translucent Medium' and 'Translucent Deep'), Saie's Airset RadiantLoose Setting Powder delivers a natural, velvety finish (while also locking in your make up for last-all-day wear). Nothing like the ultra-mattifying, drying loose powders of yore, this ultra-light powder features unique aerated-cream technology, offering a bouncy, skin-like finish that looks natural while diminishing unwanted shine and oil. In its place you'll find an ever-so-natural radiance; think: a healthy, glowing sheen. This powder does good while looking good too, thanks to its squalene-infused formula that will help to nourish and soften your complexion over time.
how_to_use: Apply to face generously with a brush or fingertips. blend all over.
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Squalane, Polysorbate 20, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Gellan Gum. [+/- May Contain/ Peut Contenir: Mica, Iron Oxides (Ci 7749, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)].

name: NARS Light Reflecting Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)
description: We're sure that if you ask any self-proclaimed beauty fiend to name their most coveted complexion products, chances are, NARS are high up on the list! From the revolutionary Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation and Sheer Glow Foundation that we can't help but rant and rave about, NARS have bestowed upon us a new complexion product to treasure - the Light Reflecting Foundation. This innovative blend of make up and skin care instantly blurs your imperfections to reveal a smoother looking base free from dark spots, blemishes or redness. Powered by advanced skin care ingredients that help defend against environmental aggressors, this is a foundation that urges to basque in the light, not run away from it. Whipped to perfection to glide across your skin like a dream, its medium yet buildable coverage feels as light as air even after a long day of wear aaandd still looks just as fresh. Following Francois Nars' ethos that make up should enhance your natural beauty, this foundation has been designed with all skin types in mind to make everyone look the best in any and every light (literally) as it adjusts itself to suit indoor and outdoor light exposure. Gone are the days of mismatched make up or a washed out complexion. Fused with skin-loving heroes like biomimetic oats, Japanese lilyturf and cacao peptides, this magic-in-a-recyclable-bottle works to visibly improve your skin's clarity and texture after just six weeks of daily use... even after it's removed! Sounds like this has add-to-basket written all over it if you ask us...
how_to_use: Dispense a pearl-sized amount of Light Reflecting Foundation and apply starting at the centre of the face and blend out with fingertips or desired brush or sponge. This product comes in a recyclable glass bottle. When finished, remove the pump and recycle the glass bottle. Francois Nars says: Makeup shouldn't cover your skin, it should enhance your natural beauty, not mask it.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, C9-12 Alkane, Butylene Glycol, Undecane, Tridecane, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Diisostearyl Malate, Glycerin, Synthetic Wax, Sodium Chloride, Ophiopogon Japonicus Root Extract, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Silybum Marianum Fruit Extract, Aluminum Hydroxide, Magnesium Chloride, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Tocophero, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxyphenyl Propamidobenzoic Acid, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid, Sea Water/Maris Aqua/Eau De Mer, Trisodium Edta, Barium Sulfate, Alumina, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, [+/-(May Contain/Peut Contenir): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)].

name: Saie Dew Blush
description: A weather-flushed blush in a bottle, Saies Dew Blush is a creamy and dew-boosting water-based gel that boasts skin-loving ingredients to beautify your skin instantly and over time. With a soft doe foot applicator, applying this weightless and comfortable formula is effortlessly easy simply dab onto cheeks and blend with your fingers whether you prefer a subtle tint or an intense, rich pop of colour. Buildable and buttery, the tint seamlessly melts into skin, giving you a lit-from-within glow that doesn't look fake, streaky or patchy. A cocktail of mulberry extract, elderberry and evening primrose also works to (*takes deep breath*) brighten, moisturise, refine, nourish, soothe and protect skin from environmental aggressors. Available in five juicy shades ranging from nude peach to deep berry pink, choose between ‘Peachy’, ‘Rosy’, ‘Poppy’, ‘Dreamy’ and ‘Spicy’.
how_to_use: Warm a little dab between your fingertips or on the back of your hand. Use the chubby doe foot wand to dab one to two dots onto each cheek. For deeper colour add more as desired. Blend out with fingertips onto apples of cheeks, cheekbones, or anywhere else you want a flush of colour.
ingredient: Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate, Glycerin, Tribehenin, Sambucus Nigra (Elderberry) Fruit Extract, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Silica, Morus Alba (White Mulberry) Root Extract, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Root Extract,Mica. [+/- May Contain/ Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide Ci77891, Iron Oxides (Ci77492, Ci77491, Ci77499), Yellow 6 Lake, Red 22 Lake].

name: Saie Sun Melt Natural Cream Bronzer 30ml (Various Shades)
description: Introducing Saie's Sun Melt Natural Cream Bronzer - available in four versatile shades, prepare for your vacation to start tomorrow thanks to the creamy and blendable formula that boasts a must-have natural, velvety finish. Fans of Saie - prepare yourselves, the brand's all-new Sun Melt Natural Cream Bronzer boasts a luxe, balmy texture that's creamy, blendable and buildable to create your desired sun-kissed finish. The velvety finish allows for seamless, buildable colour with a formula that is packed with skin-loving ingredients (think: organic colloidal oatmeal, silica, grapeseed oil, and elderberry extract) to moisturise, nourish and visibly balance skin.
how_to_use: Gently apply in circular motions to give the complexion a natural-looking tanned effect.
ingredient: C15-19 Alkane, Jojoba Esters, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Tribehenin Colloidal Oatmeal, Glycerin, Beeswax / Cera Alba / Cire D'abeille, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Silica, Bentonite, Sambucus nigra (elderberry) fruit extract, Copernica Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Cera Carnauba / Cire De Carnauba, Mica, (CI77019) Fragrance * Naturally Derived. name: Too Faced Born This Way Super Coverage Multi-Use Concealer 13.5ml (Various Shades)
description: Discover maximum coverage with an undetectable finish, for a look so flawless, they'll think you were born this way. Conceal, contour, highlight, and retouch with the Too Faced Born This Way Super Coverage Multi-Use Concealer. The ultra-perfecting concealer features fully loaded pigments, providing maximum coverage that wears for up to 12 hours. The creamy, weightless formula is infused with hydrating hyaluronic acid and coconut water, helping to maintain a smooth finish. Photo-friendly with no flashback, the oil-free concealer is available in 35 shades to suit all skin tones. Vegan and cruelty-free. Non-Comedogenic *on pack.
how_to_use: Conceal: Apply a dot under eyes or over hyperpigmentation—wherever you need SUPER coverage—and tap with fingers or a sponge until blended to a flawless finish. It even hides tattoos. Contour: Choose neutral or cool shades 3 tones darker than skin tone to create realistic shadow and shape. Highlight: Choose a shade 2-3 shades lighter than your natural skin tone and in your same undertone and apply to high points of face for a flawlessly sculpted look. Retouch: One dot refreshes makeup like you just applied a full face. Just press on wherever your makeup looks tired.

name: IT Cosmetics Your Skin But Better CC+ Cream with SPF50 12ml (Various Shades)
description: Get ready to meet your complexions new best friend: IT Cosmetics Travel Size Your Skin But Better CC+. A make up phenomenon with hosts of devoted fans, this CC Cream (which stands for complexion correcting, not Cult Cult though it could do) provides a full coverage, sun damage-deflecting, brightening and hydrating finish, with a subtly radiant result. Its available in six versatile shades and helps to conceal dark spots and minimise the appearance of pores. The formulas brimming with skin-nourishing ingredients too theres hydrating hyaluronic acid, strengthening soy extract, firming collagen and hydrolysed silk, along with grapefruit, orange, bergamot and lemon oils to infuse skin with refreshing vitamins. As well as this, theres the addition of SPF50+ broad-spectrum mineral sunscreens, which protect from harmful UVA and UVB rays.
how_to_use: Start your foundation routine by preparing and moisturising you skin with {Confidence in a Cream}. Then apply the CC Cream with a brush, starting from the centre of the face and blending outwards in a circular motion. Set the CC Cream with the {Bye Bye Pores Pressed Powder} or {Bye Bye Pores Finish Airbrush Powder}. Finish with a touch of blusher, bronzer, and highlighter from {Your Most Beautiful You} face palette.

name: Revitalash Advanced Eyelash Conditioner 3.5 ml
bareMinerals Complexion Rescue Tinted Moisturizer SPF30 35ml (Various Shades)
description: Receiver of multiple awards, the Complexion Rescue Tinted Hydrating Gel Cream SPF 30 is loved worldwide for its effortlessly natural coverage and mineral-based protection from the perils of sun damage. Fusing the best of skin care with the best of make up, this tinted moisturiser guarantees skin is left feeling dewy and supple using a 98% naturally-derived, water-based formula with absolutely no oils. A miracle worker for lacklustre skin, it encourages phenomenal radiance easily applying onto skin with a unique waterburst sensation. Lightweight and gel-like, expect sheer to medium, dewy coverage in 20 versatile shades and like a huge slurp of water to Sahara desert-like complexions it ensures skin is hydrated for up to twelve hours after application via a medley of hyaluronic acid, olive and squalane. Also working to improve skin texture with continued use, this formula wont contribute to breakouts either its no wonder the world has fallen in love!
how_to_use: bareMinerals recommends pairing this tinted moisturiser with the {Smoothing Face Brush}. The dual-fibre, synthetic brush is designed to help you blend seamlessly for a naturally airbrushed finish. Squeeze a pearl-size amount of tinted moisturiser onto the Smoothing Face Brush and blend anywhere you want sheer coverage. For medium coverage, just continue to layer with the same brush. You can also apply with your fingertips: just dot onto your cheeks, forehead, chin and nose, then blend outward. For fuller coverage, apply {Complexion Rescue Hydrating Foundation Stick SPF 25} over the tinted moisturiser. For a more matte finish, set with {Mineral Veil Finishing Powder}.
ingredient: Water(Aqua/Eau), Coconut Alkanes, Propanediol, Titanium Dioxide (Nano), Squalane, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Isostearic Acid, Polysorbate 60, Trehalose, Glycerin, Agar, Silica, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Melilotus Officinalis Extract, Theobroma Cacao Seed Extract, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Caffeine, Lauroyl Lysine, Succinoglycan, Aluminum Hydroxide, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Citric Acid, Disodium Phosphate, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate/Succinate, Cellulose Gum, Magnesium Chloride, Calcium Chloride, Potassium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Magnesium Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).

name: Eyeko Limitless Lengthening Mascara - Black
description: Turn around bright eyes and say hello to an eternity of beautifully lifted lashes plumped up with zero clumps and all the volume you desire with the all-exclusive Limitless Mascara perched in your make up bag. Extending your lashes with infinite length and enriched with 80% natural ingredients fused with nourishing açai oil, this curl-defining mascara cares for sensitive eyes and lashes. Available in a bold ultra-black and natural brown and featuring oat-derived fibres, this easy-to-use and even easier to remove lash-grabbing mascara weightlessly coats each and every hair. Enhancing your eyes in ways you wouldn't believe, it's safe to say we're obsessed!
how_to_use: To enhance the lifting effect, carefully rotate the brush backwards on itself when you reach the tips of your lashes to encourage curl.

name: The Ordinary Multi-Peptide Lash and Brow Serum 5ml
description: The newest innovative treatment from the famous groundbreaking brand is here to thicken your brows and lashes and leave them stronger than ever. Always innovative in formulation, The Ordinary has combined a peptide complex and an impressive 11 key active ingredients to bring you the lashes and brows you've always dreamed of. Sweep this concentrated, lightweight serum over your lash line and brows to unlock some serious results. Infused with a complex of four peptide technologies this is a sure fire way to achieve advert-worthy peepers. Harnessing the power of 11 (yes 11!) key actives from zinc chloride to camellia sinensis extract, with nourishing 'Redensyl' and fortifying 'Widelash', this twice-daily treatment supports hair density and thickness exactly where you want it.
how_to_use: After cleansing and drying the application area, apply a thin layer along the lashline and eyebrows in the morning and evening.

name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser 150ml
description: This gentle cleanser is anything but ordinary, removing make up and impurities as it retains your skin’s moisture – unlike some harsher cleansers, there’s no need to worry about tightness after using this. Star of the show is squalane, a first-class hydrator that’s found naturally in the skin, helping to prevent loss of moisture and boost suppleness. This combines with other lipophilic esters to dissolve make up and unwanted grime for clean and clog-free pores. The hard-working formula feels balm-like when first applied, changing to a clear oil-like texture when warmed into your skin – an important feat that allows emulsifying sucrose esters to capture the dissolved make up and dirt and rinse them away. Free from soap, which can cause irritation or ‘strip’ the skin, this crowd-pleasing cleanser respects your complexion’s natural epidermal lipids, making it suitable for all skin types – even sensitive ones.
how_to_use: Rub the cleanser in your palms to warm it until it melts into an oil. Massage into dry skin, then rinse with warm water.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood Contour Wand
description: Want to look like you were born with red carpet-ready bone structure? Charlotte Tilburys Hollywood Contour Wand is the most gorgeous, effortless way to achieve seamless, subtle sculpting. The lightweight, blendable, buildable formula gives a beautifully natural-looking effect in light-medium and medium-dark shades and the innovative cushion applicator ensures soft, even application. For a flawless finish, simply sweep along the hollows of the cheeks, forehead and jawline and down the sides of the nose and blend out, ideally with Charlotte Tilburys dual-ended {Hollywood Complexion Brush}. For a more dramatic, chiselled effect, the colour can be built up by layering just wave your magic contour wand and get ready for Hollywood-worthy glamour.
how_to_use: To use, start by sucking in your cheekbones and sweeping the sponge applicator on the hollows in a horizontal line towards your hairline. Apply in vertical stripes on the sides of your nose and loop underneath, then apply on the sides of your forehead, temples and jawline. Finish by applying on the eye crease to fake a deeper socket, then blend out.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Makeup Bag
description: Sealed with a zip… Store and cherish all of your favourite beauty bits in the Pillow Talk Makeup Bag, a super-chic home for that lipstick you can't get enough of and that compact powder that keeps your look oil-free and selfie-ready!

name: Huda Beauty 1 Coat WOW! Extra Volumizing and Lifting Mascara - Very Vanta
description: Ready to wow? You will be with just one coat of this game-changing, ultra-black mascara. Expect dramatic and intense lashes in seconds! Designed with an innovative dual-sided brush, this volumising and lifting mascara has short and long bristles to simultaneously lengthen and separate lashes. The curved concave side provides instant volume, while the convex side gives definition — no matter your technique. The silicone material holds enough formula to effortlessly coat both eyes with just one dip of mascara. Don’t be surprised if everyone asks what your secret is…
how_to_use: Hold brush close to lash line and apply. Work the lashes to your desired look.

name: benefit Hoola Matte Bronzer 8g
description: The brilliant bronzer that legions of devoted fans swear by, Benefit's Hoola has attained legendary status in the Beautysphere. The ultra-flattering golden bronze colour leaves a pure matte finish, so you can forget about tell-tale sparkle and shine and fool everyone with your natural-looking sun-kissed glow. The buttery soft powder blends dreamily into skin and, even better, the compact includes a soft, natural-bristle brush that's perfect for seamless, on-the-go application. Great for contouring, chiselling cheekbones and flattering jawlines, this multi-tasking (multi award-winning) bronzer is sure to become a mainstay in your make up bag.
how_to_use: Sweep across chin, cheeks and forehead with accompanying brush. Always tap off excess powder to avoid applying too much colour. To chisel those cheekbones and flatter that jawline, contour with our blush brush.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Setting Spray - Matte Finish/Long Lasting
description: Ensure your make up lasts as long as you do, whatever the day - or night - might bring, with the Matte Finish Setting Spray by NYX Professional Makeup. Perfect for those with oily skin, this setting spray prevents make up smudging or slipping off (so you can stop worrying about touch ups) and keeps your face shine-free for up to 16 hours. Not only will your make up stay matte around the clock, but this setting spray’s smart formula (which includes plantago lanceolata leaf extract, used in centuries-old folk medicine) is lightweight and vegan friendly, too.
how_to_use: Shake the bottle well, then spray directly over face (from a six inch distance) after applying make up. Allow to dry naturally without rubbing in.

name: Hourglass Travel Size Unlocked Instant Extensions Mascara - Ultra Black 5g
description: The key to a false-lash effect - without weighing down or damaging your delicate hairs - Hourglass’ Unlocked Instant Extensions Mascara achieves realistic yet ultra-impressive definition and lift. Now available in a full size (10g) and travel-sized (5g) so you can keep your lashes lift whether you’re on the go or at home. If you’re looking to break free from your favourite falsies, this ultra-defining mascara is your ticket to intense length and lift. Moulded with a slight curve, the lash-grabbing wand reaches along your lashline to enhance your every hair. The innovative formula is made using film-forming technology that coats each lash in featherweight fibres that perfect a long-lasting, fanned effect. From instant impact to smudge-proof wear and easy removal – no scrubbing needed, just warm water(!) – this is the ultimate false-lash alternative. It's safe to say, we're obsessed!
how_to_use: Starting at the base of the lashes, pull mascara brush straight through from root to tip. One application provides an instant effect, but additional coats add intense definition, length and lift. To remove, splash warm water onto eyes. Gently use fingers to lift mascara from the lashes.
ingredient: Water/Aqua, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Alcohol Denat., Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera, Stearic Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Disodium Edta, Ethylhexylglycerin, Laureth-21, Methylglucamine, Myristic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Panthenol, Pvp, Tocopherol, Tromethamine, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Ultramarines (Ci 77007).

name: Cult Beauty Black Travel Organiser Bag
description: Stay locked and loaded on the road with all your favourite beauty in the Travel Organiser Bag. Chic, sleek and debossed with the Cult Beauty logo, this fold-out bag is compact enough to sit snug in your suitcase and comfortably in your carry-on. Packing in more than meets the eye, strap your sunscreen into one of the six side pockets, your hair ties in the covert compartment and your favourite serums side by side in the two main sections. With a handle atop your new travel staple, you're ready to jet set to your next destination...
how_to_use: Sponge clean only.
ingredient: Size: 21x11x11cm Outer: 100% PVC (excluding trims). Lining: 100% Polyester.

name: benefit Benetint Rose Tinted Lip & Cheek Stain 6ml
description: The original rose-tinted stain, Benefit’s Benetint is a legendary product for a reason. Unlike so many others, this is totally, honestly, completely kiss-proof and offers hours of gorgeous, face-flattering wear. The sheer liquid formulation glides onto skin to give an instantly uplifting wash of colour – it’s fabulous on faces and luscious on lips and can be applied with the brush-tipped lid for an ultra-natural, rosy flush. Subtle yet sexy and scented with a gorgeous, delicate rose fragrance, it bestows the ultimate healthy glow wherever it’s applied. Available in full (10ml) and travel (6ml) sizes, this multitasking marvel is a mainstay in our make up bags.
how_to_use: Brush three strokes on the bare apples of your cheeks and quickly blend with fingertip, or wear under Benefit’s High Beam for a dewy glow. Apply on lips and blend. For a deeper "pop" of color, repeat. Kiss, repeat.
