name: Milk Makeup Kush Brow Lamination Gel 4g
description: If you’re already a fan of Milk Makeup’s iconic Kush High Volume Mascara (and let’s face it, who isn’t?), then you’ll be super excited to try this brow lamination gel from the same range. As with all of the brand’s Kush products, it’s formulated with conditioning hemp-derived cannabis seed oil for ultimate nourishment — while ensuring the gel glides effortlessly across your brows. Designed with a density-boosting complex, it works to sculpt and define to create a chic brushed-up, laminated finish that’ll stay put for up to eight hours. Consider it your new make up MVP.
how_to_use: Apply directly to brows. Use the longer bristles on the Brow Lift Brush to coat brows. Use the shorter bristles to define brows and gently press down to set in place. Wear alone for a laminated look or on top of your favorite brow product.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Ceteareth-30, Polyesther-5, Propanediol, Glycerin, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Sodium Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol.

name: PATRICK TA Major Brow Lamination Gel
description: Coming in a clear shade to perfect and groom brows of all hues, the Major Brow Lamination Gel gives the look of a lamination without stepping foot into a salon. A speedy alternative to an actual lamination, this brow-boosting formula effortlessly styles hairs as it nourishes them, working to improve brow health and give an impeccably fluffy effect. Peptides work to thicken and support healthy hair growth while microalgae conditions and protects. Quinoa and coconut extracts add lustrous shine while softening and hydrating each hair, and the nifty, flat-backed applicator brush can be used to coat each strand before pressing the brow into your desired shape.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry brows or after using Major Brow Shaping Wax to pre-set brows in place. Brush gel through the brows, being sure to fully coat each hair, until product becomes tacky, then press brows into place with the back of the applicator, laminating them into the desired shape. Clean off excess gel from the skin. Patrick Ta’s tip: Make sure that brows are clean before applying. Patrick recommends applying brows first and wiping off any excess product on the skin so foundation sits naturally.
ingredient: Alcohol, Pvp, Aqua ‑Water, Eau, Vinyl Caprolactamvpdimethyla Minoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Glycerin, Isochrysis Galbana Extract, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Cocos Nucifera ‑Coconut Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Myristoyl Pentapeptide17, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Tbutyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml
description: Forming an invisible bandage on sore skin, La Roche-Posay's insulating Cicaplast Gel B5 brings instant relief to compromised and damaged skin. This is one treatment to keep stocked on your shelfie at all times. Your new personal at-home healer can be used by every member of the family to treat damaged skin and even when recovering from laser treatments and cosmetic peels. Working to stimulate new cell production is a complex of copper, manganese and zinc that are perfectly partnered with hyaluronic acid, drawing in all the water your skin is craving. Wondering what brings that instant relief? Panthenol is your hero ingredient at play here at 5% to immediately soothe sore skin. Using this just twice a day is enough to speed up healing times and improve your skin barrier health. It might sound too good to be true but this clinically tested treatment has the dermatologist seal of approval!
how_to_use: Apply twice a day to cleansed and dry skin. Do not apply directly on wounded skin. Avoid the eye contour area.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Polybutene, Sodium Citrate, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Zinc Gluconate, Madecassoside, Dimethiconol, Manganese Gluconate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Copper Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Tocopherol.

name: Kosas AIR BROW Clear Lifting Treatment Gel
description: KOSAS’ AIR BROW Clear Lifting Treatment Gel is multitasking gel that coats each and every hair to add volume and texture (think: big fluffed up ‘90s supermodel arches) and set them in place (without leaving that dreaded crunch). The lightweight formula gives a feathery look to brows, before locking them in place a bit like a DIY lamination. For added fullness, the gel includes biodegradable plant-based microfibres which grip onto existing hairs, amping up your arches to impressive heights. This is all complimented with a cocktail of panthenol provitamin B5, biotinoyl tripeptide-1 and hyaluronic acid, all of which work to strengthen and hydrate hairs — meaning less fall out and fuller, thicker arches in the long run.
how_to_use: Brush upwards to lift and lock your brows in place. Use the flat side to fluff and the tapered point for shaping.
ingredient: Aqua, Pullulan, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Xanthan Gum, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1, Trehalose, Acacia Senegal Gum, Polylactic Acid, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

name: benefit Bene Tint Rose Tinted Lip & Cheek Stain 10ml
description: The original rose-tinted stain, Benefit’s Benetint is a legendary product for a reason. Unlike so many others, this is totally, honestly, completely kiss-proof and offers hours of gorgeous, face-flattering wear. The sheer liquid formulation glides onto skin to give an instantly uplifting wash of colour – it’s fabulous on faces and luscious on lips and can be applied with the brush-tipped lid for an ultra-natural, rosy flush. Subtle yet sexy and scented with a gorgeous, delicate rose fragrance, it bestows the ultimate healthy glow wherever it’s applied. Available in full (10ml) and travel (6ml) sizes, this multitasking marvel is a mainstay in our make up bags.
how_to_use: Brush three strokes on the bare apples of your cheeks and quickly blend with fingertip, or wear under Benefit’s High Beam for a dewy glow. Apply on lips and blend. For a deeper "pop" of color, repeat. Kiss, repeat.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Carmine (Ci 75470), Methylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Tetrasodium Edta, Geraniol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Maltodextrin, Benzyl Salicylate, BHT. N 00N12802 Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

name: Summer Fridays Sheer Skin Tint 30ml (Various Shades)
description: Go 'au-naturelle' with SUMMER FRIDAY's Sheer Skin Tint. This vegan formula is designed to give you a sheer to light coverage with a range of 10 shades to choose from. Add a hint of colour to your complexion with this sheer skin-perfecting tint. Completely weightless and leaving a natural finish in its wake, this is the key to achieving the fresh 'I woke up like this' look. Don't let its featherlight finish fool you though, the fluid formula glides onto your skin and works to conceal redness and uneven skin tone without looking caked on. Available in 10 shades from Fair to Rich-Deep, this is the summer skin essential for a perfected (but real) complexion.
how_to_use: Shake well before using. Smooth over skin in the AM after your daily skincare and SPF products. Lightweight formula can be layered if more coverage is desired.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Isododecane, Diethylhexyl Carbonate, Isohexadecane, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, C13-15 Alkane, Sodium Hyaluronate, Squalane, Niacinamide, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Silica, Alumina, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Magnesium Oxide, Propylene Carbonate, Zinc Stearate, Boron Nitride, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, May Contain / Peut Contenir (+/-) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).

name: NYX Professional Makeup Setting Spray - Dewy Finish/Long Lasting
description: This ingenious spray is like having your own personal make up artist trailing your every move - it keeps your base in place, preventing it smudging or slipping off, so there's no need to touch up throughout the day. Ideal if you have back-to-back meetings or problem skin that requires long-lasting coverage, there are two finishes to choose from. Oily skin types should opt for the Matte Finish for a shine-free canvas, while dry complexions might prefer the Dewy Finish for a hydrated glow round the clock. The clever formula makes your products cling to your skin like a magnet, so your painstakingly contoured and strobe'd features will still be on point come the end of the day.
how_to_use: Apply all your makeup first, including eyeshadow, mascara and lipstick. Shake the bottle well, hold at arm's length, and spritz a couple of times. Allow to dry naturally without rubbing in.
ingredient: Water/Aqua /Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Beeswax/Cera Alba/Cire d'Abeille, Glyceryl Laurate, Stearyl Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Hexyl Laurate, Octadecene, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol. name: Huda Beauty #Fauxfilter Luminous Matte Liquid Concealer 9ml (Various Shades)
description: Build and blend your way to flawless 'filter-worthy' skin with the new ground-breaking concealer from Huda Beauty. A do-it-all concealer that doesn't compromise on staying power, the #FauxFilter Luminous Matte Liquid Concealer will effortlessly conceal everything from blemishes to dark circles with a soft-focus blurred finish that doesn't settle into fine lines or flashback in photos. Caring for delicate under eyes is an infusion of conditioning sweet almond oil and vitamin E, applied with a pillowy soft doe-foot applicator this will hug your skin contours without irritation. As if this wasn't already flying into our baskets, the vegan-friendly, fragrance-free and alcohol-free formula is available in 29 shade for all skin tones and undertones and is water, sweat and transfer-proof...Huda certainly knows the way to our hearts and it's this!
how_to_use: Apply concealer under eyes, on dark spots, redness, and blemishes.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Propanediol, Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Talc, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Lauryl Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Phenylisopropyl Dimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, C20-24 Alkyl Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Chloride, Aluminum Hydroxide, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Isododecane, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Gluconate, Dimethicone/Peg-10/15 Crosspolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Silica, Tin Oxide, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides/Ci 77491, Iron Oxides/Ci 77492, Iron Oxides/Ci 77499, Titanium Dioxide/Ci 77891.

name: Saie The Double Brush
description: The ultimate companion to Saie's complexion formulas, The Double Brush is a multi-use tool designed to highlight, sculpt, and conceal. Particularly perfect for those who prefer to keep their fingers clean, this sleek tool is super convenient: it's got two ends, so you can use it for both broad areas of the face (like cheeks) and for more compact areas like around your eyes. Crafted with two heads boasting soft bristles, the slim brush means you can blend and evenly disperse both cream and liquid-based formulas without making a mess. Essential for effortless application and seamless blending, we're predicting second-skin finishes in your future...
how_to_use: Use to apply glow sculpt to the cheeks, eyes and high points of the face.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Filmstar Bronze & Glow
description: One of Charlotte Tilbury's 'flagship' products, Filmstar Bronze and Glow sets the standard for contouring products - effortlessly lending light to 'high points' of the face (and collarbones), while emphasising hollows to create the illusion of enviable, Kate Moss-worthy bone structure. With specialist light-reflective particles to grant skin a beautiful, 'lit from within' look, just use the darker shade to intensify shadows (beneath the cheekbones, along the jawline and down either side of the nose), then use the subtle, pearlescent powder to 'bring out' your favourite features. And can we spare a moment to appreciate the packaging? The beautiful, rose gold palette befits the most beautiful boudoir - vintage-inspired with a generous mirror, you'll want to whip this out at every opportunity...
how_to_use: Bronze: Apply the shading colour to the areas you want to sculpt and define using a powder brush: the hollows of your cheeks, temples, jaw line, sides and tip of your nose. Never forget to blend-blend-blend! Glow: Apply the highlighter on top of the cheekbones, down the centre of the nose, the cupid's bow and brow bone to give you candlelit skin.

name: NARS Orgasm X Mini Blush 2.5g
description: Shrinking the cult-classic Blush into a perfectly portable compact, this Mini Blush comes in two ultra-flattering shades to show you what all the flush is about... Lending your look the glitz and glamour that Christmas is synonymous with, NARS' festive motto is 'Dressed to Thrill'; styling a handful of their boundary-breaking bolds and bares in limited edition sets, 'tis the season to embrace extravagance and discover new make up must-haves. Soft and effortlessly blendable, this micronised powder grants natural, healthy-looking colour that will immediately enliven your complexion; choose from the iconic 'Orgasm' shade (peachy pink with golden shimmer) and 'Orgasm X' (vivid coral pink that's dotted with golden shimmer).
how_to_use: Apply to cheeks with a make up brush. François Nars says: 'Cheek colour shouldn't be limited to the apples (no one blushes only on their cheeks!). I always blend a bit into the hairline, along the jawbone, and on the tip of the nose to create a more natural-looking, all-over hint of colour.'
ingredient: Orgasm: Talc, Octyldodecyl Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Zinc Stearate, Tin Oxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Mica, Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Red 30 Lake (Ci 73360), Red 33 Lake (Ci 17200), Red 34 Lake (Ci 15880), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)] Orgasm X: Talc, Octyldodecyl Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Zinc Stearate, Tin Oxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Mica, Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Red 30 Lake (Ci 73360), Red 33 Lake (Ci 17200), Red 34 Lake (Ci 15880), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)]

name: Sweed Lashes Lash Lift Mascara - Black 8ml
description: Freshly launched and promising to overhaul your natural lash game, the Lash Lift Mascara by Sweed Lashes boasts an all-new, innovative wand that bears resemblance to a wide tooth comb – giving it an unusual aesthetic and a level of efficiency that’ll simply blow your mind. Extremely easy to glide over lashes, the formula lifts, separates and elongates with next to no effort. The targeted skinny brush coats each lash from the very root for a tightline eyeliner effect with intense lengthening of each lash. The masters of false lashes, this is Sweed Lashes’ first foray into mascara, and it does not disappoint – expect maximised, show-stopping lashes.
how_to_use: Place the mascara brush at the base (root) of your lashes and comb all the way through to the ends for a long, fluttery look. Sweed Lash Lift works for those who have sparse lashes or have had a salon lash lift, and is excellent for use with false lashes.
ingredient: Aqua, CI 77499, Oryza Sativa Cera, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Stearyl Esters, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Copernica Cerifa Cera, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Acacia Senegal Gum, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Candelilla Cera, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Polyvinyl Alcohol, VP/VA Copolymer, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate.

name: Kevyn Aucoin The Eyelash Curler
Lanolips The Original 101 Ointment
description: A must-have for anyone with dry skin, chapped lips or for those wanting to defy dreaded ‘winter skin’, The Original 101 Ointment is the Lanolips’ original cult classic and the best place to start when discovering the brand. It’s enriched with pure lanolin, which has a unique molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture. Intensely hydrating, nourishing and 100% natural, this rescue ointment has 101 uses, providing immediate relief from everything from dry spots to sore cuticles and nasal passages. Dermatologically tested, this multitasking hero is vegetarian and baby friendly, cruelty-free and is free from ‘nasties’, making it an absolute no brainer. Want it to go further? Why not mix it in with your favourite daily hydrator to supercharge its skin-replenishing effects?
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously and keep below 25˚C.
ingredient: Original: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin Minty: Lanolin*, Aroma (Nat)*, Tocopheryl acetate (Vit E)*, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil*, Limonene* *naturally derived

name: Caudalie Vinoclean Makeup Removing Cleansing Oil 150ml
description: Keep your skin supple and free from impurities with Caudalie’s cleansing oil, designed to remove even the toughest pigments. Suitable for lifting away all kinds of makeup, including waterproof, the cleanser can be used across the lips, eyes and face. Situated within the Vinoclean product line, the formula is eco-friendly and made up of only natural-origin ingredients. This cocktail of plant oils includes Sunflower, Grape Seed, Castor and Sweet Almond, all of which come together to purify and revitalise your complexion. Nourishing and gentle, the cleanser won’t strip away essential moisture, keeping skin conditioned and soft while quickly sweeping away unwanted residues and build-ups. Boasting a sumptuous oil consistency that becomes milky when added to water, it rinses away cleanly for a luminous, shine-free finish. The natural fragrance uplifts the senses and leaves behind a subtle Sweet Almond scent to complement your newfound radiance. Contains 100% natural-origin plant oils. Suitable for vegans. Non-comedogenic and tested under ophthalmological and dermatological supervision. Tested under ophthalmological and dermatological supervision. Free from soap, parabens, phthalates, mineral oils and silicones.
how_to_use: Warm a small amount of oil in your hands and massage into dry skin. Emulsify with warm water, then rinse.
ingredient: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Parfum (Fragrance).

name: Glow Recipe Blueberry Bounce Gentle Cleanser
description: Fresh from South Korea, Glow Recipe’s newly reformulated Blueberry Bounce Gentle Cleanser shares the secret recipe for a Seoul-worthy glow. Beautifully ‘bouncy’, this rich gel cleanser works into a gentle lather to erase make up and impurities while also deeply hydrating skin, so much so that you might well no longer need to use a hydrating toner. Offering two benefits in one, it can be used as a moisturising cleanser and a quenching, deep-cleaning mask when left on for five to eight minutes. Brimming with blueberry, a renowned antioxidant powerhouse, this cleanser protects, strengthens and clarifies skin, while gentle alpha hydroxy acids (including glycolic and lactic acids) exfoliate dead skin cells for renewed radiance. With the adition of hyaluronic acid, this leaves your complexion soft, hydrated, dewy and bouncy, as well as perfectly prepped for skin care that follows, this cleanser is more than a little covetable!
how_to_use: TO USE AS A CLEANSER: Dispense one pump into wet palms and rub hands to create a lather. Massage gently onto wet skin for one minute, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Admire how bouncy your skin looks and then follow with your usual skincare regimen.
ingredient: Aqua, Decyl Glucoside, Caulerpa Lentillifera Extract, Beta-Glucan, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Vaccinium Angustifolium Fruit, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Parfum, Glycerin, Rubus Idaeus Fruit, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycolic Acid, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi Leaf Extract, Morus Nigra Fruit Extract, Physalis Peruviana Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Lactic Acid.

name: VIEVE Skin Dew 20ml
description: Nothing if not versatile, VIEVE's glow-bestowing Skin Dew is designed to deliver a glossy veil to wherever you might fancy; fit for your face and body, this liquid highlighter is crafted from good-to-skin ingredients to achieve a natural, bouncy finish that complements its golden glow. Kind to all skin types, the ultra-luscious formula goes beyond make up and is even infused with the likes of squalane to promote a supple, hydrated finish; anti-inflammatory sunflower seed oil to calm and smooth your skin; sacha inchi oil (an impressive source of omega fatty acids) nourish and enliven, as well as antibacterial papaya fruit extract. As for the glow-rious highlighting effect? You can expect a glossy sheen that rivals the warmth of liquid gold...
how_to_use: Tap skin dew on high points of the face for a radiant, skin-like glow or smooth over your body for healthy-looking skin. Wear alone to keep it dewy or for intensely highlighted skin, use as a base under Nova Glow highlighter.
ingredient: Hydrogenated Polydecene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Octyldodecanol, Mica, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Squalane, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil [Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil], Tocopheryl Acetate , Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter Exctract [Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea)Butter Extract], Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Croton Lechleri Resin Extract [Croton Lechleri Resin Powder], Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tin Oxide, Aroma (Flavor) May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491)

name: Hourglass Caution Extreme Lash Mascara Travel Size 5.5g
description: For incredibly high-impact, warning-worthy lashes, Hourglass’s Caution Extreme Lash Mascara gives enviable length, extreme volume and eye-opening definition for your most explosive lash look ever. The endlessly buildable, ultra-black formula features a fusion of hard and soft waxes that create volume, length and definition with every stroke from the breakthrough brush. The double-action brush head intertwines two single brushes into one, coating lashes from a full 360-degree angle to quickly build a full look on both top and bottom lashes. Smudge-proof, clump-free and infused with moisturising panthenol, the formula conditions lashes in order to leave them soft and non-stiff. It’s available in both full and travel sizes, so you can take it with you everywhere…
how_to_use: 1. Apply to lashes from root to tip using long upward strokes. Layer until desired effect is achieved. 2. For maximum effect, apply a second coat before the first application dries.
ingredient: Water/Aqua, Paraffin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Alcohol Denat., Palmitic Acid, Polybutene, Stearic Acid, Pvp, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Triethanolamine, Hydrated Silica, Talc, Panthenol, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Laureth-21, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain (+/-): Iron Oxide (Ci 77499)

name: Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Finish
description: Achieve a flawless, luminous finish and minimise shine with this stunning, ethereal powder. Multi-tasking and packed with skin-loving ingredients and light-reflecting particles, Airbrush Flawless Finish is the ultimate 'last course' in every make up menu. Ideal for those with oily/combination skin types (it keeps the midday t-zone 'glow' at bay), this also works wonderfully for drier, dehydrated skin types thanks to nourishing rose wax and almond oil. The 'soft focus' nano-particles then blur the visibility of fine lines and help disguise pigmentation - whatever your skin tone: choose from 'Fair', 'Medium', 'Tan' or 'Deep'.
how_to_use: Using a powder brush, apply Airbrush Flawless Finish around the nose, t-zone and any other oily areas that need to be mattified.

name: Natasha Denona Yucca Palette
description: In celebration of the changing seasons and summer's arrival, Natasha Denona has launched the Yucca eyeshadow palette. Wrapped in a sun-inspired tin, it opens to reveal 15 shades, including four new fiery hues in the beauty buff's sparkling foiled formula. Capturing Natasha Denona's uplifting journey to the Maldives, this palette is inspired by the serenity of the morning sunrise brushing along the tropical leaves of the Caribbean-grown Yucca plant. Instantly transporting us to distant shores and conjuring the fantasy in discovering a treasure of beauty contained in a golden vessel, it merges Natasha's three daring formulas (each renowned to provide all-day wear and seamless application) of sparkling foiled, matte, and metallics. There's the perfect balance of hues for everything from earthy everyday make up to shimmering statement summer looks.
how_to_use: Apply Matte eyeshadows with fluffy eyeshadow brushes. For precision, use detail brushes. When using Metallic shades, apply with different eyeshadow brushes for a subtle finish. To achieve high payoff, use a damp eyeshadow brush or the tip of your finger.

name: Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray Extra Glow
description: Want a product that works just as hard (if not harder!) than you do? Look no further… A fresh spin on Urban Decay’s beloved fixing mist, All Nighter Setting Spray Ultra Glow marries major staying power with a hefty dose of dew. The ultimate ‘fix’ for your face, this spritz-with-a-difference is brimming with hyaluronic acid and agave extract to plump and a bestow a fresh, luminous glow while ensuring your look appears newly applied until bedtime. Suitable for all skin types – particularly dry, dehydrated or lacklustre – this elixir is great for extending the wear of your base, blush, concealer… you name it! – even when the weather (or the dancefloor) has designs on beauty sabotage. In consumer trials, 85% of 103 testers agreed that their skin felt refreshed, while 83% reported that their skin appeared radiant. You know what to dew…
how_to_use: After applying make up, shake All Nighter Setting Spray bottle well, hold 8"–10" away, and mist face two-four times in an “X” and a “T” formation. For even more grip (and glow), apply All Nighter Glowy Primer before use. Want extra intense shadow colour, less fallout and even longer wear? Wet your brush with the make up fixing spray before you apply. Warning: keep out of eyes. Close eyes before misting.
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau, Alcohol Denat., PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, PVP, Glycerin, Xylitol, Dimethicone PEG-7 Phosphate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycereth-5 Lactate, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Cocamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Phenylpropanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Propanediol, Agave Tequilana Leaf Extract, Parfum / Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Maltodextrin, Poloxamer 407, Phenoxyethanol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

name: Tower 28 Beauty ShineOn Milky Lip Jelly (Various Shades)
description: Do you know how we have alternative milk for people who just can't bear cow's milk? This is the alternative lip gloss for people who just can't bear lip gloss. Made with the same conditioning plant-based oils as their iconic, original {ShineOn Lip Jelly}, Tower 28 Beauty's ShineOn Milky Lip Jelly has everything we love about a juicy gloss with none of the hangups... 100% vegan and made with plant-based ingredients that are actually good for your skin (think: apricot oil, avocado oil and raspberry seed oil), not only does it supply your lips with a juicy shine and an eye-catching slick of vivid colour but it also soothes and protects your kisses. Available in five juicy shades, choose between ‘Pistachio’ (a semi-sheer, milky nude pink); 'Coconut' (a semi-sheer, milky mauve pink); 'Cashew' (a semi-sheer, milky rosy brown); 'Oat' (a semi-sheer, milky peachy pink) and 'Almond' (a semi-sheer, milky chocolate). Get ready to meet the healthiest, shiniest, most wearable gloss ever...
how_to_use: Just swipe on lips. Apply over bare lips or over your favorite lip colour for soft, glossy lips.
ingredient: Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Polybutene, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Butylene/Ehtylene/Styrene Copolymer, Aroma/Flavor, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, MAY CONTAIN (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850). Formulated without: Essential oils, fragrance, animal by-products, sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Legendary Lashes Volume 2
description: The ultimate ooh là là mascara, Charlotte Tilbury's Legendary Lashes Vol. 2 is enriched with an abundance of softening, conditioning and elasticising extracts to enhance lash health and achieve the most jaw-dropping (but natural-looking!) elongation and fullness. With bristles of varying lengths to comb through, coat and separate each and every hair (including those hard-to-access inner corners), this visually amplifies for baby-doll flutter for a flawless Hollywood look. The jet black formula flatters any eye colour and make up look and Charlotte Tilbury’s tests showed that lash volume increased by 507% after just one application. Nourishing Carnauba wax fortifies each fragile strand to ward against breakage and brittleness, making this the ultimate wand for those plagued with sparse, stumpy lashes prone to weakness.
how_to_use: 1. To use, start by curling your eyelashes using the Life Changing Lashes eyelash curler. Clamp down and hold for 5 seconds to add lift and curl to your eyelashes. 2. After completing your eye makeup look, add lashings of the Legendary Lashes Volume 2 mascara to your eyelashes, just one application will give you thickness and volume!
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Synthetic Beeswax, Paraffin, Stearic Acid, Acacia Senegal Gum, Triethanolamine, Butylene Glycol, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Polybutene, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Potassium Sorbate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Sodium Stearate, Iron Oxide (Ci 77499) Paraben-free. Also free from mica, talk, alcohol, fragrance, gluten and nuts

name: Lanolips Tinted SPF30 Balm - Rhubarb 12.5g
description: Part lip balm, part lip gloss, Lanolips Tinted Balm SPF30 is a 3-in-1, multi-tasking treatment available in four hues to enhance your natural lip colour while also deeply hydrating and nourishing parched skin. Pick from ‘Rose’, a sheer pink tint that gives lips a healthy glow; ‘Rhubarb’, a sheer fruity tint that deepens your natural lip colour; ‘Perfect Nude’, a sheer universal nude and ‘Red Apple’, a sheer vivid red that brightens your natural lip colour. A multi-award-winning balm that also boasts a broad spectrum SPF 30 to protect lips from the sun’s damaging rays, this protects as it enhances their colour and hydrates.
how_to_use: Apply to lips or cheeks as needed and keep below 25c.
ingredient: Lanolin*, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter*, Ricinus Communic Seed Oil* / Titanium Dioxide, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire D'abeille*, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate(Spf), Benzophenone-3 (Spf), Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane (Spf), Butyrospermum Parkii Butter*, Octocrylene (Spf), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*,Tocopherol (Vit E) , (Nat) Aroma*, Prunus Amygdalus (Sweet Almond) Dulcis Oil*, Cocos (Coconut) Nucifera Oil* +/- Hydrogenated Polydecene, Hydroxystearic Acid, Mica (CI77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 28 Lake (45410), Red 33 Lake (17200), Yellow 5 Lake (19140), Red 6 (15850), Iron Oxides (CI77491) *Naturally Derived Ingredients.

name: NARS Laguna Bronzing Powder 8g (Various Shades)
description: The secret to sun-kissed skin all year round thanks to diffused bronzing powders and a buildable, silky texture, the Laguna Bronzing Powder creates natural-looking warmth with an imperceptible finish. Available in a matte or subtly sheen finish, the bronzer arrives in a spectrum of shades to cater to all skin tones. Ultra-finely milled for effortless diffusion and no harsh lines, it dusts soft-focus colour across your cheeks, temples and nose – anywhere you wish to create the illusion of sun-sculpted dimension. Use to contour, add warmth or enhance the look of naturally tanned skin with a sweep of a fluffy brush.
how_to_use: To add warmth, sweep onto the skin starting from the temple, across the cheek, and along the jawline. Take what’s left on the brush and blend into the neck and décolleté. Apply in a circular motion, continuously buffing and blending, to avoid creating harsh lines.
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Silica, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Zinc Oxide, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Tocopherol, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Chlorphenesin, [+/-(May Contain/Peut Contenir): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Ultramarines (Ci 77007)].

name: Cult Beauty Large Travel Make Up Bag
description: Proudly display your Cult Beauty booty with our super-chic branded bag – an essential piece of kit for any self-respecting CB addict. The perfect size for transporting your make up (and skin care!) essentials, this see-through patent wrap around case is trimmed with glossy black vinyl, embossed with our logo and finished with a gleaming gold-toned zip and a black enamel branded pull. Convenient as well as glamorous, the case is completely wipe-clean, so you can instantly mop up make up marks and skin care spillages.
how_to_use: Use this case to house your daily beauty must-haves.
ingredient: Measures approx. 14.5cm Width x 23cm Length x 9cm Depth

name: Too Faced Lip Injection Doll-Size Maximum Plump 2.8g
description: Desperate for fuller lips but not too keen on fillers? The answer to your prayers is here! Boasting their strongest formula yet, the Lip Injection Maximum Plump Lip Plumper beats all other Too Faced products to the plumping punch. The most potent according to the brand’s very own ‘plump-o-metre’, this gloss surpasses the cult-classic Lip Injection, the Lip Injection Lip Glow and the Lip Injection Extreme with its filling and lip-boosting properties. Giving instant and intense plumping results (immediately and over time!), the clear, glossy formula also smooths, hydrates and nourishes lips with its ‘scientifically-proven advanced volumizing technology’. Oh, and don’t just take our word for it – after just one week, 98% of people said their lips looked re-volumised! Now available in two sizes, pick from the full size (4ml) or the handy travel size (2.8ml) so you're never caught without your pout-perfector
how_to_use: Apply to centre of top and bottom lips. Blend outward to corners of lips using doe-foot applicator or a lip brush. Use alone as a gloss or use under or over lipstick.
ingredient: Mineral Oil\Paraffinum Liquidum\Huile Minerale, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Ethylene/Propylene/ Styrene Copolymer, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Polyglyceryl-10 Tetraoleate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Atelocollagen, Sodium Chondroitin Sulfate, Tribehenin, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Benzyl Nicotinate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Tin Oxide, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Silica, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Capsicum Frutescens Resin, Flavor (Aroma), Benzyl Benzoate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Carmine (CI 75470), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410) <ILN48582>

name: NARS Bronzing Cream 25g (Various Colours)
description: Literally the epitome of holiday radiance, become a sun-kissed vision whatever the climate with the beautifully rich, glow-boosting Bronzing Cream. No sun beds needed… A bronzer like no other, this dream cream is fused with monoï de tahiti oil from tiare petals oozing skin-softening properties and the sweetest airy scent that helps lock in moisture (and your glow) for hours on end. Gliding with expert ease across your skin, firming formula delivers sun-warmed radiance that’s both seamless and long-lasting. Choose from five skin-enhancing shades inspired by the bestselling Laguna that we know and love to achieve that all-natural second-skin finish.
how_to_use: Apply to your face and body where the sun naturally tans cheekbones, jawline, top of shoulders, collarbone and the centre of your arms and legs. Buff onto the skin and blend with a bronzing brush for a naturally sun-kissed finish.
ingredient: Dipentaerythrityl Pentaisononanoate, Trisiloxane, Silica, Polyethylene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polysilicone-11, Plumeria Alba Flower Extract, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Fragrance (Parfum), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Gardenia Taitensis Flower, Plumeria Rubra Flower Extract, Tocopherol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, [+/-(May Contain Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)].

name: Lanolips Tinted SPF30 Balm - Perfect Nude 12.5g
description: Part lip balm, part lip gloss, Lanolips Tinted Balm SPF30 is a 3-in-1, multi-tasking treatment available in four hues to enhance your natural lip colour while also deeply hydrating and nourishing parched skin. Pick from ‘Rose’, a sheer pink tint that gives lips a healthy glow; ‘Rhubarb’, a sheer fruity tint that deepens your natural lip colour; ‘Perfect Nude’, a sheer universal nude and ‘Red Apple’, a sheer vivid red that brightens your natural lip colour. A multi-award-winning balm that also boasts a broad spectrum SPF 30 to protect lips from the sun’s damaging rays, this protects as it enhances their colour and hydrates.
how_to_use: Apply to lips or cheeks as needed and keep below 25c.
ingredient: Lanolin*, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter*, Ricinus Communic Seed Oil* / Titanium Dioxide, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire D'abeille*, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate(Spf), Benzophenone-3 (Spf), Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane (Spf), Butyrospermum Parkii Butter*, Octocrylene (Spf), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*,Tocopherol (Vit E) , (Nat) Aroma*, Prunus Amygdalus (Sweet Almond) Dulcis Oil*, Cocos (Coconut) Nucifera Oil* +/- Hydrogenated Polydecene, Hydroxystearic Acid, Mica (CI77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 28 Lake (45410), Red 33 Lake (17200), Yellow 5 Lake (19140), Red 6 (15850), Iron Oxides (CI77491) *Naturally Derived Ingredients.

name: benefit Fluff Up Brow Wax Mini 3ml
description: Leaning into the trend of fluffed-up, bushy brows, the new Fluff Up Brow Wax gives you the ultimate control over your brow shape. Available in a full size and mini for all your needs (and bags), this humidity-proof wax is about to revolutionise your brow game. Boasting a completely translucent hue and carefully structured brush, this flexible brow-texturising wax gives you a crunch-free hold that you can reshape time and time again. With a setting power of 12 hours, this brow-loving wax will see you through the working day, without budging in the face of sweat, humidity and water. Lightweight, buildable, this is the key to the perfectly undone look.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage: Brush wax through brows using upward strokes to fluff up and texturize. To pump up the fluff, gently comb brow hair against direction of natural growth. Then, brush brows into desired shape. Pro-Tips: Layer Fluff Up Brow Wax over Benefit Cosmetics’ Precisely, My Brow Pencil (sold separately) for a fuller, richer, precisely defined look. When to set versus when to fluff: If you want brows that are fluffy and look texturized with a flexible, reworkable hold, Fluff Up Brow Wax is your go-to solution! It easily shapes, feathers, tames, and sets brows with the perfect amount of playtime. If you want brows that are structured and perfectly placed with a lasting hold, Benefit Cosmetics’ 24-HR Brow Setter (sold separately) is the ideal option—it sculpts, shapes, controls, and sets brows in place all day.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Synthetic Candelilla Wax, Steareth-21, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cellulose, Silica, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax), Agrania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Arginine, Tocopherol, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Dimethicone.

name: Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Concealer 6ml (Various Shades)
description: A full coverage, weightless, waterproof concealer with innovative micro-spherical powders that blur and brighten for up to 16 hours of instant skin perfection. This Vanish Airbrush Concealer is a crease-resistant, light-reflecting liquid concealer that blends seamlessly into skin and diffuses the look of pores and fine lines. The highly pigmented formula evens skin tone to conceal dark circles, blemishes and other imperfections for a smooth, natural, airbrushed finish. It includes a custom applicator that provides the perfect amount of product for all-over coverage.
how_to_use: Use applicator to apply directly onto skin. Blend with Vanish Seamless Finish Concealer Brush, finger or beauty sponge. Concentrated formula requires just 1-3 dots under each eye.
ingredient: Water/Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Mica, Butylene Glycol, CetylPeg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Pvp, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Barium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Dimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Methicone, Myristic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Polysilicone-11, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Squalane, Stearic Acid, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492, Ci 77491, Ci 77499).

name: IT Cosmetics Heavenly Luxe Complexion Perfection Brush #7
description: Uniting the lightweight, skin care-infused CC+ Nude Glow Lightweight Foundation + Glow Serum with SPF 40 and the Heavenly Luxe Complexion Perfection Brush #7, count on this pair to deliver a flawless base every. single. time. Amalgamating your medium-coverage foundation, brightening serum and SPF into one trailblazing formula, the CC+ Nude Glow Lightweight Foundation + Glow Serum with SPF 40 is perfects your skin with humectant hero hyaluronic acid, skin-loving niacinamide and green tea extract, all working to grant a radiant complexion. Before you take the formula to your hands, let the dual-ended Heavenly Luxe Complexion Perfection Brush #7 do the work for you. Each end will airbrush your products to perfection while the tapered concealer brush effortlessly smooths areas of concern such as under your eyes, around your nose and other hard-to-reach spots.
how_to_use: Foundation: PAT. PRESS. BLEND. Brush: Using the flat end, blend your favourite concealers and foundations onto large and/or hard-to-reach areas of your face. Using the large and fluffy end, buff your favourite liquid, cream and powder products onto large areas of your face in circular motions.
ingredient: Foundation: Water/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Glycerin, Lauryl Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Bis-Butyldimethicone Polyglyceryl-3, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Plankton Extract, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Polysilicone-2, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Barium Sulfate, Tocopherol, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Alumina, Glucose, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Sodium Succinate, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891). Brush: Synthetic bristles.

name: Huda Beauty Life Liner Quick 'N Easy 1ml (Various Shades)
description: Gliding on like a dream to deliver unbudgeable coverage, Huda Beauty's Life Liner Quick 'N Easy lines and defines eyes with ease, with no need for touch-ups during the day. Now available in ‘Very Vanta’ — an extremely deep, dark black, and ‘Very Brown’ — an ultra-cool, rich brown so you can line your eyes your way. Effortless enough to use that it's set to convert eyeliner-phobes, this liner is here to help you master that wing, ace graphic linework and create flawless flicks. How? The ultra-fine, firm but flexible brush tip provides precision as well as maximum control. Plus, it employs a 'progressive flow' delivery system to ensure even distribution of the formula for one stroke easy application. As for the colours, the 'Very Vanta' shade is inspired by the deepest, richest black so expect extreme impact and impressive payoff while the newly launched ‘Very Brown’ tone promises a cool, rich brown pigment. Last but not least, the water-based formula provides all-day waterproof, sweat-proof, smudge-proof, transfer-proof, flake-proof wear — all while remaining easy to remove at the end of the day. Cue round of applause.
how_to_use: Draw your wing, starting from the outer corner of the eye. Follow the natural curve of the bottom lash line as a guide to draw upwards for a lifting effect. Next, draw along your lash line to meet your wing. Fill in the rest of the lash line using small strokes. Shake well before use & store tip down to keep the ink flowing.
ingredient: Very Vanta:Water/Aqua/Eau, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Propylene Glycol, Laureth-21, Pentylene Glycol, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Ppg-2-deceth-30, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Black 2 / Ci 77266 (Nano). Very Brown:Water/Aqua/Eau, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Propylene Glycol, Ammonium Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Peg-26-Ppg-30 Phosphate, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Polysorbate 60, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides/Ci 77491, Iron Oxides/Ci 77492, Black 2/Ci 77266 [Nano].

name: Glow Recipe Blueberry Bounce Gentle Cleanser 160ml
description: Fresh from South Korea, Glow Recipe’s newly reformulated Blueberry Bounce Gentle Cleanser shares the secret recipe for a Seoul-worthy glow. Beautifully ‘bouncy’, this rich gel cleanser works into a gentle lather to erase make up and impurities while also deeply hydrating skin, so much so that you might well no longer need to use a hydrating toner. Offering two benefits in one, it can be used as a moisturising cleanser and a quenching, deep-cleaning mask when left on for five to eight minutes. Brimming with blueberry, a renowned antioxidant powerhouse, this cleanser protects, strengthens and clarifies skin, while gentle alpha hydroxy acids (including glycolic and lactic acids) exfoliate dead skin cells for renewed radiance. With the adition of hyaluronic acid, this leaves your complexion soft, hydrated, dewy and bouncy, as well as perfectly prepped for skin care that follows, this cleanser is more than a little covetable!
how_to_use: TO USE AS A CLEANSER: Dispense one pump into wet palms and rub hands to create a lather. Massage gently onto wet skin for one minute, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Admire how bouncy your skin looks and then follow with your usual skincare regimen.
ingredient: Aqua, Decyl Glucoside, Caulerpa Lentillifera Extract, Beta-Glucan, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Vaccinium Angustifolium Fruit, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Parfum, Glycerin, Rubus Idaeus Fruit, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycolic Acid, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi Leaf Extract, Morus Nigra Fruit Extract, Physalis Peruviana Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Lactic Acid.

name: Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Primer 10ml
description: Like an insta-filter IRL, Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Primer creates an instantly perfected, soft-focus effect and the ultimate canvas for make up. With a refreshingly lightweight gel texture, this could-be-magic formula is brimming with microspherical powders that help to smooth uneven texture and blur the look of pores and fine lines. This clever primer also helps to control excess oil, to avoid unwanted shine and make up slide, without leaving skin looking flat or dull. Just a beautiful airbrushed finish that lasts all day.
how_to_use: Smooth onto moisturised skin using the fingertips. Start with one pump and add more if needed. Follow with your desired foundation.
ingredient: Dimethicone, Water/aqua, Dimethicone/vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Vinyl Dimethicone/methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Silica, Glycerin, Cetyl Peg/ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Isododecane, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Dimethicone/peg-10/15 Crosspolymer, Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Benzoate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, C24-28 Alkyl Methicone, Propylene Carbonate, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Tocopherol.

name: Too Faced Better Than Sex Doll-Size Mascara – Black 4.8g
description: Guaranteed to be better (and last longer…) than even your most dangerous liaison, Better Than Sex Mascara by Too Faced is a bona fide make up icon. The number one selling prestige mascara in the U.S., this is a Holy Grail formula for countless devoted fans. What makes it so good, you might well ask? It starts with the formula – it’s enriched with film-forming polymers and collagen to provide smudge-proof, all-day wear, as well as acacia senegal tree extract to nourish, thicken and lock each curled lash in place for an effortlessly winged look. And, of course, a mascara is only as good as its brush – this one is shaped like an hourglass to ‘unlock’ the formula and leave no lash behind, lifting and coating each and every little one, top and bottom. In just a few coats, your eyes will look more defined and bright than ever before. But there's more – this loaded formula stretches, lengthens and curls each lash in place without flaking on you, ever (which is more than we can say for your ex beaus). Now in a teeny tiny 'Doll-Size', you need never be without it either – pop one in your make up bag, one in your handbag and one in your pocket for good measure.
how_to_use: Step 1: Apply the first coat from base to tip. Step 2: Apply the second coat over and under the lashes. Step 3: Apply third coat by rolling the wand from base to tip and bumping the lashes back at the tip.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Synthetic Beeswax, Paraffin, Glyceryl Stearate, Acacia Senegal Gum, Butylene Glycol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Polybutene, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Aminomethyl Propanol, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Disodium Edta, Polyester-11, Pvp, Cellulose, Trimethylpentanediol/Adipic Acid/Glycerin Crosspolymer, Propylene Glycol, Acacia Senegal Gum Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Dextran, Acetyl Hexapeptide-1. name: PATRICK TA Major Headlines Double-Take Crème and Powder Blush Duo 10.5g (Various Shades)
description: Put your wallflower days behind you because it’s time to turn heads and get noticed with bold, attention-grabbing cheeks. Whoever said that blush isn’t an important part in your make up routine clearly hasn’t experienced the magical Major Headlines Double-Take Crème & Powder Blush Duo. Think of this as the dream-team for perfectly seamless layering because if you’re anything like us, more is definitely mooorrree! Combining the most weightless, non-cakey powder with a super-hydrating dewy crème makes for the ultimate splash of colour that your cheeks never knew they needed! Not to worry, there’s no such thing as pronounced pores over here so feel free to be as bold and daring as you would like! Choose from 4 different double-take worthy shades: She’s a Doll, She’s Vibrant, She’s Baked and She’s Blushing. Ready, steady — bllluuushhh…
how_to_use: Apply powder with a fluffy complexion brush, then layer on cream to the apples of the cheeks with fingertips or a foundation brush for a dewy, life-like glow.

name: RevitaBrow Advanced Eyebrow Conditioner 3ml
description: Pioneering, conditioning treatments, RevitaLash harnesses clinically-proven technology to nourish and strengthen eyelashes and brows – hydrating, protecting and elasticising, to enhance flexibility and help prevent brittleness and breakage. Awarded a coveted ‘2014 Best of Beauty’ award by beauty bible Allure, RevitaBrow Advanced is one of the world’s leading brow conditioning treatments – encouraging even fragile hairs to realise their full, glossy, lustrous potential. Phenomenally effective, RevitaLash was born out of a loving husband’s quest to help his wife regain her confidence during a battle with cancer. Dr. Brinkenhoff – an ophthalmologist of over 30 years – soon realised the revitalising potential of his formulation, and RevitaLash now has a loyal and global following in over 50,000 spas, salons and retail establishments, and remains a proud supporter of breast cancer research and education.
how_to_use: Step 1 Remove makeup and residue. Keep in mind, oil-based makeup removers and cleansers can leave behind a film which may create a barrier between your brows and the brow conditioner. It is important to wash off any residue. Let dry prior to application. Step 2 Apply a few short strokes of RevitaBrow® Advanced onto each eyebrow. It is not necessary to apply more frequently than once per day. Let dry completely before applying additional beauty products. Step 3 Apply daily and consistently for best results. Note: Only a small quantity is needed to beautify your eyebrows. If using the right amount, your Revitabrow will last this long:

name: Hourglass Phantom Volumizing Glossy Balm 1.7g (Various Shades)
description: A 3-in-1 multi-tasker, the Phantom Volumizing Glossy Balm applies a rich wash of colour like a lipstick with the high-shine effect of a gloss, and the nourishing comfort of a lip balm. This all-rounder is formulated with Hourglass’ Conditioning Complex to intensely nourish and replenish your pout all day long. While those skin-loving benefits sink into skin, this creamy texture applies full-bodied colour that sits comfortably without a trace of tackiness. To top it all off, expect a 3D, high-gloss effect finish that boosts a fuller-looking pucker. What’s more, this sleek, gold bullet twists up easily so you can apply on-the-go, whenever, wherever. Choose from an array of eight rich hues that range from nude beige tones to lightly-bitten pinks, and say hello to your newest beauty staple.
how_to_use: Twist base slightly to dispense desired amount. Pen does not retract. For more intense colour apply a second layer.

name: VIEVE Pencil Sharpener
description: With pencils as phenomenal as the {Modern Lip Definer} in your make up stash, you want to ensure they’re always cared for, and you certainly don’t want to hinder their performance by allowing blunt nibs to form. Enter: VIEVE’s perfectly chiselled Pencil Sharpener, carefully crafted to enhance your make up looks by giving a perfectly sharp, pointed and precise nib, every single time. Boasting both a small and large carriage, this tool will happily help any pencil in your kit. But that’s not all — each and every shaving is caught in the enclosed casing to prevent unwanted bits and pieces from ruining your make up bag.
how_to_use: Insert your make up pencil into the carriage and gently twist to sharpen. Top tip: Make sure to regularly sharpen your lip liner and eyeliner pencils to keep them as good as new and to ensure perfect precision every time.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Lip Cheat
description: The secret to a perfect pout, Charlotte Tilbury's Lip Cheat has a super-smooth, snag-free formula and is packed with long-wear pigment to create an even lip line and prevent lip colour 'bleeding'. Ultra-easy to apply and available in a spectrum of shades (there's one to complement each of Charlotte Tilbury's lipstick hues), these multi-purpose pencils can be used to outline, prime or 'fill in' lips for foolproof, kiss-resistant lip enhancement that won't smudge or feather as the days wears on. So, whether you favourite the 90s' inspired 'Foxy Brown' (warm, cafac au lait), the perfect 'your lips but better' nude 'Pillow Talk Original', rich, flattering red 'Walk of No Shame' (formerly known as 'Walk of Shame'), natural berry 'M.I.KISS' (formerly known as 'Bond Girl') or the stunning, old-Hollywood scarlet of 'So Red' (formerly known as 'So Marilyn), equip yourself with several of these crayons to ensure your lip look in 'on point'.
how_to_use: Outline your lips starting with the corner of the top lip. For the perfect supermodel pout, why not cheat and balance the lip shape and size by drawing over the outer edge of your natural lip line? For the day, trace your lip shape with Lip Cheat. Then fill in your lips with the matching lipstick shade. For the evening, outline your lips and fill them in with the Lip Cheat pencil, it creates the perfect base for your lipstick and makes it last longer. Then apply a matching lipstick shade over the top.

name: VIEVE Power Ink Liner - Midnight Black 0.43ml
description: Crafted with a precise brush to allow for ultimate control and flow of your liner, the Power Ink Liner in Midnight Black helps you to create the finest of lines for a flawless finish... and no drag! Long-lasting, smudge-proof liner is on the horizon with VIEVE's new 'stay in place' Power Ink Liner, designed in her signature gold, and formulated with a carefully though-through flat edge for unrivalled control. You can create whatever line, flick and wing you desire with this free-flowing ink in a deep, midnight black. From small flicks, to Adele-worthy wings, the world (or liner) is your oyster.
how_to_use: Draw along the lash line, extending upwards and outwards to create a wing.  Top Tips: Make sure that the lid has clicked completely shut, this will ensure that product is airtight and will prevent the liner from drying. If the liner does dry out, run some warm water over the brush tip, just enough to rehydrate and manipulate the brush tip with your fingers to dislodge any product that has dried in the brush tip, clean the brush tip as much as necessary and then dry the brush tip with a paper towel. Put the lid on the liner tight and really give the product a rigorous shake, the ball inside the cartridge will load the liner ink into the brush tip then add some pressure to the base brush tip by swatching the product on the back of the hand.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Alcohol, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Pentylene Glycol, Amp-Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Bentonite, Citric Acid, Pvp, Sodium Citrate, [+/-] Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492), Black 2 (Ci 77266).

name: Too Faced Better Than Sex Easy Glide Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner 0.6ml (Various Shades)
description: From the iconic Better than Sex range comes Better Than Sex Easy Glide Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner in the must-have shade: chocolate brown. Much like its sister the mascara, this formula is waterproof, non-fading, non-smudge, non-flake, and lasts a whopping 24 hours! Featuring a dual fibre, ultra-fine tip, this iconic liner means you’ll be able to create a sharp, precise, chocolate-brown line in one easy swipe. Achieve your most easy feline flick and have it last a whole sexy 24 hours! Is there anything better than that? We’ll wait…
how_to_use: Shake well. Lay brush down against the lash line and allow the flexible bristles to trace along it for the perfect tight line. Use the precision tip to flick up and out at the edge of eye. Shake well. Lay brush down against the lash line and allow the flexible bristles to trace along it for the perfect tight line. Use the precision tip to flick up and out at the edge of eye.

name: La Roche-Posay Respectissime Waterproof Eye Make-Up Remover 125ml
description: Gentle yet effective, this eye make up remover not only makes quick work of stubborn mascara and make up, but cleanses away dirt and impurities from around the delicate eye area. Stripping your lids and waterlines of make up is a delicate affair and the Respectissime Waterproof Eye Make-Up Remover honours that. This ultra-mild formula has been carefully formulated to remove dirt, grime and make up without irritating your eyes, so you can forget rubbing your eyes to remove waterproof mascara. Since this is La Roche-Posay we’re talking about, it’s also been made without fragrance and parabens to further prevent any intolerance you may have. Simply sweep this solution across the eye area and enjoy clean, refreshed skin that is ready for the steps ahead.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Apply using a cotton ball. Rinse.
ingredient: Aqua / Water, Isododecane, Isopropyl Palmitate, Potassium Phosphate, Sodium Chloride, Poloxamer 184, Dipotassium Phosphate, Hexylene Glycol, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide, Ci 61565 / Green 6.

name: VIEVE Sunset Blush Balm 15ml (Various Shades)
description: Blending with effortless ease to induce just-been-pinched colour, the Sunset Blush Balm enlivens your cheeks with summertime radiance inspired by none other than the picturesque Mediterranean sunset. Donning your cheeks with a buildable flush of everything from peach-perfect oranges to dusky rose pink hues, this featherlight liquid blush creates a luminous veil of soft-focus pigment. Transitioning from a natural wash of colour to a bold, high-impact look with just a few extra taps, this vivid line-up boasts flower-powered skin-soothing properties that nurture your base. Choose from four foolproof shades: 'Pesca' (a toasted orange); 'Cherub' (a delicate rose); 'Rosa’ (a dusky pink rose); 'Piazza' (a molten bronze).
how_to_use: Using the precision tip, apply small amount to the cheeks, either alone or over makeup, building the intensity as desired. For a bolder blush, apply Sunset Blush over the top.

name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Luminous Tinted Balm
description: In shades of coral, dusky plum and peach that are inspired by the Santa Monica sunset, Tower 28 Beauty's multi-purpose BeachPlease Luminous Tinted Balm blends seamlessly to grant a healthy, sun-kissed flush. Designed to cloak your lips and cheeks with weightless colour, this vegan and cruelty-free formula has the same enlivening effect as a day spent lazing in the summer sun. Never cakey or heavy, the silicone-free, creamy pans diffuse effortlessly to achieve a second-skin flush that looks like you, only on holiday. The sensitive skin-friendly formula is made with a medley of skin-loving, plant-based ingredients (think: green tea extract and aloe vera) to comfort your skin with each application. Choose between six sunset-inspired shades: 'Magic Hour', a rosy nude; 'Golden Hour', a vibrant orange; 'Happy Hour', a coral pink; 'Rush Hour', a flattering peach; 'Power Hour', a terracotta tone and 'After Hours', a dusky berry hue.
how_to_use: For cheeks and lips. Just tap tap, blend, and layer for bolder colour!

name: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Palette
description: Sometimes, the cold light of day can be a little harsh on skin, so recreate the most flattering light (wherever you stray) with this ethereal illumination powder from Hourglass. An innovation in illumination, this universally flattering finishing powder takes inspiration from the most forgiving light sources – from morning light to candlelight, via sunset and moon light – so you’ll feel like you have a personal lighting technician at your disposal. Thanks to ground-breaking ‘Photoluminescent Technology’, the Ambient Lighting Palette captures, diffuses and softens surrounding light, filtering out harsh beams to blur the visibility of imperfections, pores and wrinkles, leaving skin looking softer, more youthful and beautifully lit-from-within. This sublime trio unites three sumptuous shades, which can be applied individually or layered to imbue skin with a multidimensional glow: there’s natural peach beige ‘Dim Light’, which contains the perfect balance of warm and cool tones; opalescent pearl ‘Incandescent Strobe Light’, which brightens skin with a ‘celestial’ glow and, last but certainly not least, sun-kissed golden beige ‘Radiant Light’. You’re sure to fall for all three (we certainly already have…)
how_to_use: Apply each colour separately or layer up for a multidimensional glow. Apply with a powder brush all over the face, or use to accentuate your face’s highest points.

name: Milk Makeup Travel Size Pore Eclipse Setting Spray 40ml
description: Do you feel like your make up somehow goes AWOL as the day goes on? Let us introduce you to the Pore Eclipse Setting Spray — a weightless, alcohol-free matte formula that keeps your product in place, helps blur pores and controls shine for a soft-focus finish. Impressed? It doesn't stop there! In a study, 90% of users said that after 16 hours of wear, their make up stayed set in place and looked magnified all day. Destined to become an everyday essential, it’s infused with lentil extract, as well as niacinamide, pore-blurring microspheres and skin-smoothing bakuchiol. Be prepared to fall for the cool packaging, too.
how_to_use: Shake to mix and activate. Hold bottle 8-10 inches away from face and mist evenly onto skin. Close mouth and eyes while spraying. Let it set for one minute. Reapply throughout the day as needed to help mattify skin and control oil. Pro Tip: For extreme oil control, apply before and after make up application.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Pentylene Glycol, PVP, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Niacinamide, Bakuchiol, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Seed Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Xanthan Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol.

name: Sweed Lashes Cloud Mascara 12ml
description: Take your lashes to new heights with the Cloud Mascara and unlock mega volume, mesmer-eyes-ing definition and ultra-length. Turning right onto cloud nine, this lash-thickening formula waves a magical wand over short, sparse-looking lashes to create the illusion of fuller looking hairs. Fused with nourishing vitamin B5, this lightweight lash-lover coats each and every hair with hydration and clump-free comfort that won’t smudge or budge come rain or shine. Expect long-lasting fullness from root-to-tip that may even have you throwing away your falsies.
how_to_use: Sweep upwards from the very root to the top of your lashes to achieve a full defining and volumising effect.
ingredient: Aqua, CI 77499, Oryza Sativa Cera, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Stearyl Esters, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Copernicia Cerifera, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Acacia Senegal Gum, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Candelilla Cera, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Polyvinyl ALcohol, VP/VA Copolymer, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate.

name: Chantecaille Wild Mustang Luminescent Eyeshadow 2.5g (Various Shades)
description: Elevate your eyes with this pearlescent, light-catching eye shadow from Chantecaille’s Wild Mustang Collection. Made with vegan-friendly ingredients that are free from animal testing, Wild Mustang Luminescent Eye Shade by Chantecaille is available in a selection of colours - with luxurious tones ranging from rich cinnamon to silvery mauve - and will drench your lids with a multi-dimensional shimmer. Sparkles aside, with every sweep of eyeshadow you’ll be giving back to the planet. Sales from the Wild Mustang Collection support the American Wild Horse Campaign and protect wild mustangs’ freedom to roam and thrive - which is why the packaging is adorned with stunning illustrations of wild horses.
how_to_use: Apply with the flat side of the Shade and Sweep Eye Brush to create a shimmering wash of color on the eyelid. Use the tapered side to seamlessly blend.
ingredient: Mica, Coco-caprylate/Caprate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Silica, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-hexanediol, Gellan Gum, Calcium Chloride, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tin Oxide, Sodium Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491/Ci 77492/Ci 77499).

name: NARS Cosmetics Climax Mascara - Explicit Black 6g
description: Get ready for your lashes to reach their climax… NARS’ innovative new mascara is the perfect way to fake your fullest, most fluttery eye looks ever. Featuring exclusive ‘ribbed’ bristles loaded with whipped, super-black pigments, NARS states (with characteristic cheek) that it delivers a ‘hard core lift with a soft-core feel’, creating explosive volume with a featherweight finish. Enriched with a ‘Lash Moisture Complex’ it’s perfect for creating buildable intensity without clumping or smudging. The brush is big and bold, delivering length as well as volume with a slightly tapered edge that’s great for coating bottom lashes.
how_to_use: For dramatic volume, start by coating the top and bottom of the upper lashes, using brush to wiggle through. Next, concentrate application on the root and the outer lashes. For extra lift, use the wand to hold and lift lashes for 5 seconds. For further impact, use the tapered edge of wand to coat bottom lashes.

name: Huda Beauty Lip Contour 2.0
description: Designed to help you create a full and enviable pout without any fillers, the Lip Contour 2.0 is fuelled by the collective obsession with over-lining boasting a soft, buttery formula and accompanied by a mini sharpener at the base of the pencil (because theres nothing worse than a blunt tip!). Allowing you to achieve a precise and defined outline draw just outside your natural lip-line to subtly augment before filling in the long-wear, creamy pigment enhances lips without smudging or budging; staying put by the pool, in the rain and under masks! Effortlessly applying like butter and soothing lips with its velvet-matte texture, a nourishing complex of soybean and liquorice ensures lips are left feeling plump and comfortable. The twist-up bullet makes application a breeze, and the Contour comes in 12 inclusive shades from Sandy Beige (a fool-proof nude) to Universal Red (a show-stopping scarlet) and everything in between.
how_to_use: Assess the areas you want to contour (add more volume, fix the symmetry, improve the shape etc). Take your Lip Contour 2.0, draw an X on your cupids bow to create the arch, then line the bottom centre of your lips. Connect it at the corners to create a full lip line if you overline a little bit, go slow and build up! Fill in with the lip product of your choice. Hudas tips:

name: NARS Afterglow Lipstick 1.5g (Various Shades)
description: Ready to outshine everyone else? One swipe of Nars' Afterglow Lipstick will ensure just that - for eight hours straight. This long-lasting formula delivers protection, nourishment and kissable shine. Pucker up! Starring a lineup of iconic NARS shades, including the infamous 'Orgasm' and 'Dolce Vita', plus new ones to add to your wish list - the Afterglow Lipstick is the must-have product on everyone's lips (we couldn't resist!). Infused with antioxidants, as well as soothing mango and shea butter, this non-sticky formula gives dimensional shine while protecting your kissers at the same time. It's also boosted with the brand's Monoï Hydrating Complex (a moisturising blend of coconut oil, gardenia tahitensis flower extract, and squalane) to provide long-lasting comfort. Now to choose your shade...
how_to_use: Apply to bare lips for a lightweight sheen with lustrous shine. Layer to build from sheer to medium coverage. Top off with Afterglow Lip Shine for an extra high-shine effect.
