name: NARS Cosmetics Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation (Various Shades)
description: Ask any beauty buff to name their most coveted complexion products and, chances are, NARS will be high up on the list especially when it comes to Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation. (Somehow!) achieving light-as-air yet full luminous wear, this perfectly balanced, buildable, breathable and fade-resistant formula offers medium-to-full coverage its perfect for normal, combination and oily skin types. Enhanced with specialised skin-matching technology and available in 34 versatile shades, youll be able to find the perfect hue to match and flatter your skin tone. For a nourishing bonus, the formula is enriched with raspberry, apple and watermelon extracts, supporting skins elastic fibres to smooth improve skins texture over time for optimal radiance.
how_to_use: Apply to the whole face using a foundation brush or blender Franaois Nars says: Makeup shouldnt cover your skin, it should enhance your natural beauty, not mask it.
ingredient: Dimethicone, Water/Aqua/Eau, Phenyl Trimethicone, Glycerin, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cyclopentasiloxane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Ppg-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Boron Nitride, Bis-Butyldimethicone Polyglyceryl-3, Butylene Glycol, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Sodium Pca, Sodium Lactate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Peg/Ppg-14/7 Dimethyl Ether, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Behenic Acid, Stearic Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Barium Sulfate, Aluminum Dimyristate, Alumina, Tin Oxide, Polysilicone-2, Potassium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate. +/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499)]. Ingredients may vary per shade.

name: benefit Porefessional Pore Minimising Face Primer Mini 7.5ml
description: Benefit's The POREfessional is a silky, lightweight balm that swiftly diminishes the appearance of pores and fine lines for an unbeatably smooth finish. Creating the perfect base for make up (or just as good worn alone for a natural-looking, flawless finish), the translucent formula complements all skin tones and contains a vitamin E derivative to protect skin from free radicals. Helping products to stay put, it also prolongs the staying power of your masterful make up handiwork - genius.
how_to_use: Prime in the A.M. Apply a thin layer of this PRO balm to clean, lightly moisturized skin. Pat lightly from the centre of the face outward with fingertips. Apply make up as usual. Reapply whenever pores come out of hiding. Pat delicately on T-zone over makeup and blend.
ingredient: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Isononyl Isononanoate, Silica, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Isododecane, Phenoxyethanol, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Cyclohexasiloxane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance (Parfum), Mica, Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Limonene, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Bht. N04932/N Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

name: Huda Beauty Dual Ended Contour & Bronze Complexion Brush
description: The brush for contouring and bronzing, Huda Beauty’s Dual Ended Contour and Bronze Complexion Brush is the crème de la crème of make up applicators. Brilliant for packing on product and seamlessly blending, this brush perfect for chiselling cheekbones, sculpting your jawline or dusting all-over for a beachy glow. Crafted from densely packed bristles, the brush ensures maximum product pick-up – the small slanted end gently presses powder into the skin and is ideally shaped to reach into every contour of your face, while the larger, fluffier slanted end is designed to buff and blend powder for an airbrushed finish.
how_to_use: Use to define the jawline, cheekbones, nose and forehead – or to sweep product all-over for a sun-kissed glow.

name: PATRICK TA Major Sculpt Crème Contour & Powder Bronzer Duo
description: Sculpt, define and highlight with Patrick Tas Major Sculpt Cra¨me & Powder Bronzer Duo, which pairs a dewy cream with a finely milled powder to chisel your cheekbones and amplify shadows for subtle, believable depth. Diffusing with ease for the most realistic effect, the textures are beautifully buildable catching the light with a chic, balmy finish when swept along cheeks, lids or brow bones, or lending matte, olive-toned depth to your hollows to bring out your beautiful bone structure. Completely customisable and versatile, the textures are readily layered making it easy to dial up the drama and can be used to bestow a post-holiday glow, or strategically placed to exaggerate, streamline or help you look stunningly sunkissed.
how_to_use: Use the contour shade to add natural shadows and depth to your face. Dust the powder for added warmth all over the face, focusing on the areas where sun would naturally strike.

name: Westman Atelier Liquid Super Loaded Illuminator 30ml (Various Shades)
description: Where pearlescent radiance meets skin-brightening ingredients, consider the Liquid Sheer Loaded your fast-track to a luminous complexion. Powered by a concentrated blend of vitamin C, antioxidants and a nourishing blend of skin-enhancing oils, create a prismatic glow that draws your inner radiance out from within. Feeling adventurous? Wear your way either on its own, underneath foundation or on the high points of your cheeks for a lasting better-than-skin finish.
how_to_use: Shake well before each use. Alone: Blend with fingertips all over the complexion for a sheer, ethereal glow. Under Foundation: Apply underneath foundation, all over the complexion, or to desired areas, for a lit-from-within glow. Targeted areas: Use as a liquid highlighter and dab over foundation on high points of face, for a targeted, glassy glow.
ingredient: Squalane, Aqua (Water), Persea Gratissima Oil (Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil), Mica, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil), Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Hydrolyzed Yeast Protein, Parfum (Fragrance), Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Glyceryl Caprylate/Caprate, Butylene Glycol, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Limonene, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bisabolol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citral, Tin Oxide, Linalool, Zingiber Officinale Root Extract (Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract). May Contain: Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 75470 (Carmine), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides).

name: ICONIC London Prep-Set-Glow 120ml (Various Shades)
description: Get glowing with ICONIC Londons Prep-Set-Glow, a new and miraculous mist, which can be used before, after, or without make up for a gorgeously illuminated result. Refreshing and moisturising, the luscious fluid features subtle light-reflecting particles to leave you with a gorgeous gleam, whether you use it to prep skin for make up, set a finished look or to grant a stunning, glossy effect to a bare face. The 100% vegan formula is enriched with calming cucumber and chamomile extracts to soothe any sensitivity, as well as antioxidant-rich green tea and vitamin E to condition your complexion and revitalising caffeine to wake up even the most lacklustre skin. Youll swiftly become addicted to the radiant results. Available in three perfectly pearlescent shades, you may have a hard time choosing between the exclusive, limited edition 'Gold' (a molten, gold hue), Original (a champagne-toned shimmer to add golden shine) and Glow (a terracotta tone that bestows a rich bronze-y glow).
how_to_use: Use to prep skin before applying make up, to set a finished look, or to add a stunning glossy effect to a bare face.
ingredient: Original: Aqua, Glycerine, Butylene Glycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated castor oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Propylene Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Polysorbate 20, PEG-20 Glyceryl Laurate, Tocopherol, Linoleic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Caffeine, Arginine, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Tin Oxide, Parfum, Chlorophenesin, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate Gold: Aqua, Glycerine, Butylene Glycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated castor oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Propylene Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Polysorbate 20, PEG-20 Glyceryl Laurate, Tocopherol, Linoleic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Caffeine, Arginine, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Tin Oxide, Parfum, Chlorophenesin, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate

name: Westman Atelier Baby Cheeks Blush Stick 6g (Various Shades)
description: In true Westman Atelier fashion, the Baby Cheeks Blush Stick lends gorgeously creamy, juicy colour for lips, lids and cheeks in one easy-to-use, on-the-go-friendly stick ideal for busy guys and gals who need a succinct, hard-working edit of fuss-free multitaskers in their make up bag. Boasting a buttery texture that effortlessly melts into skin for a natural, healthy flush, this blush gifts a skin-loving, soothing swipe of colour with a triple blend of light ayurvedic oils that gently nourishes while working to balance moisture levels. Vitis vita grape extract detoxifies, stimulating the complexions natural supply of collagen and hyaluronic acid, for a plump, supple, age-defying result. Available in six lustrous shades, ('Petal', a dusty nude rose; 'Chouchette', a nude peach; 'Dou Dou', a warm rose; 'Poppet', a poppy pink; 'Minette', a luminous peach; and 'Bichette', a brick red) pick and mix to match your mood and outfit.
how_to_use: Dab Baby Cheeks onto fingers and begin by applying to the middle of your cheekbone. Work around in an oval circumference, blending outward as you go. Pop onto lips for extra fullness and juiciness.
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Kaolin, Caprylyl Caprylate/Caprate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Polyethylene, Mica, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Lecithin, Behenylcarbamoylpropyl Polysilsesquioxane, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid, Rubus Idaeus Leaf Cell Culture, Carmine (Ci 75470). May contain: Titanium Dioxide Ci 77891, Iron Oxides Ci 77491, Iron Oxides Ci 77492, Iron Oxides Ci 77499, Red 30 Lake Ci 73360, Blue 1 Lake Ci 42090, Red 7 Lake Ci 15850, Yellow 5 Lake Ci 19140.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Gel - Clear
description: If eyes are the windows to your soul then eyebrows are the curtains, so make sure they're lovingly drawn. Clear Brow Gel is perfect for giving your brows definition and reining in strays without stiffness or stickiness. Used alone or over your favourite powder, it fixes the hairs into any style you fancy - from so-hot-right-now bushy, brushed-up and boyish to super-sleek and Insta-worthy - the botanical formula 'sets' and conditions for brows that behave with a wave of this magic wand.
how_to_use: Apply the gel in short upward strokes, following the direction of hair growth. Perfect for experimenting with this season's 'brushed up' brow looks or for making sure they don't go awry during the day.

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml
description: Forming an invisible bandage on sore skin, La Roche-Posay's insulating Cicaplast Gel B5 brings instant relief to compromised and damaged skin. This is one treatment to keep stocked on your shelfie at all times. Your new personal at-home healer can be used by every member of the family to treat damaged skin and even when recovering from laser treatments and cosmetic peels. Working to stimulate new cell production is a complex of copper, manganese and zinc that are perfectly partnered with hyaluronic acid, drawing in all the water your skin is craving. Wondering what brings that instant relief? Panthenol is your hero ingredient at play here at 5% to immediately soothe sore skin. Using this just twice a day is enough to speed up healing times and improve your skin barrier health. It might sound too good to be true but this clinically tested treatment has the dermatologist seal of approval!
how_to_use: Apply twice a day to cleansed and dry skin. Do not apply directly on wounded skin. Avoid the eye contour area.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Polybutene, Sodium Citrate, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Zinc Gluconate, Madecassoside, Dimethiconol, Manganese Gluconate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Copper Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Tocopherol.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Gel - Clear
description: If eyes are the windows to your soul then eyebrows are the curtains, so make sure they're lovingly drawn. Clear Brow Gel is perfect for giving your brows definition and reining in strays without stiffness or stickiness. Used alone or over your favourite powder, it fixes the hairs into any style you fancy - from so-hot-right-now bushy, brushed-up and boyish to super-sleek and Insta-worthy - the botanical formula 'sets' and conditions for brows that behave with a wave of this magic wand.
how_to_use: Apply the gel in short upward strokes, following the direction of hair growth. Perfect for experimenting with this season's 'brushed up' brow looks or for making sure they don't go awry during the day.

name: Charlotte Tilbury The Super Nudes Duo Liner
description: Doubling as an eyeliner and an eye brightener, Charlotte Tilbury's The Super Nudes Duo Liner enables you to manipulate light and shadows to create an ultra-wearable, feline-esque smoky eye. With black-brown pigment on one end and illuminating pale peach on the other, glide these endlessly creamy liners over your lids and waterline respectively. Inspired by the ultra-esteemed make up artist's backstage secrets, this dual-ended liner is the key to exaggerated, bigger, brighter-looking eyes. Blendable and long-lasting (if it can withstand the runway, it can manage your day-to-day plans no problem!), the sensorial formula is infused with emollient oils and waxes to give it a beautifully creamy feel on your skin. Made with a high concentration of pure pigments, expect precise and intense colour release that can be blurred for a soft-focus effect.
how_to_use: Use the nude shade to trace along the waterline to create wider, brighter-looking eyes. Apply the black/brown shade along the top lash line and out into a feline flick to enhance and add dreamy definition.

name: NARS Afterglow Liquid Blush 7ml (Various Shades)
description: A glow-giving blush with skin care benefits? Thanks NARS for going one step further with this soon-to-be cult product. Think: ultra-light, ultra-creamy texture with long-lasting hydration built in. This lightweight liquid formula is set to give you a rush of radiance - that lasts. It's packed with sodium hyaluronate to deliver eight hours of hydration (that's your 9-5 sorted), plus vegan collagen for plump, healthy-looking results. We love that it's buildable too, so you can customise your look - opting for a second-skin flush to a dramatic and bold finish - without any streaks. There are six shades available, ranging from the iconic and oh-so-peachy 'Orgasm' to 'Wanderlust' (a soft lilac) and 'Insatiable' (a deep plum). Don't be surprised if you want them all...
how_to_use: For a second-skin wash of colour, use applicator to deposit on back of hand. Use fingers to gently tap one coat onto cheeks. For a natural effect, gently tap a second coat of colour on cheeks. For intensified impact, use applicator to apply two dots directly on cheeks and blend with fingers. Layer and build to desired colour intensity. Sweep on powder Blush shade of choice on top to enhance the impact.

name: Weleda Skin Food Lotion - Light 30ml
description: A lighter - but no less hydrating - iteration of the best-loved Skin Food, Skin Food Light, now available in a pocket-friendly 30ml size, brings immediate comfort to dry, thirsty skin that's in need of a cooling, replenishing drink. Intensive care that sinks in easily, Skin Food Light 30ml boasts a medley of softening, strengthening, smoothing and barrier-boosting botanicals - including sunflower seed oil, shea and cocoa seed butters, rosemary extracts and chamomile - to supplement skin's own defences while 'locking in' moisture to maximise 'spring' and resilience. Silky, non-greasy and swiftly absorbed, this tube is a true handbag hero - as well as a pocket-sized sidekick - to care for chapped, compromised hands, scaly elbows or anywhere needing attention.
how_to_use: Smooth onto dry skin areas on the body or face and massage in gently. Allow to soak in.
ingredient: Water(Aqua), Helianthus Annuus(Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Beeswax(Cera Alba), Theobroma Cacao(Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii(Shea) Butter, Limonene*, Viola Tricolor Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis(Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Lanolin, Carrageenan, Xanthan Gum, Lactic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Fragrance(Parfum)*, Linalool*, Geraniol*, Citral*. *From natural essential oils.

name: Hindash Monochromance Gradient Palette
description: Inspired by the make up master's background as a painter, Hindash's universally flattering Monochrome Palette is a pressed pigment gradient palette of vegan, multi-use shades that can be used as eyeshadow, blush, contour, highlight, eyeliner and brow powders. We love a multi-tasker… Akin to a painter's palette, this luxury eyeshadow edit lets you combine and blend colour combinations to perfection. Expertly crafted for minimal fallout, the buildable formula promises impressive pigment, effortless application and unparalleled colour payoff. Multiplying 6 shadows into 24 unique gradient shades, this revolutionary palette is bursting with velvety mattes that enable an enhanced glide that’s both seamless and long-lasting.
how_to_use: Create the ultimate look by swirling your brush along the gradient pans to customise your perfect shade. Sweep along eyes, cheeks, brows, highlights and contours of the face.
ingredient: Talc, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone, Silica, Ethylene/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Zinc Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Panisic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Poloxamer 338. name: OSKIA Renaissance Cleansing Gel (100ml)
description: The cleansing companion to Oskia’s best-loved, multi-award winning Renaissance Mask is everything we dreamed it would be *swoons*. Having left no-one in doubt of our devotion to the peachy-pink skin miracle, we’ve been falling over ourselves to lay hands on its exquisite cleansing counterpart. With the same heavenly Rose Chamomile fragrance and distinctive pink tint of the mask, the Renaissance Cleansing Gel quickly and gently dissolves make up and impurities whilst actively illuminating to reveal ultra-clean, hydrated skin that positively glows with contentment. Suitable for all skin types – particularly dull, uneven and blemish-prone complexions – it's available in supersize (200ml), full-size (100ml) and travel-sized (35ml) editions, so you need never be without its skin-saving powers.
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Aqua (Water), Sucrose Laurate, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Benzyl Alcohol, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Fruit Ferment Filtrate, Sucrose Stearate, Rhodinols, Dimethyl Sulfone (MSM), Dehydroacetic Acid, Borago Officinalis (Borage)Seed Oil , Juniperus Mexicana (Cedarwood) Wood Oil, Cymbopogon (Palmarosa) Martini Oil*, Cinnamomum Camphora Linalooliferum (Ho) Wood Oil, Retinyl (Vitamin A) Palmitate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil *, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Bud Oil *, Anthemis Nobilis (Camomile) Flower Oil *, Sucrose Palmitate, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil *, Jojoba Esters, Citronellol**, Geraniol**, Linalool**, Iron Oxides (CI 77491) *Organically Certified Ingredient. **Component of natural essential oils

name: Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood Flawless Filter (Various Shades)
description: Newly reformulated, this customisable, hybrid complexion booster is quite unlike anything weve seen before. It offers the imperfection-blurring benefits of a primer, the mega-watt glow of a highlighter and the unbeatably perfecting properties of your favourite photographic filter. Applying it is like adding a digital filter to a photograph it instantly lifts your complexion, erasing imperfections and imparting glowing radiance. Combining these filter-like perfecting properties with the blurring benefits of your favourite primer and the mega-watt glow of a highlighter, this luscious liquid imparts a dewy, soft-focus finish, illuminating skin in an instant. The magic behind the make up starts with Charlotte Tilburys airbrush polymers and finely milled powders, which smooth over fine lines and pores, minimising their appearance for a flawless effect. As well as this, porcelain flower extract (rich in antioxidants and derived from a delicate Thai flower) brightens skin beautifully. You can mix it with your best base products or use it under, over or instead of foundation, or dotted onto the areas you want to glow the brightest.
how_to_use: Apply using the magic wand applicator. Use beneath foundation as a primer, along tops of the cheekbones, down the nose, above the cupids bow as a highlighter or go mega-watt and wear it all over, erasing any imperfections for a fresh, glossy, all-over-glow!

name: Milk Makeup Pore Eclipse Setting Spray 85ml
description: Tired of your oily or combination skin eating your make up throughout the day? Let us introduce you to Milk Makeup's Pore Eclipse Setting Spray, a weightless, alcohol-free matte setting spray that locks on makeup up to 16 hours, helps blurs pores, and controls shine for a soft-focus finish. Impressed? It doesn't stop there! In a study, 90% of users said that after 16 hours wear, their make up stayed set in place and looked magnified all day. This hardworking formula is also infused with lentil extract to help control shine, niacinamide and pore-blurring microspheres that minimise the look of pores and fine lines and bakuchiol helps smooth skin texture.
how_to_use: Shake to mix and activate makeup-locking formula. Hold bottle 8 to 10 inches away from face and mist evenly onto skin. Close mouth and eyes while spraying. Let it set for one minute. Reapply throughout the day as needed to help mattify skin and control oil. Pro Tip: For extreme oil control, apply before and after makeup application.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Pentylene Glycol, PVP, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Niacinamide, Bakuchiol, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Seed Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Xanthan Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol

name: Dr.Jart+ Cicapair Trial Kit
description: Uniting three Dr.Jart+ heroes, the Cicapair Your First Trial Kit is a must for anyone who suffers from easily-irritated or red complexions, with the {Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment}, {Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Serum} and {Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Cream} all making an appearance. Designed to even tone and perfect your complexion, the Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment is a one-stop correcting pot that levels your complexion to obscure blemishes and reduce the look of redness for a your-skin-but-better look. It acts as a physical barrier against damaging environmental aggressors, changing in colour from a muted green to a subtle, beige tint that cushions your complexion with an array of ultra-nourishing ingredients. The Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Serum harnesses inflammation-battling centella asiatica mixed with a strengthening botanical complex to not only soothe your skin but also accelerate the healing process and bolster the protective barrier of your skin. The Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Cream delivers a dose of ultra-nourishing moisture, with its soft and buttery texture sinking seamlessly into skin to ease discomfort and irritation via a cushioning layer of hydration.
how_to_use: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment (15ml): After moisturising, dab a small amount evenly across face and blend. The cream will change from green to beige as you massage it onto skin, evening out skin tone. Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Serum (5ml): Apply 1-2 pumps on clean skin, morning and night. Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Cream (10ml): After applying serum, apply a moderate amount onto irritated skin. Press cream in with warmth of hands to allow for maximum absorption.
ingredient: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment (15ml): Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane, CI 77891, Dimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Lauryl PEG-8 Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Triethylhexanoin, Butylene Glycol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Niacinamide, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, CI 77491, Glyceryl Tribehenate/Isostearate/Eicosandioate, Magnesium Sulfate, CI 77492, Hydrogenated Coco Glycerides, Stearic Acid, Alumina, Panthenol, Ceresin, CI 77499, Ethylcellulose, Caprylyl Glycol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, CI 77288, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Madecassoside, Adenosine, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Eryngium Maritimum Callus Culture Filtrate, Glycine Soja Peptide, Streptococcus Thermophilus Ferment, Aluminium Hydroxide, Asiaticoside, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Ilex Aquifolium Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Achillea Millefolium Oil, Hedera Helix Extract, Tocopherol, Silica, Calcium Chloride, Asiatic Acid, Madecassic Acid. Centella Cx: Includes Tiger Grass (Centella Asiatica Extract aka Cica) and its active components, plus four traditional herbs (Fishwort, Holly, Yarrow, and Sea Holly). Cicabond: Moisture barrier-replenishing complex that includes Arabinogalactan, CaCl2 and MgSO4 and glycerin to care for skin's moisture barrier. Jartbiome: Dr.Jart's original probiotic ferment ingredient (Streptococcus Thermophilus Ferment) derived from the skin's microbiome. Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Cream (5ml): Aqua, Centella Asiatica Extract, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Panthenol, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Hydrogenated Polydecene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Cetearyl Alcohol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Niacinamide, Glyceryl Stearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, PEG-8, Stearic Acid, PEG-100 Stearate, Polyacrylate-13, Beeswax, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Asiatic Acid, Polyisobutene, Asiaticoside, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Spirulina Platensis Powder, Alcohol, Polysorbate 20, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Adenosine, Lavandula Angustifolia Oil, Ceramide Np, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Aniba Rosaeodora Wood Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil, Citrus Grandis Peel Oil, Limonene, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Theobroma Cacao Extract, Dextrin, Disodium Edta, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, D-Limonene, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Glycerol Formal, Centella Asiatica Leaf Cell Culture Extract, Madecassoside, Citric Acid, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Artemisia Absinthium Extract, Gentiana Lutea Root Extract, Sucrose Laurate, Sodium Glycerophosphate, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Potassium Magnesium Aspartate, Lysolecithin, Calcium Gluconate, Magnesium Gluconate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sodium Benzoate, Xanthan Gum

name: NYX Professional Makeup The Brow Glue Instant Styler 5g (Various Shades)
description: Boasting up to 16 hours of hold (yes, really), The Brow Glue Instant Styler by NYX Professional Makeup won’t budge... but won’t leave your brows feeling sticky, either. This glue-like gel is quick and easy to apply, with buildable coverage that dries with a natural finish, and comes with a built-in spoolie for on-the-go styling. Swipe the gel through your brows at an upward angle for an on-trend laminated look or in the direction of the hair’s natural growth, if you’re more into no-make up make up. Available in a range of shades to suit every hair colour, The Brow Glue Instant Styler is not only transfer-proof and waterproof, but flake-free too. And did we mention, it’s also vegan and cruelty-free?
how_to_use: Style your brows and set them in place using The Brow Glue Instant Styler and spoolie applicator.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Steareth-21, Vp/Va Copolymer, Glycerin, Vp/Dmapa Acrylates Copolymer, Ppg-26-Buteth-26, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Propylene Glycol, Decylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Benzalkonium Chloride, Ci 77491/Iron Oxides, Ci 77492/Iron Oxides, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide.

name: Summer Fridays Blush Balm Stick 5g (Various Shades)
description: SUMMER FRIDAYS Blush Balm Stick is your new best friend for on-the-go touch ups. A multi-use cream formula, it’s designed to elevate your complexion with a shot of colour to your lips and cheeks and nourish them at the same time. Packed with hydrating heroes, hyaluronic acid and glycerin, this must-have product does an excellent job of absorbing and retaining moisture — making your lips look plump and pillowy-soft (aka oh-so-kissable). It’s available in four delectable shades, from Heat Wave (a vibrant, deep red) to Dusty Rose (a dusk-inspired, soft mauve). Choose your favourite and pucker up.
how_to_use: Apply directly to cheeks and lips. Blend as desired.
ingredient: Isododecane, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyethylene, Behenyl Behenate, C9-12 Alkane, Glycerin, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Isohexadecane, Mica, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Triethylhexanoin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Evodia Rutaecarpa Fruit Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Propanediol, C13-15 Alkane, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cera Carnauba/Cire de carnauba, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Candelilla Cera/Cire de candelilla, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glyceryl Linoleate, Butylene Glycol, Alumina, Magnesium Oxide, Silica, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Trihydroxystearin, Propylene Carbonate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).

name: Saie Beauty The Fluffy Pinpoint and Setting Brush
description: The ultimate companion to Saie's Airset RadiantLoose Setting Powder (sold separately), The Fluffy Brush Pinpoint & Setting dusts the aerated-creamy formula over your complexion to achieve a natural, velvety finish. Crafted with a dense yet beautifully soft head, the slim brush is ideal for targeted and all-over application of setting powder. Shine won't stand a chance against this dynamic duo! Essential for effortless application and seamless blending of their talc-free, squalane-enriched setting powder, we're predicting second-skin finishes in your future...
how_to_use: Pair with your go-to setting powder to lock in your look.
ingredient: Polybutylene Terephthalate (PBT) Bristles.

name: Sweed Lashes Eyelash Growth Serum 3ml
description: Taking your lashes (and brows!) to new look-at-me heights, the Eyelash Growth Serum is vitamin-rich remedy that effectively conditions and nourishes your delicate lash hairs to promote healthier, longer wisps. Fused with a potent blend of active length-retaining ingredients such as pumpkin seed extract, biotin, hyaluronic acid, hair-loving keratin, myristoyl pentapeptide-17 and of course, panthenol, this thickening serum improves the health of lashes and even reverses the damage of one too many extensions to reveal fuller, hydrated hairs. Restoring voluminous gloss and a healthy sheen with prolonged use, blink away dry, brittle hairs. Now that’s what we call eye-conic!
how_to_use: How to use on your lashes: Remove makeup. Apply on the base of the upper lash (the lash root) with a single stroke. Repeat daily (we recommend at night). Start from the outer corner of the eye and move towards your inner corner. Allow one to two minutes for the serum to dry. How to use on your brows: Apply a small amount all over your brows for a fuller and thicker brow look.
ingredient: Aqua, Hyaluronic Acid, Panthenol (Vitamine B5), Pumpkin Seed Oil, Myristol Pentapeptide-17, Biotin, Pentapeptide-16, Hydrolized Keratin, Biotenoyl Tripeptide-1, Octapeptide-2, Glycerin, Larix European Wood Extract, Glycerin Mac (Soybean) Polypeptide.

name: NARS Cosmetics Pro Prime Smudge Proof Eyeshadow - Base
description: Beautifully bold, seriously chic and incredibly high-performing, NARS’ Smudge Proof Eyeshadow Base is a lightweight eye primer that creates a seamless canvas for eyeshadow, eyeliner and anything else you use to adorn your lids! Crafted with a blend of polymers and mineral powder, this foolproof formula establishes a firm grip on colour, ensuring hours and hours of gorgeous wear and maximising the colour of whatever you apply after it. A special deep sea extract and an antioxidant-rich rice extract keeps lids smooth and protected. Whether you’re going for a sweep of day-time polish or an all-out smoky eye, sweep this on first to ensure it looks as good as possible, for as long as possible.
how_to_use: The Smudge Proof Eyeshadow Base holds eyeshadow pigments tight, ensuring that the colour won't crease, cake, or budge. This product is especially great for anyone who has trouble with eyeshadow travelling around on the eye. It also makes colour read true, so it's great to use when you're wearing bolder colours. François Nars says: ‘You should always prep the eye area. If the eye area is too greasy, the colour will split and separate. A primer will grab the colour and intensify it.’
ingredient: Isododecane, Talc, Cyclopentasiloxane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Dimethicone, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Cyclohexasiloxane, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propylene Carbonate, Peg-40 Stearate, Sorbitan Olivate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Phenoxyethanol, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Oryza Sativa [Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil Extract], Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Castor Oil Phosphate, Sea Whip Extract, Mica, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride)

name: Dr. Jart+ Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment 50ml
description: Designed to even tone and perfect your complexion, Dr.Jart+’s Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment neutralises redness and blurs imperfections for a healthy-looking, dewy finish. Looking to try out the Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment before you fully commit? The reformulated sized-to-try {15ml} edition is sure to earn your affection! Working to cover blemishes while acting as a physical barrier against damaging environmental aggressors, this formula promises more than just a pretty face. Changing from muted green to a subtle, beige tint, the cream cushions your complexion with an array of ultra-nourishing ingredients. Formulated with a centella asiatica (tiger grass) complex to protect, extracts of resurrection plants (houttuynia cordata and yarrow) to strengthen, and raspberry leaf extract to obscure inflammation, it’s also infused with sodium, potassium, calcium and magnesium to boost moisture and lessen the signs of fatigue, while a blend of minerals and panthenol soothes and hydrates. With a list like that, it's safe to say we're beyond obsessed.
how_to_use: After moisturising, dab a small amount evenly across face and blend. The cream will change from green to beige as you massage it onto skin, evening out skin tone.
ingredient: Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane, CI 77891, Dimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Lauryl PEG-8 Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Triethylhexanoin, Butylene Glycol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Niacinamide, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, CI 77491, Glyceryl Tribehenate/Isostearate/Eicosandioate, Magnesium Sulfate, CI 77492, Hydrogenated Coco Glycerides, Stearic Acid, Alumina, Panthenol, Ceresin, CI 77499, Ethylcellulose, Caprylyl Glycol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, CI 77288, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Madecassoside, Adenosine, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Eryngium Maritimum Callus Culture Filtrate, Glycine Soja Peptide, Streptococcus Thermophilus Ferment, Aluminium Hydroxide, Asiaticoside, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Ilex Aquifolium Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Achillea Millefolium Oil, Hedera Helix Extract, Tocopherol, Silica, Calcium Chloride, Asiatic Acid, Madecassic Acid. • Centella Cx: Includes Tiger Grass (Centella Asiatica Extract aka Cica) and its active components, plus four traditional herbs (Fishwort, Holly, Yarrow, and Sea Holly) • Cicabond: Moisture barrier-replenishing complex that includes Arabinogalactan, CaCl2 and MgSO4 and glycerin to care for skin’s moisture barrier • Jartbiome: Dr.Jart's original probiotic ferment ingredient (Streptococcus Thermophilus Ferment) derived from the skin's microbiome

name: Hourglass Vanish Seamless Finish Concealer Brush
description: Making quick work of blending your concealer, this high-performance concealer brush is the ideal shape, density and texture to achieve the most seamless finish possible. The perfect partner to Hourglass’ {Vanish Airbrush Concealer} - though just as good with any other formulation - the brush’s unique half-moon shape fits easily into all contours of the face, especially under your eyes. Suitable for liquid, cream and powder formulas, these ultra-soft bristles diffuse your concealer with unparalleled precision and ease. The vegan brush head is crafted from PETA-approved Taklon bristles (a hygienic, less irritating alternative to animal hair), while the weighted metal handle provides effortless control – and a welcome touch of luxe – to any make up collection.
how_to_use: Buff over your concealer to seamlessly blend. TO CLEAN: Gently clean brush with mild soap and water. Lay flat to dry.
ingredient: Vegan Taklon Bristles.

name: benefit Floratint Desert Rose-Tinted Lip and Cheek Tint 6ml
description: Perfect to add a last-all-day, pretty pink tint to your lips and cheeks, Floratint offers a luscious, romantic flush in a bottle. With a smudge-proof, transfer-proof and kiss-proof formula, this water-like formula can be applied directly onto lips and cheeks with the precise doe foot applicator. Then, smudge out with your fingers or a brush. If you prefer a natural look, just a little of this tint will give you a subtle wash of colour — or layer up for a more vibrant, head-turning hue. The hydrating formula will stop dryness in its tracks and allow all-day-wear that will look as radiant as the moment you applied it.
how_to_use: Glide onto lips and layer to build intensity. Dot & blend quickly onto cheeks for a long-lasting flush.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Diisostearyl Malate, Squalane, Phenoxyethanol, Lecithin, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Citrate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Citric Acid, Propyl Gallate. [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6), Ci 17200 (Red 33), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 42090 (Blue 1, Blue 1 Lake)].

name: NARS Cosmetics Foundation Pump
description: Ask any beauty buff to name their most coveted complexion products and, chances are, NARS will be high up on the list – and this ultra-convenient pump will prove the perfect partner to your NARS liquid foundation. Designed to dispense just the right amount of product, this pump removes the need to dip or pour product – so no more over-pouring, drips or product wastage. By only dispensing the product you need, this pump will extend the life of your foundation and save you money. As well as this, it’s hygienic and extremely practical to use – a beauty no-brainer.
how_to_use: Use with your foundation to dispense the right amount and minimise product wastage

name: Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Eyeliner
description: For timeless eye enhancement look no further than Charlotte Tilbury's Pillow Talk Eyeliner - a smooth, creamy pencil that defines the lashline seamlessly for some sophisticated polish or some sultry, 'rock chick' smoulder. The 'little (nude) dresses' of your make up wardrobe, each pigment-rich formula is infused with opaque (long-wear) powders and a blend of nourishing oils for a flawless, transfer-resistant finish, every time...
how_to_use: For day: Sitting in front of a mirror, pull your lid taut using your spare hand. Sweep your pencil across your lash line in one continuous thin line. Re-trace the line to your preferred intensity. For night: Apply a fresh line then smudge it, using a small angled brush, upwards and outwards for a sultry smoky eye on the go – no eye shadow needed! For extra drama, line also in the upper and lower eyelid water lines. If you go wrong, soak a pointed cotton bud in Charlotte Tilbury’s 'Take It All Off' eye make up remover, and remove errors or excess product for a clean line.
ingredient: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Mica, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Polybutene, Silica, Hydrogenated Polydicyclopentadiene, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Synthetic Beeswax, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Pearl Powder, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Carmine (Ci 75470)]

name: benefit They're Real Lengthening Mascara - Jet Black 8.5g
description: Warning: using this mascara may kick-start a lifelong addiction. You need only ask anyone that's used Benefit's They're Real! Lengthening Mascara to be convinced of its unparalleled lash-enhancing super powers - there's nothing faux about it. Lifting and lengthening like a pro, the specially designed brush also curls, volumises, lifts and separates eyelashes, revealing hairs you never even knew were there. The jet black, long-lasting formula is seamlessly smudge-proof and won't dry out - in fact, 100% of Benefit's survey participants agreed that they saw long-wearing results. You can't really argue with that...
how_to_use: Hold the wand horizontally and give the brush a wiggle from side to side and base to tip, to achieve maximum volume, length and lift. Hold the wand vertically and stroke upward to curl and separate. Layer generously, as you wish.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cera Alba (Beeswax), Paraffin, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Propanediol, Glyceryl Stearate, Polybutene, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Steareth-21, Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax), Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-2, Silica, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Laureth-12 Sulfate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Kaolin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ammonium Hydroxide, Sericin, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate. [+/- Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines)] Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

name: NARS Mini Laguna Bronzing Powder 3.3g (Various Shades)
description: The secret to sun-kissed skin all year round thanks to diffused bronzing powders and subtle sheen, the Mini Laguna Bronzing Powder creates natural-looking warmth with an imperceptible finish. The travel size (hand luggage-friendly) bronzer arrives in a spectrum of shades to suit all skin tones. Ultra-finely milled for effortless diffusion and no harsh lines, it dusts soft-focus colour across your cheeks, temples and nose – anywhere you wish to create the illusion of sun-sculpted dimension. Use to contour, add warmth or enhance the look of naturally tanned skin with a sweep of a fluffy brush.
how_to_use: To add warmth, sweep onto the skin starting from the temple, across the cheek, and along the jawline. Take what’s left on the brush and blend into the neck and décolleté. Apply in a circular motion, continuously buffing and blending, to avoid creating harsh lines.
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Silica, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Zinc Oxide, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Tocopherol, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Chlorphenesin, [+/-(May Contain/Peut Contenir): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Ultramarines (Ci 77007)].

name: benefit BADgal Bang! Volumising Mascara - Pitch Black
description: Finish every eye look with a bang with Benefit's BADgal BANG Mascara, an unbelievably volumising mascara that marks the start of a new universe of lash enhancement. Offering bigger, 'badder' lashes than ever before, the unique, intensely black formula stars gravity-defying aero-particles - one of the lightest known materials derived from space technology. This innovative ingredient ensures that the formula can be layered up for maximum impact without weighing lash hairs down, adding volume, length and curl without clumps. It's effortless to apply using the unique 'slimpact' brush, which is streamlined to coat every lash evenly and the formula is both smudge-proof and water-resistant, so the miraculous results will last through even the wildest gales, tantrums and tears - though we hope it doesn't have to!
how_to_use: Wiggle the brush from base of lashes to tip. Apply one coat to both eyes, repeat as desired to build BIGGER and BIGGER volume.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cera Alba (Beeswax), Paraffin, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates Copolymer, Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax), Steareth-21, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Palmitic Acid, Polybutene, Stearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-2, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Panthenol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Silica Silylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60. [+/- Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)] Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

name: Charlotte Tilbury Matte Revolution
description: This luscious matte lipstick not only imparts bold, kiss-proof colour but also hydrates and protects lips with a delicate blend of oils and waxes, together with 'lipstick tree' and orchid extracts. Rich in light-diffusing pigments to create the illusion of enhanced lip fullness, the pigment payoff is second-to-none velvety-textured but non-drying, this keeps lips soft and nourished while creating an arresting make up look. And to ensure application is effortless, theres an innovative squared-off angled tip which mirrors the precision of a lip brush for the most perfectly defined lip line and cupid's bow. Choose from a spectrum of stunning shades ranging from Hollywood scarlet 'Walk of No Shame' (formerly known as 'Walk of Shame'), cool neutral 'So 90s' (formerly known as 'Birkin Brown') to purple berry 'Festival Magic' (formerly known as 'Glastonberry'), warm red 'M.I.KISS' (formerly known as 'Bond Girl'), rose-hued 'Gracefully Pink' (formerly known as 'Amazing Grace') and the new and exclusive berry-rose 'First Dance'.
how_to_use: Apply Matte Revolution straight from the bullet for fuller, wider, lit-from-within lips.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Cheek to Chic
description: Everything you need to achieve the most natural, 'lit from within' flush of colour, Charlotte Tilbury's Chic to Cheek duos star a deep core colour, encircled by a paler, complementary hue to create an array of subtle-to-sex kitten finishes. With nine colour combinations, ranging from delicate peaches to rich pinks and deep bronze, simply swirl the Blusher Brush (sold separately) around the outer colour and diffuse along the cheekbone, then 'pop' the brush into the core colour and apply to the apples of the cheeks for the most gorgeous, nuanced glow. Infused with special 'light-flex' technology to enhance luminosity, you cheeks have never been so beautifully dressed.
how_to_use: Swirl the brush around the outer shade and tap off any excess. Run the brush flat, up the cheekbone starting from the apple of the cheek, to add structure to the face. Take the pointed tip of the brush, 'pop' it in the core colour and tap off the excess. Apply to the apples of the cheeks to make them glow. Blend seamlessly together.

name: Weleda Skin Food Lip Butter 8ml
description: Transforming dry, chapped lips with its deeply nourishing formula, Weleda's Skin Food Lip Balm forms a lightweight veil of moisture that relieves and protects your skin. Don't let dryness deter you from smiling; this intensely nourishing balm calls upon botanical extracts, natural oil and waxes to soothe and replenish your lips. The conditioning blend fuses sunflower seed oil with rosemary, calendula and chamomile extracts to deliver a plush, supple finish. Not only does it protect your lips from drying out, but it also creates a protective barrier against environmental factors - like harsh, cold weather or dry indoor air. Think: everyday beauty staple.
how_to_use: Squeeze a little onto your finger or directly onto lips and smooth in gently.
ingredient: Helianthus Annuus(Sunflower) Seed Oil, Lanolin, Beeswax (Cera Alba), Glycerin, Viola Tricolor Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita(Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Alcohol, Water (Aqua), Fragrance (Parfum)*, Limonene*, Linalool*, Geraniol*. *From natural essential oils

name: Too Faced Soleil Bronzer - Chocolate 8g
description: For a tan that looks good enough to eat, Chocolate Soleil Matte Bronzer by Too Faced is infused with 100% real cocoa powder. *Swoon* Imparting enviable warmth, the matte formula is buttery and easily buildable, and as super-smooth as it is sweetly scented. Blending effortlessly, the velvety powder is a dream to use, creating a rich, healthy-looking, medium-to-deep tan that’s sure to attract many an envious glance. Delicately diffuse over skin for a soft and sun-kissed glow, or use a densely-packed brush for some intensely chiselled contour action – the opportunities are endless! Now even available in a teeny tiny 'Doll-Size', you never need to be without it, ever – pop one in your make up bag, one in your handbag and one in your pocket for good measure.
how_to_use: Apply wherever the sun naturally touches the face: nose, cheeks, chin and forehead. Top Tip: Get cheeky! Sculpt high cheekbones by sweeping bronzer into the hollows of the cheeks and just under the jawline.
ingredient: Talc, Mica, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Zinc Stearate, Boron Nitride, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Silica, Benzyl Benzoate, Flavor (Aroma), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Fruit Powder, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Benzyl Alcohol. (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Manganese Violet (CI 77742)

name: NYX Professional Makeup Glitter Primer
description: This easy-to-use and lightweight primer is the ultimate partner for your glitter make up. It holds those pesky particles in place so you can let you make up sparkle with minimal stress. With glowing reviews from NYX Professional Makeup customers (who dub it “glitter glue”), it feels supremely comfortable to wear too. Essential for big nights out and festival season, we advise stocking up now.
how_to_use: Apply a fine layer to the skin before following up with glitter.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Beeswax/Cera Alba/Cire d’Abeille, Stearic Acid, Octyldodecanol, PVP, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Silica, Aminomethyl Propanol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Jojoba Esters, Tocopherol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol. MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499).

name: Saie Glowy Super Gel
description: Wishlists at the ready prepare to draw gasps (and induce endless envy) with cheekbones so glowy they pose a legitimate risk. Formulated with 75% water, the cruelty-free Glowy Super Gel melts into skin and diffuses with ease for a luminous lustre that looks like your face made it simply blend with a brush or your fingers to dial up the dew when youre craving some radiance. Loaded with ten precious extracts including papaya and vitamin C to protect and revitalise skin as it brightens this comes in a choice of two flattering hues: Starglow (the dreamiest, champagne-gold gleam) and Sunglow (sunshine in a bottle). Beautiful under your make up for skin that looks lit-from-within, you can cocktail this featherlight highlight with make up or day cream, or wear it on top of foundation for maximum impact. It feels like nothing, but looks like everything you dew you.
how_to_use: Try one-two pumps to start, and apply after any serum, oil or untinted moisturiser. Then glow your way. Mix a few drops of Glowy Super Gel into your foundation to brighten up the finish. Use Glowy Super Gel alone for an easy no-make up moment. Prime with it under foundation* or tinted SPF. Looks amazing over make up, too. Use it for allover glow on your face, or anywhere you bare, like chest and collarbones, shoulders and legs. Go with 'Starglow' for a pure, super-naturalglowthat elevates every skin it touches. Get to know'Sunglow'when you want a kiss of bronze: instant beach vacay for light/medium skin, instant luminous perfection for deeper skin tones. *Its good to note that water-based Glowy Super Gel plays well with most foundation formulas, as long as the foundation isnt too oily. If youre not sure, test it out on your hand.
ingredient: Water,Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride,Propanediol,Glycerin,Mica,Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Laurate Copolymer,Squalane,Caprylyl Glycol,Phenethyl Alcohol,Ethylhexylglycerin,Polysorbate 60,Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate,Papaya Seed Oil,Rosa Canina Fruit Oil,Lactic Acid,Titanium Dioxide,Iron Oxides.

name: VIEVE 117 Foundation Brush
description: Super-soft and crafted to support comfort, the synthetic 117 Foundation Brush is densely packed and dome-shaped to buff your favourite foundation formulas seamlessly - cream, powder, liquid, you name it. Whether you're going for light or full coverage, expect this brush to move with ease, so you can effortlessly apply your chosen formula with not a streak in sight. Making uneven application a thing of the past, this dense brush blends seamlessly for an even, blurred-effect finish. Its gold wooden handle also makes for a chic staple in your kit.
how_to_use: Buff and blend your favourite liquid, cream or powder foundation over the face. The domed brush is perfect for stippling out any cream products on the face such as blushers or bronzers. How to wash your brushes: Using a gentle soap, swirl each brush into the palm of your hand, rinsing downwards under lukewarm water until the water runs clear. Once clean, gently squeeze out and rest your brushes on a table with the bristle end hanging over the edge to air dry. VIEVE recommends washing your makeup brushes once a week.
ingredient: 100% vegan, synthetic bristles.

name: Urban Decay Exclusive Travel Size Vitamin C All Nighter Setting Spray 30ml
description: Want a product that works just as hard (if not harder!) than you do? Then the fan-favourite All Nighter Setting Spray is ready and waiting to deliver a healthy glow and up to 16 hours of locked-in make up wear in this amped up vitamin C formulation. This is a mini mist-with-a-difference, bringing lightweight hydration to all skin types in a water and transfer-resistant finish, your make up isn't budging any time soon. Powered by vitamin C and cactus flower, this travel-friendly setting spray will make sure that you're good to glow from sunrise to sunset. Did we mention the uplifting citrus scent too? We can *almost* smell the orange groves…
how_to_use: As a primer: Apply your usual skincare (don't forget your SPF). Mist your face with All Nighter Setting Spray Vitamin C (30ml) for extra hydration and a long-lasting glowy base for your makeup. You'll get all the skincare benefits while keeping your makeup in place for up to 16 hours! As a setting spray: Apply your makeup. Shake bottle well, hold eight to ten inches away from face. Close eyes and mouth and mist face two to four times, in an “X” and “T” formation or until face is fully covered for 16 hours of locked in makeup. PRO TIPS: Apply before your makeup as a long-lasting base or after to lock in your look & extra glow. Want extra-intense shadow colour, less fallout, and even longer wear? Wet your brush with All Nighter before you apply.
ingredient: Aqua /Water/Eau, Alcohol Denat, Glycerin, Pvp, Amp-Acrylates/Allyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Diisopropyl Adipate, Chlorphenesin, Triethanolamine, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Parfum/Fragrance, Hydrolyzed Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Limonene, Linalool, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citral.

name: Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm - Strawberry 10g
description: A delicious reinvention of {The Original 101 Ointment}, Lanolips 101 Ointment Fruities are available in four ‘flavours’, each boasting its own good-to-skin benefits. There’s ‘Green Apple’, a vitamin and antioxidant-rich formula that naturally deflects harmful environmental elements and pollutants, ‘Strawberry’, which helps to slough away dead skin cells and reveal healthy, new skin thanks to the key addition of alpha-hydroxy acids; ‘Peach’, which helps to revive skin with its combination of vitamins and polyunsaturated fatty acids, ‘Coconutter’, which is boosted with vitamin E and is rich in antioxidants to make it ultra-hydrating and, finally, 'Watermelon', which is boosted with vitamin E and watermelon fruit extract to intensely hydrate. Each one is formulated with Ultra Medical Grade lanolin, which resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture unlike anything else and holds 200% of its weight in moisture. Vegetarian, baby-friendly and free from any nasties, this is basically a no brainer!
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously and keep below 25°c.
ingredient: Green Apple: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Apple Extract, Vitamin E. Strawberry: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Strawberry Extract, Vitamin E. Peach: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Apple Extract, Vitamin E. Coconutter: Lanolin*, Flavour*, Tocopherol Acetate* (Vit E), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*. Watermelon: Lanolin*, aroma*, tocopherol (vit E), helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, citrullus vulgaris (watermelon) seed oil*

name: Chantecaille Wild Mustang Matte Eyeshadow 2.5g (Various Shades)
description: The perfect addition to your growing make up collection, Chantecaille’s Wild Mustang Matte Eye Shade is a treat for not only yourself, but the planet too. Made from vegan ingredients, this creamy, cruelty-free eye shadow comes in a range of flattering shades and has a velvety, matte finish - ideal for fans of a rich, smoky eye. And remember what we said about doing good for the planet? Sales from the Wild Mustang Collection support the American Wild Horse Campaign and protect wild mustangs’ freedom to roam and thrive - which is why the collection’s packaging is adorned with beautiful illustrations of wild horses.
how_to_use: Apply with the flat side of the Shade and Sweep Eye Brush for a smooth wash of colour on the eyelid. Use the tapered side to seamlessly blend.
ingredient: Mica, Coco-caprylate/Caprate, Silica, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-hexanediol, Gellan Gum, Calcium Chloride, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491/Ci 77499).

name: Chantecaille Wild Mustang Lip Veil 2.5g (Various Shades)
description: Glide a luminous sheen across your lips and look after the planet at the same time with Chantecaille’s Wild Mustang Lip Veil. Available in a range of shades, this revolutionary lipstick is enriched with baobab oil — cold pressed from the seeds of the baobab tree (Africa’s iconic ‘tree of life’) — leaving lips looking glossy (but not sticky) and feeling hydrated. Your lips aren’t the only thing that’ll be looking pretty, though. Chantecaille’s Wild Mustang Lip Veil comes in the most aesthetically pleasing packaging, complete with an illustrated mustang in line with the collection’s cause: supporting the American Wild Horse Campaign and protecting wild mustangs’ freedom to roam and thrive.
how_to_use: Apply directly to the lips. Start in the middle and work the colour outward.
ingredient: Octyldodecanol, Polybutene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Polyethylene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax, Synthetic Wax, Ozokerite, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Propylene Carbonate, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Lavandula Stoechas Extract, Dicalcium Phosphate, Tin Oxide, Geraniol, Linalool, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491/Ci 77492).

name: Natasha Denona My Dream Palette
description: The midi sized MY DREAM EYESHADOW PALETTE brings together 15 of Natasha’s favourite eyeshadows in a captivating constellation of shades inspired by the elements of life that illuminate and intensify her creative vision. With burgundy, brown, and coral mattes offset by bursts of neutral golden shimmer and high shine metallics, MY DREAM EYESHADOW PALETTE is encased in packaging hand designed by Natasha and featuring her own handwriting. Including 2 of Natasha’s favourite existing shades, MY DREAM EYESHADOW PALETTE also introduces 13 brand NEW shades, including a vibrant multichrome with a high impact foiled finish, and two sparkling duochromes that can also be worn as toppers.
how_to_use: MATTE EYESHADOWS: Apply with fluffy eyeshadow brushes to blend or detail brushes for precision. METALLIC EYESHADOWS: May be applied with different shapes of brushes for a subtle application. For high pay off/ foiled finish, apply with a damp eyeshadow brush or with tip of finger.

name: benefit Badgal Bang Volumising Mascara Mini - Pitch Black 4g
description: Finish every eye look with a bang with Benefit's BADgal BANG Mascara, an unbelievably volumising mascara that marks the start of a new universe of lash enhancement. Offering bigger, 'badder' lashes than ever before, the unique, intensely black formula stars gravity-defying aero-particles - one of the lightest known materials derived from space technology. This innovative ingredient ensures that the formula can be layered up for maximum impact without weighing lash hairs down, adding volume, length and curl without clumps. It's effortless to apply using the unique 'slimpact' brush, which is streamlined to coat every lash evenly and the formula is both smudge-proof and water-resistant, so the miraculous results will last through even the wildest gales, tantrums and tears - though we hope it doesn't have to!
how_to_use: Wiggle the brush from base of lashes to tip. Apply one coat to both eyes, repeat as desired to build BIGGER and BIGGER volume.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cera Alba (Beeswax), Paraffin, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates Copolymer, Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax), Steareth-21, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Palmitic Acid, Polybutene, Stearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-2, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Panthenol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Silica Silylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60. [+/- Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)] Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

name: Tan-Luxe Super Gloss Illuminating Bronzing Drops
description: Taking up a coveted spot on our most-wanted list, the exclusive Super Gloss SPF 30 is a lightweight illuminating and bronzing serum that effortlessly colour-corrects your tone, softens the look of imperfections, quenches your skin and reignites your glow. Blurring the lines between a serum, bronzer and sunscreen, the Super Gloss SPF 30 is a multi-tasking formula that melds hyaluronic acid and squalane to boost and retain skin-plumping moisture while softening the visibility of fine lines to promote a beautifully dewy, fresh-faced finish. Effective enough for everyday use – come rain or shine - this SPF 30 helps to shield your skin against damaging UVA/UVB rays, as well as blue light! Plus, the vegan & reef-safe formula blurs the look of imperfections (think: uneven tone) to bestow a luminous, bronzed glow.
how_to_use: Apply to bare skin for natural sun-kissed radiance. Drop into your moisturiser for a custom glow-boost. Highlight cheekbones/collarbones/shoulders for a glossy finish. Mix with The Face for an instant glow that develops over time.
ingredient: C13-15 Alkane, Isododecane, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Octocrylene, Octisalate, Isosorbide Dicaprylate, Ethyl Macadamiate, Homosalate, Dextrin Palmitate, Avobenzone, Polyester-7, Mica, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Squalane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dextrin Palmitate/Hexyldecanoate, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Hyaluronic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Bisabolol, Tocopherol, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Palmitic Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Glycerin, Water (Aqua), Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Isochrysis Galbana Extract, Malic Acid

name: Too Faced Better Than Sex Waterproof Mascara - Black 8ml
description: Guaranteed to feel better (and last longer...) than even your most dangerous liaison, Better Than Sex Waterproof Mascara by Too Faced is the waterproof edition of a bona fide make up icon. The number one selling prestige mascara in the U.S., this is a Holy Grail formula for countless devoted fans. What makes it so good, you might well ask? It starts with the formula - it's enriched with unique peptides to impart the deepest, most intense black possible and porcelain flower extract to moisturise and condition lashes without flaking, ever. As well as this, film-forming polymers and collagen provide smudge-proof, all-day wear that can weather the wildest storm, tantrum, sweaty gym sesh or whatever else you throw at it (though we hope it doesn't have to!). And, of course, a mascara is only as good as its brush - this one is shaped like an hourglass to 'unlock' the formula and leave no lash behind, stretching, lengthening, curling, lifting and coating each and every little one from top and bottom. In just a few coats, your eyes will look more defined, bright and fluttery than ever before. Now in a teeny tiny 'Doll-Size', you need never be without it either - pop one in your make up bag, one in your handbag and one in your pocket for good measure.
how_to_use: Step 1: Apply the first coat from base to tip. Step 2: Apply the second coat over and under the lashes. Step 3: Apply third coat by rolling the wand from base to tip and bumping the lashes back at the tip. *For best results, let your lashes dry in between coats.
ingredient: Isododecane, Paraffin, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Beeswax/Cera Alba/ Cire d'Abeille, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Pentaerythrityl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Talc, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera/ Cire De Carnauba, Polybutene, Water/Aqua/Eau, Silica, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyquaternium-7, Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Oil, Trimethylpentanediol/Adipic Acid/Glycerin Crosspolymer, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecanol, Hoya Lacunosa Flower Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Iron Oxides (CI 77499). Ophthalmologist-Tested and Safe for Contact Lens Wearers *on pack

name: Charlotte Tilbury Look Of Love Matte Revolution Lipstick
description: From the mother of utterly iconic lipsticks, the vegan The Look of Love Matte Revolution Lipsticks come in a bouquet of rosebud hues to suit every skin tone and preference. Glamourous and seductive, each bullet is inspired by the power of love, joy and happiness lovingly embossed with a heart and housed in a refillable, keepsake, star-studded rose gold case. Never dry, uncomfortable or tight, orchid extract and lipstick tree extract (or bixa orellana extract, if you want to be technical about it) work to soften, moisturise and protect, while three-dimensional, glow-bestowing pigments create the illusion of plump, lit-from-within lips. A precious blend of oils and waxes gives this lipstick its effortless, glide-on appeal, and the bullets angled square tip mimics the shape of a lip brush for precise application. Choose between Mrs Kisses (a golden peachy-pink), Wedding Belles (a delicate rose hue) and First Dance (a blushed berry).
how_to_use: Start by applying your {Lip Cheat} lip liner, outlining from the top corner of your lip, slightly over your natural lip line to create a fuller-looking pout. Apply to lips straight from the bullet for pout-perfection in seconds! Wear First Dance with Charlottes {Lip Cheat in Crazy in Love} its the perfect way to dial up your lip look for evening! Wear Mrs Kisses with Charlottes {Lip Cheat lip liner in Love Trap}. Wear Wedding Belles with the {Lip Cheat lip liner in Pillow Talk} for fair skin tones, or {Pillow Talk Medium} for medium to deep skin tones.

name: Natasha Denona Mini Biba
description: Featuring five velvety hues, the gorgeous Mini Biba Palette stars a spectrum of high-performance metallics and buttery mattes in nude-toned shades with delicate peachy-pink, champagne and rusty tones. Perfect for creating subtle daytime looks or intense, smoky eyes alike, simply use a brush or your fingertips to apply each shadow, then get ready to fall in love with the rich pigment, seamless blend and longevity of each hue. Just like Natasha Denona’s other industry-lauded mini palettes, this travel-friendly shadow selection is ideal for both newcomers to the brand or seasoned Denona fans, uniting a quintet of neutral, pigmented shadows that pack on and blend out impeccably – without bunching or creasing – while lasting aaall day long.
how_to_use: Matte shadows: Apply with fluffy eyeshadow brushes to blend, or detail brushes for precision. Metallic eyeshadows: May be applied with different shapes of brushes for a subtle application. For high payoff with an almost-foiled finish, apply with a damp eyeshadow brush or with tip of finger.
ingredient: Blaze Nude 419 M: Talc, Mica, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Cetyl Dimethicone, Dimethicone, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Hydrogenated Palm Kernel Glycerid, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Lauryl Dimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tin Oxide, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Laureth-4, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Aluminum Powder (Ci 77000), Carmine (Ci 75470), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163). Plush 420 Cm: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Mica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Silica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Carmine (Ci 75470), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140). Izzy 418 Cm: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite Zinc Stearate Mica Dimethicone Triethoxycaprylylsilane Caprylyl Glycol Ethylhexylglycerin Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer Silica Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891) Iron Oxides (Ci 77491) Iron Oxides (Ci 77492) Iron Oxides (Ci 77499) Carmine (Ci 75470). Bruno 417 Cm: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Silica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891) Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499) Carmine (Ci 75470). Wink 421 Cp: Mica, Dimethicone, Squalane, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Zinc Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Boron Nitride, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamat Laureth-4, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Carmine (Ci 75470).

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Wiz 0.08g (Various Shades)
description: Anastasia's Brow Wiz is an ultra fine pencil designed to shape, fill and 'plump out' sparse or unshapely brows. It avoids the 'coloured in' look using a skinny, mechanical nib that can mimic even the finest hairs, coupled with a brush for convenient blending. You can fake fuller brows in an instant thanks to a spectrum of natural shades - and you won't be caught short sans sharpener - just twist. Nobody need ever know that your elegant, face framing arches were quickly drawn on in the back of the taxi!
how_to_use: For best results, use short upwards stroke in the direction of hair growth. Fill in any gaps and extend where necessary, making sure to blend with the brush for even, natural looking coverage. Make sure you always do this in really, really good light, preferably sunlight, and always blend with the brush after drawing on your brow area.

name: VIEVE Modern Lip Definer 1.2g (Various Shades)
description: The epitome of understated, contemporary glamour, try a Modern Lip Definer to define (of course!), transform and adorn your luscious lips. Whether you fancy upgrading a simple lipstick look or want to cheat your lip shape into something more befitting your mood, these multipurpose pencils come with tips and tricks from Jamie Genevieve herself, ready and raring to help you overhaul or enhance. These lip-lovers are long-lasting and highly pigmented, yet blendable and oh-so creamy. Available in a plethora of mouth-watering tones (with correspondingly memorable names!) choose from 11 stunning shades.
how_to_use: Maximise shape, sculpt, contour and add volume to lips with the Modern Lip Definer. Lip liner is a makeup artist's secret weapon when it comes to the perfect pout. Whether you want subtle definition or an ombre effect, mix and match lipsticks and liners to create endless combinations. Top Tip: To naturally accentuate lips, trace your lip line before applying your favourite lipstick, or for stronger definition and longer wear, apply liner all over the lips as a base before lipstick. Go one step further and draw the liner just over the outer edge of your natural lip line for maximum volume.
ingredient: Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax), Ozokerite, Ceresin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil, Polybutene, Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Cyclopentasiloxane, Mica (77019), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499).

name: benefit Roller Liner Liquid Eyeliner Mini Black
description: If you love Benefit’s cult classic Roller Lash (and we know that loads of you do!) get ready for your next obsession: Benefit’s Roller Liner. The conveniently mini liquid liner counterpart to your favourite mascara, this future Holy Grail delivers a true matte finish in richly saturated black or rich brown shades. Easy to apply, the flexible felt tip-style liner creates a smooth, continuous line, so you won’t have to worry about application issues – no matter how unpractised your hand. The formula is quick-drying, water-resistant and offers up to 24 hours of wear.
how_to_use: Use to line and define eyes perfectly. Hold the tip of the Stylo on its side for more control.
ingredient: Roller Liner Black: Aqua (Water), Methylpropanediol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Cellulose, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Coco-Glucoside, Poloxamer 407, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Phenylpropanol, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Laureth-12 Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Bht.
