N° 12248/B

name: NYX Professional Makeup Micro Brow Pencil (Various Shades)
description: NYX Professional Makeups handy Micro Brow Pencil is essential for filling in sparse brow hairs and defining and tidying your arches. The skinny, mechanical nib can help you recreate the finest brow hairs, while you can use the brush at the other end to help tidy and blend your handiwork. With a natural array of shades to select from, you can fake bigger brows in an instant plus the easy twist-up mechanism means you wont need to hunt around for a sharpener either.
how_to_use: For best results, use short upwards stroke in the direction of hair growth. Fill in any gaps and extend where necessary, making sure to blend with the brush for even, natural looking coverage. Make sure you always do this in really, really good light, preferably sunlight, and always blend with the brush after drawing on your brow area.
ingredient: Polyethylene, C12-15 Alkyl Ethylhexanoate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Ozokerite, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, C20-40 Alcohols, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Candelilla Cera/Cire de Candelilla, Zinc Stearate, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcrystalline, Dimethicone, Sorbitan Tristearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glyceryl Caprylate. MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (CI 77510).

name: Sweed Lashes Nikki No Lash-Lash - Black
description: Designed in collaboration with make up artist Nikki Wolff (also known as Nikki Makeup), the Sweed X Nikki Wolff No Lash Lash set features four varying lengths of ultra-delicate cluster lashes to help you achieve your most fluttery, natural look yet. Each of the four designs were created to fulfil every need in Nikki's kit and personal make up bag, ultimately delivering the ultimate lash wardrobe. Nikki carefully and thoughtfully designed each style to ensure that everyone could instantly create any lash look, no matter your eye shape. The Sweed X Nikki Wolff No Lash Lash set features ultra-delicate lashes in four different lengths to achieve the most natural and defined finish. Use the shorter lengths to add discrete volume along the entire lash line, or apply the longer lengths at the outer corner of your eyes to enhance your eye shape. Ideal for seasoned and skilled lash-wearers, these delicate lashes might take a moment to get the swing of, but hang in there – the results are worth it!
how_to_use: Apply using the Adhesive for Strip Lashes from Sweed Lashes.
ingredient: Synthetic Hair (PVC)

name: ICONIC London Rollaway Glow 8ml (Various Shades)
description: ICONIC London's Rollaway Glow is like no other highlighter that has traversed your make up kit. Get ready to roll on glow like never before… An instant illuminator, housed in a genius roll-on applicator that seamlessly melts onto the skin, it expertly injects an instant healthy boost of radiance to the skin for a flawless and filter-like glow, without adding tonnes of glitter or shimmer. The result? Candlelit radiance and a pearlescent finish in seconds. Available in three radiance-boosting shades, 'Champagne Chic' a gorgeous frosted nude shade, 'Peach Paradise' a hint of pink for warmer tones, and 'Rose Potion' packed with rosy pigments for a real flush of blush.
how_to_use: Simply roll over the skin in circular motions onto the high points of the face and any areas you want to add a dream sheen to the skin. We love to use it on the cheekbones, brow bone, bridge of the nose and cupid's bow - before blending easily with fingertips, a make up sponge or brush.
ingredient: Hydrogenated Didecene, Isododecane, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Mica, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain (+/-): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides).

name: Too Faced Hangover 3-in-1 Primer & Setting Spray 120ml
description: If you’ve gone a little overboard and your skin’s betraying tell-tale signs of one too many drinks, Too Faced has the perfect cure: Hangover 3-in-1 Setting Spray is the ultimate quick face fix, soothing, smoothing and brightening skin to create a dewy, healthy-looking finish – as well as locking down make up for transfer and fade-proof wear. Miraculously multi-tasking, this can be used to prep and prime skin, set and lock down make up or as an all-day skin refresher. The replenishing formula is infused with coconut water to rebalance moisture levels and boost skin’s radiance. 100% of those in a Too Faced survey said it made their make up go on smoother and prevented it from transferring. Used alone or to create a seamless canvas and set make up, this setting spray will make you look remarkably well-rested – like you’ve had eight hours of sleep and your daily dose of H2O, even if you’ve had quite the opposite. Now in a teeny tiny 'Doll-Size', you need never be without it either – pop one in your make up bag, one in your handbag and one in your pocket for good measure. What’s more, along with the entire Too Faced range, you can rest assured that this is cruelty-free.
how_to_use: Shake well. Hold bottle 6-8 inches away from face and mist directly onto skin. PRIME: Apply to clean skin before makeup. SET: Apply after makeup to keep it in place all day. REFRESH: This spray can also be used anytime to refresh skin.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Pentylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, AMP-Acrylates/Allyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Glycerin, Lactobacillus/Salix Alba Bark Ferment Filtrate, Maris Aqua/Sea Water/Eau De Mer, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water/Cocos Nucifera Water, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium PCA, Urea, Panthenol, Yogurt Powder, Trideceth-9, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice/Cocos Nucifera Fruit Juice, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Trehalose, Fragrance/Parfum, Polyquaternium-51, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate

name: benefit Fan Fest Mini Mascara - Hyper Black 4g
description: Bringing a whole new meaning to fan-tastic lashes, the Fan Fest Mini Mascara has joined Benefit’s iconic lash line up. Formulated with cranberry extract and provitamin B5 to nourish and condition, plus rice water to define, separate and lift, this mascara delivers serious results without compromising the integrity of those tiny lash hairs. Easy to apply and featuring a 40° curve Full-Flex Fiber Brush, you’ll coat even the ittiest, bittiest lashes. With an ophthalmologist-approved formulation that’s budge and smudge proof, you’ll quickly achieve fully fanned-out flutters that are water-resistant from root to tip and corner to corner.
how_to_use: Gently wiggle wand from base to tip of lashes. Layer as desired. Remove using oil-based cleanser. Beauty Tip Hold brush vertically against upper lashes and stroke upward for added lift.

name: Saie Glow Sculpt Multi Use Cream Highlighting Blush (Various Shades)
description: A multi-tasking, shimmering formula that works as a blush and highlighter, the Glow Sculpt Multi-Use Cream Highlighting Blush instantly lifts and sculpts. Model-like cheekbones? Check. I-just-left-yoga-class kind of blush? You've got it. Upholding Saie's reputation as the go-to make up brand for dewy skin, this highlighter-blush hybrid is formulated with nourishing kukui oil to soften and smooth skin, humectant hero hyaluronic acid to attract and lock in moisture and fine micropearl particles to deliver a lifted glow that's never chalky or glittery. It's not just a pretty face, too. When you've hit pan on one of your favourite five shades, add the Glow Sculpt Multi-Use Cream Highlighting Blush Refill to your basket so you never have to go without. Pro-tip: don't hold back! Layer on this creamy formula or mix multiple shades and prepare for an instant flush of colour and lift - you can ditch the face tape now.
how_to_use: For a sculpted glow and luminous wash of colour, apply to the cheeks, eyes and high points of the face. When you're done, pop out the old shade pan and replace with a new one (all of which are plastic-free).

name: Charlotte Tilbury Lip Lustre
description: Set to change the way you think about lip gloss, Charlotte Tilbury's Lip Lustre is lacquer, but not as you know it... With a vinyl effect and rich, creamy colour, this grants a touch of glam to every beauty look. Subtly augmenting (gloss has an instant, lip-plumping effect), this nourishing formula is enriched with a cocktail of plant extracts and protective antioxidants to ward against the damage wrought by everyday environmental stress, while maintaining moisture levels to keep your pout kissably smooth, supple and cushion-y soft. Available in a spectrum of gorgeous shades to complement each of Charlotte's lipsticks and lip liners, choose from the ravishing red 'Candy Darling' to the sophisticated shimmer of 'Blondie' - there's a hue to suit every skin tone and occasion.
how_to_use: Sweep over your lips for a 3-dimensional mirror shine, creating the illusion of fullness.  For an amped-up evening look, apply Lip Cheat lip liner, and layer the lacquer on top of the complementing K.I.S.S.I.N.G lipstick. Load it up for full-on luscious glamour.

name: Kosas Revealer Super Creamy + Brightening Concealer
description: A medium coverage formula laced with a cocktail of skin-loving nutrients, Kosass Revealer Super Creamy + Brightening Concealer works to hide the signs of tiredness and blur the look of blemishes. With a second-skin texture that virtually melts to bestow an authentically bright-eyed and blemish-free finish, this is laced with skin-brightening caffeine and algae to lessen the look of dark circles, while peptides and hyaluronic acid combine to diminish the look of fine lines. Plumping and reparative, this has instant and lasting effects camouflaging as it works to visibly improve the appearance of bare skin (100% of 20 testers agreed that it made their skin appear more radiant and luminous within 28 days of use). Think: flicking a light switch to get an idea of its dewy, light-scattering benefits (What late night?).
how_to_use: Apply anywhere you want to brighten, highlight or smooth under eyes, blemishes, cheekbones, you literally cant mess it up. Swipe or dab the doe foot applicator over skin, then blend using your fingers, a brush or sponge. Perfect for spot covering or pairing with {Tinted Face Oil} foundation and {The Sun Show Bronzer} for an easy, natural glow.
ingredient: Aqua, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Octyldodecanol, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Undecane, Glycerin, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Tridecane, Galactoarabinan, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Glyceryl Oleate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Wax, Lecithin, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Caffeine, Squalane, Dunaliella Salina (Algae) Extract, Tocopherol, Maltodextrin, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Fruit Oil, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, [+/ -: Ci 77891, Ci 77492, Ci 77491, Ci 77499]

name: Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray Ultra Matte Travel
description: Want a product that works just as hard (if not harder!) than you do? Look no further… Urban Decay’s fan-favourite All Nighter Ultra Matte Setting Spray has serious staying power (up to 16 hours) to keep your face in place, and shine-free, 'til you decide otherwise. The ultimate ‘fix’ for your face, this mist-with-a-difference ensures that your look appears freshly applied until bedtime. Suitable for all skin types and formulated without oil, parabens – or cruelty! – this game-changing mist helps to minimise shine to keep foundation, eyeshadow, blush and concealer in place and looking velvety, even when the weather (or the dancefloor) has designs on beauty sabotage… There’s no nightclub too sweaty or island too hot for this featherlight – but heavy duty – formula, meaning you can go to the ball, and the after-party... and the after-after-party. No sweat!
how_to_use: After applying make up, shake the bottle well. Hold 8"-10" from the face and spray four times in an “X” and “T” formation. On make up-free days, wear it alone to keep shine at bay.

name: Urban Decay All Nighter Face Primer 30ml
description: Ensuring your base is on lockdown, Urban Decay’s All Nighter Face Primer behaves like a magnet for make up – keeping your masterpiece freshly applied until you decide otherwise… Extending your make up’s longevity by up to eight hours, this featherweight formula glides over skin without clogging your pores – creating the ultimate canvas for any foundation, concealer… you name it. Providing a hit of hydration while softening fine lines and granting a ‘lifted’ effect, this blurs and creates a smooth, velvety-textured complexion ahead of your subsequent steps. Essential for all those who live in the fast lane and like to put their make up through its paces, sandwich your ‘look’ between this and the {All Nighter Setting Spray} to guarantee your face remains immaculate through all eventualities. Plus, if you're on-the-go or travelling, there's now a nifty travel-size to keep you covered at all times.
how_to_use: Smooth over clean, moisturised skin with fingertips or foundation brush and evenly blend from the centre of the face in an outward motion. Wear it alone or with just concealer or blush for smoother, beautiful skin.

name: Urban Decay Eyeshadow Primer Potion 10ml (Various Shades)
description: If your eyeshadow tends to crease, cake or migrate then call off the search for the ultimate primer: Urban Decays Eyeshadow Primer Potion has near mythical skills when it comes to ensuring your colours on lockdown. The ultimate foil for the slipperiest eyelids, this velvety formula counteracts oils to create a smooth, Velco-esque base for your shadows. Like prepping a canvas, this helps to intensify payoff and keep your look freshly applied until bedtime no smudging or fallout allowed. A Holy Grail favourite of those in-the-know, this much-lauded offerings tipped to transform your approach to eyeshadow there's no wonder that it's the UKs #1 premium eyeshadow primer!* *According to the NPD Group. Value and Unit product sales of Makeup Eye Primer, January to December 2019.
how_to_use: Apply just a touch of any one of these formulas before your shadow for crease-free all-day (and all-night) staying power.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Stick Contour 9g (Various Shades)
description: Effortlessly easy to use and in four natural-looking shades, Anastasia Beverly Hills Contour Stick will quickly become the hero of your make up collection. Highly pigmented and buildable, this contour stick lets you chisel cheekbones, slim down your nose and perfect your jawline, without the painstaking process of all-out contouring. It has a buildable matte finish (but you can use it with moisturiser to create lighter, sheer coverage) and, enriched with jojoba seed oil, it nourishes and softens skin while sculpting.
how_to_use: Just apply it beneath your cheeks, blending up and along both sides of your nose, blending out. For more slimming action, use it on your hairline blending up and on your jawline blending down.

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml
description: Forming an invisible bandage on sore skin, La Roche-Posay's insulating Cicaplast Gel B5 brings instant relief to compromised and damaged skin. This is one treatment to keep stocked on your shelfie at all times. Your new personal at-home healer can be used by every member of the family to treat damaged skin and even when recovering from laser treatments and cosmetic peels. Working to stimulate new cell production is a complex of copper, manganese and zinc that are perfectly partnered with hyaluronic acid, drawing in all the water your skin is craving. Wondering what brings that instant relief? Panthenol is your hero ingredient at play here at 5% to immediately soothe sore skin. Using this just twice a day is enough to speed up healing times and improve your skin barrier health. It might sound too good to be true but this clinically tested treatment has the dermatologist seal of approval!
how_to_use: Apply twice a day to cleansed and dry skin. Do not apply directly on wounded skin. Avoid the eye contour area.

name: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Palette Volume II 9g
description: Sometimes, the cold light of day can be a little harsh on skin, so recreate the most flattering light (wherever you stray) with this ethereal illumination powder palette from Hourglass. An innovation in illumination, this universally flattering finishing powder takes inspiration from the most forgiving light sources – from morning light to candlelight, via sunset and moon light – so you’ll feel like you have a personal lighting technician at your disposal. Thanks to ground-breaking ‘Photoluminescent Technology’, the Ambient Lighting Palette Volume II captures, diffuses and softens surrounding light, filtering out harsh beams to blur the visibility of imperfections, pores and wrinkles, leaving skin looking softer, more youthful and beautifully lit-from-within. This sublime trio unites three sumptuous shades, which can be applied individually or layered to imbue skin with a multidimensional glow: there’s 'Soft Light', 'Radiant Light' and 'Golden Bronze Light'. You’re sure to fall for all three (we certainly already have…)
how_to_use: Apply each colour separately or layer up for a multidimensional glow. Apply with a powder brush all over the face, or use to accentuate your face’s highest points.

name: Natasha Denona My Dream Lipstick - 11NB Natasha
description: If you could conjure up your perrrrfect lipstick, what would it look like? Introducing My Dream Lipstick 11NB - Natasha, an enzyme-rich fusion that delivers glistening coverage for all-day wear. Kissing booth, anyone? Well, we wouldn’t blame you after all this lip-softening blend starring aloe vera and nourishing papaya extracts will make anyone’s pout hard to resist. Offering a dream-like luminosity and rose-tinted pigment, what’s not to love?
how_to_use: Apply the lipstick directly onto lips for a creamy and luscious finish.

name: Too Faced Lip Injection Extreme Lip Gloss 4ml
description: An intensified take on the iconic Too Faced classic, Lip Injection, this ingenious formula offers both immediate and long-term plumping for fuller lips without fillers. Suitable for both day and night-time use, this serum-like gloss is inspired by medically proven blood vessel dilating technology, which makes lips look bigger, brighter and enviably healthy – giving a slight tingling sensation as it works. The clear gloss is packed with light-reflecting shine and provides lips with supreme moisture thanks to conditioning avocado and jojoba oils. Time to pucker up! What’s more, this product is vegan-friendly and, along with the entire Too Faced range, you can rest assured that it’s cruelty-free. Now in a teeny tiny 'Doll-Size', you need never be without it either – pop one in your make up bag, one in your handbag and one in your pocket for good measure.
how_to_use: Apply over lip liner, lipstick, or on bare lips. A slight tingling sensation that can last up to 5 minutes is normal.

name: HUDA BEAUTY Creamy Kohl Eye Pencil 0.35g (Various Shades)
description: Whether you prefer to smudge, line or tightline, the Creamy Kohl Eye Pencil from Huda Beauty will make all your eyeliner wishes come true. Line your eyes with ease with this ultra-smooth gel formulation, perfect for creating everything from graphic lines, soft flicks and a smoked-out gaze. Completely effortless to blend and apply, once this retractable pencil gets to work you'll want to work fast. The 24-hour smudge and transfer-proof formula will set swiftly to ensure your look stays in place from dawn till dusk. Choose between 'Very Vanta' - a classic onyx hue, and 'Very Brown' - a rich chocolate shade for those after a slightly softer look, and let this pencil do all the work for you...
how_to_use: Use on waterline, lash line or lid to create your preferred looks. Apply in 1 stroke. For feathery looks, smudge with finger or brush to create a smoky effect. Work fast as this formula will set quickly & will stay in place! HACK: Use the black shade for glam & dramatic eye looks; Use the brown for natural eye looks.

name: Beautyblender Blendercleanser Solid
description: A concentrated blend of sustainable palm oils, nourishing aloe and coconut oil to eliminate grime and keep sponges (and brushes!) pristine, Beautyblenders Blendercleanser Solid Lavender maintains your most precious make up possession. A professional-grade formula that protects against 99.7% of germs for up to 24 hours after cleansing, this cute and transportable solid bar cleanser boasts lavender extracts to leave your tools lightly (and soothingly!) scented. The accompanying silicone mat then allows you to break-up residual dirt from your sponge or your make up brush bristles improving stubborn stains to leave your Beautyblender spotless! Free from parabens, sulphates and phthalates, this helps to make maintenance much less mundane, and it won't compromise tools' longevity.
how_to_use: Massage a very small amount into your damp sponge or brush - a low-foam lather will then gradually remove all traces of build-up and residue, leaving your make up tools spotlessly clean and ready for their next use.

name: Travel Size Pure Canvas Hydrating Primer
description: Parched pores? Let us introduce you to Laura Mercier's all-new Pure Canvas Primer Hydrating. Give your skin a wake up call with this moisture-rich yet lightweight primer that creates a flawless canvas for make up application, plus extended wear. A tall drink of water for parched pores, Laura Mercier's Pure Canvas Primer Hydrating helps to lock moisture into skin and keeps skin feeling fresh all day. Olive extract visibly smooths and locks in hydration while marine hydra botanicals replenish skin and promote long term moisture recovery.
how_to_use: Apply after skin care. Gently massage a dime-sized amount onto skin with fingertips. Follow with Tinted Moisturiser or Foundation.

May Contain/ Peut Contenir/(+/-): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491).

name: NARS Soft Matte Primer 30ml
description: Pore-fect for keeping excess oil, sweat and sebum under control whilst maintaining selfie-ready flawlessness, consider the Soft Matte Primer your shine-preventing beauty hero - no capes necessary! Powered by NARS’ super exclusive Climate Balancing Technology, a dual-action system that cleverly adjusts to any and every climate (yes, hot and stuffy night clubs count too)! Formulated to retain hydration in dry environments and absorb excess moisture in humid ones, water-gel primer keeps your skin matte whatever the weather. Smoothing over rough texture with a velvety feel, this skin-blurring primer minimises the appearance of imperfections to ensure that your foundation glides on with ease. Ever noticed your foundation changing colour as the day goes on? Well, as if it couldn’t get any better, the Anti-Oxidation Complex prevents shade-shifting and shows excess sebum who’s boss!
how_to_use: Smooth a small amount over the entire face prior to makeup application to even skin’s surface and extend foundation’s wear. May be worn alone to create a smooth complexion with a soft matte finish.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Lip and Cheek Glow 2.5g (Various Shades)
description: Delivering vitamin-rich luxurious lustre to your lips and cheeks, this multi-use make up miracle is the sworn by secret to a radiant flush of colour. Brimming with glossy esters, vitamin E for added moisture to give your skin a sumptuous feel, silky mica for an effortless gliding effect, and skin-softening beeswax, get ready to either pucker up or play coy with this emollient-rich lip and cheek cream. Offering that youthful, ‘just-been-kissed’ glow thanks to the micronised powders which create a multi-dimensional, model-esque depth of colour, this moisture-magnetic formula is sure to be a staple in your collection. Locking in hydration to prevent cracking or dryness amd available in two shades: ‘Colour of Dreams’ (a warm, nuanced rosebud-pink’ and ‘Colour of Passion’ (a deep, blushing berry-pink), this make up must-have is your sure-fire gateway to a red carpet glam.
how_to_use: Apply to lips and cheeks, or wherever you want a flush of colour.

name: benefit Fan Fest Mascara - Hyper Black 8.5g
description: Amplify your lashes to a whole new level with the Fan Fest Mascara from Benefit Cosmetics – an absolute essential if you’re after that false lash effect – without the actual falsies. Featuring a flexible, fiber brush that curves around your lashes as it lifts from root-to-tip and reaches corner-to-corner, the Fan Fest Mascara formula – which includes cranberry extract that helps lashes feel nourished and rice wax that helps define and separate lashes – is buildable but doesn’t clump or flake. What’s more, rest assured that your mascara will last as long as you do, as this Benefit Cosmetics’ must-have is not only smudge-proof and sweatproof but water-resistant as well.
how_to_use: Gently wiggle the wand from the base to the tip of lashes, and layer as desired. For added lift, hold the brush vertically against upper lashes and stroke upward. Remove using an oil-based cleanser.

name: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Bronzer - Travel Size Diffused Bronze Light
description: Beautifully illuminating, Hourglass has devised an irresistible new way to bronze: Ambient Lighting Bronzer. This ground-breaking hybrid fuses the universally flattering glow offered by the brand’s beloved Ambient Lighting Powder with buildable bronze pigments to provide a seamlessly sun-kissed, soft-focus finish. The handmade, magnificently marbled pans are formulated using an advanced ‘miscelare’ technique (which means ‘to mix’ in Italian) creating the perfect balance of bronze pigment and powder, enhanced with ‘Photoluminescent Technology’ to maintain vibrancy, depth and dimension. Beautifully buildable, you’re sure to be seduced by at least one of the four sumptuous shades: Ideal for fair, light complexions, ‘Luminous Bronze Light’ is a medium tan shade fused with ‘Luminous Light’ Ambient Lighting Powder, a champagne pearl illuminator for a soft, candlelit finish; for medium-deep complexions, ‘Radiant Bronze Light’ is a warm bronze shade combined with ‘Radiant Light’, a golden beige glow-giving powder that mimics a summer glow; and, finally, for light-medium skin tones, ‘Diffused Bronze Light’ is a cool bronze merged with ‘Diffused Light’ Ambient Lighting Powder, a soft, pale yellow powder.
how_to_use: Gently swirl the entire compact to pick up the perfect balance of pigment and powder. Lightly apply all over face to achieve a sun-kissed look. Defining – Use as a subtle contour along the temples, hollows of the cheeks and jawline.

name: Huda Beauty Samantha Lashes #7
description: Made from synthetic fibers and completely cruelty-free, Huda Beauty’s false eyelashes can be re-used up to 12 times (depending on care), to dramatically enhance your eyes. Ideal for everyday enhancement, these mixed-length lashes lend light volume with a feathery-effect to elevate your beauty look from ‘meh’ to mesmer-eyes-ing in a minute. With an invisible cotton band for thoroughly convincing definition, this style is ideal for those who like a subtle, soft and flirty look, or who crave enviable (but believable) eyelash length.
ingredient: Natural fibres

name: Beautyblender - Bubble
description: Beautyblender was a game-changer upon its launch, created by celebrity make up artist Rea Ann Silva after she struggled to find a sponge that allowed her to easily apply foundation and base make up quickly and flawlessly. The Beautyblender is completely edgeless with an elliptical shape allowing it to blend across large areas, as well as reach the smaller contours of your face. Just make sure you wet it first so that the material expands and won’t absorb your product – meaning it will end up on your face, not on the sponge.
how_to_use: Beautyblender is easy to use: simply wet, squeeze and bounce your way to make up perfection! Wet Beautyblender with water Squeeze out the excess liquid, using a towel if available Bounce foundation, powder or any other complexion product across the face for flawless results Cleanse after each use to help maintain the integrity of the blender's exclusive material Replace and never miss a bounce! It's recommended that you replace your Beautyblender every 3 months.
ingredient: Latex-free Hydrophilic Polyurethane

name: NARS Cosmetics Radiance Primer SPF 35
description: Ask any beauty buff to name their most coveted complexion products and, chances are, NARS will be high up on the list – especially when it comes to Radiance Primer SPF 35/PA+++. Energising and revitalising skin, this oil-free formula features a radiance-boosting complex that instantly revives dull, fatigued skin and adds long-term vitality to the complexion. Applied beneath make up, it enhances the results of your careful artistry and prolongs its wear, with encapsulated sunscreen beads that release on contact with skin for luxurious broad-spectrum protection from the sun’s skin-damaging rays. With a subtle touch of refined pearlescence, the liquid immediately boosts radiance, while also improving skin over time thanks to soothing, anti-inflammatory Evodia Rutecarpa plant extract.
how_to_use: Apply beneath make up or wear alone for a radiant, protected finish.

name: Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Eye Primer
description: Screaming at your make up to - quite literally, get a grip? Let us introduce you to Milk Makeup's all new Hydro Grip Eye Primer, a skin care-laden eye primer designed to help hydrate the delicate skin around your peepers, while locking in make up for all-day wear. Giving a double dose of both hydration and hold, the primer smooths over lids and under the eye, preventing creasing, stopping smudging and holding tight to pigment all day. The 90% natural formula is infused with hemp-derived cannabis seed extract and hyaluronic acid, both of which boost moisture in an area that can often become dry and cakey. Alongside this is blue agave extract which forms a silky layer over the eyelid that provides an even canvas and helps ease blending of shadows and the ever-tricky liquid eyeliner application. The transparent formula suits all skin tones and won’t change the colour pay from your pigments, either.
how_to_use: Apply a thin layer onto clean eyelids or under eye area and blend with fingertips. Allow formula to dry down completely to activate grip before applying eye makeup. Can be used with powder and cream formulas. Angled doe foot applicator allows for quick, targeted application.

name: Huda Beauty Medium Nude Obsessions
description: Love your Huda palette but can’t fit it in your make up bag? Or just desperate to sample the shadows that have sent the beauty world into a spin? The answer has arrived (at last!) with Huda Beauty’s Medium Nude Obsessions Palette, a slimline edit of the most sought-after medium neutral mattes and brightening shimmer shades that make mesmer-eyes-ing eye looks seem effortless. The ultimate capsule make up wardrobe, this palette unites nine ultra-versatile, buttery smooth shadows – four vibrant duo-chrome shimmers and five creamy mattes. We’re completely besotted with the range of hues and textures and you're guaranteed to fall head-over-heels too – especially with the beautifully versatile range of brick red, warm copper and deep chocolates.
how_to_use: Apply with fingers or brushes for endless eye enhancement.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Easy Eye Palette - Super Nudes
description: Curated to create two easy-to-wear modern matte eye looks, Charlotte Tilbury's Easy Eye Palette - Super Nudes is a streamlined, six-pan edit that plays with light and shadow to achieve endlessly flattering nude effects. Perfect for the shadow connoisseurs and beauty newbies alike, this versatile selection of cool caramel brown and warm bronze shades is the ultimate make up indulgence. Inspired by the smoulders of '90s supermodels, turn to this six-pan palette to create an array of smoky neutral effects. Blended with oils and waxes, these featherweight, velvet matte eyeshadows boast a buildable and forgiving texture that delivers long-lasting pigment without creasing or patchiness. Expect a fluid-like glide, a smooth finish, enhanced colour pay-off and effortless blending.
how_to_use: DAY LOOK: Warm nude smoky eye Sweep the PRIME shade 1 over the entire eyelid using the Blender Brush. Apply into the inner corners for an eye-widening effect. Dip the Blender Brush into the ENHANCE shade 2 and create dimension and a lifting effect by blending this from the outer corner into the centre of the eyelid. Using the Smudger Brush, follow the top and bottom lash lines with the SMOKE/DEFINE shade 3 and blend into the outer corner and crease to elongate the look of the eye with added depth and definition. DATE LOOK: Cool nude smokey eye Sweep the PRIME shade 4 over the entire eyelid using the Blender Brush for a fresh, wide-awake look. Dip the Blender Brush into the ENHANCE shade 5 and create a shadow effect by blending this from the outer corner into the centre of the eyelid. Using the Smudger Brush, follow the top and bottom lash lines with the SMOKE/DEFINE shade 6 and blend into the crease and outer corners for a contoured, sultry look. Tilbury Tip: Apply dry or wet, using Charlotte's Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray (sold separately) to amplify colour pay-off and increase control!
ingredient: Shades: Day Eye - Prime & Day Eye - Enhance Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Mica, Octyldodecanol, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Silica, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Carmine (Ci 75470)]. name: benefit Lash Roll Out - Roller Lash Mascara Booster Set
description: Introducing Benefit's Lash Roll Our Roller Lash Mascara Booster Set, a full-size and mini duo of the iconic Roller Lash mascara that lifts and curls eyelashes for exquisitely enhanced, perfectly defined peepers. Eye-deal for short or straight lashes, this mascara features a unique Hook 'n' Roll brush that grabs each lash separately for the ultimate lifted and curled look. The long-wearing formula is water-resistant (but easy to remove once you're ready) and enriched with gorgeously conditioning, lash-loving provitamin B5 and serin to soften lashes and promote growth. In eye-enhancing midnight black, your lashes will be left perfectly lifted and enviably curled...
how_to_use: Gently wiggle the wand from base of lashes to tip. Repeat across your lash line, making sure to catch every lash.

name: Huda Beauty The New Nude Eye Shadow Palette
description: A whole new take on ‘nudes’, Huda Beauty’s The New Nude Eyeshadow Palette is a total heartbreaker. A treasure chest of blush, mauve, taupe and beige neutrals, mingled with show-stopping copper, golden and pink glitter jewels, it features everything you need to master beguiling eye effects in one slimline (clutch bag-compatible) case. The array of 18 shadows includes ten highly pigmented mattes, formulated with aloe vera and coconut oil for butter-like application; four reflective shades, featuring shimmering pearl flecks for a gorgeous duo-chromatic finish; two glitter formulas, infused with innovative silicones for advanced adherence, pigment dispersion and luminosity; one pressed pearl, combined with acacia, jojoba and sunflower wax for a high-shimmer finish that layers effortlessly on top of mattes, adding dreamy depth and dimension; and even a concealer base, for flawless application and to boost any eyeshadow layered on top of it. You're guaranteed to fall head-over-heels for just-blushed cream ‘Bare’, peachy ‘Play’, mink ‘Lace’ and burgundy ‘Love Bite’, not to mention ruby shimmer ‘Excite’, copper ‘Infatuated’ and duo-chrome silver-pink ‘Daydream’. Each of the stunning shades looks stunning on its own, or blended for a strikingly beguiling make up look. Make sure you don't get waylaid on your way to the checkout! This sought-after edit will not hang around...
how_to_use: The versatility of this palette allows you to create endless eye make up variations. Each shade looks stunning alone or layered however you desire.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Epic Ink Eyeliner - Brown
description: NYX Professional Makeup’s Epic Ink Liner is the secret to effortless eye enhancement – whatever your signature ‘wing’. With its intensely pigmented, stay-put waterproof formula and slender, flexible brush for complete control, this liner lives up to its lofty title and allows you to achieve all of your eyeliner ambitions – however epic. Flowing seamlessly for a defined finish (with no blots or snags), you can control the thickness easily by altering the pressure – just push down slightly for a thicker result. Whether you’re after subtle framing, fearless flicks or a cute cate eye, this ingenious ink will let you nail them all. It's available both in classic midnight black and ultra-flattering brown shades.
how_to_use: Glide over eye to define wherever you feel fit.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Propylene Glycol, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Laureth-21, Acrylates/Dimethylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, C11-15 Pareth-7, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Laureth-12 Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol. name: Natasha Denona Glam Palette 20g
description: Designed so that you can combine any three shades in a row to create an entire look, Natasha Denona’s Glam Palette is an effortless way to refresh all your eye-enhancing skills. The three rows unite a range of powerhouse pigments from wet-look molten chocolate, rich buttery taupe mattes and duo-chrome hazelnut to iridescent champagnes and statement silver, gold and cocoa. Perfect for creating a rich molten metallic look or winter-ready smoky eye, simply use a brush or your fingertips to apply each shadow and prepare to fall in love with the rich pigment, seamless blend and longevity of each formula.
how_to_use: Apply with Natasha Denona eyeshadow brushes to blend your shades together seamlessly.

name: benefit Roller Lash Lifting and Curling Mascara Mini - Black 4g
description: Benefit's Roller Lash Travel Size Mini lifts and curls eyelashes for exquisitely enhanced, perfectly defined peepers. Eye-deal for short or straight lashes, this mascara features a unique Hook 'n' Roll brush that grabs each lash separately for the ultimate lifted and curled look. The long-wearing formula is water-resistant (but easy to remove once you're ready) and enriched with gorgeously conditioning, lash-loving provitamin B5 and serin to soften lashes and promote growth. In eye-enhancing midnight black, your lashes will be left perfectly lifted and enviably curled, wherever you are.
how_to_use: Gently wiggle the wand from base of lashes to tip. Repeat across your lash line, making sure to catch every lash.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Paraffin, Polybutene, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Acacia Senegal Gum, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Aminomethyl Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Silica, Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Hydroxyethylcellulose, Panthenol, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Chlorphenesin, Pentylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Algin, Serine, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60. [+/- Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)] Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

name: Versed Silk Slip Conditioning Tinted Lip Oil 9ml - Various Shades
description: A tinted take on their bestselling lip treatment, Versed's Silk Slip Conditioning Tinted Lip Oil comes in three ultra-flattering shades to cloak your kisses with a lightweight (yet long-lasting!) veil of moisture. This nourishing balm imparts a beautiful wash of sheer colour to your lips while keeping them soft and hydrated throughout the day. Smoothing over supremely chapped lips, this formula is enriched with vitamin E (a stellar source of antioxidants), as well as a hydrating cocktail of jojoba, camellia and sesameoils.Though the oil is easily absorbed and non-sticky - perfect for on-the-go application - the subtle tint and moisture will be sure to hang around. Available in three stunning hues, the only hard part is choosing which one you want: sheer blue-red 'Ruby', mauve-berry 'Fig' or medium pink 'Blossom'.
how_to_use: Squeeze and swipe on to lips as often as you please. GOOD TO KNOW:Use as a dewy blush by dabbing a pea-sized amount onto cheeks.
ingredient: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polybutene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, Tocopherol, Synthetic Wax, Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Iron Oxides (CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).

name: benefit Dandelion Twinkle Highlighter Powder Mini 1.5g
description: Effortless to build and seamless to blend, Dandelion Twinkle is a weightless highlighter that wraps your complexion in a soft nude-pink radiance. Gone are the days of bulging make up bags, as this has now (thankfully) landed in a perfectly formed miniature size (1.5g) to keep your bag streamlined and your complexion glowing. Get your glow on at home and away with Dandelion Twinkle; the soft-focus blurring highlighter that imparts a luminous subtle nude-pink sheen and feels completely weightless on the skin. Wear it alone or top up your favourite blusher with this quick and easy strobing powder. Thanks to the superfine texture and special baked technology, this is delivered in a completely sheer finish that’s less ‘glitterball’ and more ‘dreamy spotlight’...oh and did we mention the signature ‘Dandy Daydream’ scent? Our highlight has never looked (or smelled) so good.
how_to_use: Sweep along cheekbones or anywhere you want to highlight, like the bridge of your nose or Cupid’s bow. Blend & build as desired on bare face or over makeup.
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Boron Nitride, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, C12-20 Acid Peg-8 Ester, Glycerin, Squalane, Parfum (Fragrance), Dicalcium Phosphate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 80, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Xanthan Gum, Limonene, Tin Oxide, Hexylene Glycol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Aqua (Water), Citronellol, Citral, Linalool, Eugenol, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Alumina, Magnesium Oxide, Tocopherol. [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)].

name: Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray Vitamin C 118ml
description: Want a product that works just as hard (if not harder!) than you do? Then the fan-favourite All Nighter Setting Spray is ready and waiting to deliver a healthy glow and up to 16 hours of locked-in make up wear in this amped up vitamin C formulation. This is a mist-with-a-difference, bringing lightweight hydration to all skin types in a water and transfer-resistant finish, your make up isn’t budging any time soon. Powered by vitamin C and cactus flower, this vegan setting spray will make sure that you’re good to glow from sunrise to sunset. Did we mention the uplifting citrus scent too? We can *almost* smell the orange groves…
how_to_use: As a primer: Apply your usual skincare (don't forget your SPF). Mist your face with All Nighter Setting Spray Vitamin C for extra hydration and a long-lasting glowy base for your makeup. You'll get all the skincare benefits while keeping your makeup in place for up to 16 hours! As a setting spray:Apply your makeup. Shake bottle well, hold eight to ten inches away from face. Close eyes and mouth and mist face two to four times, in an “X” and “T” formation or until face is fully covered for 16 hours of locked in makeup. PRO TIPS:Apply before your makeup as a long-lasting base or after to lock in your look & extra glow. Want extra-intense shadow colour, less fallout, and even longer wear? Wet your brush with All Nighter before you apply.
ingredient: Aqua /Water/Eau , Alcohol Denat , Glycerin , Pvp , Amp-Acrylates/Allyl Methacrylate Copolymer , Phenoxyethanol , Diisopropyl Adipate , Chlorphenesin , Triethanolamine , Ascorbyl Glucoside , Parfum/Fragrance , Hydrolyzed Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract , Limonene , Linalool , Ethylhexylglycerin , Citral.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Lift and Snatch Brow Tint Pen 3g (Various Shades)
description: Look at the flick of the tip! Filling up even the finest of brows with natural, hair-like volume, the Lift and Snatch Brow Tint Pen takes your arch from here to here in no time at all! Don’t you just loathe a brow that won’t cooperate no matter how hard you try? Made with a fuss-free, transfer-resistant formula that offers up to 16 hours of hold, this lightly tinted, buildable formula is the brow-raising hero you’ve been searching for — whatever your mood.
how_to_use: For a lifted brow look, apply vertically in an upward flicking motion so that hairs stand up straight. For a laminated look, first brush up hairs with The Brow Glue transparent brow setter, and then fill in with Lift & Snatch.
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Alcohol, Peg/ppg-14/4 Dimethicone, Pvp, Triisopropanolamine, Propylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain / Peut Contenir (+/-): Ci 16035 / Red 40, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5, Ci 42090 / Blue 1.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Freeze Applicator 6g
description: Made specially for use with the brand's Brow Freeze (which swiftly took the beautysphere by hurtling storm), the dual-ended Brow Freeze Applicator boasts a unique spatula on one side with a perfectly-sized spoolie on the other. When dealing with brow styling wax, the last thing you want is for things to get messy, which is why the Brow Freeze Applicator's metal spatula is so useful. Allowing you to easily scoop out your desired amount (tip: a little goes a long way), use the tool like a palette knife – offloading product onto your palette before going in with your spoolie brush. Giving you complete control over how much product you use and where exactly you use it – reducing the chance of clumping or uneven application – the spoolie end is precise and easy to use, working to lift, tame, shape, sculpt and feather every brow hair and evenly distributing product throughout your arch. This is where the spatula end comes back into its own: you can use it to press down each hair – flattening your look in place for long-lasting and extreme hold – whether your hairs are thick, coarse, curly, downward-growing or sparse. Cue everyone asking: 'Brow on earth do you do it?'
how_to_use: Using the flat spatula end, gently pick up a small amount of Brow Freeze. Only a small amount of Brow Freeze is needed for both brows, a little goes a long way! Close the lid and place the wax on the back of the cap. Using the spoolie brush end, swirl wax on the back of the cap to evenly distribute throughout the brush. Spin the brush to remove any excess before applying. On clean brows, brush a small amount of wax through the brow. Use upward motions and continuously brush through the brow in desired direction. Starting from front to back, use the flat spatula to press brow hairs down flat. Sculpt into place until desired shape and lift is achieved. Pro Tips: Keep the lid to Brow Freeze tightly sealed after use. Clean the applicator regularly with brush cleanser; warm water removes Brow Freeze from spoolie easily and quickly.

name: Milk Makeup Pore Eclipse - 40ml
description: This is one eclipse that doesn’t come around once in a new moon… the new Pore Eclipse primer from Milk Makeup promises to blur pores, control shine and keep your make up in place from dawn till dusk. Available in a travel-friendly 20ml and 40ml you can achieve mattifying results that are truly out of this world. You asked, Milk answered. We’d like to introduce you and your complexion to the mattifying primer that does everything and more for oily and combo skin types. This is make up prep with serious skin care benefits: bakuchiol works to keep your skin smooth and eve,n while lentil extract keeps shine firmly under wraps (blotting papers be gone!). Irritation and sensitivity are calmed with a soothing dose of moonstone and pores can take a back seat thanks to our favourite skin-gredient… niacinamide. This is the make up locking primer to keep your base in place all day, leaving you with a filter-like finish without the need for silicones.
how_to_use: Immediately following your skincare routine, apply a thin layer on clean skin all over face or on oily-prone areas like your T-zone. Blend into skin with fingertips. Wait one minute for formula to dry before applying makeup. For best results, use directly after moisturizing while skin is still hydrated and before makeup.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Silica, Propanediol, Nylon-11, Pentylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Polyglyceryl-10 Diisostearate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Corn Starch Modified, Bakuchiol, Fragrance (Parfum), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Unsaponifiables, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Seed Extract, Shorea Robusta Seed Butter, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopherol, Moonstone Powder, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Ethyl Stearate, Ethyl Palmitate, Ethyl Oleate, Ethyl Linoleate, Acrylates/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Copolymer, Ethyl Macadamiate, Malic Acid, Sodium Carbomer, Saccharide Isomerate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool.

name: Tower 28 Beauty Bronzino Illuminating Cream Bronzer
description: Laced with skin-loving ingredients like mango butter and green tea extract, Tower 28 Beauty's Bronzino Illuminating Cream Bronzer is your one-way ticket to an enviable faux holiday glow. Inspired by that moment when the sun sets over the ocean, this blendable, buildable illuminating cream bronzer achieves an effortless, summer glow with a multidimensional sheen. Made sans silicone, the lightweight formula is crafted with flattering mineral pigment, moisturising mango butter and calming green tea extract to soothe and condition without leaving a filmy residue. Simply choose between five sunset-inspired shades: 'Sun Coast' (a light bronze); 'West Coast' (a medium warm bronze); 'Gold Coast' (a medium neutral bronze); 'Best Coast' (a dark warm bronze) and 'Pacific Coast' (a deep bronze).
how_to_use: Tap on wherever the sun naturally shines on your face and buff, buff, blend to add warmth and dimension. Hint: Bronzino is multipurpose. Try it on lids and lips for an easy wash of colour (just tap on!)

name: Charlotte Tilbury Magic Vanish
description: The perfect disguise for tell-tale dark circles (late night? Us?) and hyperpigmentation, Charlotte Tilburys Magic Vanish cleverly colour corrects for a flawless and energised finish. The buttery compact formula is enriched with flavonoids to help visibly diminish under-eye puffiness, mica to grant wide-awake luminosity, and a combination of microspheres and carnauba wax to lend silky-smooth and easily blended application. There are four shades to choose from, from Fair to Deep.
how_to_use: Apply with your ring finger and blend.

name: Spectrum Collections KJH Number 2 Brush
description: Bringing professional-level results to your beauty routine, the KJH 02 Pro Blush Brush from Katie Jane Hughes is a must for make up obsessives. Use it with any powder, cream or liquid product to create an dreamy, rosy flush. Made from the highest quality materials, this blusher brush has a rounded shape to match the apples of the cheeks for the most effortless application. It also has silky-soft synthetic bristles, ready to work with any blush formula of your choice. The design is a joy to use too with its pale gold-hued copper ferrule, which sits atop a glossy olive-toned handle made from FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) sustainable wood. Think: chic and effective.
how_to_use: Use to elevate your routine and make your beauty products work even harder.
ingredient: 100% synthetic taklon bristles. Pale gold copper material ferrules. Glossy Olive green FSC wood handles.

name: NUDESTIX Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush Colour 7g (Various Shades)
description: Sit back and let this cream-to-powder blush balm impart a natural, soft-focus flush of colour on your eyes, cheeks and lips. Draw, swipe and blend this matte blush wherever your heart desires for a fresh, natural look and a blurred, soft-matte finish. Paving the way with a new, innovative formula — made in Korea — this lightweight, ultra-soft blush softly kisses against the skin and blends with ease. Worried about stubborn blemishes interfering with your flawless finish? The Nudies Matte Lux blurs their appearance, as well as that of fine lines and pores thanks to soft-focus minerals and a light-diffusing formula. Vegan, fragrance-free and silicone-free with five natural hues to choose from, this has got to be a staple in every make up bag from now on.
how_to_use: On Bare Skin: Swipe NUDIES MATTE LUX All-Over Blur Blush Natural Color on cheeks and lips directly from the color balm stick then stipple in a patting motion with blending brush or fingers to blend out any hard edges. Over Medium to Full Coverage Makeup: Swipe fingers or brush onto color balm stick then apply on cheeks and lips with brush or fingers and stipple in a patting motion to blend out hard edges. *Twist stipple brush and swiping onto color balm then apply directly onto cheeks and lips. TIPS Mix Your Stix Start with TINTED COVER FOUNDATION or TINTED BLUR FOUNDATION STICK to even out complexion and sculpt to highlight and define. Add NUDIES MATTE ALL-OVER FACE BRONZE COLOR to warm complexion and contour face. Apply NUDIES MATTE LUX to cheeks, swipe on eyes and press onto lips. Finish with NUDIES GLOW ALL-OVER FACE HIGHLIGHT on high points, inner eye corners and cupid’s bow to play with light.
ingredient: Pretty Peachy: Isononyl Isononanoate, Octyldodecanol, Isoamyl Laurate, Isotridecyl Isononanoate, Mica, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Polyethylene, Silica, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Synthetic Wax, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Sorbitan Isostearate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Microcrystalline Wax, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Tocopherol, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Red 40 Lake (Ci 16035), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)]. name: Westman Atelier Beauty Butter Powder Bronzer
description: Encased in opulent (but travel-friendly!) packaging with a gorgeously embossed texture, the Beauty Butter Powder Bronzer is a must-have on aesthetics alone. Yet, it lends a healthy, glowy, 'I-just-landed-from-Spain' colour with zero tell-tale shimmer that your make up arsenal is desperately calling for. Offering a natural-looking, radiant bronze, the Beauty Butter Powder Bronzer boasts intelligent pigment biomimicry technology that protects your precious complexion from ageing environmental stressors. Working as a protective shield for the skin, it locks in moisture while cocoa seed, mango seed and capuacu butters nourish and hydrate cells for a true outdoorsy gleam sans any nasty ingredients like parabens, PEGs or synthetic fragrances.
how_to_use: Sweep in a horizontal motion over the cheeks, eyelids, temples and forehead anywhere that the sun would naturally hit. Try not to apply below the cheekbones. Dont forget to apply to your neck and collarbones if theyre showing!

name: Charlotte Tilbury The Air-Brush
description: Held in a luxe, rose-gold casing, this fully retractable kabuki-style bronzer brush is the key to achieving a seamlessly glowy, sun-kissed finish. This hand-crafted brush is designed to glide effortlessly over your skin, evenly diffusing just the right amount of product to enliven and bronze your skin. It has 100% cruelty-free synthetic bristles that feel gorgeously soft upon your skin, blending out your powdered bronzer in no time at all. The innovative ergonomic handle is specially sized to deliver unwavering control during application, plus the retractable design makes it a portable purse essential.
how_to_use: Simply swirl the brush in the powder, tap off the excess and apply in a sweeping motion for an airbrush-effect finish!
ingredient: Hair: Synthetic Fibre Ferrule: Aluminum

name: benefit Cookie Highlighter Powder 8g
description: Joining the ranks of Benefit’s bestselling and cult-adored complexion powder range is the perfectly baked Cookie Highlighter: a pearly, creamy highlighter that will leave even the most lacklustre complexions glowing. It boasts a silky ultra-fine powder that seamlessly blends onto skin to grant a golden pearl shimmer. Easily layered and built to your desired luminosity, the versatile powder is perfect for lit-from-within radiance through to dazzling shine, no matter if you’re a pro or amateur baker *ahem* we mean, make up lover.
how_to_use: Sweep along cheekbones or anywhere you want to highlight, like the bridge of your nose or Cupid’s bow. Blend & build as desired on bare face or over make up.
ingredient: Cookie: Dimethicone, Mica, Alumina, Isododecane, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Triethylhexanoin, Polyethylene, Magnesium Myristate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Tin Oxide. name: Too Faced Lip Injection Extreme Doll-Size Lip Plumper 2.8g
description: An intensified take on the iconic Too Faced classic, Lip Injection, this ingenious formula offers both immediate and long-term plumping for fuller lips without fillers. Suitable for both day and night-time use, this serum-like gloss is inspired by medically proven blood vessel dilating technology, which makes lips look bigger, brighter and enviably healthy – giving a slight tingling sensation as it works. The clear gloss is packed with light-reflecting shine and provides lips with supreme moisture thanks to conditioning avocado and jojoba oils. Time to pucker up! What’s more, this product is vegan-friendly and, along with the entire Too Faced range, you can rest assured that it’s cruelty-free. Now in a teeny tiny 'Doll-Size', you need never be without it either – pop one in your make up bag, one in your handbag and one in your pocket for good measure.
how_to_use: Apply over lip liner, lipstick, or on bare lips. A slight tingling sensation that can last up to 5 minutes is normal.
ingredient: Mineral Oil/Paraffinum Liquidum/ Huile minérale, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil/Persea Gratissima Oil, Silica, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil/Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Benzyl Nicotinate, Tribehenin, Tin Oxide, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Chondroitin Sulfate, Capsicum Frutescens Resin, Atelocollagen, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil/Glycine Soja Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Benzoate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)

name: Huda Beauty Light Nude Obsessions
description: Love your Huda palette but can’t fit it in your make up bag? Or just desperate to sample the shadows that have sent the beauty world into a spin? The answer has arrived (at last!) with Huda Beauty’s Light Nude Obsessions Palette, a slimline edit of the most sought-after pastel neutral mattes and brightening shimmer shades that make mesmer-eyes-ing eye looks seem effortless. The ultimate capsule make up wardrobe, this palette unites nine ultra-versatile, buttery smooth shadows – four vibrant duo-chrome shimmers and five creamy mattes. We’re completely besotted with the range of hues and textures and you're guaranteed to fall head-over-heels too – especially with the beautifully versatile range of baby pink, purple shimmer and deep browns.
how_to_use: Apply with fingers or brushes for endless eye enhancement.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Plump Right Back Primer & Serum
description: Reporting for dew-ty, the Plump Right Back Primer & Serum delivers cushioning comfort to skin from the very first step! Locked and loaded with — deep breath (!) — vitamin E, pro-vitamin B5, hyaluronic acid and electrolytes, magnesium and potassium, this high-performing hybrid casts a featherlight veil over skin to prep your base for your favourite complexion products. Latching onto tinted moisturisers and all-day wear foundations alike, this non-tacky serum-like formula encourages super staying power with a seamless finish.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to cleansed skin before applying make up.
ingredient: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Peg-150 Distearate, Butylene Glycol, Pvp, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Potassium Pca, Carbomer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tromethamine, Magnesium Pca, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Xanthan Gum, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum / Fragrance, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate (F.I.L. D277314/1).

name: PATRICK TA Major Glow Lip Shine
description: Taking lip gloss to a whole new level, Patrick Tas Major Glow Lip Shine is swirled with translucent iridescent pearls, no less, for a multi-dimensional, high-shine glow that creates the illusion of extra plumpness. Courtesy of an advanced gel system, the formula lends a glass-like finish that cleverly stays put without feathering or stickiness, helped along by a blend of oils to ensure it glides on effortlessly and emollients to add shine, comfort and even coverage. The gloss is very comfortable to wear, with a balm-like texture that feels neither tacky nor sticky. There are three universally-flattering hues to choose between (if you can resist indulging in the lot): cool pearl Shes Expensive, warm rose Shes an Influencer and peachy Is She Younger Than Me?.
how_to_use: Apply generously to lips for instant shine.
ingredient: Polybutene, Isostearyl Isostearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyglyceryl-2 Tetraisostearate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Methyl Styrene/Indene Copolymer, Synthetic Beeswax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Mica, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Flavor (Aroma), Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil [Mentha Piperita Oil], Tocopherol, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Limonene, Butylphenyl, Methylpropional, Tin Oxide

name: NYX Professional Makeup On the Rise Liftscara Mascara 10ml
description: With a wonderful formula and ingenious wand, this mascara is bound to become a favourite – and that’s before considering its purse-friendly price tag! Cloaking lashes in a matte black hue in just a few strokes, this quickly adds drama to your lashes leaving them looking thick and lifted. As all mascara mavericks will know: a mascara is only as good as the brush you apply it with – and this one does not disappoint. The wand has two ‘sides’ which allow for different effects: an hourglass part for separating and elevating the lashes and a rounded side for amping up the volume. Don’t just take our word for it though! In a clinical study conducted by the brand, 95% of participants saw instant volume and 94% saw instant lift.
how_to_use: Use the cinched side to separate and elevate lashes. Then turn the wand out slightly to amp up the volume with the rounder edge. Repeat for big and bold lashes, layer after layer.
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau, Synthetic Beeswax, Polyethylene, Glyceryl Stearate, Polyurethane-35, Acacia Senegal Gum, Butylene Glycol, Oryza Sativa Cera / Rice Bran Wax, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Polybutene, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Carnauba Wax / Cire De Carnauba, Aminomethyl Propanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol. name: benefit Hoola Caramel Bronzer 8g
description: The brilliant bronzer that legions of devoted fans swear by, Benefit's Hoola has attained legendary status in the Beautysphere. Now available in the medium/tan shade of 'Caramel', this update on the classic leaves a pure matte finish, so you can forget about tell-tale sparkle and shine and fool everyone with your natural-looking sun-kissed glow. The buttery soft powder blends dreamily into skin and, even better, the compact includes a soft, natural-bristle brush that's perfect for seamless, on-the-go application. Great for contouring, chiselling cheekbones and flattering jawlines, this multi-tasking (multi award-winning) bronzer is sure to become a mainstay in your make up bag.
how_to_use: Sweep across chin, cheeks and forehead with accompanying brush. Always tap off excess powder to avoid applying too much colour. To chisel those cheekbones and flatter that jawline, contour with our blush brush.
ingredient: Talc, Zinc Stearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Boron Nitride, Aqua (Water). name: Eyeko Black Magic: Cocoa Edit Liquid Eyeliner - Brown
description: Inspired by Japanese calligraphy, the effortlessly slender brush ensures you achieve maximum control and a precise line. Whether you’re after a dramatic flick, a subtle defining line or bold wing, the Black Magic: Cocoa Edit Liquid Eyeliner - Brown lends itself to every look in your make up arsenal. Liquid liner lovers rejoice, for Eyeko has the perfect addition to your eyeliner wardrobobe. The Black Magic: Cocoa Edit Liquid Eyeliner creates a defined, enhanced eye without the intensity of traditional black tones, so for days when you’re after a softer line, or looking for a touch more warmth to your make up this cocoa hue is just the ticket for the perfect flick. Easy to apply, comfortable to wear and incredibly long-lasting, this warm brown liner lasts for up to eight hours and glides across your lids without pulling or dragging. Could it be magic? In this case we know it’s all down to the genius mind’s at Eyeko!
how_to_use: Shake before use. For a cat-eye look, sweep along lash line stopping at the outer corner. Draw a line from the outer corner towards the tail of the brow, stopping when your wing is just the right size for you. From the end of the wing, glide the brush tip back to meet your lash line.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499).

name: By Terry Cellularose CC Serum 30ml (Various Shades)
description: Targeted towards all those concerned with dulled, dehydrated complexions in need of a radiance boost, By Terrys Cellularose Brightening CC Serum creates a subtle veil of light-reflective pearl pigments, to blur the visibility of imperfections and create a more even-toned, radiant canvas. With colour control technology, this innovative silky serum corrects uneven tone neutralising redness and disguising dark spots to restore uniformity while white rose native cells, coupled with a micro-exfoliating agent combine to gradually lighten pigmentation patches and help prevent development of new dark spots or freckles. Beautiful worn alone on good skin days, this can also be mixed with foundation to create a flawless, lit-from-within finish. Choose from four shades, or combine a couple to create a bespoke colour; Immaculate Light (lifts porcelain complexions by controlling blotchiness and enhancing radiance), Rose Elixir (neutralises washed-out, ashy tones with brightening, pink-toned particles), Apricot Glow (a flattering shade that suits fair to warm, medium skin tones) and Sunny Flash (a beautiful, bronze-toned colour to unify darker skin tones or grant paler complexions a sunkissed glow).

name: VIEVE The Ninetease Palette
description: A modern take on grunge-meets-glam (we're sold!), VIEVE's The Ninetease Palette is a 10-pan selection of richly pigmented shades to take you from day to night and back again. Harnessing stunning cool-toned shades (look to 'Supermodel' for the ultimate matte greige, 'VHS' for a breathtaking molton silver or '93' for a deep, rich burgundy), each shadow in this selection uses a creamy formula that's both easy to blend and to build up for maximum impact. For more low key looks, there's plenty of matte finishes - but to up the ante and go full glam, you'll also find statement metallic shimmers. The black-and-gold leopard-themed packaging? Oh so chic too!
how_to_use: Every shade has been designed to be worn alone or layered together. You can use your fingers to apply each eyeshadow or for a defined, sculpted finish, use a VIEVE Eyeshadow Makeup Brush.
ingredient: Shades: Skimp, Supermodel, Whtvr, Phase, Low Rise, '93, Soot INGREDIENTS: Talc, Tapioca Starch, Magnesium Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Aqua/Water/ Eau, Myrica Pubescens Fruit Wax, Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Tropolone, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Ultramarines (Ci 77007)]. Shades: Acid Wash, VHS, Dial Up INGREDIENTS: Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Talc, Mica, Dimethicone, Magnesium Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopheryl Acetate, Myrica Pubescens Fruit Wax, Dimethiconol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Tropolone, Tin Oxide, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090)].

name: Laura Mercier Secret Brightening Powder
description: Available in two shades, this Secret Brightening Powder is designed specifically to brighten the under-eye area only, in any skin tone. This transparent and weightless powder quickly sets the under-eye area without settling in fine lines, accentuating shadows or appearing cakey and significantly blurs and brightens while the no-flashback formula ensures you look great in photos.
how_to_use: Pat across the under eye area to set and brighten the under eye.
ingredient: Talc, Silica, Dimethicone, Mica, Glyceryl Caprylate, P-Anisic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phalaenopsis Amabilis Extract, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Ethylene/Methacrylate Copolymer, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Tin Oxide.
