name: Hourglass Veil Hydrating Skin Tint 35ml (Various Shades)
description: Looking for a lightweight skin tint that instantly boosts skin’s moisture levels, provides hydration and delivers a dewy, healthy-looking glow? Your search is over. Cue: Hourglass’ The Veil Hydrating Skin Tint. This formula melts instantly into skin, providing all-day wear and a sheer veil of coverage to even skin tone, while visibly plumping and smoothing the complexion. Coming in a range of shades to suit all skin tones, it’s formulated with 94% naturally-derived ingredients including hydration hero hyaluronic acid to deeply moisturise. Also, it’s infused with plant-based squalane to help retain skin’s natural radiance and meadowfoam seed oil to strengthen skin moisture barrier. The result? Skin looks and feels instantly smoother while providing continuous nourishment throughout the day.
how_to_use: Apply on the centre of the face, chin, and forehead. Blend with fingertips, Ambient Soft Glow Foundation Brush or sponge.
ingredient: Water/Aqua, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Propanediol, Squalane, C9-12 Alkane, Erythritol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Octyldodecanol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Distarch Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate, Magnesium Sulfate, Zinc Stearate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Benzoic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Lecithin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Nephelium Lappaceum Peel Extract, Citric Acid, Stearic Acid, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499).

name: VIEVE Modern Bronzer (Various Shades)
description: Deliciously silky, VIEVEs Modern Bronzer effortlessly glides onto skin for a bronzed, lifted look. Coupled with a dash of barely-there shimmer, the buttery formula instantly lends a natural, lit-from-within glow that'll have people asking if you just hopped off the plane from Spain. (We wish). Expertly blendable and buildable, use a full and fluffy brush to give barely-there warmth, or apply with tightly packed bristles for precise sculpting and definition. Ideal for shaping and contouring (or simply for adding a healthy flush!), this versatile formula comes packaged in a sleek, elegant case and is completely vegan and cruelty-free. Plus, it sits beautifully over make up and never looks cakey, coming in four flexible shades to instantly elevate your complexion. Choose between Light (with a hint of pink to flatter fairer skin tones), Medium (with warming tones for medium skin tones), Tan (with terracotta undertones to add depth to deeper skin tones) or Deep (calling on slight purple tones to give dimension to dark skin tones).
how_to_use: Apply wherever the sun naturally touches the face: nose, cheeks, chin and forehead. Top Tip: Get cheeky! Sculpt high cheekbones by sweeping bronzer into the hollows of the cheeks and just under the jawline.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood Exagger-Eyes Liner Duo
description: Charlotte Tilbury's Hollywood Exagger-Eyes Liner Duo unites the shades 'Black' and 'Champagne' in an easy-to-use, dual-ended liner pecil that enhances the sparkle and intensity of your cover-worthy make up look. Smudge-proof, waterproof and humidity-proof, Tilbury's stay-all-day Hollywood Exagger-Eyes Liner Duo is designed to compliment and easily enhance your eye look fuss-free. Uniting a 'Black' and 'Champagne' liner, this dual-ended liner will help to emphasis and intensify your eye look. The stay-all day, gel-like formula glides onto your eyes like silk to emphasise and amplify the look of your eye colour for up to 16 hours.
how_to_use: Apply the 'Black' end of your eyeliner to the outer half of your upper lash-line to add shape, depth and definition. Use the 'Champagne' end in your inner corners and along the lower and upper lash line to make the eyes look bigger, brighter and more mesmerising. Wear these magical eyeliner duos alone for a sultry pop of colour, or with a Luxury Palette.
ingredient: Matte Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Polybutene, Silica, Hydrogenated Polydicyclopentadiene, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Synthetic Beeswax, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Ferric Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510)].

name: NARS Afterglow Lip Balm - Laguna 3g
description: Blurring the lines between skin care and make up, the NARS After Glow Lip Balm gives your lips the TLC they've been craving - all while bestowing a shimmering wash of colour. The formula envelops the lips in moisture, helping to protect against dryness and visibly smooth. Enriched with a Monoï Hydrating Complex, which consists of a blend of coconut oil, gardenia Tahitensis flower extract and squalene, the balm deeply nourishes parched lips. Not to mention, its colour is perfect for everyday glamour. Laguna (perhaps you've heard of this iconic shade in products such as the award-winning Bronzing Powder) is a sheer bronze hue with a subtle golden sparkle, delivering the perfect amount of warmth to your lips.
how_to_use: Apply to bare lips for a sheer hint of colour or as a moisturising base under any lip shade. To add shine and subtle illumination, apply over other lip colours. Alternatively, tap Afterglow Lip Balm to the high points of the cheek with fingertips for a natural-looking highlight.
ingredient: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Triisostearin, Polyethylene, Squalane, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate/Octinoxate, Microcrystalline Wax, Mica, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Iron Oxides, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Gardenia Taitensis Flower Extract, Simethicone, Tocopheryl Acetate, Lauryl Pca, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Bht, Tocopherol, Silica, Punica Granatum Flower Extract, Tin Oxide.

name: The Ordinary High-Spreadability Fluid Primer 30ml
description: Enhancing the ‘spreadability’ of make up, this perfecting primer creates a seriously smooth canvas for make up, so that you can avoid any irritating accumulation of pigment – especially common around the eyes and on dry patches of skin. Free from alcohol, water and oil, this silky-smooth serum delicately hydrates skin without feeling greasy for a naturally youthful, dewy look.
how_to_use: Use as the last step in skin care regimen as a make up primer.
ingredient: Hexamethyldisiloxane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Caprylyl Methicone, PEG-12 Dimethicone/PPG-20 Crosspolymer, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Tocopherol

name: VIEVE The Essential+ Makeup Bag
description: Boasting a delectably transparent body for easy-viewing of all your everyday favourites, The Essential+ Makeup Bag won’t hide your must-haves in any hard-to-reach, dark corners. Quickly grabbing your products has never been easier – thanks to the super-smooth zipper – and the chic, faux crocodile, patent black trimmings (plus the signature gold VIEVE badge!) makes for a sophisticated centrepiece in your kit. Perfectly sized for your daily go-tos, this is VIEVE’s roomiest answer to sensational organisation, and is a must for any Jamie Genevieve devotees who covet the entire collection. Storing and transporting your essentials has never been easier (or more luxurious!) …
how_to_use: Use this to house your daily beauty must-haves.
ingredient: Body: clear PVC Lining: Polyester Trim: croc PU leather Zipper: Chunky zipper with gold zipper puller Dimensions: 22cm Lx 18cm W x 8cm H

name: NUDESTIX Tinted Blur Sculpt Stick 6.2g (Various Shades)
description: No need to suck your cheeks in and pout to create the illusion of chiselled cheekbones with the Tinted Blur Sculpt Stick doing all the heavy face-lifting work for you. Okay… maybe you can still pout just a smidge. Delivering a soft-focus sculpt that’ll have you looking like a right-swipe from any and every angle, this ultra-lightweight cream-to-powder matte contour stick glides effortlessly across your skin to create natural dimension in seconds. No more grey-sish, chalk-like or even muggy contour streaks, just seamless sculpting that cheats the look of a face lift. Totally vegan and available in three jaw-defining shades, unlock subtle colour that enhances your already-beautiful features with a simple striping motion.
how_to_use: Want defined cheekbones? Stripe Tinted Blur Stick along hollows of cheeks. Buff & blend. Want a youthful lift? Stripe Tinted Blur Stick onto cheekbones on a diagonal. Buff & Blend upwards towards temples. Want a less defined forehead? Swipe along forehead into hairline. Buff & blend towards temples. Want a chiseled jawline? Swipe along length of jaw and chin. Buff & blend downward.
ingredient: Neutral Light: Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Isoamyl Laurate, Synthetic Wax, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Silica, Polyethylene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isononyl Isononanoate, Triethylhexanoin, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Mica, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Tocopherol, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Aluminum Hydroxide [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)]. name: NYX Professional Makeup Pro Dual Brow Brush
description: This hardworking dual-sided brow brush has light bristles cut into a slanted shape together, with a spooley wand on the other end, to effortlessly define and tidy brows with a few simple sweeps. It features a minimalist all-black design, with black ferrule complete with subtle NYX Professional Makeup logo. The brand has amassed a loyal army of devotees for their tried-and-true range of products – and their brushes are no exception, allowing you to master all manner of make up techniques with ease. Plus, if you look after these brushes, they will last you a lifetime.
how_to_use: Use the angled brush to fill in arches and define the shape with gel, powder or cream pigment. The spooley end can then be used to brush up and outwards (always in the direction of growth) to distribute product or just give a quick tidy.
ingredient: Synthetic and natural bristles

name: Charlotte Tilbury Make-Up Bag (1st Edition)
description: For anyone who’s a fan of Charlotte Tilbury, this adorable cotton canvas make up bag is the ultimate accessory. Decorated with the kiss prints of some of the most famous women in fashion, there’s no better or more stylish way to carry your make up essentials. Measuring 9 ½"W x 7"H, the 1st Edition Make Up Bag is machine washable and comes with a gold zip and black lining. It’s the perfect way to tote around your beauty kit.
how_to_use: Use this pouch to house your daily beauty must-haves.
ingredient: Made from cotton canvas material, measuring approximately 9 ½"W x 7"H

name: Huda Beauty Lip Blush Creamy Lip and Cheek Stain 6ml (Various Shades)
description: Famed for boosting hydration and adding a generous dose of long-lasting colour, the Lip Blush Creamy Lip and Cheek Stain douses your skin in a nourishing fusion of both colour and comfort. Powered by skin-softening essentials such as hyaluronic acid and coconut extract, this non-drying hybrid delivers a soft, satin matte finish that’s totally transfer-proof. Gliding with sensorial ease and available in an array of shades boasting just-been-pinched pinks and peach-toned corals, unlock progressive pigment that calls for attention.
how_to_use: Apply directly to lips and cheek.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Dimethicone, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Silica Silylate, Potassium Sorbate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Aroma/Flavor, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Trideceth-6, Sodium Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Yellow 6/Ci 15985, Red 40/Ci 16035, Red 33/Ci 17200, Red 28/Ci 45410, Iron Oxides/Ci 77491, Iron Oxides/Ci 77492, Iron Oxides/Ci 77499, Titanium Dioxide/Ci 77891.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Bigger, Brighter Eyes - Exaggereyes
description: You know those big, sparkling eyes you get with the help of Instagram and Snapchat filters? (If you dont, theyre universally flattering photo filters) Charlotte Tilburys Luxury Palette - Exaggereyes lets you channel this look in real life. Effortlessly easy to master, these sumptuous quartets feature four velvety smooth powders in complementary tones designed to Prime, Enlarge, Define and Pop when applied to lids. Carefully curated, this ingenious selection will help you create eyes that look wider and brighter, whatever colour they are. Exagger-Eyes stars ivory-cream, rose golden, red-brown and transparent sparkle shades. Another make up marvel from the queen of the scene, Charlotte Tilbury.
how_to_use: 1. To use, apply the prime shade all over your eyes with your blender brush, and use your smudger brush to focus on the inner corners of your eyelids. 2. Apply the enlarge shade using your blender brush. You can wash it across the eye lightly or build up in the crease for a lightly-contoured effect. 3. Add instant definition by applying the Define shade along your lash line to create the illusion of brighter eyes. 4. A wash of the transparent sparkle shade will create wider and brighter-looking eyes by applying with your ring finger to the centre of your eyelid.

name: Natasha Denona Glam Face Palette - Light
description: Introducing the Glam Face Palette, complete with two glowy-not-glittery blusher-highlighter hybrids and five rich pressed pigment shadows that will aid you in creating the most beautiful, glamorous looks — whether you favour all-out drama or more subtle definition. The pretty palette in two shades — ‘Light’ and ‘Dark’ — to suit a multitude of skin tones, each housed in a luxe feeling case that features an enviably large mirror (an absolute essential in any on-the-go palette, of course). To add glow to your cheeks, each palette includes a pink-toned cream blush and an illuminating highlighter, both of which feature impressive Japanese technology to bestow eye-catching radiance (without any chalky-looking glitter). For the eyes, each palette features a mix of buttery soft shadows in soft matte and melted metallic finishes (which can be applied damp for extra pizzazz).
how_to_use: Apply eyeshadows with fluffy brushes to blend or detail brushes for precision. Apply cheek shades with highlighting or fluffy blush brushes.

Star Glow Ingredients: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Boron Nitride, Zinc Stearate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Nylon-12, Dimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Caprylyl Glycol, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Polyethylene, Tin Oxide, Copernicia Cerifera Cera (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Cire De Carnauba), Hexylene Glycol, Tocopherol +/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides). name: Surratt Relevée Lash Curler
description: Ergonomically designed, Surratt’s Revelée Lash Curler creates a believable, eye-widening curl (without any harsh ‘edges’). Featuring soft, spongey silicone pads which are rounded to shape without that all-too-common right-angled effect, this minimises likelihood of breakage while delivering long-lasting ‘lift’. Ideal for creating a youthful, fully fanned, doe-eyed look, this is chic, petite and perfectly portable.
how_to_use: Apply it as close to the lash line as comfortably possible and give it a gentle squeeze. Then, pull it out about a millimetre and give it another gentle squeeze, then one more millimetre and a final squeeze. That’s three gentle squeezes in total. By working gradually along the length of the hairs, you get a gently 'uplifted' lash that’s not crimped at a 45 degree angle.

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml
description: Forming an invisible bandage on sore skin, La Roche-Posay's insulating Cicaplast Gel B5 brings instant relief to compromised and damaged skin. This is one treatment to keep stocked on your shelfie at all times. Your new personal at-home healer can be used by every member of the family to treat damaged skin and even when recovering from laser treatments and cosmetic peels. Working to stimulate new cell production is a complex of copper, manganese and zinc that are perfectly partnered with hyaluronic acid, drawing in all the water your skin is craving. Wondering what brings that instant relief? Panthenol is your hero ingredient at play here at 5% to immediately soothe sore skin. Using this just twice a day is enough to speed up healing times and improve your skin barrier health. It might sound too good to be true but this clinically tested treatment has the dermatologist seal of approval!
how_to_use: Apply twice a day to cleansed and dry skin. Do not apply directly on wounded skin. Avoid the eye contour area.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Polybutene, Sodium Citrate, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Zinc Gluconate, Madecassoside, Dimethiconol, Manganese Gluconate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Copper Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Tocopherol.

Featuring soft, spongey silicone pads which are rounded to shape without that all-too-common right-angled effect, this minimises likelihood of breakage while delivering long-lasting ‘lift’. Ideal for creating a youthful, fully fanned, doe-eyed look, this is chic, petite and perfectly portable.

Then, pull it out about a millimetre and give it another gentle squeeze, then one more millimetre and a final squeeze. That’s three gentle squeezes in total. By working gradually along the length of the hairs, you get a gently 'uplifted' lash that’s not crimped at a 45 degree angle.

name: Too Faced Lip Injection Maximum Plump Lip Plumper 4g
description: Desperate for fuller lips but not too keen on fillers? The answer to your prayers is here! Boasting their strongest formula yet, the Lip Injection Maximum Plump Lip Plumper beats all other Too Faced products to the plumping punch. The most potent according to the brand’s very own ‘plump-o-metre’, this gloss surpasses the cult-classic Lip Injection, the Lip Injection Lip Glow and the Lip Injection Extreme with its filling and lip-boosting properties. Giving instant and intense plumping results (immediately and over time!), the clear, glossy formula also smooths, hydrates and nourishes lips with its ‘scientifically-proven advanced volumizing technology’. Oh, and don’t just take our word for it – after just one week, 98% of people said their lips looked re-volumised! Now available in two sizes, pick from the full size (4ml) or the handy travel size (2.8ml) so you're never caught without your pout-perfector
how_to_use: Apply to centre of top and bottom lips. Blend outward to corners of lips using doe-foot applicator or a lip brush. Use alone as a gloss or use under or over lipstick.

name: Milk Makeup Mini Lip + Cheek
description: Part lip tint, part blush, Milk Makeup's multi-purpose Lip + Cheek cuts down on space in your make up kit and is perfect for those who want colour and glow on-the-go (so, all of us). 100% vegan and cruelty-free, this creamy colour glides on seamlessly, diffusing easily to lend a rosy-cheeked flush and just-bitten lip tint. Available in a plethora of shades building from a delicate rose hue to a deep berry, this multi-tasker builds effortlessly so you can transition from low-key to look-at-me drama in just a few swipes. Infused with conditioning, vitamin-rich avocado oil, mango butter and peach nectar, this comfortable formula hydrates and bestows a healthy dewy sheen. We'll take five, to go.
how_to_use: Swipe across cheeks and/or lips for a burst of colour.

name: Tower 28 Beauty ShineOn Lip Jelly (Various Shades)
description: With the shine of a gloss and the comforting-feel-slash-sheer-colour of a balm, Tower 28 Beauty's ShineOn Lip Jelly delivers enviable volume and a healthy gleam. A fresh take on a traditional lip gloss, this innovative formula marks a new era of lacquers that achieve, in their words, "never sticky, always shiny lips". Formulated with a unique blend of five nourishing oils - from apricot and avocado to raspberry and more - this ultra-conditioning formula soothes and protects your lips to grant a slick of subtle colour. Now available in seven translucent jelly shades, simply choose between 'XOXO' (sheer pink); 'FIRE' (sheer orange); 'FEAR LESS' (sheer berry); 'CHILL' (clear); 'SPICY' (sheer-ish) red); 'MAGIC' (clear gloss with gold shimmer); ‘WILD’ (sheer raspberry).
how_to_use: Just swipe and smile! Apply over bare lips or over your favourite lip colour.
ingredient: Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Polybutene, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Oryza Sativa Bran Extract, Aroma, Caprylyl Glycol, Helianthus Annuus Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene/Ehtylene/Styrene Copolymer, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima Oil, Rubus Idaeus Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ci 15850, Ci 77742. Formulated Without: Essential Oils, Fragrance, Animal By-Products, Ulfates (Sls And Sles), Parabens, Formaldehydes, Formaldehyde-Releasing Agents, Phthalates, Mineral Oil, Retinyl Palmitate, Oxybenzone, Coal Tar, Hydroquinone, Triclosan, Triclocarban.

name: ICONIC London Illuminator 13.5ml(Various Shades)
description: The must-have product everyone is raving about, ICONIC London's Illuminator is guaranteed to take your highlight to epic new proportions. Every drop of this super-concentrated shimmering elixir glides on smoothly to bestow an ultra-blendable glow. Whether worn alone as an enhancer, or mixed with your foundation, primer or moisturiser to create a soft focus effect, this lends light to dulled, lacklustre complexions, and looks stunning when blended along cheek and brow bones to accentuate the high points of your face. Available in five perfectly pearlescent shades, you may have a hard time choosing between the exclusive, limited edition 'Gold' (a molten, gold hue), Original (a champagne-toned shimmer to add golden shine), 'Blush' (a radiantly warm rose-toned shimmer), Shine (a pearly pink-based glow-giver) and Glow (a terracotta tone that bestows a rich bronze-y glow).
how_to_use: Add drops of your illuminator to cheekbones, tip of nose, collarbones and cupids bow Use your fingers to tap the product in, gently blending it for a beautiful high gloss look. This super-versatile product can be added to any product in your makeup bag for a touch of luxe.

name: Saie Mascara 101
description: Saie 'Yes!' to full, feathery, faux-worthy lashes (that don't leave your lids feeling leaden). Created to plump, lift and separate each individual lash for a doe-eyed effect, Saie's Mascara 101 has a buildable, cruelty-free formula that cares for your hair to keep lashes strong, glossy and flexible. With its hydra-mineral complex that's packed with potassium (proven to nourish and fortify), this phenomenal wand doesn't clump, smudge or fallout – instead, it fans lashes for heart-stopping flutter. Just wiggle from roots through to tips for the prettiest, they-can't-be-real lash enhancement.
how_to_use: Place the wand on the base of upper lashes, then wiggle upward to coat every lash from base to tip. Use small bristles at the tip of the brush for small lashes on outer corners of eye and bottom lashes. One coat for a natural look and up to three coats for more full drama.
ingredient: Beeswax (Cera Alba), Water (Aqua), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Shea Butter, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Dimer Dilinoleyl and Dimer Dilinoleate, Glycerin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Agropyron Repens Root Extract, Arginine, Leuconostoc (Radish Root) Ferment Filtrate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Glyceryl Caprylate, Xanthan Gum, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

name: Laura Mercier Pure Canvas Illuminating Primer 50ml
description: Bring a healthy glow to skin with this illuminating primer that creates a flawless canvas for makeup application and extended wear. Enhance skin's natural luminosity with the all-new Pure Canvas Primer Illuminating. Infused with beauty enhancing porcelain flower extract and a blend of micronized pearls, the primer imparts a healthy glow on skin. The pearls reflect light to visibly refresh dull, tired skin. Now available in the original (50ml) and sized-to-try (25ml) tube, there's no better time to invest in this illuminating formula!
how_to_use: Apply after skin care. Gently massage a dime-sized amount onto skin with fingertips. Follow with Tinted Moisturiser or Foundation.

name: Hourglass Voyeur Waterproof Gel Eyeliner 0.32g (Various Shades)
description: Boasting a 12-hour wear, creamy formula, the Voyeur Waterproof Gel Eyeliner adds the perfect amount of definition to a natural, daytime look and builds to 'all eyes on me' statement piece come night. Perfect for waterlines, lash lines, building up a smokey eye and more, this waterproof formula is budge-proof for up to 12 hours and sits delectably on lids with its creamy, comfortable texture. The bullet is just the right size: small enough for precise details but is thick enough for purposeful smudging, too. In five eye-catching shades, from the classic matte black 'Obsidian' to an emerald green 'Obsidian', enjoy the full spectrum of smooth, silky liners.
how_to_use: Twist base to dispense product. Retract and firmly replace cap after each use to prevent the formula from drying out. For a diffused effect, define the eyes along the upper lash line with Voyeur Waterproof Gel Eyeliner and blend. Pair with a contrasting color to create depth and definition at the root of the lashes. For a winged look, extend the liner past the outer corner of the eye using short strokes until the desired length is achieved.

Forest: Polyisobutene, Acrylates/Stearyl Acrylate/Dimethicone Methacrylate Copolymer, Dehydroacetic Acid, Bht, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499). name: St. Tropez Tan Remover Mitt
description: This specially designed mitt effectively removes tan build up and buffs away dry skin, leaving it ready to reapply a perfect sun-kissed tan base. An SOS treatment for even fully developed tans, this intelligent mitt helps to correct tanning mistakes as well as helping to ensure skin in super soft, silky and perfect for a flawless tan application. Simply wet skin and gently buff in circular motions on the targeted area to help erase mistakes and soften skin in rough areas.
how_to_use: Use on wet skin in gentle circular motions with your regular bath or shower products. Apply extra pressure to elbows, knees, ankles, feet and hands or where tan build up is obvious. To correct tanning mistakes, dampen skin then use your index finger inside the mitt and apply to the affected area.

name: Benefit Lil' Brow Loves Mini Brow Set (Various Shades) (Worth £40.68)
description: Take your brow game to the next level with three brow bestsellers from Benefit Cosmetics, now available as minis in one set: the Lil’ Brow Loves set. Add definition and volume to your brows with the Lil’ Brow Loves set, featuring a trio of minis. The Precisely, My Brow Pencil defines brows thanks to its ultra-fine tip, while the Gimme Brow+ Volumizing Gel uses fibers to add depth to your arches. Last (but certainly not least) the 24-Hour Brow Setter provides invisible shaping and long-lasting setting, meaning your brows will last as long as you do. Available in a range of shades, this mini set is perfect for testing out the brand’s bestselling brow products or for taking with you on your travels.
how_to_use: Stroke Precisely, My Brow Pencil onto eyebrows in short, upward motions. Brush on Gimme Brow+ Volumizing Gel to add fullness then swipe on 24-Hour Brow Setter to sculpt, shape and set.
ingredient: ’Warm Golden Blonde’: Aqua (Water), Coco-betaine, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Peg-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Maltitol, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium name: benefit High Beam Satiny Pink Liquid Highlighter
description: The self-proclaimed ‘supermodel in a bottle’, this gorgeously gleaming pink highlighter picks up high points of the face perfectly and adds unrivalled radiance to complexions. With a luminous, subtly shimmering finish, this highly sought-after liquid blends into skin beautifully and adds an enviably dewy glow – whether worn alone, under, or over make up. Simply dot it on wherever you want looks to linger – it’s perfect on cheekbones, brow bones, forehead and Cupid’s bow, plus it adds subtle definition to your nose when blended on the bridge. Try it once and it’s sure to take up permanent residence in your make up bag. Available in full (10ml) and travel (6ml) sizes, there's all the more reasons to take your glow on the road.
how_to_use: Take the stage fresh faced or dolled up and apply dots where you want to add radiance-cheekbones, brow bones, forehead, Cupid's bow-then blend. Add soft definition to your nose with a bit on your bridge.

N04975/N Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

name: Hourglass Ambient Strobe Light Sculptor
description: The highlighting tool you never knew you needed (but soon won't be able to live without), Hourglass' Ambient Strobe Light Sculptor is an innovation in illumination. Seamlessly designed, this dual-ended blender features an angled side to fit perfectly onto high points of the face, plus a velvety smooth, flocked end to soften and blend for a natural, smooth finish. Designed to be used with Hourglass' Ambient Strobe Lighting Powders (though just as good with any formula), the dense texture of this crafty applicator picks up the perfect amount of highlighter to achieve a subtly sculpted finish that looks believable. Composed of high-grade, anti-microbial material, this is effortlessly easy to use - it can even be used wet to create a more intense, glowing result.
how_to_use: Sweep angled side of sculptor over Hourglass' Ambient Strobe Lighting Powder and apply to high points of the face - tops of cheeks, bridge of nose, brow bone and cupid's bow. Can be used wet or dry. To use wet, dampen the angled side. Soften and blend using the flocked side.

name: benefit Dandelion Baby-Pink Blush Powder Mini 2.5g
description: Offering up to eight hours of luminosity, benefit’s Dandelion Baby-Pink Blusher and Brightening Finishing Face Powder Mini from the Wanderful World Blushes collection completes your look with an enviable glow. The cult-favourite compact boasts a soft-satin finish, that works to leave skin with an airbrushed effect and a flush of baby-pink pigment. An ultra-fine texture sweeps onto the complexion with a weightless feel, while the blendable and buildable formula allows you to create a customisable finish.

name: Spectrum Collections MB08 - Marble Magic Wand brush
description: Create perfectly blended eye looks with Spectrum Collection's MB08 Marbleous Magic Wand Brush, 100% vegan and finished in a chic white and rose gold colourway, this is a must-add to your collection. Use the feather soft bristles of the MB08 Marbleous Magic Wand Brush to seamlessly apply and blend your favourite highlighter. The flame shaped tip allows for precise application whilst the slightly crimped bristles will pick up the perfect amount of powder for an even application and a diffused soft-focus finish. Finished in a chic white and rose gold colourway, this is a must-add to your collection.
how_to_use: Use to elevate your routine and make your beauty products work even harder.
ingredient: Synthetic Bristles

name: Natasha Denona I Need a Rose Lipstick 4g (Various Shades)
description: One swipe of this full coverage gel-based lipstick and your lippy standards are going to to get a lot higher (i.e. you might start rethinking your current stash). Take all the things you love about the I Need A Nude lipsticks (think: seamless application, gorgeous pigmentation, creamy texture) and add to that even more make up magic. Three new subtle but vibrant shades of pink give a ‘your lips but better’ look; try ‘Calla’ for a rosy brown hue, ‘Daphne’ for a deeper mauve pink or keep it simple with a kiss of ‘Peony’ pink. No matter which one you choose, expect a lightweight, luminous and long-lasting shine. If chapped lips are holding you back, don’t fret! The new range infuses aloe vera and papaya fruit extracts along with antioxidants to keep your lips plump and hydrated. When skincare meets make up, you know you’re doing something very right, but who are we kidding? This is the renowned make up artist Natasha Denona we’re talking about!
how_to_use: To define the lips, apply a lip liner pencil, then directly apply the lipstick onto lips for a creamy and luscious finish.

name: ICONIC London Underglow Blurring Primer 27ml
description: Inviting you into a whole new era of make up, the ICONIC London Underglow Blurring Primer kickstarts your radiance from the very first step of your routine to give your skin the most enviable filter-free flawlessness. Marrying skin care benefits with make up and powered by the ultimate skin-brightening agent that is vitamin C, this illuminating elixir preps and primes your face for the dreamiest finish. Totally unique right down to the last glow-giving drop and featuring artemisia capillaris, a Japanese plant extract that wards of blue light exposure, you can easily blur away the appearance of crater-like pores, deep-set lines and any imperfections that may stand in the way of your seamless base. Ready, steady, glow with the help of ultra-delicate champagne pearls which enhance your lit-from-within glow in seconds. With a formula so hydrating and refreshing, what's not to love?
how_to_use: After moisturising, use the ICONIC dropper to apply 2-3 drops all over the face – focusing on any areas that are often prone to excess shine. Use your fingertips (or your favourite ICONIC base brush) to blend the refreshing formula into your skin. For best results, use together with our brand new Super Smoother Skin Tint. Together these base beauties are the dream duo for that flawless, ultra-natural looking finish that really does glow from within.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Dimethicone, Peg 10 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Isononyl Isononanoate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Pentylene Glycol, Coco Caprylate/Caprate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Cetyl Peg/Ppg 10/1 Dimethicone, P Henoxyethanol, Isododecane, Sodium Chloride, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Magnesium Sulfate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propanediol, Di Methiconol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Parfum (Fragrance), Propylene Carbonate, Tin Oxide, Artemisia Capillaris Flower Extract, Sorbitol, To Copherol, 1,2 Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbic Acid, Colloidal Gold, Glutathione. name: Cult Beauty Holographic Makeup Bag
description: Allow us to introduce you to the Holographic Makeup Bag – made to safely (and chicly!) house the beauty booty of any self-respecting CB addict. Impeccably sized for storing and transporting all make up and skin care essentials, this impressively eye catching zip up case is made from a glossy, colour-changing holographic material, embossed with our logo and finished with a discrete white zipper. Convenient as well as glamorous, the case is completely wipe-clean, so you can instantly mop up make up marks and skin care spillages.
how_to_use: Use this case to house your daily beauty must-haves.
ingredient: Holographic outer and cotton lining.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood Complexion Brush
description: Achieving a seamlessly sculpted look is impossible without the right brushes – that’s why you need Charlotte Tilbury’s Hollywood Complexion Brush. A trusty two-in-one tool, this dual-ended brush features both a small, angled head and a larger, flat-top brush to allow you to precisely place product and blend it seamlessly (the small head is also great for concealing small areas around the eyes and nose). Particularly perfect for contouring and highlighting, it’s specially designed for use with Charlotte Tilbury’s {Hollywood Contour Wand} and {Hollywood Beauty Light Wand}. Softening harsh lines, both brush heads are made from 100% cruelty-free synthetic fibres that won’t fall out, continuing your complexion perfection indefinitely.
how_to_use: Use the small head for precise placement of contouring and concealing products, then use the larger head for seamless blending.
ingredient: 100% cruelty-free 3-tone fibres

name: Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Primer 30ml
description: Like an insta-filter IRL, Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Primer creates an instantly perfected, soft-focus effect and the ultimate canvas for make up. This travel-ready size ensures your make up is primed for every photo opportunity - whatever the destination. With a refreshingly lightweight gel texture, this could-be-magic formula is brimming with microspherical powders that help to smooth uneven texture and blur the look of pores and fine lines. This clever primer also helps to control excess oil, to avoid unwanted shine and make up slide, without leaving skin looking flat or dull. Just a beautiful airbrushed finish that lasts all day.
how_to_use: Smooth onto moisturised skin using the fingertips. Start with one pump and add more if needed. Follow with your desired foundation.
ingredient: Dimethicone, Water/aqua, Dimethicone/vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Vinyl Dimethicone/methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Silica, Glycerin, Cetyl Peg/ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Isododecane, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Dimethicone/peg-10/15 Crosspolymer, Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Benzoate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, C24-28 Alkyl Methicone, Propylene Carbonate, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Tocopherol.

name: Laura Mercier Pure Canvas Mini Primer - Illuminating 25ml
description: Bring a healthy glow to skin with this illuminating primer that creates a flawless canvas for makeup application and extended wear. Enhance skin's natural luminosity with the all-new Pure Canvas Primer Illuminating. Infused with beauty enhancing porcelain flower extract and a blend of micronized pearls, the primer imparts a healthy glow on skin. The pearls reflect light to visibly refresh dull, tired skin. Now available in the original (50ml) and sized-to-try (25ml) tube, there's no better time to invest in this illuminating formula!
how_to_use: Apply after skin care. Gently massage a dime-sized amount onto skin with fingertips. Follow with Tinted Moisturiser or Foundation.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Hydrogenated Didecene, Glycerin, Pvp, Peg-6 Stearate, Mica, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sorbitan Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hoya Lacunosa Flower Extract, Plankton Extract, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/ Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Ceteth-20, 1,2-Hexanediol, Squalane, Boron Nitride, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Steareth-20, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polysorbate 60, Tin Oxide, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tropolone, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol. name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Brush #12
description: Anastasia’s Brush 12 - Dual Ended Firm Angled Brush combines high-quality, synthetic angled bristles with a spoolie wand to make achieving perfect brows a breeze. The spoolie end is ideal for combing up brows to expose any stragglers that need plucking, as well as for softening any powder or pencil marks for the most natural results. The angled brush is then intelligently designed to ‘fill in’ your brows and define the arches with brow powder. Once you’re done, just finalise the shape you want with the wand and get-set to dazzle.
how_to_use: Apply your choice of product with short, quick strokes in the direction of the hair growth. Brush 12 - Dual Ended Firm Angled Brush is perfect to fill-in arches or apply liner. Synthetic Bristles flawlessly apply powder to mimic brow hair. Spooley brush distributes and blends products evenly for a natural look.

name: VIEVE 121 Blush and Bronze Brush
description: Featuring ultra-plush synthetic bristles, this blush and bronzer brush achieves a natural flush that builds to your desired effect, so you don’t accidentally go full-on clown paint (unless that’s what you’re going for!). Thanks to its creative design, you can count on this tool suit your every rosy or bronzed up cheek look. Simply gliding the brush across cheeks will ensure an even application of blush and seamlessly blend into skin for a diffused, natural flush. Using the tapered side, bring out your inner sculptor and focus bronzer across your jaw, under cheekbones and around your forehead to enhance your gorgeous features and say hello to chiselled cheekbones.
how_to_use: Use the tapered end to apply bronzer under the cheekbones, across the jawline and around the forehead for contoured definition. For blush, gently sweep across the apples of the cheeks or bring up the cheekbones for a lifted look. It’s also the perfect brush for applying a liquid highlighter over the body. How to wash your brushes: Using a gentle soap, swirl each brush into the palm of your hand, rinsing downwards under lukewarm water until the water runs clear. Once clean, gently squeeze out and rest your brushes on a table with the bristle end hanging over the edge to air dry. VIEVE recommends washing your makeup brushes once a week.
ingredient: 100% vegan, synthetic bristles.

name: PATRICK TA Major Skin Dual-Ended Complexion Brush
description: Without further ado, we’d like to introduce the latest complexion essential you need in your routine… the Major Skin Dual-Ended Complexion Brush from Patrick Ta. Boasting two perfectly shaped brushes in one handy tool, this double-ended brush is made from soft and fluffy synthetic fibres to help you create a seamless finish. Making light work out of blending your cream or liquid foundation is the rounded dome of the foundation brush — precisely shaped to help you create a practically airbrushed finish. Flip over to the fluffy, tulip-shaped brush to precisely apply your loose or pressed setting powder (your choice!) and keep your base in place. Streaky bases be gone, Patrick Ta has all cream and powder complexion products fully covered with this multi-purpose brush.
how_to_use: Using the rounded foundation brush, apply cream foundation to the skin and blend. Apply powder with tulip-shaped powder brush to set and retouch as desired.
ingredient: Cruelty-free, synthetic fibers.

name: Chantecaille Sunflower Lip Tint Hydrating Balm 1g
description: With a flattering soft mocha hue, Chantecaille’s Sunflower Lip Tint Hydrating Balm boasts a perfectly tapered bullet that clings to the curves of your lips for effortless application and seamless coverage. The emollient-rich sheer balm is infused with lip-loving ingredients such as cherry and rose extracts to nourish and give your lips a slick of conditioning colour. As with all Chantecaille formulas, this lip balm is free from phthalates, sulfates, mineral oil, petrolatum, palm oil and GMOs.
how_to_use: Apply directly to the lips. Start in the middle and work the colour outward.
ingredient: Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecanol, Polybutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Polyethylene, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax, Synthetic Wax, Dicalcium Phosphate, Chantecaille - Rose De Mai Co2, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil [Carthamus Tinctorius Seed Oil], Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Fruit Extract [Prunus Avium Extract], Tocopherol, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Alumina, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide [+/-:Mica, Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491/Ci 77492), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090)].

name: Tweezerman ProCurl Lash Curler
description: If you're yet to find the perfect pair of eyelash curlers, Tweezerman has just launched a cleverly designed must-try. The rose gold Procurl Lash Curler features a 60-degree angle designed to help get the best curl, hypoallergenic silicone pads for optimum hygiene and a double-barrelled body for ultimate strength and control during application. It's our favourite design yet!
how_to_use: Open eyes wide to insert and center lashes. With curler pad positioned at the base of your lash line, hold handles firmly and gently squeeze. Hold for a few seconds, then open curler slowly to completely release lashes. Repeat up the length of your lashes for an even more intense curl. Always curl lashes before applying mascara.

name: Jouer Cosmetics Essential Hydrating Lip Oil 0.16 fl. oz. - Naturel Shine
description: Made with 99% plant-derived ingredients, the Essential Hydrating Lip Oil nourishes and adds healthy shine for a natural-looking, juicy and healthy pout. Cruelty-free and vegan friendly, this kind formula is enriched with apricot oil (which is full of vitamins, antioxidants and fatty acids to replenish dry lips), jojoba seed oil (to create a protective barrier that looks in moisture and keeps lips soft and supple), and vitamin E (a natural conditioner with antioxidant benefits). Sheer, non-sticky and fragrance-free, this oil formula gives lips a glass-like sheen in just one glow-bestowing swipe of the applicator wand.
how_to_use: With the plush doe foot wand, glide the high shine oil over lips. Reapply as desired.

name: NYX Professional Makeup 3C Palette - Color Correcting Concealer
description: Boasting six colour variations, this richly pigmented concealer palette gives you the flexibility to customise your concealer shade to suit your skin tone all year round - depending on whether you’re sporting bronzed skin in the summer or a more natural look in the winter. The rich pigment and creamy texture blends easily and conceals superbly for a flawless finish. Available in three shade options (Deep, Medium and Light) there’s a palette to suit every skin tone.
how_to_use: Apply your chosen shade to problem areas - melting with the warmth of fingertips or buffing with a make up brush.
ingredient: Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecanol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Polyethylene, Isostearyl Isostearate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Candelilla Cera/Cire de Candelilla, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Glyceryl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcrystalline, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica, Jojoba Esters, Synthetic Beeswax, Tocopheryl Acetate, BHA. MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499)

name: Charlotte Tilbury Bronzer & Blusher Brush
description: Having spent 20 years in the industry, celebrity make up artist Charlotte Tilbury has created an edit of essential handcrafted brushes that are simple to use and deliver an expertly blended finish. Featuring sustainable ergonomic handles (that won’t roll off a dressing table!) all brushes are designed to work with Charlotte’s skin care and make up formulas - so you can recreate her signature red carpet looks with minimal hassle! The perfect pairing for your HG bronzer and blusher, this rounded brush effortlessly diffuses powders for seamless sun-kissed glow or a stunning flush of colour. Think: surefire staple.
how_to_use: Sweep over the cheekbones, forehead, nose and chin when applying bronzer to give skin a natural-looking, instant glow. Dust across the apples of the cheeks and over cheekbones when applying blusher.
ingredient: Hair: Synthetic Fibre Ferrule: Aluminum Handle: Wood

name: Hourglass Scattered Light Glitter Eyeshadow 3.5g (Various Shades)
description: Did someone say grown up glitter? Achieving that seemingly impossible make up ideal, Hourglass Scattered Light Glitter Eyeshadow is a limited edition hidden gem quite literally. The formula features a high concentration of crushed pearls and light-reflecting glitter to create sparkling, high-impact eye looks. The unique cream-to-powder formula creates reflective dimension immediately, with intense colour payoff for the most effortless, sophisticated look. Beautifully buildable, the sheer formula is creamy and weightless, gliding across lids seamlessly before drying down for seriously smooth, ultra-comfortable wear. Its available in five show-stopping metallic shades theres hazy taupe Smoke, smoky pink Aura, shimmering champagne Reflect, gorgeously golden Foil and dazzling copper Blaze. Choose your favourite or combine a few for a sublime, shimmering take on a smoky eye.
how_to_use: Apply to lids the formula glides across as a cream then dries to a powder for super-smooth, ultra-comfortable wear.
ingredient: Cyclopentasiloxane, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Mica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Diisostearyl Malate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Isododecane, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Propanediol, Tin Oxide May Contain (+/-): Carmine (Ci 75470), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)

name: By Terry Hyaluronic Hydra Pressed Powder
description: Harnessing the hydrating powers of hyaluronic acid – a skin-loving hero that holds up to 1000 times its weight in water – for plump, moisturised skin, the Hyaluronic Hydra Pressed Powder leaves the complexion looking smooth and radiant. Colourless so as not to interfere with your make up, suitable for all skin tones and incredibly long-lasting, the formula sets make up, mattifies and gives the finishing touch to your look. With no cracking or drying on the horizon, this nifty compact suits all skin tones – utilising decadent mica pearls to give a silky-smooth, “your skin but better” feeling. With a soft-focus effect to literally absorb shine and blur imperfections, the weightless powder invisibly evens skin and sets make up. Vegan, clean and 70% mineral-based, (with a handy puff applicator!), we’re betting this is your new on-the-go staple.
how_to_use: Load up the puff, tapping off any excess powder. Apply all over the face, focusing on the T-zone. Gently press the puff onto oily areas or where more foundation has been applied, so it is perfectly set for the day. Can be used for easy touch-ups through the day. Apply directly after primer to control shine, or on top of makeup to set it in place.
ingredient: Talc, Silica, Mica, Ci 77120 / Barium Sulfate, Octyldodecanol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Magnesium Stearate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Diisostearyl Malate, Methicone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate. (T3355a1)

name: Natasha Denona Hy-Gen Primer Serum 20ml
description: With a silky consistency and a dewy, plumping finish, the ever-so-lightweight Hy-Gen Skin Glass Primer Serum nourishes skin with 72 hours (!) of hydration and softness, while bestowing a gorgeous gleam that leaves skin luminous, under make up or when worn alone. That’s thanks to crystal-like ultra-fine reflecting pigments which give a ‘lit-from-within’ glow. And for the hydration, you can thank the ‘Skin Thirst Relief Complex’ which uses a blend of hyaluronic acid, natural moisturising sugars, and powerful humectants to not only offer short-term moisture, but also strengthens your skin’s natural ability to regulate its own hydration levels over time. And for a stronger, healthier moisture barrier, there’s also Mediterranean microalgae.
how_to_use: AS A SERUM: Apply 3-4 drops on a clean face and neck before moisturiser. Use daily to improve skin’s appearance over time. AS A PRIMER: For a blurring, illuminating, and pore-refining effect, pat 3-4 drops gently into skin and allow to absorb before applying foundation.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Pro Blending Brush
description: This hardworking blender brush has light bristles that are rounded at the edge, to grant a professional finish to your eyeshadow in a few simple sweeps. It features a minimalist all-black design, with black ferrule complete with subtle NYX Professional Makeup logo. The brand has amassed a loyal army of devotees for their tried-and-true range of products – and their brushes are no exception, allowing you to master all manner of make up techniques with ease. Plus, if you look after these brushes, they will last you a lifetime.
how_to_use: Use to achieve a sheer wash of eye colour, or to blend shades together to blur visibility of 'edges' and create a diffused, soft focus effect.
ingredient: Synthetic fibres

name: VIEVE Satin Slip Lipstick 3g (Various Shades)
description: Putting the self care in lip colour, this sensorial formula is about to become a new must-have in your daily skin routine and make up look. With four powerfully pigmented shades, it immediately boosts your complexion while rejuvenating your pout at the same time. It’s infused with a cocktail of star ingredients, including shea butter, vitamin E and bitter orange flower oil to soothe and condition the lips, alongside hydrating hyaluronic acid and jojoba seed oil to deeply moisturise. Choose from four mood-boosting shades, all with a satin-shine finish: if you like nude tones, opt for 'Nightie' (a light, peachy hue), or 'Kink', which is warmer and more rich; 'Silk Sheets' is a soft pink-brown and 'Deep Love' is a cool-tone berry shade. Don’t be surprised if you want one of each.
how_to_use: Apply the lipstick straight from the bullet for a satin sheen finish. Build the formula as desired for intensity or pat out for a just-kissed lip. Pair with your favourite Modern Lip Definer for the perfect pout and ultimate staying power.
ingredient: NIGHTIE: Ingredients: Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Kaolin, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Synthetic Beeswax, Silica, Aroma (Flavor), Tribehenin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Punica Granatum Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tabebuia Impetiginosa Bark Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Linalool, Limonene, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 7 (Ci 15850)].

name: benefit Gimme Brow+ Gel 3g (Various Shades)
description: Benefits Gimme Brow Volumizing Eyebrow Gel is adored by countless devoted (immaculately arched) fans for good reason. Firstly, because it contains tiny microfibres that adhere to skin and hairs, creating natural-looking fullness and to-die-for definition thats both water-resistant and long-wearing. Secondly, the tiny tapered brush applicator blends and builds the gel effortlessly, while the precision tip shapes, outlines and presses hairs into place so just a few sweeps are enough to add enviable volume. Available in eight natural-looking shades, this genius gel tames and tints even the unruliest of arches with ease, so nobody will guess that your brows were brushed on during your morning commute We wont tell if you dont!
how_to_use: Using short pressing motions, stroke the precision tip along brows to define shape. Comb through with the custom, tiny tapered brush to blend and build.
ingredient: Aqua (Water),Mica, Glyceryl Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Polypropylene, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Peg-100 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Laureth-7, Panthenol, Glycerin, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Silica, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate. [+/-: Ci 19140 (Yellow 5, Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), Ci 77289 (Chromium Hydroxide Green), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide, Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)] Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

name: Charlotte Tilbury Hot Lips 2
description: With an innovative squared-off angled tip, the bullet permits precise application of colour, while the '3D' pigments have light-scattering properties, to create the illusion of enhanced lip fullness. Available in 11 sumptuous shades, pick from 'Amazing Amal' an elegant soft berry pink inspired by Amal Clooney in the Matte Revolution formulation, 'Viva La Vergara' a soft wine shine inspired by Sofia Vergara in the Matte Revolution formulation, 'Dancefloor Princess' a cool 60s pop pink inspired by Kylie Minogue in the K.I.S.S.I.N.G. formulation, 'Red Hot Susan' a wearable tawny-orange red inspired by Susan Sarandon in the Matte Revolution formulation, 'Carina's Star' a modern peach and soft coral inspired by Carina Lau in the Matte Revolution formulation, 'Glowing Jen' a tawny beachy rose inspired by Jennifer Aniston in the K.I.S.S.I.N.G. formulation, 'JK Magic' a peachy nude-rose inspired by J.K. Rowling in the Matte Revolution formulation, 'Angel Alessandra' a sunset, peachy nude inspired by Alessandra Ambrosio in the K.I.S.S.I.N.G. formulation, 'Patsy Red' an iconic statement red inspired by Patsy Tilbury in the Matte Revolution formulation, 'In love with Olivia' a pretty in pink shade inspired by Olivia Palermo in the K.I.S.S.I.N.G. formulation and 'Enigmatic Edward' a hydrating clear lipstick inspired by Edward Enninful. There's a colour to complement every skin tone and occasion and we defy you not to want them all...
how_to_use: Apply Hot Lips straight from the bullet for fuller, kissably 'pillowy' lips.

name: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Powder 10g (Various Shades)
description: Let perfect lighting follow you wherever you go with Hourglass Ambient Lighting Powder. Recreating the flattering effects of the most forgiving light sources, from candlelight to sunset, this ethereal illumination powder creates a soft-focus, lit-from-within glow. Ground-breaking Photoluminescent Technology Ambient Lighting Powder captures, diffuses and softens surrounding light, filtering out harsh beams to blur the visibility of imperfections, pores and wrinkles - leaving skin looking softer, more youthful and beautifully radiant. In eight stunning shades, these sleek compacts will make you feel like you have a personal lighting technician in your make up bag. Apply this silky powder to the places you want to accentuate, or sweep all over to imbue skin with a seamless lustre.
how_to_use: Apply powder all over the face as the final step for a radiant complexion.

name: VIEVE Modern Matte Lipstick - Brat
description: Add a touch of the grunge and glamour of the '90s to your lips with the new Ninetease Lipsticks from VIEVE... housed in luxurious, gold-embossed bullets with a bespoke jaguar print, these are sure to make a serious statement both in your make up bug and on your lips. The Modern Matte Lipstick you know, love, and can't get enough of has gone back in time to the decade that transitioned us out of the bright, neon tones of the '80s and into a cool new era. Harnessing all the lip-loving goodness of this rich and creamy lipstick, brimming with vitamin E, VIEVE has taken it back to the pre-millennia era with two supermodel-worthy shades. Introducing 'Brat' - the perfect pink-brown - and 'Ninetease' - a cool-toned brown nude - to give your look that 'trendy again' '90s look that we just can't quit.
how_to_use: For full colour pay off, apply straight from the bullet, working from the centre of the lips outwards. If you want a softer finish, simply blot on with fingertips and build up the colour. Jamie's Top Tip: Add extra volume and definition to lips with a VIEVE Modern Lip Definer. You can mix and match the shades to customise your lip look.

name: Hindash Lip Tone - Hush 1.46g
description: Amp up your pout with the soft and oh-so-blendable Lip Tone pencil for the ultimate kissing booth prep. Gliding dreamily across your lips without so much as a snap or smear, this caramel nude pencil lines and defines your mouth with look-at-me colour. Flattering on every complexion, this universal nude pencil delivers an enviable satin-smooth finish that’s both long-lasting and moisturising. Giving your go-to nude some much-needed flair and warm-toned hues, your new beauty staple is just a couple taps away.
how_to_use: Line and define your lips by shaping the contours and edges. Fill in color for a complete look, or follow with a Hindash lip product.

name: ICONIC London Enrich and Elevate Mascara - Black 7.5ml
description: Lasting 14 hours, this innovative mascara does everything you could hope for and more. Not only does it lengthen and volumise, but it also infuses a growth-active called Symlash to help strengthen, thicken and fan out lashes for a bright-eyed effect. Using the blackest of black pigments, you can count on this curved flexi-wand to coat lashes in a tint with deep colour payoff that doesn’t budge. This lash-loving mascara also infuses carnauba wax, an ultra-smooth wax, that layers on a soft film to give a fanned-out effect that is utterly fluttery. Expect lift, volume and curl with one simple swipe that will instantly wake up tired-looking eyes. Boasting a formula so kind to lashes, 76% of customers said that after six weeks, their lashes looked healthier! That’s what we like to hear.
how_to_use: For best results, wiggle the curved brush at the root of your lashes, to ensure the nine rows of bristles hook onto every last lash. Pull the formula through the length of your lashes. Coat both your top and bottom lashes for a long and feathery look. Layer up to three coats for seriously bambi-esque lashes.

name: NARS Light Reflecting Loose Setting Powder - Crystal 11g
description: Now available in four universally-flattering shades, the cult-favourite NARS Light Reflecting Loose Setting Powder is designed to enhance the complexion in any lighting, whilst being undetectable on skin. The no-flashback powder utilises Photochromic Technology to diffuse and adjust to new sources of light, creating a perfected, naturally luminous finish, both in person, and on camera. The formula’s Light Reflecting Complex imparts a soft-focus effect, optically blurring the appearance of pores and fine lines, while microfine mineral powders enriched with Glycerin and antioxidant-rich Vitamin E help to maintain hydration.
how_to_use: Gently sweep onto the face with the brand's #13 Powder Brush to set makeup with a luminous, photo-ready finish. Press and roll onto skin with a powder puff or #15 Precision Powder Brush to lock complexion products in place. This also works well for targeted application to smaller areas of the face, like the undereye area or around the nose.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Cleanser

name: benefit The POREfessional Face Primer 22ml
description: Benefit's The POREfessional is a silky, lightweight balm that swiftly diminishes the appearance of pores and fine lines for an unbeatably smooth finish. Creating the perfect base for make up (or just as good worn alone for a natural-looking, flawless finish), the translucent formula complements all skin tones and contains a vitamin E derivative to protect skin from free radicals. Helping products to stay put, it also prolongs the staying power of your masterful make up handiwork - genius.
how_to_use: Prime in the A.M. Apply a thin layer of this PRO balm to clean, lightly moisturized skin. Pat lightly from the centre of the face outward with fingertips. Apply make up as usual. Reapply whenever pores come out of hiding. Pat delicately on T-zone over makeup and blend.

name: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Palette - Diffused Rose Edit
description: Let perfect lighting follow you wherever you go with Hourglass Ambient Lighting Palette. Recreating the flattering effects of the most forgiving light sources, from candlelight to sunset, this trio of ethereal illumination powders creates a soft-focus, lit-from-within glow. The latest volume in the Ambient Lighting Palette story, the limited edition Diffused Rose palette includes champagne, gold and rose powders for a flush of radiance. Ground-breaking Photoluminescent Technology Ambient Lighting Powder captures, diffuses and softens surrounding light, filtering out harsh beams to blur the visibility of imperfections, pores and wrinkles - leaving skin looking softer, more youthful and beautifully radiant. In eight stunning shades, these sleek compacts will make you feel like you have a personal lighting technician in your make up bag. Apply these silky powders to the places you want to accentuate, or sweep all over to imbue skin with a seamless lustre.
how_to_use: Apply each colour separately or layer up for a multidimensional glow. Apply with a powder brush all over the face, or use to accentuate your face's highest points.

name: Too Faced Soleil Bronzer - Milk Chocolate 8g
description: For a tan that looks good enough to eat, Milk Chocolate Soleil Bronzer by Too Faced is infused with 100% real cocoa powder. Imparting enviable warmth, the matte formula is the lighter version of the brand’s bestselling Chocolate Soleil Bronzer; easily buildable, it’s as super-smooth as it is sweetly scented. Blending effortlessly, the velvety powder is a dream to use, creating a rich, healthy-looking tan that’s sure to attract many an envious glance. What’s more, this product is vegan-friendly and, along with the entire Too Faced range, you can rest assured that it’s cruelty-free.
how_to_use: Apply wherever the sun naturally touches the face: nose, cheeks, chin and forehead. Top Tip: Get cheeky! Sculpt high cheekbones by sweeping bronzer into the hollows of the cheeks and just under the jawline.

name: Eyeko Beach Waterproof Mascara 8ml
description: No, you don't have to sacrifice fluttery lashes while surfing waves or swimming laps. Instead, just apply Eyeko's Beach Mascara - a waterproof formula that's fibre-enhanced to deliver major lift and highlight your natural curl. Enriched with coconut oil and 12 fruit extracts, including strawberry, blueberry, blackcurrant and goji berry (to name a delicious few), this vegan mascara conditions and coats every lash to create the most beautiful and volumised flutter. It's been crafted with an innovative brush that lifts your natural curl, so you're left with sweeping lashes that won't budge even after swimming in the pool or sea.
how_to_use: Gently rock this brush from side to side to create voluminous lashes. Rotate the brush back on itself at the tips of the lashes to encourage the curl effect.

name: VIEVE Modern Powder Perfector (Various Shades)
description: If there's one thing that every beauty devotee needs in their make up bag, it's a powder that they can trust. Enter: the Modern Powder Perfector. Gone are the olden days of blotchy patches and cakey finishes because it's high-time you said hello to a naturally, pore-fected base a-new. Infused with hyaluronic acid and collagen amino acids, this soft matte powder sits weightlessly on your skin and seamlessly blends into your make up jussssst the way you want it to. Smoothing out the appearance of your skin to reveal a photo-ready face, this complexion-enhancing formula reduces shine and blurs away imperfection quicker than you can say 'blot'. Available in four true-tone shades, you can either brighten up your under-eyes or seal in the rest of your face for extra flawlessness.
how_to_use: Sweep over your complexion for a natural matte, perfected finish. For precise application apply with VIEVE 123 Precision Powder Brush. To buff powder effortless all over the face, use VIEVE 127 Powder and Bronze Brush. JAMIE'S TOP TIP: Use a damp makeup sponge to press the powder into the skin for longer lasting coverage.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Mini Dipbrow Gel 2.2g (Various Shades)
description: Dipbrow Pomade has been gracing our arches with budge-proof, seamless definition for years and now it has a sibling! With an easy-to-apply gel texture, this fuss-free formula can be applied directly onto brow hairs with the tapered wand to grant volume and dimension effortlessly. Packed with pigment, Dipbrow Gel leaves no room for patchiness, building full and defined arches by adhering to individual hairs. Just like the pomade, it stays put til you want it gone its waterproof, so no chance of weeping brows on a rainy day; its smudge-proof, so no amount of brow-wiggling will set it loose; its long-lasting, with over 12 hours of wear! Available in 5 shades, this travel-sized edition is suitable for a range of hair colours and can be easily slipped into your handbag for quick n easy touch ups.
how_to_use: Brush the gel from the arch and extend toward the tail using the supplied wand. Then, fill from the front of the brow toward the arch using the remaining product on the wand. Brush in the direction as hairs natural growth. For fuller coverage, brush the gel through the brows a second time to create hair-like strokes. To fill in areas of sparseness, use the tip of the brush to apply the formula directly onto the skin, then blend the product through the brow

name: Hourglass Arch Brow Volumising Fiber Gel 3ml (Various Shades)
description: Get bold, fuller brows in seconds with Hourglass Arch Brow Volumizing Fiber Gel, the perfect option for those looking for an effortless arch enhancer. The soft-hold, flexible formula is infused with micro fibres to create the illusion of fullness without looking too precise or overdone. Delivered on a dual-sided brush, there are both short and long bristles to choose from, so you can apply the gel with varying intensity, making it easy to achieve both perfectly sculpted and untamed style arches. The clever brush ensures even application of colour, while the formula gives long-lasting, comfortable wear (without smudging or flaking) in four versatile shades. From Blonde to Dark Brunette, theres one to flatter every pair of brows out there.
how_to_use: Using short upward strokes, brush the wand through eyebrows in the direction of hair growth The dual-sided brush features short and long bristles to apply product in varying levels of intensity

name: Charlotte Tilbury Full Fat Lashes
description: Charlotte is known for her smouldering 'bedroom eyes' – complete with killer lashes – so we knew Full Fat Lashes was going to be next level. With a phenomenal, clump-resistant formula that glides through lashes seamlessly to maximise their fluttery fullness, this feels soft and flexible (never 'spidery'), and grants that enviable, eyebrow-grazing wow-factor. A must for those who're fed up with deliberating over length or volume – this little miracle does both – while curling, 'lifting' and separating to ensure a full-on, breeze-inducing blink!
how_to_use: Curl lashes with eyelash curlers. Brush on Full Fat Lashes mascara, starting from the inner corner. Zig-zag the brush upwards from the very root of the lashes to curl and separate. At the outer corner, pull the brush up and out to lengthen the lashes and elongate your eye. To finish, nestle the tip of the mascara wand into the roots and brush upwards to add volume to the lash line, as if you were adding individual falsies. Repeat on the bottom lashes for added drama.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Synthetic Beeswax, Paraffin, Iron Oxide (CI 77499), Acacia Senegal Gum, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax (Oryza Sativa Cera), Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Polybutene, Triethanolamine, Palmitic Acid, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Copernicia Cerifera Cera), Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Black 2 (CI 77266), Propylparaben, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Cellulose, PVP

name: The Seated Queen The Cold Cream 100ml
description: An intensely replenishing cleansing cream, The Seated Queen’s The Cold Cream is a multi-tasking marvel that dissolves your make up, double cleanses, makes a soothing mask and a rejuvenating night cream. Powered by single-source, organic ingredients of the highest quality, the vegan formulation is the surest way to streamline your regime. Described as ‘pared-back skin care for busy people’, the formula is gloriously versatile – delivering a hit of moisture, free radical-fighting antioxidants and skin-essentials fatty acids thanks to cold-pressed oils of rosehip (to elasticise), borage and sunflower seed, safflower, argan and apricot kernel – all of which work to negate the effects of aggressors and offer the nutrients needed to keep your skin supple and luminous. With a heavenly scent due to oils of patchouli leaf, lavender, clary sage, rose otto, bergamot, chamomile and frankincense, this potion is also a treat for your spirit – helping to foster a feeling of peace and bring calm at the end of a loooooong hectic day. So, whether you have a few minutes or full half-an-hour for much-needed ‘me time’, allow the The Seated Queen to elevate your nightly ritual.
how_to_use: Use as a make up remover and evening cleanser, a facial (see steps) or an overnight mask. However you want! The Seated Queen Facial.
