name: Tweezerman Mini Slant Tweezer - Blue Bahama
description: Fitting any tiny bag (or budget!) without sacrificing unparalleled precision, Tweezerman’s Mini Slant Tweezer features the same ingeniously angled, hand-filed tips as its full-size forebear, despite being clutch-compatible. Perfectly aligned to ensure they close evenly and firmly, these allow you to pluck meticulously – offering clean, smooth, strong removal even if hairs are fine or short. Made from stainless steel, they’re durable and easy to clean, plus they come in two striking shade options – vibrant ‘Bahama Blue and bright pink ‘Geranium’ – to suit your aesthetic.
how_to_use: To ease tweezing, take a hot shower or use a warm washcloth to open pores. Tweeze in the direction of hair growth to avoid breakage. To close pores post tweezing, use cold water or astringent.

name: Pat McGrath Labs Dark Star Mascara - Xtreme Black 13ml
description: Go supernova with the Dark Star Mascara and take your lashes to an otherworldly realm with drama you’ve only dreamt of…until now! One of the best-kept runway secrets has now set its sights on your beauty bag; designed to add look-at-me drama with a single coat, this volumising formula adheres to every individual lash to deliver utterly intense colour. Inspiring intergalactic allure with a panoramic effect and strategically-placed fibers on a contoured brush, this anti-gravity mascara ensures your lashes stay lifted. C’est magnifique!
how_to_use: Create Supernova Volume: Holding the wand horizontally, place it firmly at the roots of your upper lashes to deposit a dense amount of colour. Wiggle the wand slowly from left to right as you brush upward through tips. Turn wand vertically and use the brush to separate and style the lashes in place.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Paraffin, Glyceryl Stearate, Synthetic Beeswax, Stearic Acid, Acacia Senegal Gum, Butylene Glycol, Palmitic Acid, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Polybutene, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Ozokerite, Aminomethyl Propanol, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Bht, Disodium Phosphate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Phosphate, Stearyl Stearate, Tropolone, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (Ci 77499).

name: Charlotte Tilbury Brow Fix
description: A clear, flexible and lasting brow gel that conditions as it sets hairs in place, the Brow Fix offers 24 hours of hold with no tell-tale residue, flakes or white cast. Set to last you all day and night – from desk to date and everywhere in between – this glossy formula fluffs and feathers without drying out, feeling sticky or looking stiff. Smudge-proof, waterproof, humidity-proof and sweat-resistant, the Brow Fix holds hairs in place with exceptional staying power – effortlessly styling brows as it also works to condition, soften, strengthen, moisturise and add shine to hairs via a medley of natural polymers, silk thread, panthenol and watercress extract.
how_to_use: Set your brow shape by brushing up the hairs – starting from the front of the brow and working outwards. *This formula is waterproof after five minutes of setting time.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Alcohol, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium Edta, Trisodium Edta, Sodium Nitrate, Acetone, Glyoxal, Panthenol, Disodium Phosphate, Hydrolyzed Silk, Nasturtium Officinale Leaf/Stem Extract.

name: Elemis Pro-Collagen Energising Marine Cleanser 150ml
description: One of the OG Elemis products, the Pro-Collagen Energising Marine Cleanser helped make Elemis a household name back when it was just a baby brand – by word of mouth alone. An invigorating cleansing experience, this gel cleanser revives skin as it deeply removes daily dirt, make up and impurities to reveal a dewy, youthful complexion. Energising skin, the formula is turbocharged with minerals like magnesium, zinc and copper – alongside a trio of acids – to encourage collagen production, battle against damaging free radicals, balance blemished complexions, minimise the appearance of fine lines, break down the bonds between dead skin cells and intensely hydrate. Phew! Use this hardworking formulation if you fancy an invigorated visage that isn’t stripped of moisture, with reduced levels of excess oils and a side of smaller pores to boot.
how_to_use: Use every morning and evening. Massage a pea-sized amount into damp skin with fingertips. Add warm water to create a lather. Rinse off.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Lauryl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance (Parfum), Copper PCA, Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin, Succinic Acid, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Extract, Lactic Acid, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Zinc Gluconate, Magnesium Aspartate, Acacia Decurrens (Mimosa) Flower Extract, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Linalool, Lactobacillus Ferment, Citronellol, Geraniol, Copper Gluconate, Rhizobian Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate.

name: benefit Hoola Beach Vacay Mini Bronzer and Blush Duo (Worth £31.00)
description: Want to look like you’re fresh from St Tropez or the Maldives? Now you can fake it ‘til you make it — or in this case, book your flights — with Benefit’s Hoola Beach Vacay Mini Bronzer and Blush Duo. This glow-giving, portable palette will instantly warm up your complexion, anytime and anywhere. First up, the iconic and award-winning Hoola Bronzer: with a buildable and blendable, silky-soft powder formula, it delivers a natural-looking matte-finish. And it’s make up perfecting skills don’t stop there — you can also use it to contour, chisel cheekbones, and flatter your jawline. Next but not least, the Shellie blush: it's smudge-proof and sweatproof, and comes in the most dreamy ‘seashell’ shade, giving cheeks a rosy, radiant flush with a soft-shimmer finish. If you want to amp up your 'Beach Vacay' look – top it off with the matching Butter Balm in our edit. Sunkissed perfection, incoming.
how_to_use: Swirl bronzer onto cheeks or all over face. Sweep blush onto cheeks. Blend & build as desired.

name: Pat McGrath Labs Divine Blush Legendary Glow Colour Balm 7g (Various Shades)
description: A glow-boosting cream blush stick, the Legendary Glow Colour Balm imparts a lustrous fresh-from-the-spa glow with complexion-reviving translucent colour. Enriched with a blend of moisture-enhancing shea butter, squalane and passion fruit seed oil alongside a trio of hydrating actives, this versatile, non-greasy formula effortlessly blends into skin to provide nourishing illumination. Suitable for all skin types and tones, the balm, which comes in a radiant range of shades, delivers a glossy finish and radiant reflection whether you decide to swipe it across the lips or over the cheeks. Our thoughts? It’s legendary by name and legendary by nature…
how_to_use: Soft Blush Veil: Gently swipe or dot the balm onto the apples of the cheek and blend with fingers or brush. Blend and diffuse the balm for a sheer effect using either brush and/ or the warmth of the fingertips. Rich Color Saturation: Swipe the balm directly onto the face and blend out the edges for bolder blush looks. Blend with a brush, fingertips, or sponge using tapping gestures to build color intensity.
ingredient: Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Octyldodecanol, Polybutene, Synthetic Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax / Candelilla Cera / CIre De Candelilla, Ozokerite, Silica, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Ethylene Brassylate, Pentaerythrityl Tetradi-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Unsaponifiables, Polyhydroxystearic Acid. name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml
description: Forming an invisible bandage on sore skin, La Roche-Posay's insulating Cicaplast Gel B5 brings instant relief to compromised and damaged skin. This is one treatment to keep stocked on your shelfie at all times. Your new personal at-home healer can be used by every member of the family to treat damaged skin and even when recovering from laser treatments and cosmetic peels. Working to stimulate new cell production is a complex of copper, manganese and zinc that are perfectly partnered with hyaluronic acid, drawing in all the water your skin is craving. Wondering what brings that instant relief? Panthenol is your hero ingredient at play here at 5% to immediately soothe sore skin. Using this just twice a day is enough to speed up healing times and improve your skin barrier health. It might sound too good to be true but this clinically tested treatment has the dermatologist seal of approval!
how_to_use: Apply twice a day to cleansed and dry skin. Do not apply directly on wounded skin. Avoid the eye contour area.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Polybutene, Sodium Citrate, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Zinc Gluconate, Madecassoside, Dimethiconol, Manganese Gluconate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Copper Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Tocopherol.

name: Clé de Peau Beauté Concealer Stick 5g (Various Shades)
description: Want to put your dark circles and hyperpigmentation on DND? Banish away every imperfection and blemish with this radiance-in-a-stick and say hello to seamless-looking skin. Where make up meets skin care, this hybrid concealer stick is powered by an exclusive Light-Empowering Enhancer that not only delivers that ‘I’ve-had-eight-hours-of-sleep’ glow but amps up your base to a flawless status. Offering much appreciated protection against harmful UV rays, this creamy dream successfully corrects the appearance of dark, deep-set circles and blends with ease. No cakey finishes around here, we promise! Available in 13 luxurious shades for every skin tone, type and texture, it's safe to say that no blemish goes uncovered…
how_to_use: Extend the product 1cm, and apply directly to desired areas. Blend gently with fingertips or brush to reveal a flawless finish.

name: NYX Professional Makeup High Definition Finishing Powder (Various Shades)
description: Give your skin a little lift or add a perfect finishing touch to your make up with this lightweight finishing powder. Use it to counteract an oily complexion, brighten sallow skin or diffuse fine lines and other imperfections. Think of this as a real-life Instagram filter for problem skin. Choose Translucent to brighten and mattify,Banana for setting under-eye concealer and Mint Green to counterbalance a red complexion.
how_to_use: Using a kabuki brush, dip the brush in the powder and tap off the excess. Apply using circular motions all over the face, working from the centre outwards or else you can just focus on certain areas like the t-zone, under eyes or cheeks.
ingredient: Talc, Dimethicone, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Magnesium Stearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol. MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).

name: Urban Decay Brow Blade Pencil (Various Shades)
description: Introducing Brow Blade Doubled-Ended Ink Stain and Waterproof Pencil, a double-ended ink stain and waterproof pencil that gives you definition and precision in one easy-to-use product. Tired of thin, sparse brows? Brow Blade helps you achieve defined, beautiful arches. Available in seven versatile shades, this 2-in-1 product is all you need for covetable brow goals. Start with the waterproof pencil to shape, shade, and fill in sparse areas, then use the ink stain to create hair-like strokes and add dimension. It's the only temporary solution for enviable HD brows. Youre welcome.
how_to_use: For best use, apply Brow Blade to clean skin, then apply other make up.

name: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Bronzer 11g (Various Shades)
description: Beautifully illuminating, Hourglass has devised an irresistible new way to bronze: Ambient Lighting Bronzer. This ground-breaking hybrid fuses the universally flattering glow offered by the brands beloved Ambient Lighting Powder with buildable bronze pigments to provide a seamlessly sun-kissed, soft-focus finish. The handmade, magnificently marbled pans are formulated using an advanced miscelare technique (which means to mix in Italian) creating the perfect balance of bronze pigment and powder, enhanced with Photoluminescent Technology to maintain vibrancy, depth and dimension. Beautifully buildable, youre sure to be seduced by at least one of the four sumptuous shades: Ideal for fair, light complexions, Luminous Bronze Light is a medium tan shade fused with Luminous Light Ambient Lighting Powder, a champagne pearl illuminator for a soft, candlelit finish; for medium-deep complexions, Radiant Bronze Light is a warm bronze shade combined with Radiant Light, a golden beige glow-giving powder that mimics a summer glow; for light-medium skin tones, Diffused Bronze Light is a cool bronze merged with Diffused Light Ambient Lighting Powder, a soft, pale yellow powder, while Nude Bronze Light is a neutral bronze shade infused with Nude Light, a soft, translucent powder to mimic subtle warmth.
how_to_use: Gently swirl the entire compact to pick up the perfect balance of pigment and powder. Lightly apply all over face to achieve a sun-kissed look. Defining Use as a subtle contour along the temples, hollows of the cheeks and jawline.

name: Lanolips Lemonaid Lip Treatment 12.5g
description: Not a fan of grainy exfoliating lip scrubs? Give Lanolips Lemonaid Lip Treatment a try. Laced with organic lemon oil, this lip treatment gently sloughs away dead skin to reveal fresh, smooth and even skin, which is then richly moisturised. The formula is enriched with pure lanolin, which has a unique molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture anything else, leaving you with the plump, hydrated lips of your dreams. Free from fragrance, parabens, petrolatum, mineral oil, sulphates and PEG’s, this hardworking hero treatment is a guilt-free indulgence.
how_to_use: Apply to lips as needed and keep below 25c.
ingredient: Lanolin*, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Almond) Oil*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Flavour/Aroma (Natural)*, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire D'abeille*, Tocopherol (Vit E)*, Citrus Limon Peel Oil*, Citrus (Lime) Aurantifolia Oil*, Mica/Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Limonene^*, Citral^*, Linalool*. *Naturally Derived.

name: Hourglass 1.5mm Mechanical Gel Liner 0.6g (Various Shades)
description: Ultra-fine, soft and waterproof everything you want from a gel eyeliner (or any liner at all, really) is on offer from Hourglass 1.5mm Mechanical Gel Eye Liner. Offering ultimate precision and ease of application, the sleek, chic gel liner requires no pot, no brush and certainly no cleaning up, just a couple of clicks (to dispense enough of the mechanical gel pencil) and a single stroke will be enough to create dramatic definition that resists transfer and sticks around for as long as you want it to. Whether youre creating flawless feline flicks, subtle definition or finishing off a smoky eye, the moisturising formula glides on seamlessly and dries quickly and the spectrum of shades will suit every aesthetic: theres classic midnight black Obsidian, dark brown Canyon, navy blue Ocean Floor, slate grey Meteorite and beautiful Bronze.
how_to_use: Two clicks will dispense enough gel formula to line the eye. Only dispense product as needed - mechanical pencil does not retract. Replace cap after each usage to prevent drying. Remove with a waterproof makeup remover.

name: Cult Beauty Black Compact Mirror in Drawstring Bag
description: Super convenient and incredibly handy, the compact mirror from yours truly is what your make up bag has been *missing*. Available in black, this chic, convenient must have is debossed with the cult beauty logo and, once open, you have access to two mirrors – one normal and one with two times the magnification (ideal to make sure that liner is juuust right.) Not only that but this pint-sized (70mm btw!) reflector comes in a black drawstring bag too.
how_to_use: Open and enjoy the view.
ingredient: Mirror: PVC, glass, metal. Drawstring bag: 100% polyester.

name: Huda Beauty Legit Lashes Waterproof Topcoat
description: To be waterproof, or not to be waterproof? The preference has long sparked a heated debate, but the Legit Lashes Waterproof Topcoat puts the power in your hands. If you prefer a waterproof formula on some days and not others, this delicious topping gives you the autonomy to decide on a whim. Slather it atop lashes if you're planning on watching a particularly tear-jerking movie or sweating it out at the gym, and don't worry about it weighing down your preciously mascara-laden lashes — the innovative, jelly-like formula features a unique ‘Polymer Complex’ that gives lightweight, comfortable and flexible hold that won’t weigh down or distort your lashes. Making eyelashes waterproof, tear-proof, sweat-proof and smudge-proof (Huda herself uses the term ‘life-proof’), this jelly-like formula works by harnessing film formers and resins to coat each lash. The precise brush glides through lashes to coat each individual strand with ease, and the formula itself is even suitable for contact lens wearers.
how_to_use: Use the wand to coat each lash with ultimate waterproof protection.
ingredient: Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Silica Silylate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Brow Cheat
description: Whether your eyebrows are thin and sparse, thick and unruly or faded and lacking in shape, use Charlotte Tilburys refillable Brow Cheat to fake fuller-looking brows with ease. With a superfine nib that allows for perfectly defined, natural-looking micro strokes, you can mimic the look of real brow hairs to shape, feather and fill your arches. Formulated to stay all day (as in, for a huge sixteen hours), smudge-proof, humidity-proof, waterproof and sweat-resistant, this essential tool is even rich in emollients like carnauba wax to allow for smooth application, while vitamin E conditions. Available in various shades with varying undertones, choose between Light Blonde, Taupe, Soft Brown, Natural Brown, Medium Brown, Dark Brown, Black Brown and Natural Black to lift and enhance your brows no matter your skin tone or hair colour.
how_to_use: Brush hairs upwards to reveal brow shape. Use {Brow Lift} eyebrow pencil to fill your brows and brush through. Follow with Brow Cheat to add extra definition, using the precision pencil to mimic the look of natural brow hairs in sparse areas.

name: Chantecaille Sheer Glow Bronze Face Tint 30g
description: Designed to provide dress skin in lightweight, sheer coverage, Chantecaille's Anti-Ageing Face Tint brings make up and skin care together in the most bronzed-up, skin-benefitting way. Housed in simply gorgeous bronze packaging, the gel-crème formula inside boasts the same dreamy colour and is bursting with light-reflecting particles that add a touch of radiance to every complexion. Tamarind extract mimics hydrating hyaluronic acid; mondo grass extract helps to restore skin barrier function while matrixyl 3000: tetrapeptides tackles aging by firming up fine lines and wrinkles with repeated use. In one small powerful tub, enjoy long-lasting hydration, age-defying elements and a healthy dimension of warmth.
how_to_use: Smooth on with the Liquid Sculpt Brush. Begin on the high-points of the face- cheekbones, forehead and jawline, then buff into the skin. May be worn alone or over foundation for a sun-kissed glow. Blend a drop or two to warm and deepen foundation.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Methyl Gluceth-20, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Mica, Carbomer, Ophiopogon Japonicus Root Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Pelargonium Graveolens Stem Leaf Oil, Lysine, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Aluminum Hydroxide, Maltodextrin, Butylene Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Propylene Carbonate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Amodimethicone, Magnesium Chloride, Glucose, Sodium Lactate, Polysorbate 20, Tocopherol, Chlorphenesin.

name: IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Dark Spot Concealer 33g (Various Shades)
description: A make up-skin care hybrid, the Bye Bye Dark Spots Concealer unites a medium coverage formula with brightness-boosting ingredients to conceal dark spots, dark circles and just about anything else you feel like camouflaging. Infusing a supercharged trio of 2% niacinamide to even skin tone, hyaluronic acid to attract moisture and caffeine to brighten tired eyes, this 'skincealer' has been clinically tested to fade the appearance of dark spots and fine lines. Coming in a plethora of shades to suit every undertone, this hybrid hero even promises 24 hours of hydration. Using the doe-foot applicator and built-in kabuki brush, expect a flawless, natural skin finish.
how_to_use: To conceal dark spots: Choose a shade that best matches the skin around the dark spots that you're trying to conceal. To brighten the high points of your face or under the eyes: Select a shade one to two shades lighter. Apply this all-over concealer anywhere you feel your skin could use an extra boost of confidence. 1. Using the doe-foot applicator, tap directly onto the desired areas you want to conceal or brighten. 2. Take the built-in kabuki brush concealer brush and tap repeatedly (stipple) to blend effortlessly into the skin.

name: Natasha Denona Mini Retro Palette 4g
description: Obsessed with Natasha Denona's truly iconic eyeshadow palettes? Well, the beauty mogul has now introduced seven purse-friendly renditions of her fan favourite palettes in mini 5-pan forms. Available in the 'Star', ' Gold', 'Glam', 'Tropic', 'Nude', 'Retro' and 'Sunset' colourways, these succinct edits will help you achieve the same lust-worthy finish as the larger palettes at a fraction of the cost making them great as an introduction to the brand. Uniting a range of matte, metallic, sparkling and duo-chrome finishes in each palette, you can create a wide range of sumptuous finishes and looks that are bound to garner the attention they deserve, Simply use a brush or your fingertips to apply each shadow and prepare to fall in love with the rich pigment, seamless blend and longevity of each formula.
how_to_use: Matte eyeshadows: Apply with fluffy eyeshadow brushes to blend or detail brushes for precision. Metallic / Duo Chrome / Chroma Crystal eyeshadows: May be applied with different shapes of brushes for a subtle application. For high pay off / foiled finish, apply with a damp eyeshadow brush or with the tip of your finger.

name: VIEVE 119 Conceal and Prime Brush
description: Featuring ultra-plush synthetic bristles, this multi-tasking concealer tool allows you to achieve your desired coverage and create eye-catching looks. Doing all the work for you, use the flat side to buff in concealer seamlessly with its versatile shape that allows you to conceal under your eyes and around your nose for an airbrushed finish. You can even use it blend cream eyeshadows over your eyelids in one fell swoop. If you’re feeling experimental, try your hand at contouring. That’s not all: with the tapered edge you can sharpen and clean up eyeshadow looks. If it wasn’t clear enough already, this brush has been crafted to multi-task and outperform the rest.
how_to_use: Use the flat side to buff concealer under the eyes or blend over the eyelids for a seamless eye look in seconds. How to wash your brushes: Using a gentle soap, swirl each brush into the palm of your hand, rinsing downwards under lukewarm water until the water runs clear. Once clean, gently squeeze out and rest your brushes on a table with the bristle end hanging over the edge to air dry. VIEVE recommends washing your makeup brushes once a week.
ingredient: 100% vegan, synthetic bristles.

name: Sweed Lashes Adhesive for Strip Lashes - Clear/White
description: Perfect for applying your favourite false lashes with ease, Sweed Lashes Adhesive for Strip Lashes applies white and dries clear for a seamless finish. A must-have for long-lasting, all-day hold, Sweed Lashes' Adhesive for Strip Lashes takes the fuss out of false lash application. What’s more, the lash glue dries to a clear line so even if you need to peel off your lashes it won’t affect your eyeshadow artistry. Teamed with the brand's ultra-flexible false lashes, this duo makes for a natural, undetectable finish that you'll love!
how_to_use: Use to apply Sweed Lashes as well as any other favourite false lash brand.
ingredient: Rubber Latex, Acrylate Copolymer, Aqua, HPC (Hydroxypropylcellulose), Perfume

name: SUQQU Eyelash Curler
description: Not your average lash-curling contraption, the SUQQU Eyelash Curler comfortably fits the eye contour, grabbing each lash – from the smallest little getaways to the longest of members – for an effortlessly unrivalled, fluttery fan. With no nasty snags, nips or pulls in sight, use these curlers to actually curl with confidence, without a tell-tale crimp or crease. As the uniquely-curved body and flat panel securely blankets your lid, each lash is supported from the very root, lifting hairs upwards for maximum curl and comfort. If stunning, lifted lashes are your cup of tea, you need this eye-enhancing tool in your grooming kit, stat!
how_to_use: With the eye open, gently apply the panel to the upper lid. Fit the bottom end of the panel with just above the lash line, which naturally lifts the lashes for easy clamping. Gently squeeze to curl the roots and repeat gradually moving towards the tips of the lashes.

name: Cult Beauty Pouch
description: Looking for a new make up bag? Enter Cult Beauty's sleek and simple design: ready to store your favourite glow-giving highlighters, lash-lengthening mascaras, pout-perfecting lipsticks and so much more. As chic as it gets, consider this classic neoprene-effect bag as the little black dress of make up bags. Designed to house your favourite products in style, it'll also notch up your fashion kudos, too. Take it to the gym or the office, keep it pride of place on your dressing table – or slip it into your hand luggage for in-flight touch-ups.
how_to_use: Sponge clean only.
ingredient: Bag Dimensions: approx. 20cm x 15cm x 10.5cm. Outer: 100% Polyester (excluding trims). Lining: 100% Polyester.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Studio Finishing Powder - Translucent Finish
description: Made from 100% pure mineral silica, this is a gorgeous finishing powder that keeps skin matte and your make up looking fresh all day. It also blurs imperfections and leaves zero chalky residue, (providing you don’t go overboard - a little of this goes a long way). It’s hardworking, reliable and affordable – everything we love about this line.
how_to_use: To minimise shine and set make up for the day, dust lightly with a powder puff or fluffy brush, concentrating on the oily, t-zone area.
ingredient: !00% pure mineral silica powder

name: VIEVE Modern Radiance Cream Bronzer 33g (Various Shades)
description: With four beautiful shades to choose from, this melt-into-skin bronzer achieves the most natural, radiant finish - that you can dial up or down depending on your desired look. Infused with squalane and avocado oil, the Modern Radiance Cream Bronzer is the perfect marriage of make up and skin care. It's designed to nourish and smooth your complexion, while guarding it from damage thanks to a dose of antioxidant-rich vitamin E. Choose from light to a deep tan shade, and get ready for everyone to ask if you're fresh back from holiday - don't worry, your sunkissed secret is safe with us.
how_to_use: Use a small amount and build as desired. Apply with a brush to where you would naturally catch the sun, blending into the cheekbones, temples and jawline.
ingredient: Octyldodecanol, C15-19 Alkane, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Tribehenin, Silica, Mica, Synthetic Wax, Jojoba Esters, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Beta-sitosterol, Squalene, Decylene Glycol, 1,2-hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance). May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090)].

name: Charlotte Tilbury Collagen Lip Bath
description: Bathing lips in moisture, Charlotte Tilburys Collagen Lip Bath makes your lips look at their very best. Inspired by the lip-plumping filters you may have tried on social media apps, this clever formula is infused with firming marine collagen to plump up your lips, define their contours, minimise fine lines and create the fullest appearance possible. The luscious, glossy liquid is also enriched with hydrating sprout extract, conditioning coconut oil and refreshing peppermint extract to create a cool, fresh sensation. Pearlescent pigments add a light-reflecting sheen to make lips look even fuller, wider and more fabulous. Choose between four hues - iconic rose 'Pillow Talk', pale pink 'Refresh Rose', cool peach 'Peachy Plump', berry rose 'Walk of No Shame' and dusty pink 'Rosy Glow' - then sweep it on with the adorable heart-shaped doe-foot applicator and prepare to love your lips like never before
how_to_use: Sweep on the luscious formula using the adorable heart-shaped doe-foot applicator.

name: ICONIC London Ultimate Brush Set
description: Starring 12 of the most striking, dramatic brushes we’ve laid eyes on, ICONIC London’s Ultimate Brush Set contains everything you need to make the most of all your make up. With luxe pearl-gold, high-shine ‘stiletto’ handles and soft, 100% vegan brush heads, there’s a brush for your every application need in this covetable kit. There’s a Large Powder brush for loose or pressed powder, a Tapered Powder brush for loose or pressed bronzer, a Foundation Buffer for buffing and blending, a Contour Buffer for sculpting, an Angled Powder brush for bronzer and blusher, a Concealer blender to camouflage imperfections, a Flat Fan Brush for highlighting and removing fall out, a Large Shader for evenly applying shadows, a Medium Angled Shader for brows and crease blending, a Tapered Blending Brush for blending colour, a Small Angle Brush for applying liner and – last but not least – a Small Point Brush for applying liner and filling and defining brows.
how_to_use: 1: Large Powder: Perfect for loose or pressed powder 2: Tapered Powder: Perfect for loose or pressed bronzer 3: Foundation Buffer: Ideal for buffing and blending foundation 4: Contour Buffer: Perfect for sculpting - use to apply, buff and blend your contour 5: Angled Powder: Use to apply bronzer and blusher to sculpt cheeks 6: Concealer blender: Ideal to apply and blend concealer with to cover imperfections 7: Flat Fan Brush: This super lightweight brush is perfect for dusting and great for removing powder excess 8: Large Shader: Use to evenly cover the whole eyelid and apply shadows 9: Medium Angled Shader: Gives a soft application of colour. Great to use on brows or to blend the crease 10: Tapered Blending Brush: Perfect to apply colour, use through the crease for a beautifully blended finish 11: Small Angle Brush: Ideal for applying eyeliner with precision or to perfectly shape, fill and define brows 12: Small Point Brush: Use to make perfect, smooth lines ideal to use with gel or liquid liners Clean brushes frequently to keep them in tip-top condition.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Beautiful Skin Bronzing Brush
description: Designed for effortless application and blending, Charlotte Tilbury's expert brush pairs perfectly with the Beautiful Skin Sun-Kissed Glow Cream Bronzer. With densely packed bristles that pick up the perfect amount of product and silky-smooth fibres that effortlessly fan over your face and body, achieving a sun-kissed, beachy bronzed glow will have never seemed so easy. 100% cruelty-free, the brush is skilfully hand-made with synthetic fibres that glide softly over skin and a short, ergonomic handle that makes on-the-go application a walk in the park.
how_to_use: BUFF- After applying your beautiful base of Charlotte's Beautiful Skin Foundation, lightly buff Beautiful Skin Sun-Kissed Glow Bronzer onto the skin in circular motions using the Beautiful Skin Bronzing Brush - focusing on areas where the sun naturally hits, such as cheekbones, forehead, nose, and jawline. Blend the dream-like cream formula using light brush strokes to diffuse the bronzer for a second-skin-like glow! BLEND- Blend, blend, blend the cream texture to melt into the skin using the carefully crafted Beautiful Skin Bronzing Brush for an even-looking, sun-kissed second-skin glow! To dial up the glow, build up in layers until you unlock your desired sun-kissed finish! BRONZE- For an all-over sun-kissed skin contour, continue to lightly buff and blend Beautiful Skin Sun-Kissed Glow Bronzer over shoulders, collarbone and limbs - to infuse the look of sun-kissed summer into the skin, for that just-back-from-the-beach glow all year round!
ingredient: Synthetic Fibres.

name: Hello Sunday SPF50 The Illuminating One Glow Primer 50ml
description: Want broad spectrum SPF, skin care-worthy ingredients and a glowy (not greasy) finish? We bet you dew. Here to streamline your AM sun care routine, Hello Sunday The Illuminating One Glow Primer SPF50 leaves skin protected, hydrated and dewy - all in one cushion-y formula that helps make up glide on and stay put. Smoothing the way for foundation and concealer, the pillow-soft texture is infused with subtly shimmering mica - making it an ideal glow-booster on make up-free days, too. Vitamin C and hyaluronic acid brighten and plump for radiance that lasts beyond your evening cleanse. And, typical of the Hello Sunday range, this three-in-one formula offers high-factor, broad spectrum sun protection to shield skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays.
how_to_use: Shake before use. Smooth over the face and neck after your skin care routine but before make up.
ingredient: Aqua, Octocrylene, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Isododecane, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Bis-ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Polyester-7, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethicone, Mica, 1,2-hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol, Acrylates/c10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carnosine, Dimethicone/bis-isobutyl Ppg-20 Crosspolymer, Xanthan Gum, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Ci 77891, Ci 77491 [pi02022.1]

name: Sweed Lashes Lash Lift Mascara (Various Shades)
description: Freshly launched and promising to overhaul your natural lash game, the Lash Lift Mascara by Sweed Lashes boasts an all-new, innovative wand that bears resemblance to a wide tooth comb – giving it an unusual aesthetic and a level of efficiency that'll simply blow your mind. Extremely easy to glide over lashes, the formula lifts, separates and elongates with next to no effort. The targeted skinny brush coats each lash from the very root for a tightline eyeliner effect with intense lengthening of each lash. The masters of false lashes, this is Sweed Lashes' first foray into mascara, and it does not disappoint – expect maximised, show-stopping lashes.
how_to_use: Place the mascara brush at the base (root) of your lashes and comb all the way through to the ends for a long, fluttery look. Sweed Lash Lift works for those who have sparse lashes or have had a salon lash lift, and is excellent for use with false lashes.
ingredient: Aqua, CI 77499, Oryza Sativa Cera, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Stearyl Esters, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Copernica Cerifa Cera, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Acacia Senegal Gum, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Candelilla Cera, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Polyvinyl Alcohol, VP/VA Copolymer, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate.

name: Huda Beauty Matte Obsessions Eyeshadow Palette - Cool
description: Busting the myth that mattes are just transition shades, Huda Beauty’s Matte Obsessions Eyeshadow Palette – Cool has everything you need to go au-natural or get experimental with your look. Brimming with dreamy pinks, frost-toned browns and icy mauves, this is sure to satisfy your make up cravings. Whether you want to create a minimalist, monochromatic eye, or revisit the eye-conic looks famed by the ‘90s supermodel, this multi-functional palette will indulge your every shimmer-free whim. Seven buttery powder mattes and two ultra-smooth cream-to-powder mattes range from stand-out bold shades to natural tones that will see you through your day-to-day. Free from potentially irritating fragrances and drying alcohols, it’s time to go back to matte, we’ll take our shadows on the rocks bartender…
how_to_use: Create and prep the perfect canvas with our #FAUXFILTER Concealer 2. Build your base with the cream-to-powder shadows. Use your fingers for the perfect blended base 3. Pick up the powder mattes using a dense flat brush for fully-pigmented color pay off, or use a fluffy brush for a blended out smoky look.
ingredient: Muted Pink (1): Talc, Mica, Silica, Magnesium Myristate, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin. name: benefit Porefessional Super Setter Setting Spray Mini 30ml
description: Lock your make up in place as you blur the appearance of pores with Porefessional Setting Spray – a featherweight (non-spitty!) spritz that applies and sets swiftly without compromising your handiwork. Keeping your make up immaculate for up to 16 hours, the microfine water-based formula features light-scattering powders to lend a ‘soft focus’ effect, while the spray visibly cuts shine while helping to boost moisture levels so skin appears beautifully ‘mewy’ and plump. Alcohol-free (so non-drying), the mess-free applicator dispenses an even cloud with no large droplets, to render your make up waterproof, smudge-proof and fine lines and pores far less visible.
how_to_use: After priming and applying make up, shake well and hold 8” from face. Mist evenly all over. Mist in the morning to lock on make up, then reapply during the day for a refreshing boost! Warning: Keep out of eyes. Close eyes before misting.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Butylene Glycol, Pvp, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ppg-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Ppg-26-Buteth-26, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Silica, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Sodium Hydroxide, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol.

name: Huda Beauty Face Bake & Blend Dual-Ended Setting Complexion Brush
description: A baker is only as good as their tools – and Huda Beauty’s Face Bake & Blend Dual-Ended Setting Complexion Brush is the crème de la crème of make up applicators. Brilliant for baking (especially with Huda’s beautiful {Easy Bake Loose Powder}) this brush is just as good as dusting on any of your favourite formulas – we’re talking powder foundation, blush, bronzer and finishing powders. Crafted from densely packed synthetic bristles, the brush ensures maximum product pick-up – the slanted end gently presses powder into the skin and is ideally shaped to reach into every contour of your face, while the soft, fluffy end is designed to sweep away excess powder. Making the art of baking effortless, this foolproof brush is super-easy to use – use the dense slanted end to pick up a generous amount of loose powder and ‘bake’ under the eyes, T-zone, outer corners of mouth and chin area, let this set for 3-5 minutes, then use the fluffy end to gently dust away the excess.
how_to_use: Use the dense end of the brush to pick up a generous amount of loose powder to bake under the eyes, T-zone, outer corners of the mouth, and chin area. Let the powder bake for 3-5 minutes and gently dust away the excess powder with fluffy end of the brush. Pick up loose or pressed powder and dust lightly all over your face to set any liquid formulas applied.
ingredient: Synthetic hair

name: Natasha Denona Mini Xenon Eyeshadow Palette
description: The key to recreating Natasha Denona's signature smoky eye, this Mini Xenon Eyeshadow Palette spans creamy mattes and a highly foiled metallic that are perfect for achieving defined looks with a dash of drama. The first and only mini palette to include the supremely rich and velvety 'Blackest Black' shade, this is a handbag essential... Taking its name from the chemical element, xenon, it's no surprise that our chemistry is off the charts with this smouldering shadow selection. From platinum silver to charcoal and the true black shades, it has everything you need to create the make up artist's signature, smoky cat eye. Made with the highest quality pure colour pigments, dazzling chroma crystals and luminous mineral pearls, these buttery soft pans promise comfortable coverage that lasts and lasts. Think: maximum colour payoff, minimal effort.
how_to_use: Mattes: apply with fluffy eyeshadow brushes to blend or detail brushes for precision. Metallics: Apply with different shapes of brushes for a subtle application. For high payoff/foiled finish, apply with a damp eyeshadow brush or with tip of finger.
ingredient: Blackest Black Matte: Isododecane, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, C20-24 Olefin, Ci 77499 ( Iron Oxides). name: benefit Crystah Strawberry Pink Blush Powder Mini 2.5g
description: Delivering light-reflecting radiance, benefit’s Wanderful World Blush in ‘Crystah’ offers a flush of soft-focus, strawberry-pink colour. The powder blusher applies with an ultra-fine, silky-soft texture, sweeping across the apples of the cheeks to create a soft-shimmer hue. The formula offers a smudge-proof finish, enhanced with freshwater pearl and synthetic sapphire for a lustrous glow. Scented with a citrus-floral fragrance, the blush offers an airbrushed effect when applied to bare skin or over makeup.
how_to_use: Swirl brush in blush and sweep onto cheeks. Blend and build as desired on bare face or over makeup. Pairs perfectly with Benefit’s Multitasking Cheek Brush (sold separately).
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Zinc Stearate, Lauryl Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Alumina, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dehydroacetic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pearl Powder, Stearic Acid, Tin Oxide, Laureth-4, Aqua (Water), Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7 Lake), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake)].

name: VIEVE Sunset Blush (Various Shades)
description: Mimicking the effect of summer light, the exclusive, creamy-textured Sunset Blush from VIEVE comes in five flattering shades to warm your complexion with rays of soft matte colour. The second drop of Jamie Genevieve's curated collection of high-performing make up staples, these supremely chic compacts are the key to enlivening your base with healthy-looking colour. The beautifully creamy blush can be effortlessly built up from a delicate flush to a lifting block of colour; it's made with finely milled pigments that cast a soft-satin finish and it comes in natural shades that meld with your rather, rather than sitting on top of it. Inspired by sun-soaked evenings and Jamie's love of Italy, these are the hues to choose from: 'Pesca' (a toasted orange); 'Cherub' (a delicate rose); 'Sorbet' (a warm, fuzzy peach); 'Piazza' (a molten bronze); 'Malbec' (a rich burgundy).
how_to_use: Jamie says: I love to apply my blush above where I bronze, keeping it nice and high on the face to give a lifting effect. Otherwise, you can go all out, buffing into the temples to create a blown-out eye look with a true 80s vibe.

name: benefit They're Real Tinted Lash Primer
description: Your partner in prime, Benefit’s They’re Real! Lengthening Primer is a one-way ticket to beyond belief lashes. The mink brown gel lengthens and separates each and every eyelash, giving a gorgeously feathered, natural-looking effect when worn alone and dramatically boosting length when worn under mascara. Enriched with conditioning provitamin B5, the high-performing formula nourishes lashes and is soft enough to layer with mascara – in fact, 91% of a consumer panel said it remained soft enough to act as a base for mascara six hours after applying. Ideal layered with your favourite lash-enhancing mascara (and particularly perfect paired with Benefit’s They’re Real! Mascara), the specially designed brush curls, volumises, lifts and separates eyelashes, revealing hairs you never even knew were there.
how_to_use: Wiggle the wand at the base of lashes, then sweep upwards from root to tip. Layer your favourite mascara on top for a gorgeous finish.

name: Natasha Denona Mini Glam Palette 4g
description: Obsessed with Natasha Denona's truly iconic eyeshadow palettes? Well, the beauty mogul has now introduced seven purse-friendly renditions of her fan favourite palettes in mini 5-pan forms. Available in the 'Star', ' Gold', 'Glam', 'Tropic', 'Nude', 'Retro' and 'Sunset' colourways, these succinct edits will help you achieve the same lust-worthy finish as the larger palettes at a fraction of the cost making them great as an introduction to the brand. Uniting a range of matte, metallic, sparkling and duo-chrome finishes in each palette, you can create a wide range of sumptuous finishes and looks that are bound to garner the attention they deserve, Simply use a brush or your fingertips to apply each shadow and prepare to fall in love with the rich pigment, seamless blend and longevity of each formula.
how_to_use: Matte eyeshadows: Apply with fluffy eyeshadow brushes to blend or detail brushes for precision. Metallic / Duo Chrome / Chroma Crystal eyeshadows: May be applied with different shapes of brushes for a subtle application. For high pay off / foiled finish, apply with a damp eyeshadow brush or with the tip of your finger.

name: NARS Cosmetics Pure Radiant Tinted Moisturiser SPF30/PA+++ (Various Shades)
description: Ask any beauty buff to name their most coveted complexion products and, chances are, NARS will be high up on the list especially when it comes to Pure Radiant Tinted Moisturizer SPF 30/PA+++. Now with new shades to choose from, the advanced, oil-free formula provides a translucent veil of colour and gives a radiant, luminous finish in a spectrum of 16 versatile shades. Offering advanced sun protection, it shields your skin from the suns harmful rays, while also reducing the appearance of hyperpigmentation and dark spots in as little as four weeks. Infused with lush, naturally derived botanicals, it helps skin to feel hydrated and encourages a bright, natural-looking glow; kopara from French Polynesia and mineral-rich sea water revive and remineralise skin for a softer, smoother finish. Its dermatologically tested, non-comodogenic and synthetic fragrance-free perfect!
how_to_use: For subtle coverage, use the tinted moisturizer in place of foundation. Blend it along cheekbones, then swipe a bit down the nose and along the top of the forehead. This will even tone while keeping things light and sheer. For an extra glow, blend a pea-size amount with equal amount of Copacabana Illuminator and smooth over entire face.

name: Huda Beauty Tantour
description: Doubling as a contour and bronzer, Tantour is a gorgeous cream-to-powder formula that grants instant warmth to lacklustre complexions. Packed with pigment and blending like a dream, it can be layered to create anything from a subtle glow to dramatic definition hello, cheekbones! Given Hudas history producing stand-out products with insane payoff, it comes as little surprise that this is no run-of-the-mill bronzer-meets-contour. Sweat and water-resistant, its incredibly long-lasting perfect for warmer climes, busy bees and no-fuss make up buffs who dont want to traipse to the bathroom for a touch up every other hour. There are five shades to choose between: Fair is a neutral honey shade best for fair to light complexions; Light is ideal for light to medium complexions; Medium a neutral mocha shade, best suited to medium to tan complexions; Tan is a deep cocoa shade for deeper complexions and Rich is a deep mahogany shade for very deep complexions.
how_to_use: To Contour: 1.Using a small dense brush to grab a small amount of product, apply in large 3 shape along the contours of the face: hairline, under cheekbones, along jaw line. 2.Blend out any harsh lines with a fluffy brush or beauty sponge. To Bronze: 1. Using a brush to pick up a small amount of product, smooth and blend on the face: cheek bones, forehead, and jawline. 2. Build to desired intensity. Blend well for an all-over healthy glow. Hudas Tip: DotTantourin the desired areas. Using a fluffy brush, work from a contour to a healthy bronzed glow by blending it out in a circular upwards motion. Using the same brush used to apply foundation, use excess formula to blend out any harsh lines. Set the look with your favourite powder!
ingredient: Fair: Dimethicone, Dipentaerythrityl Pentaisononanoate, Silica, Polyethylene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polysilicone-11, Trimethylsiloxysilicate. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499). May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499). Tan: Dimethicone, Dipentaerythrityl Pentaisononanoate, Silica, Polyethylene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polysilicone-11, Trimethylsiloxysilicate. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499). name: NARS Soft Matte Powder 9g (Various Shades)
description: Ace your base with the Soft Matte Powder, an oil-controlling handbag essential that helps maintain beautifully balanced skin and wards off excess sebum for hours on end. Sibling to the legendary foundation and concealer, this blendable powder instantly mattifies your skin thanks to Adaptive Oil-Control Technology and an Anti-Oxidation Complex that ensures your base remains as you left it — true-toned and matte. Supercharged with skin-smoothing niacinamide, this pore-refining formula promotes a soft, natural-looking finish that’s both photobooth-ready and in no need of a filter!
how_to_use: For a natural-looking, soft-matte finish, use a powder brush to dust powder all over. Wear alone or over foundation to set makeup for up to 24 hours. For targeted, buildable coverage, use the tapered brush to press and blend powder on areas where more coverage is desired.
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Mica, Zinc Oxide, Silica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Zinc Myristate, Dimethicone, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Tocopheryl Acetate, Quercetin, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Polysilicone-2, Aluminum Hydroxide, Boron Nitride, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Calcium Silicate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Glucose, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Succinate, Niacinamide, Lauroyl Lysine, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain +/-: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide.

name: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Blush - Travel Size
description: For a flawless flush that will never fall flat, Hourglass has devised an irresistible new way to blush: Ambient Lighting Blush. This ground-breaking hybrid fuses the universally flattering radiance of the brands beloved Ambient Lighting Powder with vivid, uplifting colour to provide a seamless, soft-focus finish. The handmade, magnificently marbled pans are formulated using an advanced miscelare technique (which means to mix in Italian) creating the perfect balance of pigment and powder, enhanced with Photoluminescent Technology to maintain vibrancy, depth and dimension. Beautifully buildable, youre sure to be seduced by at least one of the seven sumptuous shades: theres Diffused Heat, a vibrant poppy combined with Diffused Light Ambient Lighting Powder; Luminous Flush, a champagne rose blush combined with Luminous Light to evoke a candlelit glimmer; Mood Exposure, a soft plum blush fused with Mood Light to brighten the complexion; and Radiant Magenta, a golden fuchsia blush combined with Radiant Light for a summery glow.
how_to_use: Swirl the entire compact with your brush to pick up the perfect balance of pigment and powder.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Mini Soft Glam Palette 6.4g
description: This all-new, limited edition Mini Soft Glam palette unites eight supersized pans of high-performance shadows for professional grade artistry with maximum colour payoff. Bringing together a crucial collection of warm and cool nude tones just in time for Autumn, adorn your eyes with the most gorgeous of buttery textures in hardworking pigments that are ideal for both day and night sophistication. From the pop of dusty lilac in matte ‘Dusty Rose’ to the metallic pink champagne of 'Dreamer' and satiny chocolate brown of ‘Sultry’, this Mini Soft Glam palette will take your artistry skills to brand new heights. A smorgasbord of rich brown, smooth terracotta and the must-have full-lid washes of velvety beige and pastel peach hues, you won't regret adding this to your signature collection of shadows to your make up treasure trove.
how_to_use: Use a light hand when picking up product—because the formula is full pigment, a little bit goes a long way. To apply eyeshadow, use a flat brush to deposit color, highlight, or pack eyeshadow onto the lid. Use a fluffy ended brush to diffuse and blend out shadow. For a more intense color payoff, pair metallic shades with Dewy Set Setting Spray. Use the light matte and metallic eyeshadows as highlight shades. Use the warm matte neutral eyeshadows for contouring the crease, and the deep, smoky hues to define.
ingredient: Tempera: Dimethicone, Boron Nitride, Nylon-12, Zinc Stearate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Zinc Myristate, Glycerin, Silica, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane name: Too Faced Makeup Insurance Setting Spray 118ml
description: A contract worth signing… the Makeup Insurance Setting Spray locks your look in place for up to 18 hours so your mattes stay matte and your dews won't become don'ts. Boasting a refreshing blend of antioxidants, green tea and algae extract, this skin-loving formula instantly sets your make up all throughout the day (and night). One spritz is all you need to defend your skin against harmful blue light damage and deliver a surge of optimal hydration. Totally alcohol and silicone-free, this cake-preventing formula has your name on it!
how_to_use: Shake well. Hold product 6-8 inches from face and close eyes & mouth before spraying directly onto skin. Avoid spraying in eyes.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Amp-Acrylates/Allyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Saccharomyces Ferment, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Sorbitol, Caprylyl Glycol, Caffeine, Trehalose, Sodium Polyaspartate, Lauroyl Lysine, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Tocopherol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PVP, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citric Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, BHT, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol

name: Spectrum Collections KJH Number 11 Brush
description: If blending eye creams and powder shadows hasn’t been your make up forte, it soon will be thanks to Katie Jane Hughes. The celebrity MUA has designed this pro-level brush to create red-carpet worthy looks, anytime and anywhere. The KJH Number 11 Brush features premium quality (and luxuriously soft) bristles made of synthetic fibres for seamless blending and perfect eyeshadow application. If you’re working with creams and powders for a subtle look, use the tips of the bristles to apply the product — otherwise use the belly of the brush to create a stronger wash of colour. The design of this must-have is a joy to look at too: it has a pale gold-hued copper ferrule, which sits atop a glossy olive-toned handle made from FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) sustainable wood. Think: chic and effective.
how_to_use: Use to elevate your routine and make your beauty products work even harder.
ingredient: 100% synthetic taklon bristles. Pale gold copper material ferrules. Glossy Olive green FSC wood handles.

name: Clé de Peau Beauté The Sponge
description: Talented in the realms of application, blending and perfecting, The Sponge boasts four precision-cut surfaces that help you to achieve a flawless, professional-effect finish across your entire face. This ultra-versatile tool is custom-created for use with fluid and cream-based foundation, concealer, contour and blush. Made in collaboration with Clé de Peau Beauté's make up artists, it has a luxuriously soft, cloud-like texture that makes it a joy to use, as well as an innovative design: the curved side is crafted to fit facial contours to ensure even application to your full face; the small flat side works precisely to diffuse blush and contour; the tip is perfect for intricate areas such as the side of your nose or beneath your eyes; finally, the bottom surface is suited to blending all formulas with a light dabbing motion. You can use dry for a medium, natural coverage or dampen for a light and dewy look.
how_to_use: The curved side fits facial contours and delivers a smooth and even application over the entire face. The small flat side works precisely on targeted areas when applying blush and contouring. The tip is ideal for intricate areas, such as the sides of the nose and beneath the eyes. The bottom surface allows all formulas to be blended with a light dabbing motion. For wet application, moisten sponge with water and gently squeeze out excess. After use, allow to dry thoroughly.

name: Pat McGrath Labs Skin Fetish Divine Bronzer 4.8g (Various Shades)
description: If you're hoping to mimic a day in the sun sans the UV exposure, look no further than the velvety Skin Fetish: Divine Bronzer courtesy of British trailblazer Pat McGrath Labs. Described by the eponymous founder as an “the ultimate in sun-sculpting technology for your very own goddess-worthy glow,” this illuminating, lightweight powder is infused with refined golden pearls to balance red, golden and neutral tones while adding dimensional warmth to all complexions. Leaving the skin looking naturally sun-kissed and radiant, it comes in shades ranging from light to deep (with either pearlescent or demi-matte finishes), which are easily blendable for customisable warmth, luminosity, and definition. The result? A naturally radiant glow.
how_to_use: Use the brush in sweeping and circular motions to buff and diffuse the powder. Pinch fibres at the base for precision application and sculpting.
ingredient: Talc, Zea Mays Starch, Nylon-12, Dimethicone, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Zinc Stearate, Isopropyl Isostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol. (+/-): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140).

name: Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Dreams Luxury Palette
description: Whether you're a die-hard eye make up aficionado, or only just beginning to experiment with eye enhancement, Charlotte Tilbury's Pillow Talk Dreams Luxury Palette is the ultimate must-have indulgence, especially if you're already a fan of the brand's cult favourite lipstick in the ultra-flattering nude shade, 'Pillow Talk'. A dream come true for fans of the heavenly hue, this palette stars four beautifully buttery, complementary shades of eyeshadow, designed to be used individually or together to create an array of arresting effects. From daytime understatement to an eye-catching heatwave look, the only limit is your own imagination. The shades in each palette are categorised as 'Prime', 'Enhance', 'Smoke', the upgraded, luminous 'Super Pop', and should be applied in that order to take you seamlessly from 'desk to dusk to disco!'.
how_to_use: 1. For a daytime look, start by applying the ‘Prime’ shade to the entire eyelid using the Blender Brush. You can also apply the ‘Prime’ shade to the inner corners of your eyes to help brighten your eyes. 2. Wash the ‘Enhance’ shade over your eyelids and into the crease of your eye using the Blender Brush. Apply this shade along the upper and lower lashline and finish with Legendary Lashes Mascara for a perfect daytime look. 3. For an evening look, repeat the first steps, then using the Eye Smudger Brush, blend the ‘Smoke’ shade from the outer corner of the eye, upwards into the crease. Blend into the crease and apply across the upper and lower lashline. 4. After steps 1, 2 and 3, amp it up for a party look by applying the ‘Super Pop’ shade to the centre of your eyelid with your ring finger, for a glamorous finish. Charlotte’s Tip: Use this eyeshadow palette with the rest of the Pillow Talk complexion for a complete, mesmerising makeup look.
ingredient: Talc, Mica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Silica, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Hydroxystearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Polyethylene, Isononyl Isononanoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tin Oxide, Caprylyl Methicone, Tetrasodium Edta, Zeolite, Dimethiconol, Sorbic Acid, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Butylparaben, Bht, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, [May Contain: Ultramarines Ci 77007, Carmine Ci 75470, Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide Ci 77510, Ferric Ferrocyanide Ci 77510, Blue 1 Lake Ci 42090, Titanium Dioxide Ci 77891, Manganese Violet Ci 77742, Iron Oxides Ci 77492, Iron Oxides Ci 77499, Iron Oxides Ci 77491]. Shade: ‘Super Pop’ Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyethylene, Phenoxyethanol, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Diamond Powder, Tin Oxide, [+/-Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77499)].

name: Shiseido Rubber Refill for Eyelash Curler
description: Eyelash curlers don’t come much more legendary than Shiseido’s – a cult classic for a reason. Delivering glamorous, traffic-stopping curl, the ingenious tool will take your lashes from flat to formidably fluttery, enhancing and lifting without any giveaway ‘bend’ or discomfort. The broad curve curls lashes from the outer corner to the inner corner of your eye, with silicone pads that curl from base to tip, reaching even the smallest lashes without pinching. Perfect for keeping your curler in tip-top condition, Shiseido’s Eyelash Curler Pad contains two silicone replacement pads that slot into your tool effortlessly.
how_to_use: Use to replace the pads in your Shiseido {Eyelash Curler}

name: Charlotte Tilbury K.I.S.S.I.N.G
description: In a spectrum of suits-all hues, painstakingly developed by Charlotte and her team to complement every skin tone, K.I.S.S.I.N.G lipstick applies seamlessly - cloaking lips with long-wear, non-drying 'flexible' colour that keeps skin soft, supple and smoochably soft. Traditionally used by indigenous Americans, the key ingredient - achiote, or 'lipstick tree' extract - is powerfully protective; shielding against damaging free radical attack, while deflecting the skin-ageing effects of UV rays to keep lips plump, nourished and protected. Uniting all the benefits of balm with the best, beautifying benefits of lipstick, K.I.S.S.I.N.G is any lipstick-lovers dream - high-impact, low-maintenance and irresistibly gorgeous (just look at that rose gold casing)! Pick from an array of gorgeous shades, including 'Coral Kiss' (formerly known as 'Coachella Coral'), 'Yes Honey' (formerly known as 'Hepburn Honey') and 'So Red' (formerly known as 'So Marilyn').
how_to_use: Apply K.I.S.S.I.N.G straight from the bullet for a quick, easy lipstick slick, or for more precision apply using a lip brush.

name: benefit Precisely, My Brow Pencil Mini (Various Shades)
description: Designed to shape, fill and plump out sparse or unshapely brows, Benefits Precisely, My Brow Pencil avoids the coloured in look thanks to its ultra-fine tip. Armed with rich yet blendable colour and a twist-up, non-sharpen tip, youll be able to mimic even the finest hairs and, thanks to the waterproof formula, your handiwork will last for up to 12 budge-proof hours. You can fake natural-looking brows in an instant with the spectrum of 12 believable shades from fairest blonde to deep brunette by way of auburn, grey and blackest black - so youll be sure to find a colour that matches and flatters your natural assets. Your face-framing arches will look flawless even if they were scribbled on during your morning commute.
how_to_use: Start at the base of the brow and use tiny hair-like flickslight, short, upward strokesto draw in the direction of your natural hair growth.
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Stearic Acid, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Synthetic Japan Wax, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tocopherol. [+/-: CI 19140 (Yellow 5, Yellow 5 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), CI 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), CI 77289 (Chromium Hydroxide Green), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide, Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)].

name: Pat McGrath Labs Perma Precision Liquid Eyeliner - Xtreme Black 1ml
description: Granting a smudge-proof, waterproof coverage and ultra-longlasting 12-hour wear, this inky black liquid liner is the ultimate formulation to create everything from sultry cat eye flicks to modernistic graphic lines and smokey-eye intensity right at the lash. With just a quick lick of this jet back liner you’re sure to achieve all your eyeliner goals. Crafted with a super-thin and flexible tip to bring you total control over your flick, this ophthalmologist-tested formula quickly dries down to a velvet matte black finish. No matter if you’re a liner newbie or make up pro, you’ll create a perfect line every time without a hint of bleeding, smudging or skipping thanks to its ultra-smooth glide. If you’ve been trawling the beautysphere for your haute-couture liner, Pat McGrath’s versatile creation will see you through from dawn-till-dusk…
how_to_use: Classic Definition Starting at the inner corner, glide the tip of the Eyeliner across the upper lashline, keeping close to the base of the lashes. Gradually widen the line as you reach the outer corner, ending in a subtle V shape. Tightlining To create the illusion of darker, fuller lashes, glide the tip of the Eyeliner just above the upper waterline. Work the tip in between lashes to deposit ink at the base for continuous coverage. Winged Elongate and lift the eye by gliding the tip of the Eyeliner across the upper lid near the base of lashes, creating a seamless line. Begin your wing close to the lower lashes at a diagonal angle, following the upward curve of the upper lashline and extending outwards for an eye-lifting effect. Doe-Eyed Apply a thin stroke of liner across the centre of the upper lashline, extending to the outer corner. Apply a second line along the bottom lashes. Intentionally leave the lines unconnected for an eye-opening effect.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Methylpropanediol, Cellulose, Poloxamer 407, Coco-Glucoside, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Laureth-12 Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Bht, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77499), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510).

name: Natasha Denona Mini Love Palette
description: Featuring five velvety hues, this gorgeous Mini Love Eyeshadow Palette stars a spectrum of super-shimmers and buttery mattes in pink-toned shades with lilac undertones, a frosty glitter topping or a deep burgundy twist – an innovative, festive palette that celebrates love and Valentine’s Day. Ideal for those wanting to try out Natasha Denona’s cult eyeshadow palettes, the Mini Love Eyeshadow Palette unites a quintet of pigmented shadows that pack on and blend out seamlessly – without bunching or creasing – and last all-day long. From sparkle-flecked, bold metallics to a soft petal-pink matte, these satiny formulas pair beautifully together to create an intense and fun eye look. With all five shades spelling “You Are My True Love” when together, there’s ‘You’ (a glitter-packed pink), ‘Are’ (a soft, pastel rose), ‘My’ (a deep plum-burgundy hybrid), ‘True’ (a creamy-gold glitter) and ‘Love’ (a bright pink shimmer). Created as part of the Mini Love Story collection, this limited edition mini palette is sure to be a bestseller…
how_to_use: Matte eyeshadows: Apply with fluffy eyeshadow brushes to blend or detail brushes for precision. Metallic / Duo Chrome / Chroma Crystal eyeshadows: May be applied with different shapes of brushes for a subtle application. For high pay off / foiled finish, apply with a damp eyeshadow brush or with the tip of your finger.
