Sodium Silicate, Alumina, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Carmine (Ci 75470), Ferric Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510)

name: Augustinus Bader The Eyebrow and Lash Enhancing Serum 8ml
description: A lash and brow treatment serum with a difference — Augustinus Bader’s latest innovative creation works to support your hair growth cycle through a unique concoction of heavily-researched, nourishing and stimulating actives of the highest quality. Would you expect anything less? The latest innovation to come forth from the skin and hair-changing ranks of this indulgent range is The Eyebrow & Lash Enhancing Serum. Created to lock in moisture, prevent damage and support cellular renewal, this is clinically proven to bring about fuller, thicker brows and lashes. No Augustinus Bader formulation would be complete without the patented complex of amino acids, high-grade vitamins and synthesised molecules that make up the unique TFC8 active ingredient. Used daily, this helps to guide key nutrients to the skin cells and create an optimal environment for your body’s innate repair and renewal processes to thrive. Where would any hair-boosting product be without a dose of biotin, this hair hero helps to metabolise amino acids and boost keratin production for overall healthier, stronger hairs. Finally, a trio of red winter algae, peptide-rich tumeric and hyaluronic acid work to improve hair density, prevent shedding and create a protective moisture barrier around the hair shaft for revived, thicker and healthier brows and lashes.
how_to_use: Use morning and night on clean, dry skin. Apply a few strokes onto each brow using the flat side of the brush. Apply above the lash line - as if applying eyeliner - using the thin side of the brush. Follow with your Augustinus Bader skincare routine.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Panthenol, Propanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Carthamus Tinctorius Flower Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Carbomer, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Citric Acid, O-Cymen- 5-Ol, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Biotin, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Maltodextrin, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopherol, Alanyl Glutamine, Arginine, Oligopeptide-177, Phenylalanine, Sisymbrium Irio Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride.

name: Milk Makeup Bionic Bronzer 17ml (Various Shades)
description: Whether you're in pursuit of cutting cheekbones or want a well-rounded holiday glow, this vegan and gluten-free liquid bronzer is up to the task. More than just a make up product, this liquid formula contains mushroom extracts and hyaluronic acid, making it wonderfully hydrating and lightweight so you can dial up the coverage at your own pace. Add to that vegan collagen and you've got a plumping, brightening bronzer on your hands - well, face. Choose 'Time Travel' for a light bronze look; 'Shapeshift' for a medium tan; 'Invincible' for a deeper bronze and 'Mind Reader' for an even deeper bronze tone. In true Milk Makeup fashion, only the essential ingredients are included so everything it can be free from, it is. No parabens, silicones or fragrance here, just good 'ole fashioned glow.
how_to_use: For best results, shake well before use. Gently squeeze tube to dispense a small dot of formula. Softly blend into skin with fingertips, brush, or sponge for a sun-kissed bronze. Add more to build and intensify colour. Can be worn alone or applied seamlessly over other makeup.
ingredient: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Kaolin, Silica, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides, C9-12 Alkane, Tribehenin, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Candelilla Cera/ Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/ Cire de candelilla, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oi, sr-Hydrozoan Polypeptide-1, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Ganoderma Lucidum (Mushroom) Stem Extract, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Aqua/Water/Eau, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Rosinate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77492, CI 77491, CI 77499).

name: Kosas AIR BROW Tinted Volumizing Treatment Gel
description: Boost, fluff and tint your brows with the AIR BROW Tinted Volumizing Treatment Gel, a long-wearing, mousse-like gel that's boosted with actives to support hair health and growth. Encouraging airy and feathery brows both instantly and over time, this formula calls upon a conditioning medley of castor oil, peptides and panthenol provitamin B5 to encourage growth for an overall fuller and more voluminous look. Using biodegradable, plant-based microfibres to swiftly smooth through brows, the AIR BROW Tinted Volumizing Treatment Gel creates bold yet natural-looking arches that look like they're created with real hair. It's incredibly easy to use, simply brush through and go, and it comes in 10 versatile colours to match a range of hair hues.
how_to_use: Brush through brows to fluff and add volume. For extra boost, start by brushing backwards from the tail end of your brows to the inner corner, then brush through brows like usual. Tip: apply Brow Pop pencil first, then layer on Air Brow tinted gel. You can also finish with Air Brow clear gel to complete the full Kosas brow look (peak tint, volume, and hold).
ingredient: Aqua, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Pullulan, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides, Sorbitol, Glyceryl Oleate, Silica, Mica, Panthenol, Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Fruit Oil, Trehalose, Acacia Senegal Gum, Polylactic Acid, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenethyl Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Tin Oxide [+/ -: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxide (CI 77492), Iron Oxide (CI 77491), Iron Oxide (CI 77499)]

name: NYX Professional Makeup Highlight & Contour Pro Palette
description: Experiment with light and shade to your heart’s content with this must-have palette offering eight shades for you to experiment with. The different colour variations give you the option to 'tweak' your contour and highlighter shades to perfectly suit your complexion (as opposed to looking like painted-on side burns), while the finely milled powder formulas blend easily for an air-brushed finish.
how_to_use: Apply the darkest shades to hollows (beneath cheekbones, along your jawline and to temples), then use the lighter shades to 'bring out' anywhere that light would naturally strike - cheekbones, brow bones, bridge of the nose and cupid's bow.
ingredient: Talc, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Boron Nitride, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Lauroyl Lysine, Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, Dimethicone, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Zinc Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate. MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 6 (CI 15850).

name: Caudalie Vinoclean Micellar Cleansing Water 200ml
description: Part of the brand's all-new and eco-friendly makeover, the Vinoclean Micellar Cleansing Water is housed in 100% recycled and recyclable plastic while leaving skin soothed, hydrated and soft after removing all traces of make up. Composed with 98% natural origin ingredients, the Vinoclean Micellar Cleansing Water removes make up and cleanses the face and eyes in one go, while respecting the skin’s natural balance. Bursting with organic grape water, it hydrates and soothes even the most sensitive skin. Skin is clean, soft and comfortable. Its very fresh fragrance combines notes of mandarin tree blossom, lemon leaf, watermelon and fresh mint for a delicious, spa-worthy aroma. Pick from a full size 200ml bottle – perfect for stocking up on long-term beauty love affairs – or a sized-to-try mini 100ml bottle that's great for testing out new must-haves.
how_to_use: 1. Morning and evening, soak a cotton pad with 4 pumps of Micellar Water. 2. Gently sweep the cotton pad all over your face, not forgetting your neck. Repeat this step if necessary. Do not rinse. To remove eye make up, leave the cotton pad in place for a few seconds, then sweep it gently downwards and then towards the outside of the eye.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Poloxamer 188, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Water, Heptyl Glucoside, Capryl/Capramidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Sodium Chloride, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Citric Acid, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Juice, SodiumBenzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum (Fragrance).

name: Saie Mini Mascara - 101 5ml
description: Saie 'Yes!' to this new mini size of the brand's beloved Mascara that grants full, feathery, faux-worthy lashes (that don't leave your lids feeling leaden). Created to plump, lift and separate each individual lash for a doe-eyed effect, Saie's Mascara 101 has a buildable, cruelty-free formula that cares for your hair to keep lashes strong, glossy and flexible. With its hydra-mineral complex that's packed with potassium (proven to nourish and fortify), this phenomenal wand doesn't clump, smudge or fallout - instead, it fans lashes for heart-stopping flutter. Just wiggle from roots through to tips for the prettiest, they-can't-be-real lash enhancement.
how_to_use: Place the wand on the base of upper lashes, then wiggle upward to coat every lash from base to tip. Use small bristles at the tip of the brush for small lashes on outer corners of eye and bottom lashes. One coat for a natural look and up to three coats for more full drama.
ingredient: Beeswax (Cera Alba), Water (Aqua), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Shea Butter, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Dimer Dilinoleyl and Dimer Dilinoleate, Glycerin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Agropyron Repens Root Extract, Arginine, Leuconostoc (Radish Root) Ferment Filtrate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Glyceryl Caprylate, Xanthan Gum, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

name: SUQQU Sheer Matte Lipstick Lid
description: Designed to accompany SUQQU's {Sheer Matte Lipstick} — a subtle, sheer but undeniably vibrant, moisturising lipstick — this Sheer Matte Lipstick Lid stores the super sleek bullet safely, ensuring the embossed design (SUQQU's signature 'S', no less) stays beautifully defined. The finishing touch to the richly pigmented, deliciously pigmented formula, this smooth matte-black case has an elegant gold accent that will make rummaging for it in your make up bag all the more effortless. Simply remove the temporary resin cap from the bullet, slip this lid on and you're good to go!
how_to_use: Use this product with Sheer Matte lipstick (sold separately). Before putting this cap on, make sure to remove the temporary cap that comes with the lipstick.

name: ICONIC London Multi-Use Sculpting Contour Palette
description: Enhance your bone structure and define your facial features with this compact of six creamy, blend-able shades. Featuring three shades to conceal, highlight and brighten and three shades to contour, define and bronze, this palette contains everything you need to create a sculpted look. A little goes a long way with the highly pigmented formula, and with medium coverage you can build-up your desired intensity – perfect if you want that 'no makeup-makeup' look or 'going out' full glam. Plus, getting ready on the go has never been easier thanks to the full-sized mirror and travel- friendly slimline compact. What's not to love?
how_to_use: Choose a deeper shade to create soft definition wherever shadows fall naturally on your face – under your cheekbones and along your jawline. Also apply a rich colour around the edges of your face for flattering warmth and a naturally sun-kissed look. Top tip: Keep your cheek contour high and work upwards and outwards, towards your temple.
ingredient: Paraffinum Liquidum, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Beeswax, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Cera Microcristallina, Mica, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Silica, Paraffin, Sorbitan Stearate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Trimethoxycaprylylsilane, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Talc, Tocopherol. May Contain (+/-): Ci 77891, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499.

name: benefit Team Magnet Mascara - They're Real Magnet Mascara Booster Set
description: Obsessed with mascara? Then look no further than Benefit's Team Magnet Mascara Magnet Booster Set which unites a full size and travel size of their beloved They're Real Magnet Mascara. Boasting lash-enhancing superpowers, this duo is here to exceed all high expectations and a long-lasting supply of your new favourite too! Working to lift, lengthen, curl, volumise and separate lashes, (phew!), the next-gen brush features intelligent 'zigzag' bristles that latch onto even the teeniest of hairs - strategically working to fan them out with intense definition. Jet black and long-lasting, the brush even boasts a magnetically charged core to draw lashes out - creating extreme, extended, extension-like length. You should also know that the formula is totally smudge-proof, so you can rub your eyes in disbelief as many times as you'd like (though we wouldn't recommend it...).
how_to_use: Hold the wand horizontally and give the brush a wiggle from side to side and base to tip, to achieve maximum volume, length and lift. Hold the wand vertically and stroke upward to curl and separate. Layer generously, as you wish.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cera Alba (Beeswax), Paraffin, Polybutene, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Acrylates Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Steareth-21, Palmitic Acid, Pvp, Stearic Acid, Silica, Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-2, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Panthenol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60. Before using a Benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

name: Huda Beauty Bomb Brows Microshade Pencil
description: Introducing Huda Beauty's Bomb Brows Microshade Pencil, a 2-in-1 spoolie and ultra-fine 0.9mm tip, retractable brow pencil which precisely defines, shapes and fills brows for a microblade effect you'll adore. Perfect for creating the brows of your dreams, this Bomb Brows Microshade Pencil from Huda Beauty unites a spoolie brush and an ultra-fine 0.9mm tip, retractable brow pencil. The formula is infused with a creamy blend of vitamin E, castor oil and coconut oil to help achieve a smooth, precise and defined application which will in turn help create that enviable microblade effect. Available in 8 natural-looking shades, this waterproof, smudge-proof and transfer-proof formula is here. to help you create a long-lasting, real-looking finish.
how_to_use: Stroke brow hair upwards using the spoolie. Shape brow, starting from the middle, working to the edges. Soften edges using the spoolie. Fill in using short, upwards strokes to mimic natural hairs. TIP: To avoid breakage, warm up the pencil between your hands before applying and also twist up less than 1mm of product.
ingredient: Shades 7, 3, 1 and 4: Stearic Acid, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Bis- Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Jojoba Esters, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Titanium Dioxide / Ci 77891, Iron Oxides / Ci 77492, Iron Oxides / Ci 77499, Iron Oxides / Ci 77491. Shades 6, 8 and 2: Stearic Acid, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Bis- Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Jojoba Esters, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Tocopherol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Lecithin, Citric Acid, Titanium Dioxide / Ci 77891, Iron Oxides / Ci 77492, Iron Oxides / Ci 77499, Iron Oxides / Ci 77491

name: benefit The Porefessional Primer Plus Booster Set (Worth £43.68)
description: Never miss a prep step again with The Porefessional Primer Plus Booster Set by benefit, a POREfessional Primer duo in full and travel-friendly sizes. Worthy of all the base-perfecting bragging, the best-selling balm is renowned for minimising visible pores and filling in fine lines for super smooth results. Its translucent coverage and lightweight matte finish make it great for all skin tones and types; helping any foundation formula stay put for longer with a just-applied feel. Take the travel size on the go for anytime touch-ups, as the multi-purpose primer can be used over make up to instantly smooth and blur for complexion-correcting action in a matter of finger taps.
how_to_use: Smooth all over face with fingertips. Use alone, under makeup as a primer or over makeup to touch up.
ingredient: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Isononyl Isononanoate, Silica, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Isododecane, Phenoxyethanol, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Cyclohexasiloxane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance (Parfum), Mica, Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Limonene, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Bht.

name: Pai Skincare The Impossible Glow Bronzing Drops 30ml
description: Great for all skin types and tones, Pai Skincare’s The Impossible Glow, Hyaluronic Acid & Sea Kelp Bronzing Drops are perfect for granting a beautifully luminous look (sans the sun damage). Brimming with dew-boosting hyaluronic acid – a natural moisture magnet that acts like you’re ‘fluffing the stuffing’ (if skin cells were cushions) – these drops can be mixed into serum or cream for a gradual glow, or used straight from the bottle to instantly grant an ethereal gleam. Laced with light-scattering pigments to help you look lit-from-within, lemon-derived vitamin C works to brighten while scavenging damaging radicals, while sea kelp delivers long-lasting hydration for skin that looks visibly smooth, firm and radiant.
how_to_use: Mix a few drops into topical serum or cream to enhance its glow-boosting effects, or use 'neat' to instantly grant a warm, holiday glow to your cheeks, forehead, bridge of your nose and your chin for a natural, sunkissed aesthetic.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Citrus Limon Fruit Water* (Lemon Fruit Water), Mica, Glycerin**, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract (Algae Extract), Sclerotium Gum, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Sodium Levulinate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Anisate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Phytate, Maltodextrin, CI 77019 (Iron Oxides), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) *Organic / Biologique Of Total: 87% (minus water & minerals) / 23.46% ORGANIC, 93% NATURAL **Mixed organic and non-organic ingredients.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Norvina Pro Pigment Palette Vol 2
description: With its wonderfully watery wardrobe of shades, make space in your make up collection for Anastasia Beverly Hills’ Norvina Pro Pigment Palette Vol II – a swathe of bright, powerhouse pigments that look just as good on your lids as they do in the pan. Created for artists but perfect for those who love making a statement, this is the ultimate gift for an eyeshadow addict (ie: YOU). Boasting buttery mattes, silky shimmers and shade-shifting, foil-effect hues, these vegan, cruelty-free colours are totally out of this world. Now, where’s Sebastian… ?
how_to_use: Little pressure is needed when picking up product. Apply light shades to highlight and accentuate features. Apply medium shades to contour and transition colour for a blended finish. Apply deeper shades to define and line. Use a small, dense brush to deposit the pressed pigments onto your desired area of application. Use a fluffy brush to blend. Apply {Eye Primer} to help these highly saturated pressed pigments adhere and stay in place, ensuring maximum colour payoff and performance. Pro Tips: Apply any of the bright shades to the cheek area as a blush. Mix shades together to create your own custom colours. All shades can be applied to the face and body. Mist brush with a setting spray after picking up product for a more intense payoff of shimmer or metallic shades.

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml
description: Forming an invisible bandage on sore skin, La Roche-Posay's insulating Cicaplast Gel B5 brings instant relief to compromised and damaged skin. This is one treatment to keep stocked on your shelfie at all times. Your new personal at-home healer can be used by every member of the family to treat damaged skin and even when recovering from laser treatments and cosmetic peels. Working to stimulate new cell production is a complex of copper, manganese and zinc that are perfectly partnered with hyaluronic acid, drawing in all the water your skin is craving. Wondering what brings that instant relief? Panthenol is your hero ingredient at play here at 5% to immediately soothe sore skin. Using this just twice a day is enough to speed up healing times and improve your skin barrier health. It might sound too good to be true but this clinically tested treatment has the dermatologist seal of approval!
how_to_use: Apply twice a day to cleansed and dry skin. Do not apply directly on wounded skin. Avoid the eye contour area.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Polybutene, Sodium Citrate, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Zinc Gluconate, Madecassoside, Dimethiconol, Manganese Gluconate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Copper Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Tocopherol.

name: NUDESTIX Splashproof Mascara - Black 12ml
description: Introducing Nudestix's Vegan Splashproof Mascara, a waterproof and sweat-proof high-performance mascara infused with multi-vitamins and plant-based oils to moisturise, strengthen and protect lashes. Brimming with argan oil, mango seed oil and panthenol, this Vegan Splashproof Mascara from Nudestix nourishes lashes as it enhances for lustrous lashes that don’t flake, clump or look unnaturally rigid, the Lash Lengthening Mascara cloaks each lash with a rich and creamy formula that lengthens and volumises.
how_to_use: Brush the mascara on top and bottom lashes starting at the root line to get maximum effect. Add a second coat if desired.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Sorbitan Olivate, PPG-17/IPDI/DMPA Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera Cera, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Hydroxethylcellulose, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Sorbitol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Tocopherol, BIS-PEG/PPG-16/16 PEG/PPG-16/16 Dimethicone, Dimethicone, Argania Spinose Kernel Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Panthenol, Caprylic/Capric Trigylceride, Bambusa Vulgaris Leaf/Stem Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate [+/- Iron Oxides (CI 77499)]

name: Saie Mini Mascara - 101 5ml
description: Saie 'Yes!' to this new mini size of the brand's beloved Mascara that grants full, feathery, faux-worthy lashes (that don't leave your lids feeling leaden). Created to plump, lift and separate each individual lash for a doe-eyed effect, Saie's Mascara 101 has a buildable, cruelty-free formula that cares for your hair to keep lashes strong, glossy and flexible. With its hydra-mineral complex that's packed with potassium (proven to nourish and fortify), this phenomenal wand doesn't clump, smudge or fallout - instead, it fans lashes for heart-stopping flutter. Just wiggle from roots through to tips for the prettiest, they-can't-be-real lash enhancement.
how_to_use: Place the wand on the base of upper lashes, then wiggle upward to coat every lash from base to tip. Use small bristles at the tip of the brush for small lashes on outer corners of eye and bottom lashes. One coat for a natural look and up to three coats for more full drama.
ingredient: Beeswax (Cera Alba), Water (Aqua), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Shea Butter, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Dimer Dilinoleyl and Dimer Dilinoleate, Glycerin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Agropyron Repens Root Extract, Arginine, Leuconostoc (Radish Root) Ferment Filtrate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Glyceryl Caprylate, Xanthan Gum, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

name: benefit ChaCha Tint Mango Tinted Lip & Cheek Stain 6ml
description: Perfect to add a last-all-day, delectable mango-sheen tint to your lips and cheeks, ChaChatint offers a beach-ready flush in a bottle. With a smudge-proof, transfer-proof and kiss-proof water-like formula, this sheer stain bestows a beautiful blush to your lips and cheeks with a mango hue that’s good enough to eat (nearly!). Fabulous on faces and luscious on lips, try applying this vibrant tint directly on cheeks and lips with the precise doe foot applicator, then smudge out with your fingers or a brush. If you prefer a natural look, just a little of this tint will give you a subtle wash of colour — or layer up for a more vibrant, head-turning hue. The hydrating formula will stop dryness in its tracks and allow all-day-wear that will look as healthy and radiant as the moment you applied it.
how_to_use: Glide onto lips and layer to build intensity. Dot & blend quickly onto cheeks for a long-lasting flush.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Dimethicone Peg-7 Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Lecithin, Polysorbate 60, Tetrasodium Edta, Sorbitan Isostearate, Disodium Edta. name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Norvina Pro Pigment Palette Vol 2
description: With its wonderfully watery wardrobe of shades, make space in your make up collection for Anastasia Beverly Hills’ Norvina Pro Pigment Palette Vol II – a swathe of bright, powerhouse pigments that look just as good on your lids as they do in the pan. Created for artists but perfect for those who love making a statement, this is the ultimate gift for an eyeshadow addict (ie: YOU). Boasting buttery mattes, silky shimmers and shade-shifting, foil-effect hues, these vegan, cruelty-free colours are totally out of this world. Now, where’s Sebastian… ?
how_to_use: Little pressure is needed when picking up product. Apply light shades to highlight and accentuate features. Apply medium shades to contour and transition colour for a blended finish. Apply deeper shades to define and line. Use a small, dense brush to deposit the pressed pigments onto your desired area of application. Use a fluffy brush to blend. Apply {Eye Primer} to help these highly saturated pressed pigments adhere and stay in place, ensuring maximum colour payoff and performance. Pro Tips: Apply any of the bright shades to the cheek area as a blush. Mix shades together to create your own custom colours. All shades can be applied to the face and body. Mist brush with a setting spray after picking up product for a more intense payoff of shimmer or metallic shades.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Magic Away Liquid Concealer
description: Following on from her multi-award winning {Magic Foundation}, Charlotte Tilburys long-wearing, water resistant Magic Away Liquid Concealer will astonish you with its retexturising powers as well as its concealing capabilities. Enriched with glycine, Persian silk tree bark extract (which stretches across imperfections and smooths over to form a second skin finish) and wild indigo extract (which reduces redness and enhances the skins luminosity) this truly is make up magic. Not only does it cover dark circles, spots, blemishes and any other imperfections youd care to mention, it also plumps skin, leaving it firm, smooth and lifted as well as beautifully even. Perfect around your eyes in particular, this miracle product leaves upper lids looking lifted and can minimise the appearance of crows feet and fine lines. In 20 versatile shades to match as wide a variety of skin tones as currently possible, this is sure to be your new favourite.
how_to_use: Draw the blending wand across imperfections and blend with your favourite tool.

name: ICONIC London Radiant Concealer and Brightening Duo
description: No sleep, no problem! Cheat the look of a good night's rest with this 2-in-1 concealer from ICONIC London. Featuring a brightening crayon - that's so easy-to-use you can literally swipe it onto your canvas while running from the coffee shop to your office - to illuminate and lift the under-eye area, as well as a liquid concealer that camouflages dark spots and blemishes with medium to full coverage. Available in a range of shades, with everything from 'Warm Tan' to 'Golden Rich', the Radiant Concealer & Brightening Duo is an absolute make up bag must-have... and an affordable one, too.
how_to_use: Apply the brightening crayon directly to your under-eye area and blend lightly into the high points of your face. Apply the liquid concealer to any areas where you want coverage, such as the under-eye (on top of the crayon) and on any blemishes. Build and blend to achieve your desired look.
ingredient: Brightening crayon: Polybutene, Phenyl Trimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Synthetic Wax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax), Ricinus Communis Seed Oil (Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil), Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tin Oxide, Brassica Campestris Seed Oil (Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil), Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Collagen, Rubus Idaeus Seed Oil (Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil), Caffeine, Silica, Tabebuia Impetiginosa Bark Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Disteardimonium Hectorite. Liquid concealer: Aqua (Water, Eau), Talc, Dimethicone, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Glycerin, Isododecane, Caprylic/Capric/Succinic Triglyceride, Vp/Hexadecene Copolymer, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Hexyl Laurate, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Octyldodecanol, Magnesium Sulfate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate, Lecithin, Benzoic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Brassica Campestris Seed Oil (Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil), Dehydroacetic Acid, Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Collagen, Rubus Idaeus Seed Oil (Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil), Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tabebuia Impetiginosa Bark Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Citric Acid. name: PATRICK TA Monochrome Moment - Precision Lip Crayon
description: Clinging to the curves of your lips with a creamy formula, the Monochrome Moment Precision Lip Crayon glides easily with no snags or smudges. Designed with a click-to-reveal tube, forget the sharpening struggle and simply twist to reveal the precision, angled tip. Ultra-lightweight and seriously flexible, film formers hold your colour in place for lasting defined coverage, while an emollient blend gives the formula a creamy feel and an even application. Perfect for accentuating your kisses, line your natural shape or fill your entire lip before applying your favourite lip lacquer for a more intense colour payoff. Choose between four utterly gorgeous hues: brick pink Shes Humble, deep brown Shes Strong, cool nude Shes Proud and rich mocha Shes Bold.
how_to_use: Click to reveal product, and line the lips, using angled shape to define and fill as desired.

name: Huda Beauty Cheeky Tint Blush Stick 5g (Various Shades)
description: Encased in a handy stick that makes application as easy as 1-2-3, this blush seamlessly melts into skin to add a touch of colour to cheeks and lips with a dew-boosting formula. Thanks to lychee extract and vitamin E, this make-up-meets-skin-care blush hydrates skin (for nine hours!) and leaves a glossy glow that lasts throughout the day. Offering a sheer finish, this lightweight formula dispenses a natural hint of colour for an everyday glow that builds to a vibrant hue when you want to up the ante on loved-up cheeks. Available in five shades (from the warm ‘Perky Peach’ peach shade to the deeper plum ‘Baddie Berry’), there is a shade to suit everyone, no matter your skin tone, undertones or mood of the day, you name it.
how_to_use: For a natural look, dot or swipe Cheeky Tint directly on cheeks and blend out using fingers or brush. Repeat for added intensity. For a more intense look, apply directly to brush then buff onto cheeks.
ingredient: DIISOSTEARYL MALATE, OCTYLDODECANOL, POLYGLYCERYL-3 DIISOSTEARATE, POLYETHYLENE, MICA, MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX (CERA MICROCRISTALLINA), HYDROGENATED MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX, SYNTHETIC WAX, LITCHI CHINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL [CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS OIL], TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-t-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, DICALCIUM PHOSPHATE, SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE, CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE, CALCIUM SODIUM BOROSILICATE, SILICA, TIN OXIDE. name: Kosas Cloud Set Baked Setting & Smoothing Powder
description: Said to give you actual angel skin, the Cloud Set Baked Setting & Smoothing Powder does more than just whisk away oily shine. A formula that not only looks good but works to improve your skin over time, this baked powder feels airy and light but packs a mighty, skin-smoothing punch. Super-soft and sheer, this compact uses skin care actives to inhibit shine but encourage glow. Making cakey, matte, crease-ridden bases a thing of the past, bamboo stem extract reduces excess oil and shine, passionfruit leaf extracts hydrate and smooth, and Chinese peony detoxifies and minimises the look of pores. Working to sweep away fine lines and uneven texture too, this innovative formula cares for skin but doesnt compromise on coverage or performance ensuring your look is locked in place without oxidising or changing colour throughout the day. Never chalky, dry or uncomfortable, the texture feels weightless on skin ensuring skin looks diffused, blurred and healthy without the mess or stress of a loose powder.
how_to_use: Apply with a tapered brush and sweep or pat onto forehead, chin and nose (or wherever else you need to blur!) to set, perfect and refresh makeup.
ingredient: Mica, Silica, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Lauroyl Lysine, Glyceryl Stearate, Octyldodecanol, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil / Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Potassium Sorbate, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Powder, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Aqua / Water, Stearic Acid, Candelilla Cera / Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Phytate, Cetearyl Olivate, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Olivate, Honokiol, Paeonia Officinalis Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera Seed Extract / Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract (+/-): Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491 / Iron Oxides, Ci 77492 / Iron Oxides, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides

name: Natasha Denona Mini Pastel Palette
description: What’s that thing they say about good things and small packages? Just as eye-conic as its big sibling, dress your lids with five high-performing shades that you can use to unlock mega-statement looks and add the Mini Pastel Palette to your collection to create the most unique colour story fit for the springtime. Choose from matte, metallic, duo-chrome and multi-chrome finishes that add a pop of pastel for a neutral eye, used as a colourful graphic liner (just add a little setting spray to your brush) or built up into an impressively intricate, pro-level look. Think: bubblegum pinks, icy blues, pretty mints and pastel limes. And don’t worry - you won’t find any chalkiness here, just buttery-soft, last-all-day formulations.
how_to_use: Matte Eyeshadows: Apply with fluffy eyeshadow brushes to blend or detail brushes for precision. Metallic Eyeshadows: May be applied with different shapes of brushes for a subtle application. For high pay off / foiled finish, apply with a damp eyeshadow brush or with the tip of your finger.

Aurora:  Mica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Stearyl Dimethicone, Lauryl Dimethicone, Silica, Sorbitan Isostearate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Polysorbate 60, Cellulose Acetate, Caprylyl Glycol,, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tin Oxide, Triacetin, Zinc Stearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Aluminum Powder (Ci 77000). name: Augustinus Bader The Cream Cleansing Gel
description: It's the product you've all been waiting for, Augustinus Bader's The Cream Cleansing Gel is now vegan! A revitalising daily cleanser - perfect for AM and PM - that's powered by the brand's hero ingredient, TFC8, alongside a host of active botanicals, this gel cleanser gently cleanses, conditions and prepares the complexion for the rest of your skin care routine. The ultimate cleansing ritual, The Cream Cleansing Gel is a must-add to both your morning and evening vegan routine. Its unique transforming texture quickly transforms from a gel into a cleansing milk, then into a light lather. Gentle and non-stripping, this effortlessly sloughs away dirt, debris and make up for a clear complexion. Alongside the renowned TFC8 complex - a complex of natural amino acids, high-grade vitamins and synthesised molecules naturally found in skin, which help rejuvenation and renewal, rose water extract tones, refines and purifies, cucumber extract deeply moisturises and reduces redness in stressed out skin while aloe vera leaf juice helps to protect skin from environmental aggressors.
how_to_use: Apply to damp skin. Gently massage in circular motions to form a light lather. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Follow by applying {The Cream}.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Coco-glucoside, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-hexanediol, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Carrageenan, Coconut Acid, O-cymen-5-ol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Maltodextrin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Alanyl Glutamine, Arginine, Oligopeptide-177, Phenylalanine, Potassium Sorbate, Sisymbrium Irio Seed Oil.

name: Avène Cicalfate Restorative Lip Cream for Chapped, Cracked Lips 10ml
description: Kiss goodbye to dry, chapped or irritated lips with Avène’s Cicalfate+ Restorative Lip Cream. Formulated to soothe and moisturise dryness on and around the lips (as well as the sides of the nose and localised areas on the face), the hydrating balm works wonderfully for sensitive skin types. Avène’s hero soothing ingredient Thermal Spring Water is combined with plant-based waxes and oils to deliver a surge of moisture, while sucralfate (an original active ingredient) helps to repair the skin barrier. The water-in-oil formulation creates a water-resistant film for long-lasting protection. Whether it is for climate-induced dryness or post-treatment irritation, keep lips nourished and soothed with this multi-purpose balm.
how_to_use: In the event of dry, irritated lips or specific areas of the face and body, apply the Cicalfate Lips Restore Balm as often as necessary.
ingredient: Glycerin, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil (Ricinus Communis Seed Oil), Avene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua), Beeswax (Cera Alba), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Isopropyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Peg-45/Dodecyl Glycol Copolymer, Aluminum Sucrose Octasulfate, Zinc Oxide, Magnesium Sulfate, Zinc Sulfate.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Pro Angled Brush
description: This hardworking shadow brush has light bristles cut at a sharp angle, to precisely define the brows and create an immaculate cut-crease. It features a minimalist all-black design, with black ferrule complete with subtle NYX Professional Makeup logo. The brand has amassed a loyal army of devotees for their tried-and-true range of products – and their brushes are no exception, allowing you to master all manner of make up techniques with ease. Plus, if you look after these brushes, they will last you a lifetime.
how_to_use: Use this brush with eyebrow powder in short, upward strokes following the natural line of the brow, or with eyeshadow to create a 70s cut-crease effect.
ingredient: Natural and synthetic bristles

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Sharpener
Beautyblender Liquid Blendercleanser
description: Remove excess make up residue and spot-causing bacteria without compromising the condition of your Beautyblender with the brand’s ingenious Blendercleanser Liquid Lavender. The clever formula soaks out tough stains and removes excess residue for seamless make up application, while maintaining the integrity of Beautyblender’s exclusive material. Make-up applicators are magnets for dirt and blemish-inducing germs, so it’s important to clean them regularly to minimise the breakout risk. Enriched with dead sea salts, coconut surfactants and a light lavender fragrance, this is a beautifully effortless way to keep your tools clean.
how_to_use: Wet your blender or brush Apply a small amount of liquid to solid areas Work into lather, rinse, and repeat if necessary. Squeeze to remove excess water. Great for pre-soaking or to clean stubborn stains. Air dry Insider Tip: Clean multiple beautyblenders in a snap: place blenders in a large ziploc bag. Cover the blenders with water and add a squeeze of liquid blendercleanser. Start shaking to create a sudsy foam and clean the blenders. Rinse and air-dry in a well-ventilated area or on the lid of your canister
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Potassium Palm Kernelate, Potassium Oleate, Glycerin, Potassium Cocoate, Potassium Citrate, Maris Salts, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citric Acid

name: NUDESTIX Blend + Buff Brush
description: Uniting a full and fluffy face brush with a tapered brush that reaches all those hard-to-reach areas, Nudestix's all-new Blend + Buff Brush is a multi-tasking, dual-ended make up brush ideal for applying cream, liquid and powder complexion and concealer products, featuring soft synthetic fibres that are cruelty-free and won’t shed. The ultra-plush BLEND & BUFF BRUSH is so versatile, with a round fluffy brush on one end and a flat tapered brush on the other to effortlessly buff and fluff your favourite complexion products to HD perfection. Ideal for sheer, lightweight products, this new Nudestix blending brush is a make up must-have for worry-free application, every time.
how_to_use: Large Fluffy Brush Tip: STEP 1: Apply your product directly onto the large fluffy brush, buffing in a circular motion onto larger areas of the face to blend evenly. STEP 2: For extra coverage, add more product to the brush and apply onto the face in a pressing, dabbing motion. Tapered Brush Tip: STEP 1: Use the tapered brush end with your Nudestix concealer products, applying the product directly onto the BLEND & BUFF BRUSH and blending under the eyes, around the nose and on any other hard-to-reach areas. STEP 2: Apply the product to the face with your brush in a pressing motion for more coverage, blending out edges with a circular buffing motion.
ingredient: Soft synthetic Taklon fibres

name: NARS Cosmetics Sheer Glow Foundation (Various Shades)
description: Ask any beauty buff to name their most coveted complexion products and, chances are, NARS will be high up on the list especially when it comes to the beloved Sheer Glow Foundation. A glowing, naturally radiant-finish foundation, the formula grants sheer yet buildable coverage that evens out skin tone immaculately. Perfect for normal and dry skin types, the formula is replete with skin care benefits from the NARS Complexion Brightening Formula which hydrates skin, to powerful antioxidants that protect against free radical damage and turmeric extract to improve skins radiance and tone. In the full spectrum of 40 versatile shades, this foundation grants a subtly luminous finish thats great for dryer skin types but also not too dewy for those with oilier complexions its the go-to product for a transparent, weightless finish with the versatility to be built up.
how_to_use: Sheer Glow Foundation creates a luminous, satin-like texture to the skin. Although the foundation can be built up for more coverage, this is the go-to product for a transparent, weightless foundation with sheer to medium coverage. The foundations give their coverage by pigment, not weight of product, so less is more. Always warm up foundation in the hands and apply with the finger this creates the most natural-looking finish. Start in the centre of the face (where we typically need more coverage) and work out toward the edge of the face. Sheer Glow Foundation is also a great clean-up tool: use it with a concealer brush under the eyes and around the lips to make sure lines are crisp and picture-perfect.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Lip Liner 1.49g (Various Colours)
description: Whether you want to augment your natural shape or sketch a new one entirely, Anastasia Beverly Hills’ Lip Liner draws the perfect lip. Ideal for shaping and contouring with precision, the full-pigment pencil boasts a wax-based formula that casts a feather-free matte finish. Its square-shaped design allows you to sharpen to a fine point for extreme precision and will never roll off your vanity. Creamy yet never shiny or slippery, the antioxidant-enriched formula glides on effortlessly (think: no skipping or tugging) for a velvet-matte finish. With 18 shades — from beige brown ‘Hazelnut’ to bright red ‘Cherry’ and cinnamon brown ‘Chai — to choose from, it’ll be hard to pick just one...
how_to_use: First, pull cap straight off when removing (don’t twist). For extra precision, sharpen before each use. Line and sculpt the lips to create desired shape before applying lipstick. Use a shade that is slightly deeper than your lipstick for a fuller-looking effect.
ingredient: C10-18 Triglycerides, Talc, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Mica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Synthetic Japan Wax, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Red 7 (Ci 15850).

name: Westman Atelier Lit Up Highlight Stick
description: Available in three flatterings shades, the Lit Up Highlight Stick is a new-generation highlighter that looks just like skin, but with an unbeatably healthy glow. Think: revitalised, post-facial radiance, all imparted by one, easy-to-use, quick-to-apply stick. The literal embodiment of the glass skin trend, this highlighter uses multidimensional undertones to complement all skin tones. The secret to overhauling dull complexions, the formula encourages collagen and hyaluronic acid production with detoxifying vitis vita grape extract. In a refreshing jelly-like texture, this multitasking highlighter can be used whenever skin feels dull and thirsty, with Gucci Westman herself always keeping one on hand to rejuvenate her skin throughout the day. The only hard part is choosing between 'Lit' (a glassy iridescent), 'Bra»lace' (a bronze gold) and 'Nectar' (a golden peach)...
how_to_use: Glide it onto tops of cheeks, cheekbones, cupid's bow and tear ducts for subtle iridescence and clarity.

name: Natasha Denona Hy-Glam Concealer 7g (Various Shades)
description: Saving space in your make up bag and steps in your routine, Natasha Denona Hy-Glam Concealer is a hybrid correcting formula to camouflage skin discoloration of all kinds - from dark circles to acne scars. Suitable for all skin types, this silky smooth concealer creates weightless and comfortable full-coverage in a luminous matte finish that looks like skin. Made with bio-mimetic pigments and texture-perfecting microspheres, it creates a soft-focus finish that blurs the appearance of fine lines, hyperpigmentation and blemishes. In a wide range of hues, this versatile concealer can be used to correct, conceal, highlight and contour.
how_to_use: Dot under the eyes or over imperfections. Blend out with your fingers, brush or sponge.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Bis-Stearyl Dimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Isohexadecane, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Isononyl Isononanoate , Diphenyl Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Stearyl Dimethicone, Alumina , Butylene Glycol, Boron Nitride, Sodium Potassium Aluminum Silicate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride , Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Disteardimonium Hectorite, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, C20-24 Olefin, Silica, Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Propylene Carbonate, Fragrance (Parfum), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract [Vitis Vinifera Fruit Extract], Portulaca Grandiflora Extract, Capsicum Annuum Extract, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.

name: Rituel de Fille Colour Nectar Pigment Balm
description: Bringing the joy to your make up ‘rituel’, these joyful shades can be worn for bright creative editorial looks or everyday simplicity. With a decadent cream texture that blends easily (but won't travel or spread around your face), this palm-sized compact is your ticket to dewy, healthy-looking skin in a pinch. Multi-purpose makeup for every part of the face, the Colour Nectar Pigment Balm can be worn anywhere you are inspired to put it: lips, eyes and cheeks (oh my!). Applied with fingertips, beauty sponges or brushes, these vibrant yet extremely sheer shades are just as easy to brighten or soften, so there is no such thing as a mistake. Inspired by sweet flowers in bloom, these rich and emollient jelly textured balms are beautiful on all complexions and with a range of shades from everyday simplicity to the unexpected, each offers something different and special. Choose your dew from each of the five glow-giving shades: ‘Snapdragon’, an orange cream blush, ‘Bee Sting’, the perfect everyday pink, ‘Bloodflower’, a glossed cherry red shade that diffuses out to the perfect natural flush, ‘Glasswing’ a beautifully wearable reddened plum flush and the newest nectar, ‘Hummingbird’, a euphoric summer watermelon glow.
how_to_use: Each shade can be worn everywhere you are inspired to put it: lips, eyes and cheeks. Creating looks is intuitive and remarkably easy. Applied with fingertips, beauty sponges or brushes, they create the most stunning stained glass or watercolor-like makeup effect. Their rich and emollient texture imparts a sheer, dewy tint that can build to incredible vibrancy. As with any cream product, we recommend tapping it on to build up vibrancy and swiping to take it down.

name: Kosas Wet Lip Oil Gloss (Various Shades)
description: If your make up looks are all about dew-ing the most, this Wet Lip Oil Gloss from Kosas is bound to blow your mind. Infused with a bunch of ultra-nourishing ingredients, this dual-action lip treatment and gloss plumps and hydrates your lips while delivering a juicy slick of colour. Hyaluronic acid helps to lock in hydration, while peptides stimulate collagen production and evening primrose oil works to maintain your natural plumpness and protect against environmental stressors. Thats not all, avocado oil makes for an ultra-cushiony, deeply moisturised finish, while konjac root forms a gel-like veil to seal in the formulas goodness. As for the results, the slick formula has a vinyl effect to rival your go-to high-shine lip gloss and a beautifully soft finish that wears effortlessly, day or night. Available in five head-turning hues, pick between clear Jellyfish, light-catching rose Dip, classic pink Malibu, hot-blooded red Jaws and rich magenta Fruitjuice.
how_to_use: This clever formula plays well on its own and with others! Layer over bare or already layered lips for instant shine.

name: NARS Soft Matte Complete Concealer 6.2g (Various Shades)
description: A brand that needs no introduction, NARS is a definitive cult classic and the Soft Matte Complete Concealer upholds their trailblazing reputation as it conceals, smoothes and evens texture with natural-looking finish. It’s no easy feat to balance a full coverage formula with a second-skin finish, but somehow, NARS do it time and time again. Serving up more coverage than the beloved Radiant Creamy Concealer, the Soft Matte Complete Concealer does it all: from concealing dark spots, under-eye circles, redness and breakouts to smoothing out uneven texture. Wherever you decide to dot this oil-free formula, you can instantly rejoice in a blurred, soft-focus, longwearing finish that doesn’t cake or sink into fine lines. Not only that, this make up must-have even infuses skin care benefits with a blend of skin-supporting peptides, hydrating hyaluronic acid, and a protective cocktail of vitamins A, C, and E to keep your skin healthy in the long run. Full coverage has never looked so natural…
how_to_use: Use fingertips to warm product and press into the skin. Use a stippling application to areas with more texture such as acne scars, pores, and wrinkles. Apply with #12 Cream Blending Brush to layer and create a smooth finish.
ingredient: Dimethicone, Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Nylon-12, Paraffin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Zinc Oxide, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Peg-400, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Aluminum Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Polysilicone-2, Silica, Barium Sulfate, Dextrin Palmitate, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Palmitic Acid, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Ascorbic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Alumina, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, [+/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499)].

name: Huda Beauty GloWish Multidew Skin Tint
description: Skin care-meets-make up, Huda Beauty’s GloWish Multidew Skin Tint harnesses skin-loving ingredients to plump and brighten while near-sheer pigments lend a luminous, dewy finish. The key to a no-make-up make up look, this radiant, moisturising skin tint blurs the look of pores while still letting your skin shine through. As well as achieving a second-skin finish, it's infused with reflective pearl pigments that naturally catch the light for a flattering glow. Its credentials don't end there, it's designed to be water-, sweat- and transfer-proof so you can maintain a fresh-faced finish no matter what life throws your way. A dream to apply and blend, it has a clever cocktail of Damascus rose oil and sustainably sourced red bell pepper extract that ultimately soothes, pumps your skin with up to eight hours of hydration and protects it from the effects of blue light and pollution did we mention that the formula is 92.6% naturally derived? Now with 15 shades to choose from, there’s even more to love about the dew-inducing skin tint…
how_to_use: Wear alone for an all-over healthy glow. Apply to the centre of your face and blend outward. Add to your favourite foundation to boost luminosity. HUDAS HACK: have a pesky blemish or any pigmentation this sheer formula might not cover? Spot - apply concealer before applying MultiDew to maintain a perfect canvas. Apply MultiDew on the high-points of your cheekbones for a super natural highlight.

name: Natasha Denona Rose Cheek Duo
description: Uniting the brand’s iconic Cream Blush and Super Glow Highlighter within one weeny palette, the travel-friendly Mini Rose Cheek Duo is ideal for busy people on-the-go and jetsetters alike. Starring shades that have never been seen before in the Natasha Denona brand portfolio, this duo is made to light up all skin tones — effortlessly blending and melting into skin for a highly pigmented and even finish. Featherweight, buildable and lasting, each hue feels deliciously silky on skin, with no oiliness but with a smooth, velveteen texture. They even call on hyaluronic acid and botanical oils for a moisturising and nourishing effect that enhances your complexion beyond just the pigment. Try the universal pink shade over your cheeks and nose, then sweep the luxurious highlighter (made with crushed pearls and chroma crystals!) over cheekbones for a sheer, radiant, glass-like gleam. You won’t be disappointed.
how_to_use: Cream Blush: Apply on the apples of the cheeks with a blush brush. Lightly sweep for a sheer sparkling finish or add a second coat for more colour and intense shine. Super Glow Highlighter: Apply on the upper cheek bones with your finger or a shimmer brush.

name: Too Faced Hangover Replenishing Face Primer
description: If you’ve gone a little overboard and your skin’s betraying you via tell-tale signs of one too many drinks, Too Faced has the perfect cure: Hangover Primer is the ultimate quick face fix – soothing, smoothing and brightening skin to create a dewy, healthy-looking finish. The lightweight formula is infused with hydrating coconut water, probiotics and skin revivers to rebalance moisture levels and boost skin’s radiance. Used alone or to create a seamless canvas that locks down make up, this miraculous primer will make you look remarkably well-rested – like you’ve had eight hours of sleep and your daily dose of H2O, even if you’ve had quite the opposite. Now in a teeny tiny 'Doll-Size', you need never be without it either – pop one in your make up bag, one in your handbag and one in your pocket for good measure. What’s more, along with the entire Too Faced range, you can rest assured that this is cruelty-free.
how_to_use: Smooth over face and blend into skin. Can be worn alone or under make up.
ingredient: Water, Lactobacillus/Salix Alba Bark Ferment Filtrate, Propanediol Dicaprylate, Propanediol, Ceteareth-6 Olivate, Olive Glycerides, Lactobacillus Ferment, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Hydrogenated Olive Oil, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Cellulose Gum, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Pectin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Xanthan Gum, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Unsaponifiables, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Lauryl Alcohol Diphosphonic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Lecithin, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Fragrance, Lauric Acid, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid

name: Charlotte Tilbury Luxury Palette - The Sophisticate
description: Whether you're a die-hard eye make up aficionado, or only just beginning to experiment with eye enhancement, Charlotte Tilbury's Luxury Palette - The Sophisticate is the ultimate must-have indulgence; starring four beautifully buttery, complementary shades of eyeshadow, designed to be used individually or together to create an array of arresting effects. From daytime understatement to smouldering, after-dark drama, the only limit is your own imagination - so unleash your inner sex kitten, or channel your dormant Park Avenue Princess - then go forth and ignite some passions. The shades in each palette are categorised as 'prime', 'enhance', 'smoke' and 'pop', and should be applied in that order to take you seamlessly from 'desk to dusk to disco!'.
how_to_use: Desk (day look) Step 1: Using the eye blender brush, apply prime to the entire eye-lid, with a backwards and forwards 'windscreen wiper' motion. Then using the eye smudger brush apply the prime shade to the inner corners of the eyes to open them up. Step 2: Nestle the enhance shade in the outer corner of the eye socket using the eye smudger brush and blend. Then using the eye smudger brush apply the enhance shade along the upper and lower lashline. Dusk (evening look) Repeat steps 1 and 2. Step 3: using an eye smudger brush, blend the smoke shade from the outer corner of the eye, upwards and into the socket. Then using the same brush, apply the smoke shade along the upper lashline and into the socket in a half-moon shape. Also run it along the lower lashline. Disco (night look) Repeat steps 1, 2 and 3. Step 4: with your ring finger, apply the pop shade to the centre of your eyelid for amped up glamour.
ingredient: Talc, Mica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Silica, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Hydroxystearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Polyethylene, Isononyl Isononanoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tin Oxide, Caprylyl Methicone, Tetrasodium EDTA, Zeolite, Dimethiconol, Sorbic Acid, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Butylparaben, BHT, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, [May Contain: Ultramarines CI 77007, Carmine CI 75470, Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide CI 77510, Ferric Ferrocyanide CI 77510, Blue 1 Lake CI 42090, Titanium Dioxide CI 77891, Manganese Violet CI 77742, Iron Oxides CI 77492, Iron Oxides CI 77499, Iron Oxides CI 77491]

name: Bondi Sands Liquid Gold Self Tanning Foam
description: The brand's longest lasting formula that requires zero wash off, Bondi Sands Liquid Gold Self Tanning Foam is perfect for those wanting to achieve a flawless yet long-lasting tan at a moments notice. Created with a minor colour guide that disappears once rubbed into skin, Bondi Sands Liquid Gold Self Tanning Foam can be applied before popping clothes on and going about your day as normal with the tan developing over the next six to eight hours. Enriched with Argan Oil and infused with the scent of coconut, this hydrating self-tanning foam will develop into a golden tan that is touch dry in seconds. Last minute planners – this one's for you!
how_to_use: For an even streak free tan use the Bondi Sands Exfoliating Mitt to ensure skin is clean and smooth. Lightly moisturise hands, knees and any dry areas. Apply Liquid Gold directly onto skin and use the Bondi Sands Application Mitt to smooth foam over your legs, arms and body using long sweeping motions. Use remaining tan on mitt for face, elbows and knees. Dress and go. No shower necessary. For a deeper tan reapply 30 minutes after application.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Propylene Glycol, Alcohol, Polysorbate 20, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Oleth-20, Pentylene Glycol, Erythrulose, Sodium Metabisulfite, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ci 14700 (Fd&C Red No. 4), Ci 19140 (Fd&C Yellow No. 5), Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ci 42090 (Fd&C Blue No. 1), Coumarin.

name: Aesop Parsley Seed Facial Cleanser 200ml
description: This gentle gel cleanser contains powerful antioxidants and mild exfoliating properties to leave skin thoroughly clean and protected. Suitable for all skin types, lactic acid gently lifts build-up and dead skin cells without scrubbing, making it the ideal daily cleanser for those in urban or polluted environments. Liquorice root is anti-inflammatory and blackcurrant and parsley seed extracts ward off free radical attack, making this face wash the perfect first step in the city dweller's skin care arsenal.

name: Westman Atelier Vital Skincare Complexion Drops 30ml (Various Shades)
description: Westman Atelier's next-gen skin tint is brimming with hydrating skin care and a natural hue to transform your complexion from dull to fresh-faced in just a few drops. Designed to work with your skin, this complexion-boosting tint not only glides over your skin and blends with ease, but infuses your visage with serum-strength actives to improve texture, firmness and radiance. Transforming from a lightweight oil to a cushiony serum as it glides over your skin, each drop of this radiance-booster soothes and revitalises a dull complexion thanks to a trio of tsubaki oil, ginseng extract and pomegranate extract. Non-comedogenic, effortlessly chic and available in 20 skin-loving shades, these are sure to become a vital part of your daily ritual.
how_to_use: Gucci Westman's Tips:
ingredient: Squalane, Aqua (Water), Persea Gratissima Oil (Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil), Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Mica, Pentylene Glycol, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Propanediol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil), Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Zingiber Officinale Root Extract (Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract), Oryza Sativa Extract (Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract), Oryza Sativa Germ Extract (Oryza Sativa (Rice) Germ Extract), Bisabolol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Glycine Soja Oil (Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil), Gossypium Hirsutum Seed Oil (Gossypium Hirsutum (Cotton) Seed Oil), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil), Triticum Vulgare Germ Oil (Triticum Vulgare Germ (Wheat) Oil), Zea Mays Germ Oil (Zea Mays (Corn) Germ Oil), 4-T-Butylcyclohexanol, Glyceryl Caprylate/Caprate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Tin Oxide, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Lysine, Magnesium Chloride, Tocopherol. +/- May Contain: Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

name: NYX Professional Makeup Blurring Vitamin E Infused Pore Filler Face Primer Stick
description: Your deep-set pores and fine lines called and the Blurring Vitamin E Pore Filler Primer Stick answered. Prepping your base with up to 12 hours of staying power, this non-drying, glide-on stick keeps skin looking and feeling smooth. Powered by moisture-locking vitamin E, expect selfie-ready skin that appears plumped and hydrated with a soft-focus finish. Next step: foundation...
how_to_use: Apply after your moisturiser, before your foundation, or wear alone. Apply a tiny amount of primer directly to the face using circular motions to deliver a silky soft finish that will form the perfect canvas for makeup application.
ingredient: Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Silica, Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isononyl Isononanoate, Isododecane, Polymethyl Methacrylate, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol. name: ALGENIST GENIUS Ultimate Anti-Ageing Melting Cleanser 150ml
description: Utilising the best of biotechnology to offer an unparalleled cleansing experience, Algenist’s GENIUS Ultimate Anti-Aging Melting Cleanser contains both of the brand's signature algae-derived ingredients. The transforming gel formula melts into a luxuriously silky oil to gently yet effectively lift away all traces of impurities and make up (even stubborn, long-wearing kinds) then, upon contact with water, the lightweight oil turns into a milky emulsion, rinsing clean to wash away everything you want removed, while leaving soft, radiant skin behind. The cleanser contains Algenist’s breakthrough patented ingredient, alguronic acid, a powerful compound responsible for regenerating and protecting the algae cell. Naturally sourced and sustainably produced, it offers incredible age-defying benefits to skin, supporting natural skin renewal. Alongside this, microalgae oil – rich in oleic acid, phytosterols and tocopherols – replenishes essential moisture and nutrient loss (it’s clinically proven to keep skin hydrated five times longer than untreated skin over 24 hours).
how_to_use: Morning and night, apply over the entire face when skin is dry. Then gently massage into skin in circular motions as the gel transforms into a luxurious oil to gently remove long-wearing makeup. Then apply water to transform the oil into a lightweight, milky emulsion and rinse thoroughly. Use only as directed.
ingredient: C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Water (Aqua), Sucrose Laurate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Chlorella Protothecoides Oil, Algae Exopolysaccharides, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Vaccinium Myrtillus Seed Oil, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Benzyl Benzoate

name: benefit Badgal BANG! Volumizing Waterproof Mascara - Pitch Black
description: Calling all BADgal BANG Mascara loyalists! Benefit has blessed the beautysphere with a waterproof version of their bestselling volumising mascara. Maintaining everything you love about the original formula — from the 36-hour volume to the innovative brush that reaches even the teeniest lashes — the BADgal BANG! Waterproof Volumising Mascara will will last through even the wildest gales, tantrums and tears, though we hope it doesn’t have to! Offering bigger, ‘badder’ lashes than your average mascara, the unique, intensely black formula stars gravity-defying aero-particles: one of the lightest known materials derived from space technology. This innovative ingredient ensures that the formula can be layered up for maximum impact without weighing lash hairs down, adding volume, length and curl without clumps. It’s effortless to apply using the unique ‘slimpact’ brush, which is streamlined to coat every lash evenly and the formula is both smudge-proof and waterproof.
how_to_use: Gently wiggle wand from base of lashes to tips. Repeat as desired to build volume. Remove with waterproof or bi-phase eye makeup remover.

name: Natasha Denona Retro Palette
description: Designed so that you can combine any three shades in a row to create an entire look, Natasha Denona’s Retro Palette is just perfect for anyone with a penchant for pinks, lilacs, dusty roses and delicate plums. Each rows unite a range of powerhouse pigments — from gold-spangled, wet-look hues like ‘glitz’, to rich and buttery mattes like ‘amara’ and ‘nude mauve’ to soft, glimmering lilacs like ‘helio’ and ‘andy’. Perfect for creating an ethereal, sparkling look (or even a muted, work-ready nude look!), simply use a brush or your fingertips to apply each shadow, and prepare to fall in love with the rich pigment, seamless blend and longevity of each formula.
how_to_use: Apply with Natasha Denona eyeshadow brushes to blend your shades together seamlessly.

name: NUDESTIX Nudies Bloom 7g (Various Shades)
description: Nudies Bloom, the latest launch from Nudestix, boasts a beautifully natural-looking sheer dewy balm that can be sweeped across eyes, cheeks and lips for a pop of radiance. Conveniently dual-ended with a block of colour at one end and a soft, densely-bristled brush at the other, this stick is a one-stop ticket to flawless faces. The soft, subtly brightening balm can be drawn directly on to cheeks, eyes and lips (gently dabbed in with fingers or stippled with the brush), offering sheer, long-wearing coverage that can be built up to intensify the colour. Available in four sheer and bright glowy shades to suit all skin tones, pick from 'Sweet Peach Peony', 'Tiger Lily Queen', 'Cherry Blossom' and custom colour, 'Poppy Girl'.
how_to_use: On bare skin: Swipe NUDIES BLOOM on cheeks, lips and eyes directly from the stick then stipple in a patting motion with blending brush or fingers to blend out any hard edges. Over make up: Swipe fingers or brush onto colour stick then apply on cheeks, lips and eyes with brush or fingers and stipple in a patting motion to blend out hard edges.
ingredient: Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polybutene, Ceresin , Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Paraffin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Microcrystalline Wax, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Ethylene/Propyelene Copolymer, Euphorbia,Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Polyethylene, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Hexylene Glycol, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Colourants.

name: INKED by Dani Celestial Pack
description: Where intricate, hand-drawn sketches meet temporary tattoos that create lasting memories, the Celestial Pack is filled with otherworldly designs, from constellations to star-like sparkle and fine-line suns. Made with cruelty-free, vegan ink and delivering high-pigment colour that can stand the test of time and heat, rest assured that your new ink won’t rub or fade away until you want it to. Boosting confidence with playful patterns that don’t need to last a lifetime, adorn your body with eye-catching designs. INKED By Dani’s temporary tattoos often last up to a week or longer depending on their size and placement but the majority will last at least 2-4 days. Who knows, you may even decide to get the real deal once they’ve faded…
how_to_use: Make sure application area is clean and dry. Peel off the plastic top sheet, place tattoo face down on your skin, and wet the back side of tattoo paper until completely soaked through with water. Press and hold for a few seconds, then gently peel off the paper to reveal your INKED.
ingredient: Acrylates / VA / Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer. May Contain: Black 2, Blue 1 Lake, Yellow 5 Lake, Red 7 Lake, Titanium Dioxide.

name: Too Faced Lip Injection Extreme Lip Shaper 0.23g (Various Shades)
description: Maximise your pout with no needles necessary using the Lip Injection Extreme Lip Shaper that's here to line, define and reshape your lips with a kiss-proof finish. Powered by a vegan formula starring a nourishing medley made up of organic shea butter and jojoba seed oil, this easy-glide liner reveals a demi-matte finish that doesn't smudge, budge or bleed. Supercharged with volumising technology that instantly plumps up the perimeter of your pout, expect the subtle tingle that you know all too well to dial up your look. Choose from six ultra-flattering shades from a 'Espresso Shot', a dark chocolate nude to 'Post-Op Pink', a light, flesh-toned pink.
how_to_use: To shape lips, follow your natural lip line. Slightly over line Cupid's bow and bottom centre lip for a fuller pout effect.
