name: 19/99 Beauty Lash Tint Mascara 4g (Various Shades)
description: Introducing 19/99 Beauty's Lash-Tint Mascara, designed to work on all eye shapes and sizes, this lightweight, smudge and flake proof mascara creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes. The super slim wand's bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of lashes from fine to full, coating every lash, from root to tip. Perfect for long-wearing, the clever formula won't smudge or flake as it's water-resistant (not waterproof!) which means when you are ready to take it off, it melts away with warm water. Last but by no means least, the versatile and buildable formula – that's vegan and cruelty-free(!) – allows user to customise the level of product and finished on the lashes.
how_to_use: Apply one coat for defined and lengthened lashes, or add a second coat for volume.
ingredient: Water, Iron Oxides(CI 77499), Acrylates Copolymer, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Butylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Alcohol, Tromethamine, Palmitic acid, PEG-100 Stearate, Stearic acid, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Stearate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Ethylhexylglycerin.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Can't Stop Won't Stop Contour Concealer (Various Shades)
description: Proof that great things really do come in small packages, this overachiever lives up to its name it Wont Stop for up to a solid 24 hours *gasp*. The long-lasting formula is oh-so blendable and lightweight, granting that well-sought after second skin effect without skimping on coverage that would be a medium-to-full coverage FYI. With a matte finish, itll keep T-zone oil at bay and resists slipping from forehead to chin, whether youre covering blemishes, brightening cheekbones or sculpting your face. Available in 24 shades, the versatile formula is suitable for a spectrum of skin tones.
how_to_use: Delicately dot the wand over areas you want to conceal, correct or contour (for hygiene reasons, we recommend washing the applicator wand immediately after use on blemishes). Blend with fingers or a brush.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Cyclohexasiloxane, Butylene Glycol, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Silica Dimethyl Silylate [Nano], Sodium Chloride, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Propylene Carbonate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol.MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891). <AA002>

name: Westman Atelier Vital Skin Foundation Stick
description: Rich in antioxidants and cleverly formulated to tackle skin redness and to calm irritation, the Vital Skin Foundation Stick evens the complexion and boosts moisture levels for an incredibly healthy glow. In a fuss-free, on-the-go-friendly stick for busy gals and guys, the bullet effortlessly glides melting into skin for a radiant finish that looks just like your natural skin, enhanced. Vegetable derived squalane restores skin giving it a supple, plump bounce while phytosphingosine (a potent compound that works exactly like real skin!) helps the complexion to retain moisture. Also working as a strong anti-inflammatory, fine lines and tell-tale signs of angry skin are visibly reduced. Add the active raspberry-derived berryflux vita with coconut and camellia seed oils, and you have an age-defying recipe for uber-moisturised, protected skin. Environmental pollutants who?
how_to_use: Start by prepping skin with moisturizer and then use fingers to pat into skin, building in areas that need more refinement. Always work with a few foundation shades on hand to mimic the tone variations of real skin lighter under eyes, matching in the T-zone. Our skin responds to our environment and is not all one tone.

name: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Blush 4.2g (Various Shades)
description: For a flawless flush that will never fall flat, Hourglass has devised an irresistible new way to blush: Ambient Lighting Blush. This ground-breaking hybrid fuses the universally flattering radiance of the brands beloved Ambient Lighting Powder with vivid, uplifting colour to provide a seamless, soft-focus finish. The handmade, magnificently marbled pans are formulated using an advanced miscelare technique (which means to mix in Italian) creating the perfect balance of pigment and powder, enhanced with Photoluminescent Technology to maintain vibrancy, depth and dimension. Beautifully buildable, youre sure to be seduced by at least one of the seven sumptuous shades: theres Diffused Heat, a vibrant poppy combined with Diffused Light Ambient Lighting Powder; Dim Infusion, a subdued coral fused with Dim Light to add warmth; Ethereal Glow, a cool pink blush united with Ethereal Light for moonlit luminosity; Luminous Flush, a champagne rose blush combined with Luminous Light to evoke a candlelit glimmer; Mood Exposure, a soft plum blush fused with Mood Light to brighten the complexion; Radiant Magenta, a golden fuchsia blush combined with Radiant Light for a summery glow and, finally, the brand new 'Sublime Flush' a soft petal pink fused with lilac for a mermaid-esque glow. Oh, glow on then!
how_to_use: Swirl the entire compact with your brush to pick up the perfect balance of pigment and powder.
ingredient: Luminous Flush, Ethereal Glow, Radiant Magenta Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Boron Nitride, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Octyldodecanol, Benzoic Acid, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Dehydroacetic Acid, Diamond Powder, Dimethicone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Laureth-7, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyacrylamide, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Potassium Sorbate, Silica, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sorbic Acid, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Tin Oxide, Trimethylsiloxysilicate. name: benefit Roller Liner (Various Shades)
description: If you love Benefits cult classic Roller Lash (and we know that loads of you do!) get ready for your next obsession: Benefits Roller Liner. The liquid liner counterpart to your favourite mascara, this future Holy Grail delivers a true matte finish in richly saturated black or rich brown shades. Easy to apply, the flexible felt tip-style liner creates a smooth, continuous line, so you wont have to worry about application issues no matter how unpractised your hand. The formula is quick-drying, water-resistant and offers up to 24 hours of wear.
how_to_use: Use to line and define eyes perfectly. Hold the tip of the Stylo on its side for more control.
ingredient: Roller Liner Brown: Aqua (Water), Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Methylpropanediol, Cellulose, Poloxamer 407, Coco-Glucoside, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Sodium Laureth-12 Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Bht. N° 12248/B

name: benefit Peachin Peach Blush Powder Mini 2.5g
description: A creamy blusher in a shimmery, golden peach hue, benefit’s Wanderful World Blushes in ‘Peachin’ veils the cheeks in a fresh-picked flush. Infused with a refreshing tropical scent, the ultra-fine powder blends seamlessly into the skin with an airbrushed effect, its buildable formula offering a customisable look. A blend of freshwater pearl and synthetic sapphire lends the skin a luminous, light-reflecting glow. The blush boasts a sweat, smudge and humidity-proof formula, helping to ensure long-lasting wear.
how_to_use: Swirl brush in blush and sweep onto cheeks. Blend & build as desired on bare face or over makeup. Beauty Tip: Pairs perfectly with Benefit’s Multitasking Cheek Brush (sold separately).
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Zinc Stearate, Lauryl Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Alumina, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dehydroacetic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pearl Powder, Stearic Acid, Laureth-4, Aqua (Water), Tocopherol. [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 77491, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 75470 (Carmine)]. Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

name: Lanolips Baby Rose Gold 101 Lip Ointment 9g
description: A juicy reinvention of the original {101 Ointment}, this must-have is for anyone with dry skin, chapped lips or who's craving a naturally flushed look. The 101 Ointment Lip + Cheek Tint is enriched with pure lanolin, which has a unique molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils to deliver unparalleled levels of moisture. However, this formula also comes laced with a natural, pinched-your-cheeks tint for a flattering, dewy-skinned flush that looks just like your face made it. Intensely hydrating, nourishing and 100% natural, this rescue ointment is a handbag hero, providing immediate relief while lending lips and cheeks a sweet, just-bitten hint of pink. Dermatologically tested, vegetarian and baby friendly, cruelty-free and free from ‘nasties’, this treatment is an absolute no-brainer. Choose from 'Rose Gold', 'Baby Rose Gold' or 'Bronze Gold'.
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously and keep below 25°c.
ingredient: Lanolin*, Lanolin Cera (Wax)*, Cera Alba (Beeswax)*, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Mica*, Aroma (Flavour)*, Tocopherol (Vit E)*, Benzyl Alcohol*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Tin Oxide, Limonene*, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 77491 (Iron Oxide). *Natural + Mineral Derived

name: NYX Professional Makeup Radiant Finish Setting Spray
description: Vegan, cruelty-free and here to take your make up from dawn to dusk with a dewy glow to boot, the Radiant Finish Setting Spray is mandatory for all beauty devotees. Overflowing with a beautiful blend of ultra-fine gold and warm champagne micropearls, this shimmery setting spray sets skin with a gorgeous, radiant, glimmering finish – ideal for every occasion (from summer through to Christmas!) and with an easy-to-use spray nozzle for even misting. Lending glitz and glow without going overboard, spray less for a more natural, dewy finish that’ll still keep make up in place, and try misting between the different steps in your make up routine for extra staying power!
how_to_use: Step 1: Shake well to disperse pearlescent particles before each use. Step 2: Hold bottle eight to twelve inches away from face and mist directly onto skin, avoiding the eye area. Step 3: Spray over makeup for an ultra-natural finish. Pro Tip: Spray between makeup applications and layer between foundation, contouring shades, and blush to prolong makeup.
ingredient: Borosilicate, Niacinamide, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain / Peut Contenir (+/-): Ci 77491 / Iron Oxides. <D240624/1>* *For the most recent ingredient list, please refer to packaging.

name: Pat McGrath Labs LiquiLUST Legendary Wear Matte Lipstick 5ml (Various Shades)
description: Saturating lips with rich pigment, the LiquiLUST Legendary Wear Matte Lipstick glides onto lips with ease, leaving a beautiful matte colour in its wake without a smudge in sight. Designed with a tapered teardrop applicator to help you perfect your pout, this creamy formula defies the expectations of your average matte lipstick. Comfortable to wear all day without a crack in sight, this non-drying, velvety-smooth formula builds in opacity and can be blended with other shades to create the prettiest of diffused ombre effects. Coming in 10 shades that range from ‘Divine Rose II’, a soft plum rose shade to ‘Wild Orchid’, a subtly striking berry pink, it looks like the perfect, plush matte lipstick does exist.
how_to_use: 1. Prep the lips by gently exfoliating and applying a dab of balm. Blot with a tissue. 2. Use the tip or sides of the applicator to line lips. 3. Use the width of the applicator to fill in a layer of bold colour. 4. For a blurred ombre look, apply colour to the centre of lips and tap with finger to diffuse outward. 5.Layer and blend shades to create your own rule-breaking look.
ingredient: Isododecane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Kaolin, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Synthetic Beeswax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Silica Dimethyl Silylate [Nano], Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Propylene Carbonate, Bht, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850).

name: Urban Decay Subversion Lash Primer 8.5ml
description: The key to thicker, longer, stronger lashes, Urban Decay’s Subversion Lash Primer wraps each individual hair to add show-stopping volume to grant a formidable flutter. A creamy priming formula that’s packed with lash-conditioning ingredients, including vitamin E and panthenol, this acts like a mask for your lashes while giving your pigment a canvas to cling to. Essential for those with fine, delicate fringes who crave a phenomenal flutter, this fortifies, softens and wards against breakage, while the big brush and densely packed bristles lift and separate to effortlessly coat from roots to tips for a show-stopping, false lash-effect.
how_to_use: Comb through your lashes and leave for a minute ahead of applying mascara.
ingredient: Aqua (Water/Eau), C18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Synthetic Wax, Myristic Acid, Stearic Acid, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Butylene Glycol, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Cera Carnauba/Cire de Carnuba), Glyceryl Stearate, Cera Alba (Beeswax/Cire D'abeille), Tromethamine, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydrogenated Lecithin,Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax (Candelilla Cera/Cire de Candelilla), Simethicone, Hexylene Glycol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Disodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Panthenol.

name: Natasha Denona My Dream Lip Gloss - Natasha
description: Using the groundbreaking formula from the I NEED A ROSE collection, this classic, ultra-moisturising gloss is the first to be offered in the bestselling shade Natasha from the I NEED A NUDE collection. A lusciously soft and conditioning lip shine with nourishing balm like benefits and a subtle rosy tint, this high shine gloss adds a diamond bright dimension to any look. Enriched with soothing avocado oil, the cushiony, gel like consistency keeps lips soft, supple, and smooth throughout the day.
how_to_use: Wear alone for a burst of hydrating, high-dimension shine or pair with I NEED A NUDE LIP CRAYON and MY DREAM LIPSTICK, for extra dimension.

name: Hourglass Veil Eye Primer 9.6ml
description: Joining Hourglass' beloved Veil collection, the all-new Veil Eye Primer is an ultra-long-wearing yet lightweight formula that creates the perfect canvas for eyeshadow, elongating its wear and enhancing its performance for showstopping looks. Amplify your eyeshadow colour and its staying power with this silky, blendable Veil Eye Primer. The long-wearing yet lightweight formula creates an flawless canvas for eyeshadow while improving its performance, making its colour more vibrant while reducing fading and creasing from morning to night. But it doesnt' stop there, this good-to-skin formula also helps to nourish delicate skin with vitamins E and C, keeping skin moisturised while reducing the look of age spots and sun damage too.
how_to_use: Worshipped for incandescent powders, butter-soft blushers and a game-changing range of complexion perfectors, Hourglass combines science, luxury and beauty to create the most magnificent make up. Blending ground-breaking active ingredients with innovative technology, the products make for surreal skin – and the sleek, chic packaging is just another reason we adore it.
ingredient: Isododecane, Talc, Mica, C13-14 Alkane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Helianthus Annuus Seed Wax, Trihydroxystearin, Hydroxystearic/Linolenic/Oleic Polyglycerides, Triethylhexanoin, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Calcium Carbonate, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Dimethicone, Propylene Carbonate, Synthetic Beeswax, Peg-40 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492, Ci 77491, Ci 77499).

name: Avène Gentle Eye Make-Up Remover for Sensitive Skin 125ml
description: Stubborn mascara and vivid eyeshadows are no match for the Avène Eye Make Up Remover. Specially designed to be gentle on the eyes and lashes, the gel cleanser effectively removes all traces of make up for a fresh, comfortable finish. The residue-free formula is powered by Avène's signature Thermal Spring Water ingredient. Packed full of minerals and trace elements, the water helps to soothe, refresh and hydrate the skin. Its fragrance-free composition is ideal for contact lens wearers and eyelids that are prone to sensitivity and dryness.
how_to_use: Pour a small amount of the Gentle Eye Makeup Remover onto a cotton pad and leave it on the eyelid for 3 seconds. Gently remove eye and lash makeup by smoothing from top to bottom and then from bottom to top.
ingredient: Avène Thermal Spring Water (Avène Aqua), Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, Poloxamer 188, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Phenethyl Alcohol, Water (Aqua).

name: Too Faced Moon Crush Highlighter - Shooting Star
description: Light up your eyes, cheeks and body with Too Faced's Moon Crush Highlighter in Shooting Star - delivering the glossiest of glows that really does appear out of this world. Designed to glide on like a second-skin, this next-generation highlighter has an easy-to-use powder formula that creates the dreamiest, wet-look finish. The Shooting Star shade imparts a glistening champagne glow, ready to draw attention to your eyes, cheekbones, décolletage - and anywhere else you want to add a touch of moonlit luminescence. Oh, and it smells like fresh crisp apples. Obsessed? Us too.
how_to_use: Face: For a radiant cheek glow, glide Moon Crush Highlighter across the high cheekbone toward the temple using a highlighter brush. Layer for intensity. Eyes: For brighter eyes, apply Moon Crush Highlighter into the inner corners, onto the centre of the eyelid, and on the brow bone using a small shadow brush. Body: For a gorgeous body glow, sweep Moon Crush Highlighter on desired area using a large fluffy powder brush. Layer for intensity.
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Zinc Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Boron Nitride, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Diisostearyl Malate, Nylon-12, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Seed Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenylpropanol, Methylpropanediol, Polyethylene, Tin Oxide, Silica, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\ Copernicia Cerifera Cera \Cire De Carnauba, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Tocopherol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499). ILN51437.

name: Hourglass Veil Translucent Setting Powder 10.5g (Various Shades)
description: The make up equivalent of airbrushing, Hourglass’ Veil Translucent Setting Powder miraculously minimises the appearance of pores and fine lines for a beautifully smooth finish. Formulated with soft-focus, light-reflecting particles, this utterly weightless formula glides onto skin effortlessly — instantly blurring any pesky ‘imperfections’, while setting your make up at the same time. You can even use it just under your eyes to prevent creasing. It’s delivered through an innovative (and stylish!) signature Hourglass sifter, allowing the perfect amount of product to be dispensed. Mess-free, high-performing and oh-so-sleek, it represents everything we love about the brand.
how_to_use: Using Hourglass’ Veil Powder Brush, pick up a small amount of powder and tap off excess. Apply powder all over the face to set make up.
ingredient: Mica, Synthetic Sapphire, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Boron Nitride, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Silica, Diamond Powder, Sorbic Acid, Sodium Dehydroacetate. May Contain (+/-): Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492).

name: Urban Decay 24/7 Eyeshadow Mono - Overdraft 2g
description: Day or night, adorn your eyes with the high-performance and ethereal-looking colour of Urban Decay’s 24/7 Eyeshadow Mono Moondusts. Supercharged with super-fine shimmer, each vegan and cruelty-free hue boasts an addictively creamy texture that effortlessly glides onto skin, treating it to brightening caffeine in the process (tired eyes, begone!). Displaying a mesmerisingly intense, sparkly, shimmery finish that lasts up to 16 long hours, these Moondusts will have your eyes looking out of this world – whether you prefer to apply them with your fingers or a brush. Coming in twelve shades to suit a myriad of looks and skin tones, you’ll soon find yourself wanting every single one…
how_to_use: First, prime lids with {Eyeshadow Primer Potion} for more vibrant, crease-free colour that lasts all day. For even bolder, richer colour, use a correspondingly coloured eyeliner pencil as an all-over base. Apply the high pigment eyeshadow using any eyeshadow brush or your fingertips for intense colour payoff. Use wet or dry. Mist your brush with {All Nighter Setting Spray} before using to create a foiled, wet look. Finally, lock down your makeup look for up to 16 hours with All Nighter Setting Spray.

name: Huda Beauty Naughty Nude Eyeshadow Palette
description: 18 shades. Five innovative textures… Huda Beauty’s Naughty Nude Eyeshadow Palette is ‘nude’ as you’ve never yet seen it before. The ‘birthday suit’ your make up wardrobe’s longing for, this jaw-dropping wardrobe of nearly-bare shades will facilitate limitless pared-back and smoky-eyed looks. The 2020 reinvention of the best-loved New Nude Palette, this marries smooth, buttery mattes with five, high-shine metallics, three multi-reflective marble cream shimmers, one matte marble cream and one never-before-seen shimmering gloss hybrid, with encapsulated bronze and berry pearls to elevate your beauty look to cover-worthy heights. Spanning shades of tan, toffee, espresso and sand with hypnotically beautiful, foil-effect glimmers in shades of plum, berry and flame, this edit will quickly become your go-to – trusted to take you from coffee to cocktails with just a quick flick of a brush.
how_to_use: Build your base with the matte cream marble and matte powder shadows. Pick up metallics and cream shimmer marbles with a brush in small, circular motions then apply on lids for an illuminating finish. Build an extra layer using your fingers or a sponge brush for a high-shine foil effect. For a soft, pearlescent glow, apply the pearl gloss hybrid to bare lids using your finger or a flat brush. Huda’s tips: For deeper shades: blend is your friend! Brushes are super important to get a smooth finish in the crease and across the lid. Not all deep shades have to be bold and graphic; blend out the deep mattes with a fluffy brush to five definition and shape to the eyes for amore low key look. For soft daytime looks, build a light base using matte shades, adding shimmer across the lid using your finger, a flat brush or a sponge applicator. Don’t forget your lower lashline! The metallics and pearl gloss hybrid can also be used to contour the lower lashline or add to inner corners for a soft highlight that opens up the eyes.
ingredient: Filthy, Hypnotic, Untamed, Rough, Spicy, Arouse, Naughty, Juicy: Talc, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Zea Mays Starch, Silica, Magnesiummyristate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate,Dimethicone, Decylene Glycol, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer. name: Spectrum Collections KJH Number 4 Brush
description: Designed by professional make up artist Katie Jane Hughes, the KJH Number 4 Brush is your new go-to for blending foundation to create a perfectly natural finish. With its angled design and ultra-soft professional grade fibres, this brush hugs the contours of the face to give you precise control — creating a smooth, almost-airbrushed effect. It also boasts two different length bristles, which are idea for picking up and distributing a sheer amount of product. Use it with your favourite foundation, as well as other liquids and creams such as blushers or bronzers.
how_to_use: Use to elevate your routine and make your beauty products work even harder.
ingredient: 100% synthetic taklon bristles. Pale gold copper material ferrules. Glossy Olive green FSC wood handles.

name: Pat McGrath Labs Lust Lip Gloss - Nude Venus 4.8g
description: Ever had love at first gloss? Well, with the LUST: Gloss, there's a first time for everything… Offering a lustrous stained-glass look that's second to none, this limited-edition gloss glides across your lips with truly unbeatable payoff. Utterly lightweight yet emollient, this runway-worthy lip glaze blends long and short polymers together to promote a sublimely seductive sheen while its balm-like texture delivers high-performing colour that's hard to resist. What's more, this pout-perfecting luxuriant is further enhanced with softening vitamin E which makes this beauty staple suitable to be worn alone or over your go-to lipstick for an extra dose of drama. Decadent, dreamy and daring glosses await you…
how_to_use: Swipe on succulent shades for a dose of three-dimensional wet shine and ethereally erotic colour.
ingredient: Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isostearyl Isostearate, Synthetic Wax, Polyglyceryl-2 Tetraisostearate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Methyl Styrene/Indene Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Mica, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ethyl Vanillin, Tocopherol, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).

name: Laura Mercier Pure Canvas Blurring Primer 50ml
description: Perfect for those wanting to smooth and blur, this Pure Canvas Primer Blurring from Laura mercier helps to visibly smooth your skin thanks to this silicone-free primer that instantly mattifies. Create a flawless canvas for make up application and extended wear with this innovative primer that blurs the look of skin for a soft-focus effect. Infused with microalgae and hardworking blurring powders, the Pure Canvas Primer Blurring primer conditions skin over time for improved look and texture and absorbs excess oil while providing a mattifying effect.
how_to_use: Apply after skin care. Gently massage a dime-sized amount onto skin with fingertips. Follow with Tinted Moisturiser or Foundation.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Triethylhexanoin, Isopropyl Myristate, Synthetic Wax, Phenoxyethanol, Squalane, Plankton Extract, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Silica, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Bht, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Polysorbate 60, Potassium Hydroxide. name: Natasha Denona Mini Bronze Palette
description: With everything from warm-toned mattes to eye-enhancing shimmers, the Mini Bronze may be small but it’s definitely mighty! Packed with powerhouse pigments from wet-look molten coppers, rich buttery terracotta mattes and copper-toned bronzes to iridescent true golds and beige mattes create a rich molten metallic look or summer-ready reinvention of the smokey eye. All you need is a brush or failing that, your fingertips will work just fine to apply each shadow. Prepare to fall in love with the rich pigment, seamless blend and longevity of each formula.
how_to_use: Matte eyeshadows: Apply with fluffy eyeshadow brushes to blend or detail brushes for precision. Metallic / Duo Chrome / Chroma Crystal eyeshadows: May be applied with different shapes of brushes for a subtle application. For high pay off / foiled finish, apply with a damp eyeshadow brush or with the tip of your finger.

name: The Nue Co. Barrier Culture Cleanser 120 ml.
description: Efficacious enough to use on its own (without a second cleanse!) to rid yourself of the day's dirt, grime, make up and SPF, the Barrier Culture Cleanser deeply cleanses skin without stripping, dehydrating or upsetting skin's pH levels via gentle and biodegradable cleansing agents derived from apples. Ideal for dry, dull and breakout-prone complexions, the vegan, soap-free (and paraben, sulphate and fragrance-free) formula harnesses patented tech to rebuild your microbiome, which helps you to ward off the negative effects of pollution and effectively lock in moisture. It does this by repairing the skin barrier via prebiotics, probiotics and postbiotics - all working in tandem to give you balanced, smooth, calm and happy skin. Coming in a delightfully decadent, velvety gel texture (that transforms into a light, milky foam when used), this next-gen cleanser will boost skin's natural immune system - helping it to defend itself against pollution, UV light, infection and dehydration.
how_to_use: Use in the PM to remove daily grime, makeup and pollution from the skin. Apply 1-2 pumps to damp skin, massage in and then rinse clean with warm water. Pat skin dry. Follow with the Barrier Culture Moisturiser.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Sodium Cocoyl Apple Amino Acids. Hydroxyethylcellulose, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Inulin, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Maltodextrin, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Hyaluronic Acid, Lactic Acid.

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml
description: Forming an invisible bandage on sore skin, La Roche-Posay's insulating Cicaplast Gel B5 brings instant relief to compromised and damaged skin. This is one treatment to keep stocked on your shelfie at all times. Your new personal at-home healer can be used by every member of the family to treat damaged skin and even when recovering from laser treatments and cosmetic peels. Working to stimulate new cell production is a complex of copper, manganese and zinc that are perfectly partnered with hyaluronic acid, drawing in all the water your skin is craving. Wondering what brings that instant relief? Panthenol is your hero ingredient at play here at 5% to immediately soothe sore skin. Using this just twice a day is enough to speed up healing times and improve your skin barrier health. It might sound too good to be true but this clinically tested treatment has the dermatologist seal of approval!
how_to_use: Apply twice a day to cleansed and dry skin. Do not apply directly on wounded skin. Avoid the eye contour area.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Polybutene, Sodium Citrate, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Zinc Gluconate, Madecassoside, Dimethiconol, Manganese Gluconate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Copper Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Tocopherol.

name: VIEVE 123 Precision Powder Brush
description: Featuring ultra-plush synthetic bristles, this versatile powder brush pairs up with your favourite pressed and loose powders to lock in your look with a level of precision. When big, fluffy brushes just aren’t cutting it, let the 123 Precision Powder Brush take centre stage. Working its magic with setting powders, the pointed design seamlessly delivers pigment under the eye, hard-to-reach areas around the mouth and nose, and across t-zones — where oilyness threatens to undo all your beautiful handiwork — for a soft, flawless finish. Being a VIEVE creation, this hardworking tool is as expertly-crafted as it is versatile, also working with bronzer to add dimension and sculpted definition.
how_to_use: Precisely set your look in place under the eyes, across the t-zone and around your nose and mouth with pressed or loose powder. Add expert definition by using the tapered end to create a sculpted look with bronzer. How to wash your brushes: Using a gentle soap, swirl each brush into the palm of your hand, rinsing downwards under lukewarm water until the water runs clear. Once clean, gently squeeze out and rest your brushes on a table with the bristle end hanging over the edge to air dry. VIEVE recommends washing your makeup brushes once a week.
ingredient: 100% vegan, synthetic bristles.

name: IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Pores Poreless Finish Airbrush Powder
description: Specially designed (with the help of plastic surgeons) to blur the appearance of pores and imperfections, IT Cosmetics' Bye Bye Pores Poreless Finish Airbrush Powder will leave your complexion smooth, even and 'poreless'. In a universal translucent shade, this imparts a silky, skin-perfecting finish, whatever your skin tone. Ideal for oily skin types or anyone worried about shine, this can be applied throughout the day for on-the-go touch-ups, doubling as a blotting powder too. As age-defying as it is pore-minimising, the formula features peptides, silk, hydrolysed collagen and antioxidants, creating a more youthful airbrushed-looking finish. Worn over make up or all by itself, this will swiftly become a mainstay in your make up collection.
how_to_use: Sweep a small amount onto skin using your favourite IT Cosmetics brush. Can be worn over makeup or on bare skin.
ingredient: Silica, Soluble Collagen, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Silk, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Niacinamide, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Aqua/Water/Eau, Algae Extract, Avena Sativa Kernel Extract, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Carbomer, Cholesteryl Chloride, Cholesteryl Nonanoate, Cholesteryl Oleyl Carbonate, Citric Acid, Glycerin, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea Leaf Extract, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Retinyl Palmitate, Rosa Canina Flower Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, [+/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499, Ci 77492, Ci 77491)]

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Waterproof Creme Color - Jet Matte
description: A cute pot of densely coloured pigment, Anastasia Beverly Hills’ Waterproof Crème Color combines the longevity, intensity and functionality we’ve all come to expect from the A-List’s go-to make up guru. With a weightless texture, this glides effortlessly over skin (no dragging or snagging) – adhering to even the oiliest eyelids – until you dictate otherwise. Anastasia Soare is known as THE definitive brow and make up expert. For examples of her work look to Kim Kardashian, Charlize Theron, J-Lo, Madonna, Megan Fox, Claudia Schiffer, Heidi Klum, Jada Pinkett-Smith, Oprah and Penelope Cruz (phew), all of whom have been lucky enough to benefit from the unparalleled ‘Anastasia’ eyebrow treatment. Former architect-turned-eyebrow maestro, Anastasia’s expertise shines through in every element of her self-named range; from the brilliant waterproof {Dipbrow Pomade}, to her innovative yet practical selection of powders, pencils, tools and brushes.

name: Too Faced Fluff and Hold Laminating Brow Wax
description: A vital last step in any well-versed brow routine, the Fluff and Hold Laminating Brow Wax is a hardworking brow gel that grips every hair and locks them in place all day long without any hint of crunchiness. Carefully crafted to ensure a flake-free hold, this invisible-finish gel boasts a laminating liquid wax formula that fluffs up brows – adding a boost of volume to even the most sparse of arches. Achieving the perfect hold that sits somewhere between natural and on-point definition, this dual-sided brush coats every hair evenly from root to tip. Prepare for eyebrow-raising looks in the best way possible.
how_to_use: Step 1: Apply onto clean, dry brows, using the wand applicator with a backcombing technique. Brush hair against the hair growth. Step 2: Before the liquid wax sets, place and press the comb against the skin and sweep upward slowly, until hair is laid flat. From the arch of the brow to the tail end, sweep hair in the natural direction of growth. Tip! For stubborn hairs, hold the wand in place for a few seconds and then brush up.
ingredient: Water\Aqua\Eau, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates Copolymer, Citric Acid, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol .

name: NARS Air Matte Lip Colour - Dragon Girl
description: A fresh spin on matte, NARS Air Matte Lip Colour marries formidable payoff with cushiony softness for flexible wear and a soft-focus finish. With a smooth creamy texture that glides over lips without snagging or caking, this formula’s jam-packed with pigment that’s beautifully buildable – layering effortlessly ‘til you reach the desired intensity (*dramatic music plays*). With its custom-designed applicator making it easy to distribute colour, alongside the innovative ‘Colour Diffusion Complex’ (a weightless blend of silky polymers and micropowders that move for a flexible, non-flaky finish), each limited-edition shade ensures a sexy, hazy look – whether you favour the bright red ‘Total Domination’, the warm beige of ‘Thrust’ or the rosy nude ‘Shag’… (we’ll have what she’s having).
how_to_use: Build and blend to perfection with a custom-designed applicator.
ingredient: All Yours: Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Flavor (Aroma), Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol. name: Huda Beauty Waterproof Lash Glue 7g
description: Say goodbye to falsies that peel from the corner of your eye halfway through the night! Huda Beauty’s Waterproof Lash Glue locks in the eyelash style of your choice with a grip so good, they won’t flutter off without your permission. Thanks to its jet black colour, this lash glue not only keeps your lashes in place, but it also enhances your natural lash line to create the illusion of thicker, voluminous lashes. It works with both your synthetic and natural Huda Beauty lashes and even stands strong against tears, sweat and rain! Easy to apply and drying in a matter of seconds, this long-lasting adhesive is bound to become a staple in your kit.
how_to_use: Apply a thin line along base of false lash (never apply directly to your eyelids.) Let adhesive set for 30 seconds or until sticky; during this time, holding the lash by both ends of the base strip, flex it back and forth forming the shape of a horseshoe (this contours the base strip to fit your eyelid easily and comfortably). Center the lash close to the base of your natural lashes and press ends into place. To secure the lash firmly, gently press down on the lash strip from one end to the other until adhesive is dry. To insure proper flow of adhesive, remove any hardened adhesive from tip of tube.
ingredient: Rubber Latex, Water, Fragrance, Cellulose Gum, Sodium, Dodecylbenzenesultonate.

name: Pat McGrath Labs Satinallure Lipstick 3.7g (Various Shades)
description: Pucker up for a colour story that only your lips can tell with the Satinallure Lipstick, a featherlight formula that glides on with ease and intensity. Available in six silky shades ranging from mauve pinks to bright scarlett reds, lock lips with a satin-meets-dewy finish that's guaranteed to turn heads. Infused with a botanical blend of collagen and passion fruit oil, this high-performing pigment not only imparts amorous colour but also maximum moisture.
how_to_use: Smooth lips with exfoliant and apply from side to side for creamy colour glistening with sensual shine. For extra definition and staying power, define lips with a coordinating PermaGel Ultra Lip Pencil (sold separately). For a dewy blotted effect, use the finger to press and roll colour onto the lip.
ingredient: Veiled Rose: Polybutene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyethylene, Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / CIre Microcrystalline, Dicalcium Phosphate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Collagen, Mica, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Propylene Carbonate, Tocopherol. name: Danessa Myricks Beauty Colorfix 24 Hour Cream Colour - Foil
description: Lauded for their award-winning potency and pigment, the Colorfix 24 Hour Cream Colour Foils offer fast-drying, dazzling pigment in an easy-to-use cream formula. Safe for use on lips, eyes and skin, use these for an ethereal highlight, stunning eye statements, or even for a pop of sun on your collarbones. Whatever you decide these long-wearing paints are richly pigmented and wont smudge or budge in water or high temps (so you can live your glitter-inspired dreams all summer long without sweating anything off). Playing well with wax, silicone and even oil-based products, these foils layer well with the rest of your make up, and you can mix shades to create your very own custom colours. With eight shades to choose between from Nebula, a warm gold, to Cosmic, a charcoal with hints of silver all thats left for you to do is pick your favourite shade, if you can
how_to_use: Use alone for a highly pigmented eye, lip or cheek. Layer beneath Metals or Micro Metals for an uber rich color payoff and lots of dimensionality. Layer with ColorFix Glaze for a glossy finish. This high-performance formula dries rapidly and should be blended quickly. Acts as a stand-alone eyeshadow, lip, or cheek, but also as a base for powder product.

name: INKED by Dani Butterfly Dreams Pack
description: Fancy getting a little creative with you look without committing to a trip down your nearest tattoo parlour? Welcome into your world: INKED by Dani’s Butterfly Dreams Pack, a selection of temporary tattoos of over 20 butterflies! Easily applied by simply soaking your carefully chosen design with warm water and transferring it on to your skin, these hand drawn designs can be applied anywhere and everywhere, with the promise of lasting up to two weeks. In fact, you can even use these to jazz up your space — each tattoo can be applied to any hard surface for a little bit of DIY magic. Ready to get creative? In this pack you’ll find minimalist line drawings and intricate illustrations of butterflies that make for a Y2K throwback.
how_to_use: Make sure application area is clean and dry. Peel off the plastic top sheet, place tattoo face down on your skin, and wet the back side of tattoo paper until completely soaked through with water. Press and hold for a few seconds, then gently peel off the paper to reveal your INKED.
ingredient: Acrylates / VA / Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer. May Contain: Black 2, Blue 1 Lake, Yellow 5 Lake, Red 7 Lake, Titanium Dioxide.

name: Pat McGrath Labs Skin Fetish Sublime Perfection Concealer Brush
description: Making all of our deepest make up desires a reality, Pat McGrath Labs has finally landed on Cult Beauty’s virtual shelves. Specifically designed to precisely and effortlessly apply and blend your cover-up is the Skin Fetish: Sublime Perfection Concealer Brush. Give your make up tool arsenal a serious glow-up in the form of the fetish-worthy brushes from the mother of make up herself. Uniquely angled to a precise 40 degrees, this concealer brush mimics the angle of Pat McGrath’s (!) fingertip, so you can achieve a catwalk-ready finish from the comfort of your own home. Expertly designed — and rigorously tested on all the most lusted-after runways — you can sleep easy knowing that your face is getting the very best of the best. The key to a flawless canvas, this effortlessly blends your concealer into your skin with unparalleled precision and artistic ease. No bristle has gone unturned in the making of this plush brush, boasting cruelty-free fibres and reaching the smallest contours and curves of your complexion, this tapered tool covers everything from spots to dark under eyes.
how_to_use: Use with Skin Fetish: Sublime Perfection Concealer to ensure precise coverage and seamless blending. For a naturally flawless effect, apply in thin layers and buff to gradually build coverage. Gently diffuse by using sweeping or tapping motions while you blend out. Multifunctional use: The Brush’s versatile shape is also ideal for detailed eyeshadow application, blurring or correcting lip colour or adding highlighter to the brow bone.
ingredient: Eco-Friendly FSC-Certified Wood. Vegan, 100% Synthetic. Cruelty-Free Fibres.

name: Laura Mercier RoseGlow Liquid Highlighter 12ml (Various Shades)
description: Drench your skin in pearlescent radiance with Laura Mercier’s RoseGlow Liquid Highlighter — a long-lasting, lightweight formula that’ll bring any (and every) make up look to life. Add a sheer glaze of gold-toned colour to your canvas with the RoseGlow Liquid Highlighter, the newest addition to Laura Mercier’s bestselling RoseGlow collection. Available in a range of shimmering shades, designed to suit all skin tones, the RoseGlow Liquid Highlighter — made with soft silica powders for a blurred (but lit-from-within) finish — is wearable on its own or as the final touch to your make up routine.
how_to_use: Twist the applicator to the ’on’ position and gently squeeze tube until product appears on the tip of the sponge. Tap sponge tip on back of hand to desaturate. Dab a dot or two of RoseGlow Liquid onto cheekbones, then blend with the Crème Cheek Colour Brush or your fingers. Twist the applicator to the ’off’ position before replacing cap. RoseGlow Liquid Highlighter can be applied on clean skin, or after foundation or tinted moisturiser.
ingredient: Water (Aqua/Eau), Hydrogenated Didecene, Isododecane, Mica, Glycerin, Propanediol, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Silica, Sodium Chloride, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, 1,2-hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Trisodium Ethylenediamine.

name: Saie Glowy Super Skin Foundation 30ml (Various Shades)
description: Formulated with 85% (yes, you read that right... 85%) skin care ingredients, this lightweight, foundation is a sure-fire way to achieve the laid-back no-make up make up look. Held within this skin-perfecting formula you'll find what the brand calls its Hydrobounce Complex with cross-linked hyaluronic acid, non-equilibrium hyaluronic acid, polyglutamic acid and rice bran peptides as well as squalane, glycerin and 15% lightweight pigment, delivers a bouncy, radiant look, all working to grant a radiant complexion. Thanks to a buildable, medium coverage you can customise your base day in and day out while visibly improving everything from texture to tone. Fall in love with your skin again, and again, and again...
how_to_use: Buff and blend glowy super skin foundation using the base brush for a weightless, true-to-skin finish.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyhydroxystearate, Polyester-7, Mica, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Squalane, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phyllanthus Emblica (Amla) Fruit Extract, Althaea Officinalis (Marshmallow) Root Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Magnesium Stearate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Trihydroxystearin, Polyglycerin - 6, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Stearic Acid, Tocopherols, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Polyglutamic Acid. [+/- May Contain/ Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492, Ci 77499, Ci 77491)]

name: Clé de Peau Beauté Pore Refining Mattifying Veil 35ml
description: Creamy and luxurious, the Pore-Refining Mattifying Veil cloaks skin in a soft, hydrating and mattifying blanket without feeling greasy or heavy. Best paired with Clé de Peau Beauté's {Radiant Fluid Foundation Matte}, this formula swiftly diminishes and blurs the look of pores - eliminating shine without making you look dull. Ideal for slick complexions, this primer-meets-skin care formula hydrates, brightens and smooths skin instantly and over time. Offering a natural matte finish with light to medium coverage, the Pore-Refining Mattifying Veil boasts SPF 25 to protect you from the sun's rays and its skin-damaging effects. Using the brand's unique Porous Matte Powder Complex, excess sebum is absorbed to reveal a radiant, even finish, while a Light-Empowering Enhancer encourages radiance and a Skin-Empowering Illuminator (with real platinum golden silk!) hydrates, plumps and encourages skin to protect itself against different types of stress. And of course, the formula prolongs the longevity of your foundation - giving it a new lease of life with a fresh finish that won't crease over time.
how_to_use: Apply to face following skincare. Squeeze a small amount of cream onto fingertips and apply to five points (forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks) on the face. Smooth evenly over skin. Allow base to set before applying foundation. Recommended amount: once a day. Lasts for approximately 4 months.

name: Beautyblender Blender Defender Protective Carrying Case
description: It was beginning to feel like an age-old, unsolvable problem – what do you do with your damp Beautyblender if you need to transport it. The original Beautyblender has quickly become a beauty phenomenon; with its elliptical shape and super-strong sponge material allowing for flawless application of foundation, primer and BB/CC creams, it's a definite make up bag must-have. Yet, no one wants a soggy sponge in their make up bag – enter, the Beautyblender Blender Defender! An ultra-convenient protective case, this houses your Beautyblender perfectly – it features a vibrant pink lid and a black base, plus super-cute little Beautyblender-shaped ventilation holes to help dry your sponge and prevent the formation of bacteria.
how_to_use: Use to carry your Beautyblender safely and securely.
ingredient: Silicone.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Darkside Waterproof Eyeliner
description: Anastasia Beverly Hills’ Darkside Waterproof Gel Liner combines the super-smooth texture and intensity of a gel with the convenience of a crayon for quick, convenient and long-lasting eye enhancement. Water-resistant, you can use it to define your waterline without risk of the colour running, smudging or transferring, while the slim tip allows for ultra-fine, liquid-like results. Inky black, this is a must-have weapon in your eye-enhancing arsenal – perfect for achieving feline flicks or lived-in, smoky smoulder…
how_to_use: For a dramatic, winged eye look, trace the pencil along the upper lashlines, drawing the line up past the outer corners of the eyes. Alternatively, use to 'tightline' and define the waterline, or to create a lived-in, smoky-eyed look - just blur to soften any lines before the colour sets.
ingredient: Cyclopentasiloxane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire De Candelilla/Candelilla Cera, Isododecane, Beesxwax/Cire D'abeille/Cera Alba, Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcristalline/Cera Microcristallina, Paraffin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Montan Wax/Montan Cera, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax /Cire De Carnauba/Cera Carnauba, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: Iron Oxide (CI 77499), Black 2 (CI 77266), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).

name: Too Faced Natural Bronzer - Sun Bunny 8g
description: The ultimate secret for creating believable, sun-kissed radiance, Sun Bunny Natural Bronzer by Too Faced stars a duo of subtly shimmering shades. Whether you use these separately to shape and subtly contour or blend the two to achieve a bespoke shade suited to your skin tone, the versatility of this bronzer will be the key to your success. Blending effortlessly, the velvety powder is a dream to use, creating a rich, healthy-looking tan that’s sure to attract many an envious glance. What’s more, along with the entire Too Faced range, you can rest assured that this is cruelty-free.
how_to_use: Use to contour or combine the two shades for a customised glow. Top Tip: Combine both bronze shades and apply over the forehead, nose and cheeks.
ingredient: Mica, Talc, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Nylon-12, Zinc Stearate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbic Acid. May Contain/Peut Contenir/(+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Manganese Violet (CI 77742)

name: Versed Mood Lighting Luminizing Glow Drops Sheer Golden
description: Dousing you with a healthy glow come rain or shine, the Mood Lighting Luminizing Glow Drops bestow deliciously luminous skin while nourishing your precious complexion with skin-boosting ingredients. With the consistency of a serum but the transformative powers of make up, this lightweight elixir features superfine light-reflecting pigments to enhance skin’s natural radiance, effortlessly casting a no make up-make up glow while evening skin tone. With polyglutamic acid — a skin-strengthening, powerful peptide — the formula plumps skin and helps it to retain moisture alongside antioxidant-rich blackberry extract, which also fortifies the skin barrier. Whether you choose ‘Sheer Golden’ or 'Sheer Bronzed’ (each shade suits a swathe of skin tones and can be worn alone or even mixed), try wearing it instead of make up or mixed with your foundation for a skin-smoothing, soft focus glow.
how_to_use: How: Smooth 2-3 Luminizing Glow Drops into dry skin or mix 1-2 drops into your moisturizer or face makeup. Where: Entire face — or anywhere you want to glow. When: As the last step in your skincare routine after moisturizer and/or SPF. Or, if mixing, with your moisturizer or foundation. Good To Know: For an extra dewy glow, mix the Luminizing Glow Drops with Sunday Morning or your favourite face oil. Use within nine months once opened, or keep it on your vanity unopened for up to two years.

name: Huda Beauty Rich Nude Obsessions
description: Love your Huda palette but can’t fit it in your make up bag? Or just desperate to sample the shadows that have sent the beauty world into a spin? The answer has arrived (at last!) with Huda Beauty’s Rich Nude Obsessions Palette, a slimline edit of the most sought-after deep neutral mattes and brightening shimmer shades that make mesmer-eyes-ing eye looks seem effortless. The ultimate capsule make up wardrobe, this unites nine ultra-versatile, buttery smooth shadows – four vibrant duo-chrome shimmers and five creamy mattes. We’re completely besotted with the range of hues and textures and you're guaranteed to fall head-over-heels too – especially with the beautifully versatile range of deep ruby, brick red, warm walnut and speckled bronzes.
how_to_use: Apply with fingers or brushes for endless eye enhancement.

name: By Terry Lash-Expert Twist Brush Mascara - Black
description: Providing two perfect mascaras in one, By Terry’s Lash-Expert Twist Brush is an innovation in lash enhancement. The ingenious brush is the real star of the show here: the original position offers infinite lengthening opportunities, creating long, comfortably stretched and separated lashes. After some volume well? Too easy. Simply twist the handle and watch the wand transform into a shorter, more densely packed spiral-aligned brush – perfect for adding immediate volume and creating thicker, fuller lashes in just a few strokes. As if the brush isn’t tempting enough, the extra-black, pigmented and super-buildable formula features a cocktail of three protective oils – jojoba, olive and avocado – to nourish, lengthen and volumise, three rich waxes – candelilla, carnauba and rice bran – to extend and protect and, finally, hydrolysed keratin to moisturise and prevent breakage.
how_to_use: Use the brush in its original position to lengthen then twist the handle to change the brush and use to build volume.
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Cyclopentasiloxane, Oryza Sativa Bran Cera / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Stearyl Esters, Alcohol Denat., Palmitic Acid, Triethanolamine, Stearic Acid, Acacia Senegal Gum, Euphorbia Cerifera Cera / Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Vp/Va Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Chlorphenesin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Ascorbic Acid, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Biotin, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Serenoa Serrulata Fruit Extract, Methyl Alcohol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Equisetum Arvense Leaf Extract, Sorbic Acid. (T32202a1)

name: Westman Atelier Squeaky Clean Liquid Lip Balm
description: Squeaky Clean in more ways than one, the Squeaky Clean Liquid Lip Balm is consciously crafted without any gluten, parabens or silicones, and will instantly have lips looking fresh, plump and juicy via its 'bouncy' hybrid formula that strikes the perfect balance between a balm, lip oil, gloss and tint. Delicately tinted to give lips a sheer, soft and natural-looking hue, this weightless balm-treatment amplifies the look of lips with a heavenly texture that envelopes, comforts and protects skin. With an innovative gel-oil system that imparts a pillowy sheen, this easy-to-use, on-the-go colour can be worn alone or over lipstick to add depth and shine with zero stickiness. A nourishing blend of organic jojoba, almond oil and argan oils works to hydrate and soften, while shea butter soothes and seed oils offer the gleam without any 'gloop'. With six just-bitten, translucent colours on array from soft nudes to vivid reds theres a shade for every skin tone, occasion and lip balm addict. All created with naturally derived pigments that will effortlessly melt on contact to enhance tone, try Chou Chou for a pale pink, Nou Nou to achieve a soft coral, Nana if you fancy a dusty rose, Garaonne for a berry mauve treat, Ma Puce if a pop of fuchsia tickles your pickle, or Pipsqueak if you need a power red to complete your look.
how_to_use: Swipe over lips and then marvel at them in the mirror.

name: Kosas Brow Pop Dual-Action Defining Pencil 0.08g (Various Shades)
description: Whether you’re struggling with hair loss, you simply over-tweezed in the ’90s or you just want to add a bit of definition, the BROW POP Dual-Action Defining Pencil will have you covered. Delivering hair-like fullness and definition to even the sparsest of arches, this pencil features a triangular tip that imparts both thick and whisper-thin strokes. Precise and richly pigmented, you can use it to fill, shape, sculpt, feather and even blend (thanks to the help of a built-in spoolie). Totally vegan and made without the likes of artificial fragrance, silicone, mineral oil or microplastics, this do-good formula even cares for hairs and encourages hair growth via nourishing castor oil and panthenol provitamin B5.
how_to_use: Use the thin tip of the triangle to create hair-like strokes. Use the thicker side to fill in more sparse areas that need a little more love. Then use the spoolie brush to shape it up and blend the pigment through. Tip: Layer Air Brow tinted gel and/or Air Brow clear gel over Brow Pop for the full Kosas brow look (peak tint, volume and hold).
ingredient: Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Mica, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, [+/ -: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Iron Oxides (CI 77491)]

name: Charlotte Tilbury The Super Nudes
description: Reimagining the iconic {Matte Revolution} formula in four modern nude tones, The Super Nudes are Charlotte Tilbury's love letter to the pouts of perfectly poised '90s supermodels. Prepare to channel your inner Naomi Campbell and Kate Moss... This luscious matte lipstick not only imparts bold, kiss-proof colour but also hydrates and protects lips with a delicate blend of oils and waxes, together with 'lipstick tree' and orchid extracts. Rich in light-diffusing pigments to create the illusion of enhanced lip fullness, the pigment payoff is second to none velvety-textured but non-drying, this formula keeps lips soft and nourished while creating an arresting make up look. Choose from a quartet of stunning shades: 'Catwalking' (a neutral nude peach), 'Supermodel' (mid-toned nude rose), 'Cover Star' (nude muted apricot) and 'Super Fabolous' (deep rosewood brown nude).
how_to_use: Apply straight from the bullet for fuller, wider-looking lips in seconds!

name: Hourglass Arch Brow Sculpting Pencil 0.4g
description: Get immaculate arches in one easy step with Hourglass Arch Brow Sculpting Pencil, a mechanical brow pencil that combines the benefits of powder, pencil and wax formulations to create natural-looking definition. The secret to this pencils success? The unique triangular shape, which allows you to sculpt with broad strokes using the flat edge of the pencil, as well as fill in fine lines using the pointed tip, to create the illusion of fullness without looking obvious. The sleek, double-ended tool features a spoolie at one end for effortless grooming and blending, while the buildable pencil end comes in nine versatile shades to flatter and enhance your hair colour. From light, cool Platinum Blonde to dark brown Natural Black, via medium brown to deep red Auburn, theres one to flatter every pair of brows out there.
how_to_use: 1. Twist up slightly until the product reveals itself. 2. Define your brow shape by using the pencil to outline your desired brow shape using the wider edge of the pencil. 3. Fill in any sparse areas to even out your brow using small strokes. 4. Use the brush on the other end to groom and blend brows in place.
ingredient: Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Ozokerite, Mica, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Acrylates/Stearyl Acrylate/Dimethicone Methacrylate Copolymer, Synthetic Wax, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylparaben, Bht. May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)

name: Huda Beauty Sticky Tack Latex-Free Lash Glue 7g
description: Deescalating pre-night-out stress levels and making your life so much easier, this ingenious Sticky Tack Lash Glue is designed to coat your favourite falsies in a long-lasting adhesive formula with an incredible re-stickable grip that clings to your lash line (even after multiple misfires). Say goodbye to crooked lash line despair... This glue grants four hours of re-sticking potential, all without compromising the Herculean hold of your lashes – they’ll stay strong for up to 12 hours. What’s more, the lash glue dries to a clear line so even if you need to peel off your lashes it won’t affect your eyeshadow artistry. If that wasn’t enough, the latex-free, ophthalmologically tested formula is designed with even the most sensitive eyes in mind.
how_to_use: Align the band with the natural lash line and trim off any excess from the outer corner of the lashes. Apply a thin line of glue along the lash band. Wait for a few minutes to maximise stickiness. Fix the band close to your natural lash line. If you need to re-position, gently peel the lash off without removing the glue, and re-apply, for up to 4 hours.
ingredient: Acrylates Copolymer, Water/Aqua/Eau.

name: benefit Playtint Pink-Lemonade Lip and Cheek Stain 6ml
description: A flattering incarnation of the cult-classic tint, Benefit’s Playtint Lip & Cheek Stain is inspired by the delicate hue of rose lemonade. Destined to be a legend in its own right, this non-drying formula boasts the same lightweight feel and long-wearing coverage, all with a playful pink flush. Like its bestselling siblings, this tint is totally, honestly, completely kiss-proof and offers hours of gorgeous, face-flattering wear. The sheer liquid formulation glides onto skin to give an instantly uplifting wash of colour – it’s fabulous on faces and luscious on lips and can be applied precisely with the new doe-foot applicator for an ultra-natural, pink flush. Bestowing the ultimate healthy glow wherever it’s applied, this smudge- and transfer-proof tint glides on effortlessly for a fresh, flattering colour that lasts all day — no touch-ups needed.
how_to_use: Glide onto lips and layer to build intensity. Dot and blend quickly onto cheeks for a long-lasting flush. BEAUTY TIP: For ombre lips, dab on the inner part of lips & blend outward with your fingertip.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Diisostearyl Malate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Phenoxyethanol, Lecithin, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Citrate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Citric Acid, Propyl Gallate. name: Natasha Denona Mini Bronze and Glow 4g
description: Designed to help you create a covetable bronzy glow, the Natasha Denona Mini Bronze & Glow unites two a brand favourite, the ‘Glow Extreme’ highlighter from the much-loved Diamond & Blush palette in ‘Citrus’, and a new bronze blush shade. Universally flattering, the highlighter grants a multidimensional, dazzling finish while the velvety bronze ‘Blush’ imparts a natural glow. Thanks to its neat, perfectly portable size, you can take this everywhere and apply effortlessly on-the-glow. Housed in a handbag-sized palette with a compact mirror, this makes the perfect mini present (or guilt-free treat-to-self) that keeps on giving.
how_to_use: Apply the BLUSH on the apples of the cheeks with a blush brush. Apply the GLOW EXTREME on the upper cheek bones with your ﬁnger or a highlighting brush.
ingredient: Glow Extreme (Diamond & Blush, Citrus): Talc, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Mica, Diisostearyl Malate, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Polybutene, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Isopropyl Isostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Tin Oxide, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Oleate, Citric Acid +/- : Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides. name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Soft Glam Palette
description: Almost certain to become the most-coveted palette of the season, Anastasia Beverly Hills’ Soft Glam Eye Shadow Palette features 14 highly pigmented, long-lasting powders in a spectrum of foolproof neutrals, hypnotic iridescents and glamorous metallics. There are pastel pink, warm brown and peachy shades, making this the perfect palette for both day and night-time looks – and it’s more than a little bit ‘bridal’ (do we hear wedding bells!?) With seven brand new shades and seven familiar favourites, this cleverly curated collection that will give your lid looks a new lease of – oh-so enviable – life. There’s ultra-matte velvety beige ‘Tempera’, iridescent gold with a hint of pink ‘Glistening’, ultra-matte pastel peach ‘Orange Soda’, rose gold with soft pink iridescence ‘Rose Pink’, satin metallic warm chocolate brown ‘Sultry’, metallic golden bronze ‘Bronze’, ultra-matte mulberry ‘Mulberry’, ultra-matte dusty lilac ‘Dusty Rose’, multi-dimensional light gold ‘Fairy’, ultra-matte deep orange ‘Burnt Orange’, ultra-matte earthy brown ‘Sienna’, ultra-matte deep cinnamon brown ‘Rustic’, ultra-matte dark coffee ‘Cyprus Umber’ and, last but not least, ultra-matte deep carbon black ‘Noir’.
how_to_use: High-pigment shadows can be worn dry for a sheer wash of colour or wet for added drama, or to transform shadow into liner and achieve more intense pigment payoff.

name: benefit Butterfly Orange Tangerine Blush Powder 6g
description: Delicate yet bold, the Wanderful World Blushes Butterfly Golden Orange Powder Blusher is a golden tangerine-inspired blush that seeks to impart a radiant, lit-from-within luminosity. The silky-smooth, ultra-fine blush blends effortlessly across the complexion to deliver a flush of soft, shimmering colour. Infused with freshwater pearl and synthetic sapphires, the orange-toned blush powder bestows an ethereal-looking glow to the complexion. Complimenting a range of skin tones, the blush can be lightly applied for a barely-there tint, building to a rich warm tone.
ingredient: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Zinc Stearate, Mica, Lauryl Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Alumina, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dehydroacetic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pearl Powder, Stearic Acid, Laureth-4, Aqua (Water), Tin Oxide, Tocopherol. [+/- Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake)].

name: Embryolisse Lait-Crème Fluid (500ml)
description: A lighter version of Embryolisse’s best-loved Lait-Crème Concentré, this easily absorbed lotion contains all the brand’s signature nourishing and hydrating ingredients in a silky, featherweight formula. Brilliant for face and body, the lightweight liquid can be used to hydrate, prime and gently melt make up, which is why this is a must-have multi-tasker (and firm fixture of French women’s bathroom cabinets). Suitable for even sensitive skin (it can be used to soothe sunburn, after shaving and for baby care), the one-size-fits-all lotion will leave your skin soft and supple however it’s used. Nous l’aimons! It's available in both 75ml and 500ml sizes.

name: NARS Cosmetics Applicators Eyelash Curler
description: Designed with a matte black finish, NARS' Eyelash Curler is as easy to use as it is sleek to look at. A must for anyone looking to accentuate short, naturally straight lashes, this classic tool will have you on your way to a fluttery, curled effect. Featuring a curved design to fit various eye shapes and soft contoured pads to gently curl, this trusty device allows you to create an elongated curl instead of a crimped finish right from the lash root. A must-have for long lash lovers, you need to add this to your grooming arsenal, stat!
how_to_use: Position the curler, with the handles open as far as they go, at the base of your upper lashline, gently squeeze together and hold for 5 seconds. Then move slowly up the lash squeezing gently and releasing as you go. Release handles fully before removing the curler to avoid pulling or breaking the lashes.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Brow Cheat Refill
description: Whether your eyebrows are thin and sparse, thick and unruly or faded and lacking in shape, use Charlotte Tilburys Brow Cheat Refill to fake fuller-looking brows with ease all while saving the planet by helping you to produce less waste; simply twist and click into place on your old {Brow Cheat} pen. With a superfine nib that allows for perfectly defined, natural-looking micro strokes, you can mimic the look of real brow hairs to shape, feather and fill your arches. Formulated to stay all day (as in, for a huge sixteen hours), smudge-proof, humidity-proof, waterproof and sweat-resistant, this essential tool is even rich in emollients like carnauba wax to allow for smooth application, while vitamin E conditions. Available in various shades with varying undertones, choose between Light Blonde, Taupe, Soft Brown, Natural Brown, Medium Brown, Dark Brown, Black Brown and Natural Black to lift and enhance your brows no matter your skin tone or hair colour.
how_to_use: To replace your {Brow Cheat} pencil with your refill, simply pull to remove the empty pencil top and twist and click!

name: Beautyblender Blendercleanser Solid Charcoal 28g
description: This charcoal-infused solid cleansing bar for brushes and sponges not only lasts for ages, but also has a gorgeous lavender scent (turning your brush cleaning into a mini aromatherapy session). With its new jumbo size and new formula, it also comes with a silicone scrubbing pad to (gently) put your brushes and sponges through their paces, dislodging every last scrap of dirt and make up. Now available in the original size (150g) and a sized-to-try bar (28g), your blending besties will be looking good as new in no time at all!
how_to_use: blend.cleanse.repeat Step 1: Swirl and compress sponge onto soap, working into a lather. Pressing the sponge releases oxygen allowing blendercleanser solid in. Step 2: Bounce the blender against the silicone pad, drawing the soap in and easing the makeup out. And of course, you can use the silicone pad to cleanse makeup brushes as well. Gently squeeze beautyblender or makeup brushes and rinse again to remove any excess cleanser and water. Squeeze away excess water with a towel. Step 3: Set beautyblender out to dry completely in a clean, well-ventilated area and re-use. beautyblenders need light and air to avoid growing mold. Wet sponges should never be stored in a ziploc bag, a drawer, or any closed space. Use the lid of your canister as a drying pedestal, and set your damp blender on it. Allow the blendercleanser solid to dry on the silicone pad.
ingredient: Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Water, Glycerin, Coconut Acid, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Palmitic Acid, Fragrance, Sodium Chloride, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder.

name: Natasha Denona Bronze Palette
description: Designed so that you can combine any three shades in a row to create an entire look, Natasha Denona’s Bronze Eyeshadow Palette is an effortless way to refresh all your eye-enhancing skills. The three rows unite a range of powerhouse pigments from wet-look molten coppers, rich buttery terracotta mattes and duo-chrome hazelnuts to iridescent true golds and statement bronze, raspberry and blueberry. Perfect for creating a rich molten metallic look or summer-ready reinvention of the smokey eye, simply use a brush or your fingertips to apply each shadow and prepare to fall in love with the rich pigment, seamless blend and longevity of each formula.
how_to_use: Apply with Natasha Denona eyeshadow brushes to blend your shades together seamlessly.

name: RÓEN Eyes On Me Eyeshadow Palette
description: Taking the multi-dimensional glassy glow to a whole new level is the Lid Illume 4 Eyes On Me Palette, with four perfectly pigmented copper and rose gold hues. These long-lasting shades are the pop of colour our make up bags have been waiting for. We’re feeling just about ready to walk the red carpet with eyeshadoews this glam. RÓEN’s dreamily luxe formulas are, of course, vegan, cruelty-free and gluten-free and harmoniously combined in the picture-perfect hues we never knew we needed. Housed in this pewter-toned palette you’ll find two buttery powders and two of the iconic Lid Illume eyeshadows that bring a whole new dimension to your look with the ultimate glassy-glow. Build and blend to your hearts content with ‘Filter’ a shimmering cream base, ‘Selfie’ a burnt orange that’s bound to make baby blues pop, ‘Flash’ the rose gold sparkle of our eyes and ‘Polaroid’ for the matte-toned copper that we just can’t quit. Wear alone or blend seamlessly together to achieve a myriad of attention-grabbing looks, this foolproof palette is basking in the copper-toned limelight.
how_to_use: With our Lid Illumes being a first of its kind formula, here’s a few tips to get you started: Upon first use, swirl your fingertip in a circular motion on each eyeshadow shade. Don’t be afraid to use firm pressure. This will activate our Lid Illumes for optimal colour payoff. For more pigment, apply directly to your eyelid using your fingertip. For a diffused wash of colour, use our Everything Eye Brush. Be sure to use firm pressure. Push, swipe, swirl, layer, and have fun. Mix and match the colours and let your creativity or simplicity SHINE!
ingredient: Filter: Mica, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Synthetic Beeswax, Isopropyl Myristate, Iron Oxide (CI 77491), Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Bismuth oxychloride (CI 77163), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Magnesium Silicate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire de candelilla, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol. name: Westman Atelier Vital Pressed Skincare Powder 5g (Various Shades)
description: Ultra-sheer and finely milled, this setting powder feels supremely soft on skin and sets make up with a silky-smooth finish that is never cakey. What's more, it even packs in skin care actives to control sebum over time and lend a brightening effect via vitamin C. The Vital Pressed Skincare Powder employs Westman Atelier's 'Skin Defense Shield Complex' made up of vitamin C and probiotics to protect skin from free radicals (which can speed up ageing) and blue light. Not to mention the antioxidant-rich vitamin C is almost unparalleled when it comes to giving your skin that lit-from-within glow. Actives are pressed into the powder so that over time, your skin can enjoy sebum control and quinoa seed extract refines skin and reduces the appearance of pores. All of that and we haven't even gotten to the make up part yet! This feathery-light powder sets make up with ease, controls shine and thanks to its talc-free formula, you don't have to worry about an ashy finish.
how_to_use: Simply buff the powder over your foundation for long-lasting, locked-in coverage.
