name: 19/99 Beauty Cream Contour Stick 8g (Various Shades)
description: From makers of multi-generational beauty, 19/99, comes this seamless sculpting stick to throw shade just where you want it. Lightweight but wax-rich, the Cream Contour Stick has a buttery texture that melts into skin without fading, feeling greasy or settling into fine lines and pores. Swipe on and blend out to create soft shadows and light sculpting, or build up for a dramatically chiselled effect. Whatever your contour style, it creates a beautiful finish that always looks like skin. Cream Contour Stick comes in two shades with natural-looking undertones: ‘TEA’, a warm-toned medium brown for fair to medium skin tones, and ‘KAVE’, a neutral deep-brown for medium-deep to deep skin tones.
how_to_use: Swipe on wherever you’d like to add shadow. Blend out with fingertips or a brush for sculpted definition.
ingredient: Diisostearyl malate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Silica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Titanium dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxide (CI 77492), VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Mica (CI 77019), Euphorbia Cerifera (candelilla) Wax, Iron Oxide (CI 77491), Iron Oxide (CI 77499), 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate.

name: Cult Beauty Kraft Paper Make Up Bag
description: If, like us, you’re looking at ways to transform your beauty habits for the betterment of the planet, allow us to introduce you to the Kraft Paper Make Up Bag – made to safely (and kindly!) house the beauty booty of any self-respecting CB addict. Impeccably sized for storing and transporting all make up and skin care essentials, this case is made with a 100% organic cotton lining and 100% recycled kraft paper outer, which remains unbleached to keep chemical processing down to a minimum – without compromising on strength or aesthetics. Because shunning single-use goods is no longer enough, let us help you to help the planet with this one teeny step further – tidying your make up and skin care faves within this CB-branded, planet-friendly, reusable pouch that works just that little bit harder…
how_to_use: Use this case to house your daily beauty must-haves. Care Instructions: Sponge clean only.
ingredient: Bag Dimensions: approx. 20cmW x 13.5cmH x 8.5cmD Fabric Composition: 100% recycled kraft paper outer, 100% organic cotton lining

name: Kate Somerville Travel Size ExfoliKate Cleanser Daily Foaming Wash 50ml
description: A seriously clever cleanser, Kate Somerville’s ExfoliKate Cleanser gently removes excess oil, make up and surface impurities while also exfoliating away dulling, uneven cells to diminish dryness and reveal unrivalled radiance. How does it reap such miraculous results, you might well ask? It’s all down to gently exfoliating ingredients, including a duo of alpha hydroxy acids – glycolic and lactic acids – and Kate’s ‘three Ps for perfect skin’: pineapple, pumpkin and papaya enzymes. These advanced additions work to counteract dullness, dryness and uneven skin tone and texture by loosening and sloughing away dead, dulling cells to reveal the beautifully balanced, even radiance beneath. Purifying without over-drying, Kate Somerville’s creamy daily foaming facial wash leaves skin fresh, soft and conditioned – it’s the perfect way to cleanse.
how_to_use: Use AM and PM, twice a day. Apply a small amount to wet face and neck and massage gently for 30 seconds. Rinse and gently pat dry. Please be mindful that Kate Somerville is a clinical brand who pride themselves on real results. While they infuse active ingredients with vitamins and botanicals for minimal downtime, if you haven’t used a particular ingredient at a clinically proven level before, we recommend you always patch test first. (Apply to a small area of the skin).
ingredient: Water, Stearic Acid, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Cetearyl Phosphate, Xylitylglucoside, Dimethicone PEG-8 Meadowfoamate, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Bromelain, Papain, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Fruit Ferment Filtrate, Lauramide DIPA, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Aniba Rosaeodora (Rosewood) Wood Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Geranium Maculatum Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex (CI 75810), Maltodextrin

name: Hourglass Veil Soft Focus Setting Spray 120ml
description: Joining the brand's beloved Veil collection, Hourglass' all-new and incredibly lightweight Veil Soft Focus Setting Spray sets make up while blurring imperfections and dries down to a wonderfully dewy, soft-focus finish that you'll adore. This lightweight Veil Soft Focus Setting Spray not only sets make up while blurring imperfections, it also hydrates and grants a dewy finish. Undetectable on the skin and applied via the finest mist you'll ever come across, this hydrating mist creates a smooth, even and naturally radiant appearance for a healthy-looking complexion. The spray's water-resistant properties also enhance foundation for maximum staying power, setting it in place for up to 24 hours. It's our new obsession and it's about to become your too.
how_to_use: Shake well and hold 10 inches from face. Close eyes and firmly press pump to release a generous mist over makeup. Allow formula to dry before opening eyes. Warnings: Causes eye irritation. Keep out of eyes. Avoid inhaling product during application.
ingredient: Water/Aqua, Propanediol, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Pentylene Glycol,Trimethylpentanediol/Adipic, Acid/Glycerin Crosspolymer, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Isostearic Acid, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Amodimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Hexylene Glycol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Extract, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Maltodextrin, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Potassium

name: Danessa Myricks Beauty Linework Eyeliner - Onyx 1ml
description: Every artist needs the right tools to create a masterpiece — and the same goes for your make up. Danessa Myricks’ eyeliner merges a water- and smudge-proof formula with a paintbrush-inspired tip for a smooth (and effortless!) application. Perfecting smokey eyes or sultry flicks? Cue Linework. Formulated with ‘Ever Flow’ technology, this demi-matte product provides continuous flow for skip-free lining — and has 560 tapered bristles to give you maximum control and versatility in whatever look you’re creating. What’s more, it forms a flexible film on the skin to ensure your artistry lasts all day long.
how_to_use: For thicker lines, apply more pressure and glide using the full length of the brush. For thinner lines, apply less pressure and glide using the tip of the brush. Pro Tip: For an easy, graphic look, draw a line, starting at the tip of the wing, that glides inwards onto the crease.
ingredient: Water/aqua/eau, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Propylene Glycol, Laureth-21, Pentylene Glycol, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Ppg-2-deceth-30, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Carbon Black/CI 77266 (Nano).

name: NARS Cosmetics Pencil Sharpener
description: Sleek, chic and incredibly high-performing, NARS’ Pencil Sharpener represents everything we love about this brilliant brand. This custom-designed dual blade sharpener is an essential tool for sharpening pencils of every size to guarantee precise make up application. With two sharpening holes – one for standard and one for larger-sized pencils – this is all you need for sharpening your favourite brow, lip and eye definers. It includes a blade cleaner and a cover to capture shavings for effortless, mess-free sharpening on-the-go, sans mess.
how_to_use: Use to sharpen your make up pencils.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Colour Chameleon
description: Achieve glamorous, hypnotic eyes in an instant with Charlotte's easy-to-use Colour Chameleon shadow pencils. With a jewel-box of colours to choose from, there's a sumptuous shade to suit every skin tone and eye colour. 'Bronzed Garnet' and 'Amethyst Aphrodisiac' enhance the emerald hue of green eyes; 'Golden Quartz' and 'Smokey Emerald' make hazel eyes dazzle, while 'Champagne Diamonds' and 'Black Diamonds' are perfect for bringing out those baby blues. And if you're blessed with mesmer-eyes-ing brown eyes, try 'Amber Haze' or 'Dark Pearl' - both of which intensify the depth of chocolate eyes for the most sultry and seductive stare. With a super-soft creamy formula, the shadow glides on straight from the stick (with no snagging!) - just blend with fingers to achieve a 'lived in' look (that sets in 30 seconds).
how_to_use: Make sure your pencil is as sharp as possible! Run the eye shadow pencil along the lash line and blend upwards and outwards across the socket. Sweep, blend or smudge with your finger apply it any way you want to. Work quickly as this brilliant formula will set after 30 seconds and stay in place until its time to take it off!

name: Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eye Colour Travel Size 1g (Various Shades)
description: One of Laura Mercier's most adored products from the range, it's no surprise that we couldn't wait to welcome this mini edition of the Caviar Stick Eye Colour. Boasting the same ultra-flattering pigment performance just in an even more portable size, this Mini Caviar Stick Eye Colour is either the perfect way to discover the iconic formula or your excuse to invest in multiple shades... Ideal for those who love fuss-free eye looks, this sublime stick is effortlessly easy to use, combining seamless application with impressive staying power and high-impact colour payoff. Ideal for lazy days, on-the-go touch-ups and beginners alike, youll want to keep at least one of these nearby every time you apply make up. There are five simply sublime shades to choose from, including smoky jewel-like 'Amethyst', rich walnut brown with hidden pearl Cocoa and cool neutral 'Au Naturel'.
how_to_use: Apply to the lash line for a subtle smokey look, or all over the lid and lower lash line for a higher impact look. Blend with a brush or your finger.

name: Ultra Violette Daydream Screen SPF50 Tinted Veil 50ml (Various Shades)
description: A tinted moisturiser and SPF in one, the Daydream Screen SPF50 Tinted Veil (in 16 shades!) goes hand in hand with your regular SPF to boost protection and offer natural, radiant coverage. Offering SPF50+ broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection, all the while keeping skin super hydrated, this secondary SPF marries complexion coverage with skin-shielding benefits. Just remember to use your dedicated SPF first before this complexion champion! Plant-derived pentavitin is infused to deliver a dose of hydration and moisture to leave skin feeling plump, while rice bran is rich in antioxidants to lend another helping of hydration and soothe the skin. Coming in 16 flexible shades, find your ideal shade and the daydream of protected, hydrated and even skin will become a reality.
how_to_use: The Daydream Screen has been designed as a secondary sunscreen that sits snugly over your dedicated SPF. Use your fingers or a dry beauty sponge to gently buff into the skin for a flawless finish.
ingredient: Water, Homosalate, Octyldodecanol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol, Bis-Ethyhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Propanediol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Cetyl Alcohol, Octyl Triazone, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Lauryl Glucoside, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Poly C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Decyl Glucoside, , Saccharide Isomerate, Cellulose Gum, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Propylene Glycol, Disodium Edta, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492, Ci 77491, Ci 77499).

name: INKED by Dani Empowered Pack
description: Where intricate, hand-drawn sketches meet temporary tattoos that create lasting memories, the Empowered Pack is filled with mood-boosting designs accompanied by fine-line positive slogans. Made with cruelty-free, vegan ink and delivering high-pigment colour that can stand the test of time and heat, rest assured that your new ink won’t rub or fade away until you want it to. Boosting confidence with playful patterns that don’t need to last a lifetime, adorn your body with eye-catching designs. INKED By Dani’s temporary tattoos often last up to a week or longer depending on their size and placement but the majority will last at least 2-4 days. Who knows, you may even decide to get the real deal once they’ve faded…
how_to_use: Make sure application area is clean and dry. Peel off the plastic top sheet, place tattoo face down on your skin, and wet the back side of tattoo paper until completely soaked through with water. Press and hold for a few seconds, then gently peel off the paper to reveal your INKED.
ingredient: Acrylates / VA / Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer. May Contain: Black 2, Blue 1 Lake, Yellow 5 Lake, Red 7 Lake, Titanium Dioxide.

name: Tata Harper Lip Crème 2.5g (Various Shades)
description: Make dry and dull lips a story of the past with Tata Harper’s new Lip Crème. This melt-on-the-mouth formula is the stuff of beauty dreams with its youth-enhancing benefits — not to mention the five beautiful shades to choose from. Starring a protective and rejuvenating antioxidant superfruit complex, this hybrid crème also includes a deeply nourishing phyto-hydration blend, which works to moisturise and protect the lips. It’s also enriched with four superfruits packed with essential fatty acids and omegas to promote cell regeneration, seal in moisture and provide shine. Expect deeply moisturised kissers complete with the perfect pop of sheer colour.
how_to_use: Apply product directly onto lips.

name: SUQQU Gel Eyeliner Pencil
description: A silky smooth, long-wearing pencil that glides over delicate skin without snagging or skipping, SUQQUs Gel Eyeliner Pencil fulfils all your eyeline requirements. With its ultra-fine 2mm nib and incredibly creamy consistency, this pencil is jam-packed with pigment to tight-line your lashes or draw easy flicks that will stand up to anything life has to throw at them. Water and oil-resistant, choose from five classic colours Black, Dark Brown, inky-blue Navy, Light Brown and the soft, smoky Gray.
how_to_use: Twist out the lead about 1.5mm and apply it along the edge of the eyes from inner corner.

name: Natasha Denona Retro Glam Palette
description: What do you get when you combine two of Natasha Denona's most famous creations into one new covetable palette? The answer... The Retro Glam Palette! A truly dynamic colour story, this colourful creation fuses the greens, pinks and neutral nudes of the Mini Retro Eyeshadow Palette with a host of the seductive Glam Eyeshadow Palette hues for an unmissable new collection. Spanning everything from muted sage greens and cool-toned browns to the sparkling shimmer of champagne nudes and dusty pinks, this is a palette for all occasions.
how_to_use: Matte eyeshadows: Apply with fluffy eyeshadow brushes to blend or detail brushes for precision. Metallic / Duo Chrome / Chroma Crystal eyeshadows: May be applied with different shapes of brushes for a subtle application. For high pay off / foiled finish, apply with a damp eyeshadow brush or with the tip of your finger.

name: Urban Decay Perversion Mascara 12ml
description: Dial up the drama with Urban Decay’s ultra high-voltage Perversion Mascara – a game-changing creamy, conditioning blend with a glossy black finish for show-stopping lashes. Lengthening, lifting and volumising with a single coat, the high-tech brush and densely packed bristles grip, lift, wrap and separate each, individual hair to effortlessly amplify from root to tip. Neither too wet nor too dry, the texture is juuuuuust right, while the cocktail of nourishing proteins and amino acids – including marine glycogen – condition and stimulate growth to keep lashes strong, supple and silky. Honey extract and elastine work to fortify, while the high-shine, latex-effect finish is brilliantly buildable to upgrade every gaze and guarantee a breeze-inducing blink.
how_to_use: For even sexier lashes, prep yours with Subversion Lash Primer before applying Perversion Mascara.
ingredient: Aqua (Water/Eau), Synthetic Beeswax, Acacia Senegal Gum, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Cera Carnauba/Cire de Carnuba), Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Polybutene, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Soluble Collagen, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Behenic Acid, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Oleic Acid, Mel (Honey/Miel) Extract, Sodium PCA,Hydrolyzed Elastin, Glycogen, Serine. name: Beautyblender - Nude
how_to_use: Beautyblender is easy to use: simply wet, squeeze and bounce your way to make up perfection! Wet Beautyblender with water Squeeze out the excess liquid, using a towel if available Bounce foundation, powder or any other complexion product across the face for flawless results Cleanse after each use to help maintain the integrity of the blender's exclusive material Replace and never miss a bounce! It's recommended that you replace your Beautyblender every 3 months.

name: LIVE TINTED Huebeam Blushing Bronzer
description: With a blend of one blusher and two bronzer shades into a handy little compact, the Blushing Bronzer palette can be customised however you want it, offering the lightest flush of colour through to full impact pigment. Whether swirled together or used as individual shades, this lightweight formula packs a punch. Even better, this powder is brimming with skin-loving ingredients to elevate it above the other bronzer and blushers in your collection. For hydration, there's hyaluronic acid; to even skin tone, there's niacinamide; and to soothe irritation there's chamomile flower extract. Which means the more often you use this compact, the more your skin will thank you!
how_to_use: On-The-Go: Swirl all shades together and apply where the sun naturally lands. Sculpted: Using a small brush, press bronzer along the cheekbone to sculpt and apply blush on the high points of your cheekbones.
ingredient: Mica, Talc, Nylon-12, Octyldodecanol, Methicone, Magnesium Stearate, Niacinamide, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Silica, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Propylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Tin Oxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360).

name: Pat McGrath Labs Divine Bronze Luxe Quad Palette - Venusian Sunrise 4.8g
description: Donning your lids with sun-sculpted glamour, the Divine Quad offers a selection of smoulder-worthy shades and shadows which epitomise bronze heat. Creating skin-illuminating dimension, these long-wearing formulas that can be worn wet or dry range from angelic glimmers of golden hues to deepening, neutral-brown warmth. From sun-soaking sultriness evoking come-hither sensuality to luxurious shimmers, this versatile quad delivers intense colour payoff that lets your eyes do the talking.
how_to_use: Lightly contour and shape the eye by blending matte shades through the crease and along the lower lashline. Elongate the eye and define the lashline by applying Velvet Eclipse with a damp angled brush. Highlight the eye by blending shimmers onto the brow bone, eyelid and and inner corner-For stronger payoff, use a fingertip or damp brush to apply shimmer shades, then diffuse edges with a blending brush. Layer glittering shades over the IntensifEYES™ Artistry Wand for increased wear and opacity.

Sunset Taupe: Talc, Mica, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Silica, Dimethicone, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Diisostearyl Malate, Hexyl Laurate, Maltodextrin, Caprylyl Glycol, Zinc Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Carmine (CI 75470), Ultramarines (CI 77007). Velvet Eclipse: Mica, Talc, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Silica, Lauroyl Lysine, Maltodextrin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Methicone, Iron Oxides (CI 77499, CI 77491), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Carmine (CI 75470). Gilded Glamour: Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Polybutene, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Mica, Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Tin Oxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Zinc Stearate, Hexylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Polyethylene, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Cera Carnauba / CIre De Carnauba, Tocopherol, Iron Oxides (CI 77491).

name: Danessa Myricks Beauty Evolution Powder
description: Available in a myriad of flexible shades, the Evolution Powder is made with the modern day in mind it boasts microfine, lightweight pigment that looks seamless under the duress of TV, film and flash photography. (Were no Jennifer Aniston, but that sure sounds good to us). Ideal for use as a setting powder or a buffer against slick T-zones, this formula can be used under foundation as an oil-control primer or over foundation to set and finish your make up without looking cakey or settling into fine lines. Skin blurring technology works by diffusing the light to blur the look of imperfections, fine lines and uneven texture, all while allowing your skins natural radiance to shine through for a perfected, even, natural finish.
how_to_use: Easily apply with a brush or sponge. Use under foundation as an oil control primer. Use over foundation to set and finish makeup. Apply with a dampened sponge for a fuller coverage application.

name: ICONIC London Kissed by the Sun Multi-Use Cheek Glow 5g (Various Shades)
description: Seamlessly blending the warm hue of a bronzer with the vividness of a blush and the luminosity of a highlighter this 3-in-1 powder delivers that 'just been kissed by the sun' radiance whatever the weather... Super blendable and never glittery, this natural looking do-it-all cheek glow can be swept over cheeks lightly or layered for a 'just stepped off the plane' glow. Formulated with a high percentage of pearlescent pigments, this glow giver glides on the skin like silk. Plus, with an infusion of emollient esters this buttery soft powder swipes onto your cheeks and leaves them suitably moisturised. Available in a variety of sunshine-inducing shades, from the golden hued 'Oh Honey' to pinktastic 'Play Time' and peachy 'So Cheeky' this enriched, weightless wonder is never cakey and never powdery.
how_to_use: Sweep with your favourite blush/highlight brush and apply as a radiant topper to cheekbones, towards the temples, or build up the colour intensity on your cheeks for a sun-kissed, healthy flush.

name: Hourglass Lash Curler Refill
description: With the looks and the lifting power to back it, the Hourglass Lash Curler is must-have for any make up maven. Designed with a wide opening to suit every eye shape and size, the ingenious tool lifts and shapes to deliver an enviable curl with impressive staying power. With flexible layer of silicone to curl from base to tip without pinching, tugging or breaking your precious lashes, expect your best curl yet. Perfect for keeping your curler in tip-top condition, the Lash Curler Refill contains two silicone replacement pads that can be slotted into your tool, ready to reignite your love affair.
how_to_use: Replace lash pad every 3 months. Ensure replacement pad is firmly in place before use.

name: Shiseido Synchro Skin Soft Blurring Primer 30ml
description: Looking for a water-based primer that not only plays nice with your foundation but mattifies, blurs and refines the appearance of pores? Let us introduce you to Shiseido's Synchro Skin Soft Blurring Primer. The perfect partner to your go-to foundation, this Shiseido Synchro Skin Soft Blurring Primer is brimming with a mattifying peptide to help decrease the excess production of sebum that helps pore sizes look smaller while a sebum catch powder absorbs excess oil to prevent shine and make up deterioration. finally, a light diffusing powder helps to colour correct and even out skin tone for an enviable base you'll adore. Thought you already loved your foundation? watch it become even more perfect with this base underneath!
how_to_use: Smooth over face and blend into skin. Can be worn alone or under make up.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Lash Brag Volumizing Mascara
description: Anastasia Beverly Hills' first foray into mascara, this utterly must-have Lash Brag Volumizing Mascara lets you achieve maximum lash volume with minimum effort so much so you won't be able to stop bragging about it (geddit?). This voluminous mascara instantly creates the look of dramatic, full-bodied lashes with intense, jet-black colour. The specially designed hourglass-shaped mascara wand separately coats each lash with the lush, full-pigment formula that glides on without weighing down lashes. Non-drying and long-lasting, you can trust this formula not to flake or crust up throughout the day for a freshly applied effect hours later.
how_to_use: Just a single coat delivers the perfect amount of product, leaving you with voluptuously defined lashes that last all day. Apply 2 coats for extra length and thickness. Apply 3 coats for full-on extreme volume.
